The room size is also spacious for our family of 4.  They offer self-parking and valet at a reasonable cost.  We usually will uber or cab from the Anaheim Marriott to D-land. It is a $7.00 cost and so much easier than walking!  The team also goes above and beyond. The service is fabulous!  We so look forward to returning to the beautiful Anaheim Marriott!
Manager Response: Dear MYHlovetotravel,  Welcome back to Anaheim Marriott! It is nice to know that our hotel is your favorite when visiting Disney California Adventure Park. We are especially glad to know how much you appreciated our comfortable beds and well-appointed rooms that made for a great night's sleep.  We love it when guests enjoy our accommodations and staff so much they choose to stay with us again. Thank you for recognizing our efforts. Your continued business is the best recommendation there is, and we look forward to exceeding your expectations with every visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Thin Wall but  Convenient location to Disneyland
Summary: We're first placed at the Oasis tower, we've heard the bus backing up noise late night (after 12 am) and early in the morning (around 6 am). Then luckily one Marriott team member emailed me to follow up and I've told him the situation, then we've switched to another room in the same tower. However, it was even worse, I didn't know if it's the noise from some outside machinery or the fridge in the room, there was a constant noise there. And the phone in the room in not even working, I immediately run down to the reception again for another change. The lady then placed us in the main tower and I believed it's an upgrade as it;s with a balcony. That room was OK if you've more or less the same schedule with the people beside you or the same floor. The wall of the hotel is very thin,
Manager Response: Dear ICYicy,  We appreciate you taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel. We are delighted to know that much of your stay was satisfactory, but we are terribly sorry your sleep was interrupted by noise. Should you stay with us again please request a room in the quietest area of the building, and we'll do our best to honor your request. In the meantime, we will work with our engineering team to find solutions to these issues. Thank you once more. We are grateful for your feedback and hope you will return.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: It’s a clean hotel but the rooms are really small.  We try to stay at Marriott whenever we can.  I was sure to check here for reviews. I thought for sure I was seeing 4 stars and up.   I should have read closer.      The staff are friendly.   The hotel is clean.  It’s just that the rooms are so small.  7 day stay - very tight quarters.     Front desk- great   Clean- yes   Close to amenities and attractions - yes   No chest of drawers or anything in which to put clothes other than a piece of furniture in the closet about the size of a night stand, but it’s really of no use.  We are in an upgraded and newly renovated room.  2 queen beds.  One small chair.  The bathroom might take up an entire 1/4 of all of the real estate in here.    Couldn’t ask for friendlier and kinder staff.
Manager Response: Dear Johnhunt2008,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your feedback for fellow travelers. We are glad you were able to take advantage of many of our hotel amenities and that you enjoyed your overall stay. However, we are sorry that you were disappointed with the size of your guest room. For future reference, we have rooms of varying sizes, and we will gladly assist you in finding a more suitable option. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again during future travels.  Thank you,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We are Marriott Gold Members and very loyal to the Anaheim Marriott. We visit once or twice a year and always stay at the Anaheim Marriott. First disappointment was at check-in, we inadvertently had a reservation mix-up and had two rooms booked. A human error and they were going to charge us for the second room.  Gold Members! Finally they waived it. Secondly, I can confirm another reviewer’s feedback- we had booked and paid more for a balcony pool view, and our balcony was unusable the full four nights of our stay. Ropes and workmen outside our window and on our balcony, no balcony tiles or chairs, with no mention of this when we checked in, and no discount offered.  NFUSE Lounge closed for two of the four nights we were there for maintenance. Again no offer of compensation for
Manager Response: Dear MarriottGold2019,  Thank you for being loyal a Marriott Bonvoy member and for your continued patronage to our hotel. Our staff genuinely cares about providing an enjoyable stay for all of our guests, and this isolated incident is not a reflection of our usual service standards, as you know. Our leadership team has your survey so we can strengthen service excellence moving forward. Again, we apologize for the unpleasant experience and hope you will keep us in mind during your return trips to Anaheim. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you soon.   Thank you,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great customer Service, Awesome Food, Small Rooms
Summary: The hotel entry is beautiful with the marble floors.  I also came during the Thanksgiving holiday and Christmas trees were placed around the property - pretty.  The customer service was great.  I had a special request that was met.  The onsite food vendors were priced well and had very good food.  I ate at Slice, The Market and the restaurant.  All were great.  Given the prices of IHOP, the hotel breakfast buffett was a great choice.  The only issue was the lack of storage and closet space in the room.  We were there for 8 nights - 4 people.  There was hardly any storage space.  I had a balcony room - try to get one, it was great.  I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Tracy W,   Thank you for celebrating your Thanksgiving with us at the Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted our team took excellent care of you and that you were pleased with the delicious food we serve. However, we are sorry for not meeting some of your expectations with your room. It is always a joy to hear our guests are excited about returning; we are looking forward to it!   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Book through MVC who recommended a 2-double room for my family of 4. When I arrived at the hotel, the counter staff “generously” offered an “upgrade” due to my gold elite membership. To my family’s horror, we were given a room with 2 under-sized “double beds”, which I suspected are super single bed sizes. In addition, these were what we encountered during our 4-day stay:   1. The “upgraded” room offered has a balcony that was “freshly painted” for 4 days with the mats and cardboards still not removed. My balcony had been a forbidden ground. On the third day, there was a gondola outside hanging outside our balcony one afternoon and we were not informed about it. This is a dangerous intrusion of privacy which we don’t expect it.   2. Our room bathroom door was spoilt and we waited
Manager Response: Dear JacobO634,  Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. Although we are confident some of these instances are isolated, this in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you an outstanding experience. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for Mickey and Meetings
Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for two nights to attend a convention meeting.  The hotel is an excellent meeting hotel with a large ballroom and nice nearby meeting rooms.  Even better is that the hotel is a walk across the street from the Anaheim Convention Center.  The hotel is practically new -- fresh off a multi-million dollar renovation completed earlier this year.  Rooms have a fresh modern design and are well thought out.  Beds are probably more comfortable than your bed at home.  If there is any complaint it is that your room could be a long hike from the elevator as was mine and my view was of a parking lot.  Staff is friendly, accommodating and professional.  And -- oh yeah -- Disneyland is very nearby.  A great choice if you're visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Gary H,  We are thrilled your convention brought you to the Anaheim Marriott. It is delightful to know you loved our freshly remodeled property while the comforts of our bed exceeded your expectations. We are also happy to read you liked our courteous associates and that our proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center as well as Downtown Disney worked well for you. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back for another outstanding experience.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: One of many hotels within the convention centre complex and is expansive in size. It has an outdoor pool & hot tub, large bar and restaurant with buffet or al a carte breakfast. The location to Disneyland is about a 15 minute walk or for $6 per day you can get a shuttle run by the city (good option to save your feet!) which stops right out the front. Our room was newly renovated, sparking clean and spacious. Patio door opened right onto a sitting area. Check in/out was seamless and concierge helpful with information about shuttles to/from the airport. (Book then when you check in to avoid disappointment) Plenty of eateries in walking distance. My only criticism is the wifi is not free and they don’t make it overly clear of the charge. (It’s only free if you sign up as a Marriott
Manager Response: Dear TheTravellingTees,  Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are pleased to know our convenient location a couple of blocks form Disney, Anaheim Convention Center worked well for your plans. We are also glad our updated, spacious rooms, exceptional front desk service, and on-site dining options added to the enjoyment of your visit. However, we are unhappy to read your disappointment with our internet fees and regret any inconvenience this may have caused. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Our company, Jeunesse Global, recently had a mid-year, North American conference at the Marriott.  What a classy place!  Plenty of room, you didn't have to walk a mile to get to the conference center, lots of breakout rooms, convenient food service options and an extremely friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear John K,   Thank you for sharing your experience at the Anaheim Marriott. We were pleased to read that our convenient conference accommodations exceeded your expectations and our event staff took good care of you. We understand planning a conference can be stressful, and our team takes pride in making sure every event goes as smoothly as possible. Thank you again for your great feedback. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: They put on a first class business conference
Summary: This is a VERY nice hotel. The catered food was excellent all week and the selection was good as well. The meals were all tasty and a variety of styles were served. The rooms are really nice. The showers were amazing. The staff was helpful and the maid service did an excellent job. My only complaint is that the mattresses were too soft for my taste, which some people probably love.
Manager Response: Dear Jason G,   We appreciate your kind comments regarding how much you enjoyed the delicious food we serve. Thank you also for letting us know you were pleased with our friendly service and accommodations. It was a pleasure having you as our guest at the Anaheim Marriott, and we look forward to seeing you soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: Beautiful room. Bed very comfortable. But the best part...service. Do yourself a favor and choose valet parking. Have the bellman help. Tip. Enjoy. Great tv. And the walkin shower had a lot of pressure. Only down side, hotel gets loud around 1030pm when families return from Disneyland. Lasts about an hour.
Manager Response: Dear robinwillis2019,   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott for your stay. We are delighted you were pleased with our well-appointed accommodations and that you were impressed with the excellent service provided by our team. We will be sure to share your compliments with our team. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you soon.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Nice decor , very big rooms . Has separate living room.  2 big queen size bed. Coffee machine provided. Excellent breakfast. Good rates . Offer shuttle to Disneyland . Lots of stores and restaurants nearby hotel. Very convenient. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Dear Zaidzahari,  Thank you for staying at Anaheim Marriott. We are glad you loved our elegant decor as well as our spacious rooms with comfortable beds. We are especially happy to read that our location a couple of blocks from Disney and near many other attractions was perfect for your plans. We look forward to welcoming you both back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Very convenient, quality Marriott staff and services. I ate in the bar and restaurant as we ordered pizza from the pizza store. All food was top quality, concierge lounge staff friendly. If you have a convention to attend, this Marriott is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear 777robbm,  We are glad your convention brought you to Anaheim Marriott. It is great to know you had a fabulous experience and that you loved our staff as well as the food we offer at our restaurants. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: So, it’s not cheap. I’ll state that right up front. $229/night plus taxes, resort fee, and $26/day for parking.   But the services are excellent. The beds are very comfortable, the towels and linens are high quality, and everything in the room worked perfectly (iron, coffee maker, HD tv).   Many restaurants and activities are all in walking distance. Walked to downtown Disney for a meal and shopping.   Uber/Lyft are also really easy since Disneyland is just across the street.   Would definitely stay again for business. It may be a bit too rich for my blood for personal travel.
Manager Response: Dear biffnix,   Thank you for choosing to stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad your room provided the comforts you expected and that our close proximity to local restaurants and Disney was perfect for your needs. We are competitively priced; however, we are disappointed we did not meet all of your expectations. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A very well equipped hotel with excellent staff
Summary: We spent a few days here at a convention. The hotel is very spacious and well equipped and ideal for convention set up. There was an excellent bar and a good choice of other Casula eating choices. The hotel is also walking distance from Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Dear PeterG022,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know our ideal location, excellent bar, and appetizing food exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel is attached to the Anaheim convention center. Perfect for businesses. Lots of rooms for business to hold meetings and dinners. You may not realize but plenty of shops, restaurants and the Disneyland entrance are within a 10 minute walk. Walked to downtown Disney twice to shop. hotel is very clean and staff was friendly. All your needs will be met. The only downfall is no microwave in the room. There is a small fridge and coffee maker. The hotel dining is a little on the pricey side but can easily walk to IHOP, Denny's, Walgreens and other stores.
Manager Response: Dear Garnet603,  It is our pleasure knowing we met your expectations and that you appreciated our upscale conference accommodations, beautiful location, and cordial staff. We are also glad you liked our well-kept property and your comfortable room. Thank you for being our guest. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Very convenient location, friendly staff, nice property!
Summary: I've stayed here twice. There are no additional resort/parking fees. Both rooms have been very nice and modern. Easily within walking distance to Disneyland and they even let you leave your car in the garage on the day of your checkout. Staff has always been very friendly and certainly makes you feel welcome. The on-site Starbucks is a really neat place to grab a quick bite to eat. Very nice property and at the top of my list when I need to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Dear temecula951,   Thank you for returning to stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted you were pleased with our well-appointed accommodations, friendly service and our proximity to Disneyland. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: Went for a convention, the rooms were good and the staff was ok, the food was lack luster and the drinks are pricey, the wait staff in the restaurants are great, I would say this was slightly above average hotel experience.
Manager Response: Dear mtxprim3,   Thank you for choosing to stay at the Anaheim Marriott while in the city for the convention. We are pleased to know you enjoyed our well-appointed accommodations and were impressed by our restaurant staff. We appreciate your feedback as we are always striving to improve our guest experience. Thank you again for the honest evaluation, and we hope to welcome you back soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: First time to be here and loving it already.  It's our third day and getting better. Facility so nice , service,  staff sooo great!!! From having extra  towels , other amenities that I forgot to microwave having in the room is very convenient.  🥰🥰
Manager Response: Dear Marita A,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott during the Halloween celebration. We appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed our friendly service and thoughtful in-room amenities that we provide. We are thrilled we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience and look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My family (husband and children 9 &11) and I had a one night stay at this property.  We had an excellent time and can’t wait to return for a longer staycation! I am a Gold Elite members and our stay was upgrade to Platinum Elite, what great surprise!!   I was very impressed with the level of customer services.  I was contacted before during and after our stay to inquire about the quality of our stay.   I chose to do a mobile check in and received my key before the time requested.  Although, it is a large convention hotel, my stay felt personalized!  The property appears to be recently renovated.  The common areas have plenty of space to lounge and provided nice amenities.  There was a gift store, Starbucks, a quick bites eatery, Fed Ex office and a make your own Pizza
Manager Response: Dear love2travel79,   As a member of Marriott Bonvoy, we appreciate your loyalty to our brands, and we are glad we could welcome you and your family to the Anaheim Marriott for your overnight stay. Thank you for your wonderful comments about how much you enjoyed our excellent amenities and that the comforts of our well-appointed accommodations exceeded your expectations. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a convention next door. The hotel has an exceptional location and staff is attentive and friendly. The bonus for staying here is that if you have access to the lounge level you can avoid all of the lunch time crowds at the restaurants and within the convention center. We would visit the lounge and order room service to be delivered there. The food would arrive within 30 mins and you could have a conversation without the noise and crowds everywhere else. Bonus!
Manager Response: Dear MAMomof3,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott on your business trip to the city. We are delighted to know you loved our convenient location and that you found our associates to be friendly and welcoming. We appreciate your kind compliments about our M club access along with the quality food and timely service we offer. We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My family stayed at the Anaheim Marriott Oct 6th-9th.  I cannot say enough amazing things about this hotel.  The staff was phenomenal! I wish I wrote down all of the hotel employees that we had interactions with.  The lady who checked us in was so friendly and engaging.  We ate at all of your food establishments and was not disappointed in any of the food.  Our best service was on the outside patio next to the pool.  We had the same waiter on two occasions (his name started with a J I believe), he was a student at a nearby college studying business and he actually purchased two Disney water bottles at the gift store to give to our two children as he wanted to make sure they had the best first experience to Disney, as we were there for their Oogie Boogie Bash.  On our first night
Manager Response: Dear Tourist65218,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your family's first time Disney experience. We are also delighted to know your kids had a great time at the pool and that our outstanding hospitality far exceeded your expectations.  We never compromise on quality in our service, accommodations, or the food that we offer, so we are happy that you appreciated it. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another enjoyable experience.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott Anaheim when we visited Disneyland Resort for a few days in Oct 2019. This property was only a 17 minute Uber ride from Orange County Airport. We stayed on a Concierge Floor, which offered a convenient breakfast, snacks, light evening fare and dessert. We ate once in the poolside restaurant, and had excellent service and food. Transportation to Disneyland is also available right out front. All of the employees we encountered were friendly and professional, and the room was clean and well appointed.
Manager Response: Dear Seattlecyn,   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott during your trip to Disneyland. We are delighted our location was convenient for your needs and that you also enjoyed our breakfast and Evening Reception. It is also nice knowing you loved our friendly service, comfortable accommodations, and that you had a wonderful time at our poolside restaurant, nFuse Bar & Kitchen. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for 4 nights for our Disneyland trip. The check in process was quick. There always seemed to be lots of employees around to help with anything and they were friendly. William at the concierge desk was amazing. I wanted to surprise someone in our party with a special treat and he did just that. Room service was quick and the food was good. We had a standard queen room and it was very clean. It was very modern which was nice but at the same time it didn’t have a cozy welcoming feel, kinda stale. Another down side to the room was the lack of storage space. For our family of four there was not enough space for us to unpack and put our clothes into cabinets. But overall we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear LDelima,   Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott during your Disney trip. We appreciate your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from our associates, especially William. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights for our visit to Disneyland. Its a 1.5/2 mile walk to the Disneyland park. The rooms are nice and clean and the property is well maintained. The biggest downside is the far away expensive self parking. Getting a space is a challenge in the car park. At the check out, the FO executive insisted on providing the Marriott membership number instead of email id on records, in order to make the in room wifi complimentary, which was bit strange. But overall experience was good. Recommeneded!!
Manager Response: Dear gaurav2307,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know you loved our convenient location and well-appointed accommodations. We are grateful for your recommendation and feedback. We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Great customer service! Very attentive and friendly staff at the concierge, not to mention their food is amazing anything and everything! Very clean and spacey rooms. The balcony view is nice to get away and unwind.
Manager Response: Dear samanthabK5985HH,   Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! It is also great to read you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations along with the lovely views and the food we serve. Thank you again, and we look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have been attending Tradeshows in different parts of the country and the experience has not been good  What an amazing surprise to check into the Marriott and they had every clerk open took me 5 minutes to check in.  Rooms were nice and clean.  Only issue if you are attending a convention wear comfortable shoes the convention center is  a good walk away.  The restaurants are also a good jaunt away from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy W,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott. With our impeccable service and spotless accommodations, we are thrilled to read that we were able to provide you with a comfortable experience. We enjoyed serving you and look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit to our area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our five night stay at this hotel.  Room was relatively large.  Laminate floors gave room a beachy feel.  View was unlimited to the south and over the pool.  Elevators are very impressive and efficient.  We ate breakfast and dinner in the Concierge Lounge on the 18th floor.  We had drinks and a sandwich poolside one afternoon.  Food and drink prices are high in the hotel but hard to avoid in this area.  Nice area outside around convention center.  Easy walk to Disney and reasonably priced shuttle service available also.  Desk, cleaning and concierge staff were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear stevendale,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know our amiable staff, spacious accommodations as well as our convenient location and appetizing food offerings, exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for three nights, this hotel was convenient and close to Disneyland and the Convention Center.  The room was modern, clean and nice.  Plenty of places to dine in the hotel.  Would stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear A1607QBlisag,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney and Anaheim Convention Center was perfect for you. We are also happy to know you were able to relax in your clean, comfortable room. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to doing so again in the near future.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Top valet team very efficient and friendly, thanked me for my business, didn’t hear anything close to that inside.  Love the way the elevator panel instructs you to a specific door and travel to your floor is direct, you don’t have to stop at every floor on the way to yours. Enjoyed the balcony as well.  The biggest drawback is availability of food.  The market is closed by 730, only the expensive restaurant or pizza remains and the dough tastes really weird. If you are going to do pizza do it right, this isn’t right!   Gift shop was interesting all shirts, nothing for the bottom, buyers need to rethink that.    The immediate area is cleaner that most and if you get too far off the tourist areas you will become a target for homeless begging.  Be aware of your surroundings.  Also
Manager Response: Dear 812841,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott. We love knowing that the attentive service provided by our valet associates exceeded your expectations. We will surely share your compliments with them. It is also nice to know how impressed you were by the convenience of our elevators and that you enjoyed shopping in our gift shop. However, we are sorry for any inconvenience you had due to our surroundings. Moreover, we have shared your concerns with appropriate team members, so that we are well-poised to serve our guests. We value your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Not a 4 star hotel at all.
Summary: Everything about this hotel is over prized in regards to the standard. Small pool, small bar, small restaurant. $4 for a bottleof  water, $45 for a rub eye, that was average at best. Rooms OK and clean, but an incredibly loud AC that is guaranteed to wake you up several times each night. On the positive side, nice nd friendly staff everywhere
Manager Response: Dear dtravellerhappy,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed there to be close to Disneyland and as a hotel next to the convention center it made to suit both people visiting for the convention and Disney. The hotel is a standard hotel but rooms are equipped differently. You would expect to get a better coffee machine than the coffee they had. The only thing that really disappointed me and it's not the fault of the staff is that I ordered packages for me personally to be delivered to the hotel as it was the end of my trip and wanted to have them delivered to me instead of travelling with them from state to state. To my surprise, they charge $5 for each package and imagine you get 10 or 15 small items and end up paying $50-$75 for packages that didn't charge as much to ship. I understand if I had a meeting or a business where they
Manager Response: Dear nasser665,  We strive to make your stay a complete success and appreciate your constructive feedback. We are happy we met the majority of your expectations.  We regret that you were not aware of our package handling fee prior to your arrival.  We hope that we have the pleasure of serving you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I got a room on the 14 floor at the Oasis tower. It is a little bit walk from the front desk to the Oasis tower. The good thing is that the Marketplace/ Starbucks is on the first floor at the Oasis tower so it is quite convenient for me to grab an egg croissant for breakfast. The room is spacious and clean. The bed is comfortable with different choices of pillows.
Manager Response: Dear EJ885,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know you liked our comfortable accommodations, cordial associates, and our on-site dining options. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott was perfect! We were attending a big convention and the host hotel across the street was sold out. So glad that I stayed here instead. The hotel is updated and very well maintained. The restaurant choices were great. We had breakfast at The Market almost daily. The Power Up breakfast is the way to go. Our room overlooked the pool which was nice. Although we could hear the large air conditioners when the door was open, we were very comfortable. The beds are great and our room attendants were terrific! The location is perfect especially if you are attending a convention at the ACC or going to Disneyland. All the staff were very friendly. I would highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear BellaGood,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott while you were in the city for a conference. We appreciate you mentioning how much you enjoyed our well-kept property, various dining options, and the attentive service from our associates. We are also glad you loved our comfortable rooms, and the ideal location just steps from the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center. We appreciate your kind recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have been to this hotel several times over the years for meetings but hadn't visited recently. There seems to have been some recent renovations. Everything ran smoothly from my perspective during a 3 day conference stay even though there were several large meetings going on at once. The hotel seems to be well-staffed with friendly people. The concierge lounge was fine and open at all advertised hours. Everything was promptly restocked as necessary (unlike my experience at the Pasadena Sheraton on the same trip). Very impressed by the professionalism and comfort of this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Chris W,  We appreciate your consistent support of the Anaheim Marriott. It is always a pleasure to see a familiar face, and we love having you as a regular guest. Thank you for mentioning how much you enjoyed your time at the concierge lounge and the attentive service from our staff during your recent conference stay. Your continued business is the best recommendation there is. Please come back again for another fantastic visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Not what a Marriott is in my mind
Summary: So I just finished a three night stay at this hotel for a conference. First, let me say that the saving grace of this place is its staff. We had catered lunches each day at our conference of over 750 people and the staff worked its butt off and it showed. Everyone was pleasant. Now, the hotel. I was in the Oasis Tower. Supposedly updated. The rooms have pargo/fake hardwood in them. So, they are noisy and you can hear everything from the rooms near you. I was in a room in a corner so another room butted against mine and the noise from the adjoining room was enough to make sleep an issue. The beds and pillows are comfortable. The TV is huge but channel selection is limited. Now, the bad. I checked in on their app before arrival. I asked for a digital key. When I arrived, the key
Manager Response: Dear Greg B,   As a Marriott Bonvoy Member we greatly appreciate your feedback and take each one of your concerns to heart. We are truly sorry that we did not live up to the standards that you expected from us. We have taken note of the issues you outlined and will be working with our team to improve these areas. We are committed to providing you with the best accommodations and service, so we apologize that we fell short during this visit. We greatly appreciate your choice to stay with us and thank you for your loyalty to our brand. We hope you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust on your next visit to this amazing city. Take care and safe travels.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for a 3-day convention at the Anaheim Convention Center.  This hotel is very close to the convention center with a walk only taking a few minutes.  It sometimes seem longer to get through the hotel complex than to the ACC.  My room was in the Oasis Tower and had been updated. There are wood type floors with modern furniture. I find these floors harder on the feet and the room above is noisier! There is no drawer space in the room, so things had to either hang up or be placed on a shelf.  This room faced South and was on the 5th floor. It was a corner room, so had balcony access.  But the view is over the parking garage and hotel convention space, so lots of AC units and roof.  Bedding was very comfortable. I liked that the AC could be set to
Manager Response: Dear mkemows,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott for your stay. We are glad you liked our ideal location, cordial staff, and delectable breakfast. We are pleased we met most of your expectations, but regret not reaching them all. We value your feedback and will use it to make improvements. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Anaheim Marriott We tried the Marriott suites in Anaheim last year and were forced to leave once again for false advertising and moved to the grand Californian in 2018.  This year August 22, 2019 we tried Anaheim Marriott which is different from the suites; giving them a second chance as they are close to Disneyland, however we had the same HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!   We booked at Anaheim Marriott and they charged me for three nights when we only stayed for one and were forced to leave due to the condition of the room. I had complained about the room not being what we booked, the view was of a dirty roof with exhaust pipes, a huge unmanicured tree right at our window, thus, we did not have the “guaranteed” (another lie!) view we booked.  Although the hotel states it’s a non-smoking
Manager Response: Dear World_Traveller_Nico,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your concerns so we may properly address them. It is quite disappointing to know we failed to provide you with the exceptional experience we strive to provide for all of our guests. First, we are sorry to hear about your experience at another hotel in the area. Unfortunately, even though hotels may be under the same brand and strive to provide experiences the meet the high expectations and Marriott standards, we cannot account for that experience as both hotels are under different ownership and management. We also regret the disappointment caused to you by your guest room and the view it provided. We have various room types and room views available, and we are always happy to try our best to move you to another room should you be dissatisfied. However, there are some times when this is not an option due to the many conventions held at our hotel and being fully booked. We know this is frustrating, and we sincerely apologize. However, your comments regarding the appearance of our rooms are concerning. Each guest room has been recently renovated, and we are very proud of the results.   In addition, we are very happy to hear about your remission, but we are sorry for the issues caused to you by smoke from other guests. The majority of guest requests favor a non-smoking hotel environment. The only way to provide this experience is to not allow smoking within the building. We do provide designated smoking areas outside the building to accommodate the needs of guests who smoke. However, should smoke bother you or somehow enter in your room, we ask you notify us immediately so we may address this.   Thank you, as well, for letting us know about the charges applied to  your card. Once you choose a hotel and see the list of rooms and rates for that hotel, select "Rate details" below the room description to see the cancellation policy for that rate. After selecting that rate, you will also see the cancellation policy in the Summary of Charges section of the Review Reservation Details page. If your reservation has already been made, you can open the reservation and view the cancellation policy from there. However, we appreciate you bringing your concerns to our attention. We will share your message appropriately within the organization.   Thank you once more for taking the time to share your feedback. We sincerely hope to have the chance to make a better impression on a future visit. In the meantime, we wish both you and your daughter safe travels and hope you have a great day.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: So I have never stayed at this hotel...I cancelled my reservation directly with the hotel and was told that I would receive a refund from the conference planner.  Turns out the 24 hour reservation cancellation 'policy' meant because I cancelled 72 hours after booking and about 6.5 weeks before the event I lost $600 because the hotel took the $$ and not the conference planner. I have spent months calling, emailing and phoning to see if I could get a partial refund or any refund at all but to no avail.  I even turned up in person whilst I was traveling and they refused to speak to me.  So it was definitely a disappointment...
Manager Response: Dear NTValadao,  Thank you for your review and for choosing our hotel. We certainly apologize for the issues you encountered with your reservation, which led to your disappointment. Our hotel has a standard cancellation policy that applies in most situations such as yours. If you made a reservation through a third party, prepaid booking site, you must make financial inquiries through them. We recommend that you contact them directly for the resolution regarding your billing concerns. Please send us a private message with your personal contact information so we may investigate and assist you further.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Not a bad hotel. Neat and clean. Bed was comfortable and houses keepers do a good job. No water is provided. You can get a bottle in your room you can purchase for $4. CVS is a ten minute walk for a case for water for $2.99. Pool area is small for such a large hotel.     Also, I would not recommend having a conference here unless the lunches are catered. There are only a couple small places in the hotel for meals. The nearest places to eat are 15-20 minutes away by walking. When there is a schedule you will get back to the session late because it took too long to get to lunch. Seemed like a fair amount of families stayed here for Disney.
Manager Response: Dear 114Eric,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted knowing you had a pleasant stay. However, we are sorry for problems that inconvenienced you, and we are taking steps to keep them from happening in the future. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel, comfortable rooms, clean, friendly staff, everything you need and more. The amenities are great, the market has everything you might need, a nice pool, big fitness center. Close to restaurants, Disneyworld, and convention center. Great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear espeesh,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott. We greatly appreciate you sharing your comments about how much you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations, upscale amenities, and the ideal location to nearby attractions.  It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Terrific location from Disneyland if you cannot stay at the Disneyland resorts. The pool was on the smaller side but it wasn’t busy during the afternoon hours. The staff was pleasant and the rooms were comfortable and clean. The location to Anaheim Angels stadium is great as well. 40-50 minute drive from LAX.
Manager Response: Dear kaylal986,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney. We are thrilled to know you loved our ideal location, and that our well-maintained rooms and friendly service enhanced your visit. We are grateful for your feedback and do hope to welcome you both back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel is very comfortable. I like pool view rooms with balcony. Several food options for eating in the hotel and nearby. Staff was polite and helpful. Starbucks in the hotel too. Walking distance to Downtown Disney and Garden Walk,  Large flat screen TV in rooms.
Manager Response: Dear TravelLynn2015,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience with our well-equipped rooms, friendly service as well as the ideal location to nearby attractions, particularly to the convention center which worked for your plans. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We've been staying at the Anaheim, Marriott for Vdicon for a couple years now. The staff is always nice and accommodating. The pool is small for the size of the hotel, so get out to the pool early if you want a good seat. We stayed last June 2018
Manager Response: Dear Stilly09,  Thank you for returning to stay with us at  Anaheim Marriott for the Vidcon visit. It is great knowing you had another outstanding experience as our guest, and that you loved our excellent hospitality. We will share your praises with our team. It was a pleasure serving you and your family, and we hope we will continue to be your hotel of choice each time your plans bring you to the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel with a Great Location
Summary: This hotel has had a lot of expansions so it's multiple towers and sections of the hotel that all flow together. (But pending where your room is located, it could mean a lot of walking!) This hotel had a nice lobby. Not too big, but nice. There is a restaurant and a mini-Starbucks nearby on the first floor. The pool area looked very nice, although I did not get in. The front desk staff and housekeeping staff was very friendly! It's right beside the convention center and walking distance to so many things! We even walked to Disneyland from the hotel! Great stay!
Manager Response: Dear nolan_nichols,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott and that our ideal location worked well for your visit.  We are also happy our hospitality exceeded your expectations, and that you loved our hotel amenities as well as in-house dining options. Thank you for the compliments, and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I'm staying here for Vid Con and have a bunch of talent rooms that were booked in advance and have caused a slight logistical nightmare as far as checking them in correctly and paying for them, but Savannah and Zachariah have been so beyond helpful! And in the middle of a Vid Con check in rush no less. Looking forward to my stay here with such great customer service already displayed!
Manager Response: Dear Alyssa M,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! I will be sure to share your comments with our team, especially with Savannah and Zachariah. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Overall it was a nice stay. The hotel is recently renovated with a beautiful lobby area. I was lucky enough to be given a corner room with a balcony, and although the physical room was excellent the location wasn’t too great. Due to the earthquake that took place on Friday evening the elevators in the hotel went down. Which led to ALL the guests on my floor using the staircase next to my room to get in and out of the hotel. The constant slamming of the door along with the location of the room being right next to the stairs (and I mean literally right next to the stairwell door) made for a bit of a noisy night trying to get some class work done.   The shower floor was also very dirty as there were debris and hair on the floor. I ended up just cleaning it myself as I did not want
Manager Response: Dear ceelo23,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted knowing you had an overall pleasant stay. However, we are sorry for problems that inconvenienced you, and we are taking steps to keep them from happening in the future. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: 8,700 students for FCCLA conference & the earthquake!   WOW~
Summary: We had a great experience at the hotel.  All staff friendly and  always on points.  Front desk and room attendants were great.  They accepted my package and even though they charged me, it was perfect shape and mostly there.  Perfect location for Disney and Convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Baybug2012,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! Our main priority is your comfort, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations with our service levels. Also, it is good to know our location was perfect for your needs. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Skip it. I am Marriott gold and it did me no good. No early check in to start. I was told very curtly check in time is 4 pm.  So we waited and waited. We were sent to the oasis tower which at first I thought was an upgrade. Not so as the main hotel has all the balcony rooms . The second day I was here I put a breakfast room service sign up requesting between 6:15 and 6:30. 6:55 still no breakfast. I called to cancel . Thank goodness for the Hilton right across the street ( CLOSER to the convention center I might add ) . My meetings were in the Hilton but I thought I am a Marriott kinda girl . Anyway thankfully the Hilton had a lovely breakfast buffet. The only reason the place gets 2 stars is the infuse restaurant inside is pretty amazing.
Manager Response: Dear maniy2017,  Thank you for being a Marriott Bonvoy Gold Elite member and for taking the time to share such valuable feedback regarding your experience as our guest. We strive to always provide early check-ins, especially for our loyal travelers; however, we can only do this based on availability. We regret the disappointment caused to you by this, and we appreciate your patience. In addition, we are disappointed to know we failed to promply deliver your room service for breakfast. These comments will be reviewed with our room service team, as this does not meet our standards in excellence. Thank you once more for bringing these issues to our attention. We hope you will consider staying with us once more so we may regain your confidence. Until then, please travel safely and have a great day.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: What a great stay at this hotel near the convention center
Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott because it was a conference hotel for IDEA WORLD 2019. We were upgraded when we arrived because I am a member of the Marriott BonVoy system and couldn't believe our rooms.  So much room.  And quiet on the room levels despite the multiple conventions and DisneyLand crowds in the hotel. The food and service in the restaurant was amazing.  They knew us by name after the second day.  The waiters and waitresses were asking us if we had a schedule so they could rush our orders.  The buffet had a gluten free corner and separate toaster.  The coffee was always hot and good. The front desk staff took good care of us on check in and check out. Great hotel!
Manager Response: Dear bluewater08,  We are glad your conference brought you to the Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted to know we exceeded your expectations and that you particularly loved our comfortable accommodations and convenient locations. It is also great to know you enjoyed the delicious food at our restaurant and that you were impressed by the service provided by our staff. Your kind compliments will be shared with our entire team. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, very professional, good location
Summary: This hotel is well located. We visited with our 4-year-old to go to Disneyland. It is in walking distance from the parks (15 minutes flat stroll) and there is also a bus that takes you directly to and from the park from this hotel. It felt very safe too. The lobby is nice and there is a real atmosphere here. The Starbucks in the hotel was also great. The staff were very friendly, very professional and everything was well presented. The room was quite small, but very modern and very clean.   The only negative was that we could hear the people walking around in the room directly above ours - all night (maybe we just had party people up there). I would recommend a top floor to avoid this but it's very minor.
Manager Response: Dear THG74,   Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney. We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your vacation with your daughter. After a fun-filled day at the park, we are so happy you were able to relax in your clean, comfortable room. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Arrived the morning of conference with three of my colleagues and requested from the check in desk to try and get rooms on the same floor. And after a few minutes we got room in Oasis tower second floor. I got Comer room with King size bed and big shower and big Balcony The room was very clean and it would Have be nice to have small fridge in the room.. Liked the Big screen Tv which had the option of streaming so I could watch my Netflix series’s. There is nice Restaurant and market place and pizza onsite. The Hotel in walking Distance to Disney land and different restaurants like Morgan and others. Or just Uber away from Restaurant or Target . We had a nice conference with all the Hotels staff organization with halls etc. Would recommend to my friends and family To stays at
Manager Response: Dear MarkK483,  We are glad your conference brought you to Anaheim Marriott and that you loved our accessible location, spacious rooms, and in-room amenities. Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your stay. We highly appreciate your recommendation and do hope to welcome you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: HURRY! HURRY! READ ALL ABOUT IT!  Today I drove down the Yellow Brick Road to be greeted by all the Wizards. Each and everyone of them worked their magic,as though they were "Merlin". As I entered the Emerald City, I reached the top, to open the doors to my Fortress. As I dozed off, I slept in the softest bed hand stitched by the sheep's themselves.  As I awakened, I realized, it was not a dream, nor was I in Kansas, but in California at the Marriott Hotel. Follow the Yellow Brick Road,your destination awaits....
Manager Response: Dear Taytavon7877,  We love your review title. And we loved the gracious description of our dedicated staff and comfortable beds at Anaheim Marriott. We highly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Excelent service Shaun Williams - Guest Services!
Summary: I arrived for a convention at this hotel and Shaun just took care of all my requests, going the extra mile! Excelent service! Thank you Shaun ! You made my day ....  the hotel is well located and has many restaurants nearby.  Perfect location for business meetings .
Manager Response: Dear Hifumi2016,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are thrilled our location worked well for your visit and that our courteous staff, particularly Shaun, took such great care of your needs. Your compliments will be surely shared with them. We appreciate your business and do hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The only regret I have from my recent trip to Disneyland is my decision to stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  As a lifetime Titanium Bonvoy member, I prefer to stay in Marriott hotels when I can and the vast majority of Marriott hotels have treated me very well.  The Anaheim Marriott is an exception.  I will NEVER stay here again under any circumstances and recommend that you do the same.  When you receive a nice email from the hotel prior to your stay asking how they can make your stay more enjoyable and you reply asking for simple things like foam pillows and the hotel completely ignores your request, what do you call that?  When the hotel ignores your Titanium status and refuses to give you any kind of a room upgrade even though you are paying more for your room than the high
Manager Response: Dear wildwriters,   We appreciate your loyalty to Marriott Brands and thank you for sharing your feedback about our hotel. We are disappointed you had an unpleasant experience and that we failed to live up to the high standard you have come to expect from Marriott. Please accept our apologies for letting you down due to not having the upgrade or specific room preferences you desired. We do our best to honor all guest requests, but there are times when the desired preferences are unavailable. We understand your frustration, and we will address the rude manner in which our staff responded to you with our entire team. We value your business and hope you will reconsider giving us another chance to make a better impression during your next visit to the area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Great staff at the front desk, concierge, restaurants, and housekeeping. Everyone was very considerate and offered great suggestions and made sure I knew about all the available services. The floors were NOT carpet, which made me feel like it was so much cleaner. Could not have been happier about my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Mn0902,   Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel was just awesome! Clean, friendly staff, perfect location, Starbucks inside, amazing price, excellent value!!!!  Stayed in the oasis tower and couldn’t of asked for more. Even on the day of check out, we left car in garage, and we’re Going to leave bags with Bell station....until “Sal” offered to load them in our car for us!!!!!  Great Hotel!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear rempt1,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you acknowledging our efforts. Your comments will be shared with them, especially Sal. We are also glad to know you loved our location as well as the on-site Starbucks and that we were able to meet your expectations at a great price. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Clean and inviting hotel - walking distance to the convention center. Also walking distance to the Disney resort.  Check in process was efficient and my stay was without event.  I would stay here again if I was attending a conference or going to Disney
Manager Response: Dear bthomps01,  Thank you for staying with us at Anaheim Marriott during your convention trip to the city. We are pleased to know you liked our ideal location close to the convention center and Disney resort as well as the seamless check-in. We look forward to hosting you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I had a balcony room which was nice to relax.  Very clean hotel. The downstairs bar had slow and terrible service, but I think it’s because the vintage guy working there for too many years.   Great location for everything in the area.
Manager Response: Dear bama7471,  Thank you for staying with us at Anaheim Marriott. We are pleased to know you loved our well-appointed rooms and excellent location. Although you had an overall great experience with our service, we are sorry that it was not the same at our bar. We value your feedback and look forward to hosting you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room we stayed in had been recently updated, it was clean, it had plenty of room...it was lacking in drawer space. GREAT water pressure in the shower. The bed and pillows were comfortable. Walking distance to Disney, and the convention center is right next door.
Manager Response: Dear Scott B,  Thank you for evaluating your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Nothing is more important than your satisfaction, so we are delighted to know how happy you were with our excellent staff, spacious accommodations as well as the convenient location. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you again soon for another enjoyable stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have been a loyal Marriott customer at least for the past 6 years.  Every year when I attended the annual convention at the Anaheim Convention Center,  Anaheim Marriott Hotel was always my first choice.  This year I had a HORRIBLE experience.  Recently, the hotel had merged their reward program & made some changes onto the program.  They claimed that they became bigger & better but instead they took away some of the important benefits to the gold members.  Prior to my arrival, I called the hotel & asked about the new program,  the front desk conveyed the changes to me. He gave me the impression that since I am not at their highest level of the reward program, & now that they have merged with other hotels & have more members that belong to the Platinum & Titanium, so the gold
Manager Response: Dear Nebu L,   Thank you for your loyalty to the Marriott brand and for bringing this to our attention. We take your concerns very seriously, as we never wish to cause our guests’ any inconvenience. We invite you to contact us directly at the hotel so we can fully solve this matter. Thanks!   Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager 714-703-3150  zuyen.urbina@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Super nice staff and treated us like family!
Summary: I was incredibly surprised by the warm welcome by the staff of the hotel.  We were on vacation to celebrate my daughter's 5th birthday and the team made it a really special occasion for her.  They prepared a thoughful hospitality gift which was already placed in the room prior to arrival.  The team even provided a beautiful card with signatures from entire staff.  This kind touch was completely unexpected and surpassed all of our expectations. My daughter totally loved it!  I should also mention the accommodations were superb and well maintained.  The kids has fun at the pool and I was able to get a good workout in the expansive health club / gym.  All in all, a great stay at an excellent property.  No doubt this is will be the only hotel I'll stay next time we're back in
Manager Response: Dear MillionMile8888,  We are happy to read that you and your family had a pleasant, fun-filled stay at the Anaheim Marriott. There is nothing more rewarding than knowing you were impressed by our hospitality. We are also glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and that you liked our accommodations as well as the pool and fitness center. Thank you for choosing us to celebrate your daughters birthday, and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Service from arrival was spot on, even though the hotel was was hosting a kid's dance competition which looked quite hectic. Rooms are very modern and clean, and the bed was surprisingly super comfy. It's a large property so expect to walk a ways to get around, but overall a really great experience!
Manager Response: Dear dentravelr,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the excellent service you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we are glad we met your expectations. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Good but can be better easily
Summary: This hotel is centraly located, closed to Disneyland and the convention center. Nice rooms, mine had balcony, Great TV, refrigerator, nice gym... BUT, when you play hundreds of dollars, you could expect a complimentary water bottle, that the shower gel and the shampoo won't have the exact same ingredients (only different bottles), and I won't be charged for delivering packages to the hotel... These are the small things that are easy to do, but if not have a negative impact on your impression.
Manager Response: Dear Koby11,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney. We are thrilled to know you liked our well-appointed accommodations and that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your trip. Your feedback is valuable to us as it helps us to improve future guests' experience. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Very clean well maintained rooms, excellent conference facilities.   Adjacent to convention center.  Very nice staff.  Parking is expensive in my opinion.  I stayed in Oasis tower.  Very quiet and closer to car.
Manager Response: Dear greglinmon,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending the conference at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel.  We are happy our accommodations and hospitality met your expectations, and we look forward to your next visit with us.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Where do I begin?  Check in was a breeze, room was ready and super clean.  The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom roomy with lots of counter space and lots of hot water, the A/C worked very well and was quiet (a find!) and the sliding door to the Juliet balcony opened for fresh air.  Delightful!  The staff couldn't be more welcoming; every single person I saw had a smile on their face and gave a warm hello.  Was there for a conference at the ACC, so the location couldn't have been more convenient.  The landscaping was gorgeous, resplendent with jasmine, so every where I walked, the fragrance was gorgeous.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear JFsB,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending a conference at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. We are happy our service and accommodations exceeded your expectations, and we look forward to your next visit with us. Thank you for the recommendations!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was in town 1 night for a business meeting. The hotel looks like it recently went through a remodel as it has the newer concept “hard wood” floor décor.  I was upgraded to a corner room and the closet was small, but the bathroom was fairly large and the bed was comfortable.  The restaurant was good for a simple bite to eat, but the chicken sandwich was dry as sandpaper. The waiter was cheerful, friendly, and offered to give me an iced tea in a plastic cup to go. He gets 5-stars in my book for going the extra mile at lunch and being friendly even though the restaurant wasn’t busy, he wasn’t going to let that bring down his cheerful attitude.  The only major problem was the air conditioning. It was fine when the fan was on low but it was a bit stuffy so I set the fan to high and
Manager Response: Dear TravelinKenChi,  Thank you for leaving a detailed review about your time at our hotel. We are delighted to know you enjoyed our updated design as well as the personable service you received at our restaurant. We wish all of the areas of your stay were perfect and regret the air conditioning in your room prevented this from occurring. Please accept our apologies for the fan disrupting your sleep. We have forwarded your concerns to maintenance to prevent a repeat occurrence. We enjoyed hosting you, and we hope we will have the chance to exceed all of your expectations during your next visit to the area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have always loved staying in Marriott hotels. Our experience with the staff at the Anaheim Marriott solidifies my loyalty to the brand. Elsie Carbajal, and her team, really helped make our stay fantastic!
Manager Response: Dear KCmotravler,   We appreciate your loyalty to our hotels and are delighted to welcome you to the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from our team, especially from Elsie. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: Hi, this hotel is updated, well-appointed, great proximity to Disneyland, and we got a very reasonable rate.  The staff was helpful except for one incident I had upon departure.  I was told upon check-in by the front desk staff that I as a hotel guest would get a $19 rate for overnight parking.  This rate isn't listed anywhere, so the only way I could know about it is if I was told by a Marriott employee.  When I checked out on 5/12 around 8:00am, the man charged me $26.  I told him what I had been told and he resisted giving me the promised, advertised rate about three times.  He said that was only the rate for convention members, even when that's clearly not what they told me the afternoon before at check-in.  He then said I should check with the parking people, which I again
Manager Response: Dear 521viviena,  Thank you for evaluating your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are pleased to read our accessible location, well-appointed rooms, as well as friendly service, met your expectations. However, we are sorry that the parking charges were not conveyed to you properly during the check-in and the inconvenience you had while you were here. We hope this did not overshadow your otherwise great stay and we look forward to welcoming you and your family again on your future visits to the city.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was very surprised by the hotel. This hotel is beautiful and customer service was incredible. Great dining with the restaurant called Nfuse. They also have a place called Market Village. Things you can pick up like snacks and star bucks is there. The also have a pizza place you can walk you and create your own pizza. Free ex office and Hertz rental service is there. The rooms were beautiful and clean. The elevators amazed me because there is a key pad to summon the correct elevator to escort you to the appropriate floor before you go to the elevators on the side. The only down side is the parking structure if you decide to self park is far from the lobby to check in.  I would recommend this hotel if you are looking for comfort and style. I need to go to bed feeling clean and
Manager Response: Dear divayumi,   We are so happy you had an outstanding stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We appreciate you mentioning the features you most enjoyed, and we are pleased that nFuse Bar & Kitchen, Starbucks, and Pizza Hut made that list. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: What a lovely hotel! We had a great room - a good size with 2 very comfortable queen beds, a balcony from where we could watch some of the Disneyland fireworks and a good sized bathroom with a fabulous shower. The room was very quiet, super clean and quite modern. Beyond our room, the hotel itself also had great amenities. The foyer and reception area were large, modern and well layed out. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the food options were excellent too. We had room service one night and very much appreciated the option of being able to pop downstairs to collect it, thus saving the standard ‘tray delivery fee’ that all hotels charge. Each morning we were pressed for time so being able to buy a quick breakfast on-the-go, plus a good coffee - from The Market - was
Manager Response: Dear LuLuJ41,   We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing & recommended us for your visit to Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights to enjoy disneyland and the surrounding areas. Firstly I liked the location and we didn't mind the walk to disneyland although if we had kids I would take the bus. I loved the feel of the lobby with the bar, Starbucks pool area etc. It felt big and I like that. The room looked nice and modern however I was not a fan of the hard floors, much prefer carpet in a hotel, it didn't feel homely. The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept it. However.. And this is my gripe. The insulation on these rooms was terrible! We were on the 6th floor and we could hear all the noise from people out by the pool, it was so loud! Also we could clearly hear the couple next door through the walls, so clearly that we could actually make out what they were
Manager Response: Dear SteveShell30,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott. We are happy to know you liked our convenient location, comfortable accommodations, and the lobby. However, we apologize you were inconvenienced by the noise from the other guests. Our front desk is available to resolve issues, so we are sorry we were not aware of the noise problem, as we would have been happy to try and resolve the issue or move you to another room. We hope you will come back and see us the next time you are in our area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed for 5 nights for a conference.  Registration personnel was extremely accommodating and check-in was a breeze.  King room with modern furnishings.  While the bed was low to the floor the mattress was extremely comfortable.  Bath had shower only with rain shower head and a wand.  Loved the fact that the shower wand was included.  Wonderful views from balcony.  Restaurant (NFuse) had wonderful food offerings.  Steak & Eggs and Lemon Blueberry pancakes were to die for.  Staff was attentive and prompt.  Marketplace for coffee (Starbucks) was great and again staff were wonderful. I'd definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Karen G,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott while you here for your conference. We loved reading how much you enjoyed our hospitality, views from the balcony, delicious food we serve, comfortable accommodations as well as the prime location. It was our pleasure serving you, and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great Experience for My Birthday Weekend
Summary: When you arrive you are greeted by friendly staff that truly set up the whole stay.  Shaun Williams at the front desk got us a great room over looking the Disney fireworks, Being huge Disney fans this was a great thing, coming back to the room to watch the fireworks, The concierge lounge is amazing, great staff who are friendly and always willing to help. Then you head to the rooms that I believe were recently remodeled, They look great, private balcony to relax and read a book . When I arrive to the room I was greeted by a knock , and staff bring me and my wife a special gift along with a hand written card saying Happy Birthday. This meant a lot. This stay was truly magical, This hotel is great for conferences, couple, family, or just stay cation . We did eat the pizza place
Manager Response: Dear BeHaPpYSmileMore,  Thank you for choosing Anaheim Marriott to celebrate your birthday and your lovely comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you and your wife received from us. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. Also, it is nice to know you had a great time at pizza hut. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager
