Summary: The hotel was nice and every staff member I encountered were friendly and helpful.   The reason I only rated this hotel a 3 was due to cleanliness and accuracy of reservations.  The reservations were incorrect.  Multiple times we spoke with someone to get it resolved and then would find out that it was still incorrect.  The room also had a lot of hair in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Dear curtismsjr,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted knowing you had a pleasant stay. However, we are sorry for problems that inconvenienced you with our housekeeping services and front desk reservation assistance, and we are taking steps to keep them from happening in the future. Thank you once more for taking the time to share your feedback. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE and terrible location from Disneyland
Summary: We checked in late like around 9:30 pm because we took too long in Disneyland. The first receptionist took more than half hour to find us a room. She initially tried to push us to take the two rooms that had construction outside. She was reluctant to reveal the noisy condition of those two rooms. When we declined to take those rooms, she made us wait for a long time. By the time she finally found us a room, we were beyond exhausted. When we went up to the room, we discovered it’s a room with one king size bed (the receptionist didn’t inform us at all). The whole family of 4 had to go down together to ask for an explanation. The original receptionist was not available so we got another staff called Evelyn to help us. She demonstrated no customer service at all. She right away
Manager Response: Dear Travelermomo17,   Thank you for taking time to share your feedback. It was disappointing to read your comments concerning your stay at our hotel. Please accept our apologies, as we never mean to disappoint our guests in any way, and we definitely failed in this attempt. We can assure you that what you experienced is not acceptable by our standards, and we will be taking the proper action to ensure a more wonderful experience for every guest entering our doors. We are truly grateful for your feedback, and we hope you will give us another opportunity to show you our level of commitment to delivering exceptional hospitality. Take care and safe travels.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Do not stay if you are visiting Disneyland with your kids.  They had a convention at the time of our trip. The lobby was full of drunks, and that scared the kids to the point of having to get another hotel.  Trying the check out, the manager would not reimburse our money, we checked into the hotel for a total of 3 hours.  Shame on Marriott for taking this stance, they should warn people with kids if there is an event like that going on.  Will never stay at a Marriott property again based on this!
Manager Response: Dear anakkash1,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs. We are committed to delivering an outstanding experience to all who visit, and we apologize this was not the case for you. Please know a majority of our clients are convention attendees, though we do welcome various families and leisure travelers to our hotel due to our proximity to Disneyland and many other attractions. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope you will give us another chance to make a better impression.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Very Nice Location Next to Convention Center
Summary: Hotel lobby remodeled recently as well as Starbucks and Food Court. Nice convention facilities. Rooms are small but okay. Really loved the elevators where you put in your number and it programs each individual elevator floor for you. Staff was friendly despite lots of people. Really liked that this hotel seems to limit the amount of "Disneyland" conventions unlike the Hilton. This seems like a business hotel while the Hilton next door allows in every teenager magazine sales convention they can find to come. This means Marriott is quite for its size so I slept well. My biggest suggestion is better food and friendlier staff in the concierge. Liked late check out for Platinum Elite.
Manager Response: Dear scottpU3985BC,   As a member of Marriott Bonvoy, we appreciate your loyalty to our brands, and we are glad we could welcome you to the Anaheim Marriott. It was a pleasure reading your compliments about the things you liked as well as your valuable feedback about our concierge staff. Thank you for your business, and we hope you will come back and stay with us again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina,  Front Office Manager

Summary: Great stay, except I was not allowed for a late check-out? I was only asking for an hour, due to a meeting that I will not end til 4PM. I attended a business conference for 4 days. Food at the market is good.
Manager Response: Dear roelam,  Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. Although we are pleased you experienced an overall great stay, we sympathize with the frustration you felt from us not being able to grant you a late checkout due to our high occupancy with many large conventions in town. This inconvenience in no way excuses the fact we failed to grant your request. We want to extend our sincere apologies for disappointing you. We hope you will give us another opportunity to provide you with a flawless stay; we wish you all the best with your travels.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I am a regular at Marriott properties, and once or twice a year I stay at one of the convention hotels. This location is adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center and I stayed 6 nights for a convention. The location was great ... adjacent to the convention center and across the street from Disneyland. The couple blocks near the hotel offered several dining choices from fast food to fine steak houses. The check-in was pleasant although I learned that my status had slipped from Platinum to Gold just a couple weeks prior so I could not access the concierge lounge which was a disappointment. The room was good size, had a large screen television, ample work area for both me an my colleague that allowed us both to keep our computers busy. The only negative was the lack of towel rack
Manager Response: Dear bharrier,  Thank you for being loyal to our brand. We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending an event at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. We are happy our service and hospitality exceeded your expectations, and we look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Management unwilling to work with customers to fix mistakes
Summary: I recently spent days trying to book a conference reservation through Marriott, only to be told over and over their systems were down.  Days later, when they could finally book my room, the group reservation rate was full and no longer available.  After calling and talking to Ryan and Remington, I was told 'nothing can be done', which is never true in this business.  I've had countless Marriott property managers go above and beyond to fix issues, but apparently this property is different.  I'll be canceling my reservation and staying at the Hilton across the street.
Manager Response: Dear chbrandt85,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. This in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you outstanding customer service. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we review this with our team. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My family loved this hotel. The staff was incredibly warm and helpful. It is walkable to Disneyland but it is only five dollars for a round trip bus to the parks. The ART busses are similar to the busses at Disney World. I preferred to just take the bus since the stop is literally steps from the lobby.  It was nice that there was a Hertz rental car right on the premise and it made it very easy to do a beach day. We ate at Starbucks a few times and also at the pizza place called slice. We also had the breakfast buffet at the hotel restaurant and it was very good and reasonably priced especially since kids eats free.  The room was very modern and clean. Absolutely no complaints. My kids loved having access to our Netflix on the smart tv and also really liked the pool. We look
Manager Response: Dear 531JenniferP531,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your family's vacation. After a fun-filled day at the park, we are so happy you were able to relax in your clean, comfortable room. We can’t wait to welcome you back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel is close to Disney (about 1mile walk, along a sidewalk well shaded and lined with palm trees). The hotel rooms were clean, comfortable, and had HBOgo and room service. Definitely will stay here again next time visiting family in the area.
Manager Response: Dear sdircks051218,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your visit to the area and that you loved your clean & comfortable room. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We took a mini vacay for Spring Break and was very pleased with the Marriott!  It was a great location, though after a day of walking at the parks we decided to Uber back (less than $10!).  Very business oriented with the proximity to the Convention Center, but it was OK. The room was comfortable and newly renovated.  A few of the employees that should be recognized are William at the Concierge, Vivienne at the pool/lounge and Justus at the valet (who did a dance off with my son.).  They truly made the stay even more memorable.  The food was delicious (try the ahi poke) and not overly priced.  My only disappointment was that the pool wasn't warmer but I assume it warms up as the weather does.
Manager Response: Dear katelynn210,   We are delighted you chose the Anaheim Marriott for your mini vacation. We are delighted you could take advantage of our perfect location and that you were impressed with the thoughtful service provided by our associates. We will be sure to share your compliments with our team, especially with William, Vivienne & Justus. Thank you also for letting us know how much you loved the ahi poke we serve. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you and your family soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel was well maintained the room was excellent. The staff were friendly and very helpful especially William the concierge. The only thing that let it down was that we wanted some peace and quiet time by the pool for an hour or so a day and the workmen made it impossible to have any peace. Great place for Disney, the shuttle service is good
Manager Response: Dear K287WLlees,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience at our hotel. We are delighted to know you were impressed by our superior hospitality and had a great stay. We will surely share your compliments with William. However, we are sorry for the inconvenience you had due to our ongoing revitalization project. We work hard to keep inconveniences to a minimum but, unfortunately, some interruptions in our normal routine are unavoidable Please come back again for another fantastic stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Old A/C units even in refurbished rooms means a noisy night's sleep
Summary: Thanks to platinum status, we got triple upgraded from the base room to a "city view refurbished" room. The room was recently retrofitted with new, modern furnishings, but the guts of the room felt like they hadn't been upgraded since the 80s. Specifically, the in-room A/C compressor was super loud, which prevented us from getting a good nights' rest, as it would come on/off every 20-30 minutes to keep the room cool enough to sleep. Opening the window isn't an option due to street noise and guest noise (the hotel attracts a lot of kids).
Manager Response: Dear ericbogs,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted knowing you had a pleasant stay. However, we are truly sorry for problems that inconvenienced you, and we are taking steps to keep them from happening in the future. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We needed to book a one night stay in Anaheim on April 4 and we got a good rate for this hotel by paying in advance.  This hotel was very nice. We are familiar with the hotels in the Convention Center area so finding the self-parking was not difficult and Google Maps routed us correctly through the roundabout.  We were greeted promptly at check-in and the process was efficient. The elevators are unique and something I hadn't experienced before.  When you press the call button for the elevator you select your floor.  A digital display will tell you which elevator to board and it takes you directly to that floor.  You don't have to select the floor when you board the elevator and there are no floor selection buttons inside the elevator. The self-parking is a little bit of a walk
Manager Response: Dear 30scottn,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott for your overnight stay, and for sharing your comments. We are delighted to know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County and look forward to your future visit!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a long weekend to visit Disneyland and Disney California Adventure. Though the hotel was crowded with guests for a nearby cheerleading competition, we were never ignored or felt out of place. Hotel is a bit tricky to get to, as it is on the same property at the Anaheim Convention Center and several other hotels. Valet was courteous and prompt. Check-in was a breeze. We can't praise Shaun W. at the front desk enough! He checked us in and was kind, informative, and gave us tips not only for our hotel stay, but also for our trip to Disneyland. There should be more wonderful people like Shaun at today's hotels. Julie at the front desk was great! She helped us out when we couldn't figure out the Wi-Fi. We were assigned room 1738, which was roomy and clean. Blanca
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie L,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott.  Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. Your kind will surely be shared with our team, especially with the ones you mentioned. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel was close to the convention center so it was convenient for a conference. However, i was disappointed with the service. I stayed at the same hotel two prior and it was great. If this was my first time, I would not go back.
Manager Response: Dear elsiejclay,   Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your comments. We truly appreciate your feedback as it helps us identify the areas in which we can improve our guests experience. We sincerely apologize we were unable to provide you with the expeditious service we are accustomed to delivering. As we strive to provide all of our guests with a positive, memorable experience your comments will be shared with our team to ensure we are better equipped to serve our guests moving forward. Again, it was an absolute pleasure to have you as our guest. We hope you will consider providing us with another opportunity to show you the level of hospitality we are known for.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here on a weekend trip to Disneyland. It was about a nine dollar taxi ride to Disneyland. It had a great pool for the kids to swimming and also a nice pizza place where we can get pizza at the end of the day. It had a nice exercise room. The beds and rooms were all updated. The bathroom is a little bit small. It has a nice view of the convention center. Easy parking. Would go back!
Manager Response: Dear 751shanel,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney!  We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your family's vacation. After a fun-filled day at the park, we are so happy you were able to relax in your clean and comfortable room. We look forward to your return visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This place has all you need if you are here for a convention or to visit Disney.  Rooms are small but I found the staff very helpful.  Lots of food options and the market in the hotel is great.  They are updating many of the rooms so they are keeping it up nicely.  Grounds are beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear rodjan5,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Anaheim Marriott. We appreciate you mentioning the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. We are happy our service and hospitality exceeded your expectations, and we hope to see you again soon. Thank you again for the compliments.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel on a trip to visit friends and to visit Disneyland for a couple of days.  The public areas of the hotel are lovely:  lobby, dining, pool, fitness center.  The location is great, we walked to Disneyland 1 day, and took an Uber the 2nd day.  The walk is about 15 minutes, so too long with younger kids but fine with older kids.  Uber was only $5-$6 and a couple of minutes.   There is on-site self-service laundry which was a nice bonus.    The room and bathroom were very small.  The bathroom in particular was extremely small.  We found it difficult to get all of us ready and out the door.  For a modern hotel, the bathroom was huge disappointment.  If I went back I'd book a different hotel simply due to the small, non-functional bathroom.   Our biggest problem was
Manager Response: Dear jlee10015719,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your family's visit to Disneyland. We are happy our close proximity to the park, fully equipped fitness center, and dining were perfect for your family's needs. However, we are disappointed the size of our rooms and our concierge lounge made your time with us less than ideal. We have noted your concerns and apologize for any miscommunication on our part regarding our lounge access policies. We are committed to our guests' satisfaction and will continue to work hard to ensure everyone leaves completely satisfied. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to servicing you again during your next trip to Disneyland.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed there 2.5 days just for a business meeting, the hotel is well maintained and the service just wonderful. With its convenient location, you can walk around the surroundings of Disney and enjoy the lovely sunshine.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed at this Marriott several years ago and was very disappointed. The hotel showed its age and really needed a makeover. So while I’m a Marriott platinum member this time we are staying at the Hilton Anaheim. While here we decided to check out the lobby. Quickly it was clear that a lot of renovations and upgrades were completed. We decided to have lunch on their outdoor patio and we were all very pleased. Now I’m sorry I didn’t book it for this trip. Next time in Anaheim it’s this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear X7906NOjosephf,  Thank you for being loyal to our brand and for reviewing the Anaheim Marriott! We are glad to know you had a great dining experience with us. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel is just a 10 to 15 minute walk (depending on your speed) to Disneyland.  The hotel is well maintained and very clean. We booked a balcony pool view but needed two rooms close together and were moved to a balcony city view and it was lovely. We woke to up to palm trees lining the courtyard every morning.  Shaun Williams checked us in and he was so friendly and welcoming!  He took the time to make sure our requests were met. He used to work at Disney and gave us some helpful tips too!   We really liked the  elevator as it was super efficient and fast! The buffet breakfast at Infuse was great too!  They had made to order omelettes, waffles, fresh fruit and much more.  Kids ate free per paying adult which was a bonus!!  Thank you for a wonderful stay Marriott.  You
Manager Response: Dear insearchofbluewater,   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott. We love getting feedback from our guests and truly appreciate your comments regarding our accommodations and hospitality. Team members like Shaun are a perfect example of the passionate and dedicated spirit of service that we value. It was a pleasure hosting you and your family, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Huge 1200 plus rooms. Understaffed by people who don't care and are poorly managed. Awful front desk staff. Valet guys try to scam tips from you at check in. Need to walk forever to your room, very confusing. good wifi and location is ok. Breakfast was above average but expensive. My key had problems two time I had to go get it replaced.   Management at the hotel needs to be shown the door!
Manager Response: Dear DrewDrewDrewDrewDrew,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs. We are committed to delivering an outstanding experience to all who visit, and we apologize this was not the case for you. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope you will give us another chance to make a better impression.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here two different nights last month due to my husband’s job and it was fantastic. Friendly, professional service and lovely renovated rooms. Bed were very comfortable. 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear vettegirl1,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us again and look forward to welcoming you and your family again soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Checked in for a couple of days of work, got a very nice, newly updated room, extremely comfortable bed and great amenities. Only on the 2nd floor, but very quiet, there was a high school DECCA convention going on, but all the kids were well behaved, didn't bother me a bit.
Manager Response: Dear barnesrph,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending DECCA convention. Thank you for letting us know how much you liked our liked our updated accommodations and excellent amenities. It was our pleasure hosting you,  and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This review was important to me to write as prior to our stay at the Anaheim Marriott I had read a handful unpleasant reviews and nearly changed our plans.  Fortunately, our family (family of 4 along with 3 grandparents) decided to keep our reservations here.  Our group had a total of 3 rooms.  We all found our rooms to be well appointed and clean!!!  Cleanliness is extremely important to us when rating a hotel and the Anaheim Marriott definitely met expectations.  I loved that the room had laminate flooring rather than carpet.  To me that just feels cleaner and it was a really nice look as well.  The rooms had mini fridges, lots of plug-ins and usb ports for all of your charging needs which was a real bonus!  The kids were thrilled that we could log into our Netflix to watch
Manager Response: Dear Darci C,     Thank you for the kind feedback of Anaheim Marriott. We are overjoyed to learn that from start to finish, your stay was nothing short of exceptional. Also, we will be sure to share your compliments with Fernando. Thank you again for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Still good Marriott quality.. seems to need a little interior facelift... The laminate floors were a different touch in the room but we got used to it. Balcony was a nice touch but no chairs on it. Good quality beds and clean and proximity to convention center was great.
Manager Response: Dear cannonater,  Thank you for the review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott! We are glad you had a pleasant experience and that you liked our ideal location and comfortable bedding.  It was our pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here for two nights for a conference and enjoyed it very much. We had a great room (1151) with a balcony and tons of windows. The bed was incredibly comfortable. The bathroom is very small and there is almost no storage for unpacking. Otherwise, it had everything we needed. The hotel restaurant (nFuse) was very good and the conference facilities were great. The staff were very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen42,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott while you were here for a conference. We are happy our service and facilities exceeded your expectations. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Had a family reunion to visit Disneyland over two days. We stayed at the Marriott Anaheim convention center.   One of the best stays I have experienced. The staff at the Marriott were outstanding, accomadations excellent, restaurant and bar great.   The Marriott and it’s staff made our family reunion and Disney visit memorable. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear jmpm1,   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott for your family reunion. We are delighted to know how much you enjoyed our location and the excellent service provided by our staff. We also appreciate you recommending us to our future guests and hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This property is close to Disneyland, clean and at a fair priced. The gym also has all the up to date equipment. I think parking nightly was $31 for valet or $26 self. Their is a few spots to eat on property and even more within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear jerryn856,  Thank you for letting us know your visit to the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your trip. It is also nice to know you found us to be a good value. Thank you again, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I'm a price conscious traveler. And I found this to be very good value for what I paid for. I'm a relatively simple traveler, and the hotel was exactly what I needed. The only thing was that I couldn't find free water to fill up my water bottle besides the faucet. But I was able to get free water in the fitness center.
Manager Response: Dear TonyL4731,  Thank you for reviewing your visit to the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad you found us to be a great value and enjoyed your time with us. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Business trip with a Disney day
Summary: We stayed in a lovely recently updated room with solid surface floors (that looked like wood) the room also had a balcony with chairs and a table to enjoy the outside.  The hotel staff was responsive to our requests for early cleaning of the room.  The staff in the restaurant, in the bar, the market, and the gift shop were very friendly.  We walked to Morton’s for dinner, it’s half a block away, which was very nice. We caught the ART bus (convenient bus stop out in front of the hotel) to Disneyland on one day. Over all we had a wonderful time.  Thank you, we’ll be back.
Manager Response: Dear Katiearmywife,  Thank you for making the Anaheim Marriott a part of your business trip. We are happy our service and hospitality exceeded your expectations. It is also nice to know that our location close to Disney added convenience to your visit. We enjoyed hosting you, and hope you will choose us again whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a week for a business conference. Conveniently located near the parks. Beautiful views from the personal private balconies. Modern decor. Lots of food options with lower room service rate ($5 flat delivery free). Great amenities with a great shop, gym, pool, and wonderful bar. I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Renee S,  Thank you for making the Anaheim Marriott a part of your conference visit. We are delighted to know we were able to exceed your expectations with our excellent accommodations and hospitality. We truly appreciate your compliments and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Good convention location, lacks attention to detail
Summary: This hotel is very convenient for conventions in the Anaheim convention center, but overall I was disappointed in the experience. Pros: great location, good food and drinks at nFuse (hotel restaurant), comfortable Marriott beds and towels, friendly service and fully equipped gym. Cons: you can hear everything that’s going on in the rooms next to you, as well as in the hallways (including your neighbor’s wake up alarms), no coffee to be had in the hotel until after 6 am (other than the in room service, which is terrible), no acknowledgement of loyalty as a Platinum Marriott member - not even a bottle of water. I asked for a feather free room with a king bed near the elevator - it’s on my profile as well as in my special requests when I checked in online. Instead I got two double
Manager Response: Dear Memeheg,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you loved our location and our lovely facilities. However, we are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs due to our attention to detail. We are committed to delivering an outstanding experience to all who visit, and we apologize this was not the case for you. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope you will give us another chance to make a better impression.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Well this review could've potentially been worse or better. As it started off with an odd check in experience. I arrived before my husband who is a Platinum Member. The lady had to start my check in and see that my husband was a Platinum Member before she lightened up and smiled. Why not just be nice to everyone who checks in whether they are Platinum or not? Everyone is paying a premium for this hotel. She also asked if my husband was coming, which I've never been asked before when checking in without him. After I told her not tonight. She informed me she'd be applying reward points and not giving me a Food and Beverage option, as if I was going to try and steal my husbands 1000 point opportunity for a candy bar or glass of wine. Check in was just weird, and not what I'm use

You have our assurance we will learn from your situation so we are better equipped to provide a first-rate experience to all of our guests. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Staff was very helpful, and the rooms nicely renovated.  Not a luxury hotel, but also not a highway option.  A bit on the pricey side, but that's to be expected given its location.  Plenty of information and support for folks visiting Disney Land.  Very active business conference location.
Manager Response: Dear Scott2211,   Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted we met most of your expectations and that you enjoyed our perfect location and comfortable accommodations. We value your business and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a future visit.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Unless you are visiting Disneyland then this hotel location is not going to be convenient- and it is pricey for the quality. Rooms are clean but sparse. Dining options limited but can walk to nearby venues. Decent fitness centre and friendly staff
Manager Response: Dear Kat_Goes_Everywhere,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are happy knowing you had a satisfactory stay. However, we are sorry for problems that inconvenienced you, and we are taking steps to keep them from happening in the future. Please know we are always availale to offer recommentdations with areas of interest surrounding our hotel. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Protesters outside of window at 5:00 AM every morning.
Summary: The room was nice and the facilities were up to par.  However,  every morning of our trip there were protesters outside of our window with an obvious issue with Marriot.  The would chant and bang musical instruments for at least 3 hours, waking up myself, my wife and my daughter.  This should not be allowed and Marriot needs to do something to fix the issue with the people protesting, this is no way to spend a vacation.  I tried to drop off a stroller which was rented through a 3rd party service with the Bell Hop and he reluctantly took it after he informed me that I was supposed to organize pickup of the stroller directly with the 3rd party.  For being a hotel with such a close proximity to Disneyland...this stay was certainly less than magical.
Manager Response: Dear sean h.,  First and foremost, thank you for choosing to stay with us. Please accept our apologies for the noise coming from the othe hotel on our street. Feedback such as yours helps us when planning future improvements, so thank you. We appreciate your business and hope you will come back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We often stay at the Anaheim Marriott when visiting Disneyland and it's a perfect option. It has convenient amenities on site, like a bar and market, and is easy walking distance to the park. The restaurant has a superb breakfast. The rooms also look to be recently renovated and are a good size. We'll continue to make this our first choice when heading down to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear taramaffeo,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of the Anaheim Marriott. We are so glad our close location to Disneyland worked so well for you. It is also nice to know that you enjoyed our excellent rooms and breakfast offerings. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location for Disneyland and Convention Visitors
Summary: They are going through a remodel which is OK since they are almost done.  The hotel inside and out is great.  The only problem is the beds OMG.  I had to a chiropractor this morning to get re adjusted.  The mattress are good ones but they don't have a base to them.  Those mattress need a box spring because you just sink into them.  We requested a roll away for my son that has a cast (broken leg).  In the middle of the night I had to move him and I slept on the roll away.  By then the damage was done.   The issue no bathtubs just walk in showers.   My poor kid couldn't take a shower.   So, we had to cut our trip short and leave the next morning.     Unless the fix the bed issues I would stay again but for now I would stay away.  Then parking is another issue there is only 6
Manager Response: Dear Minerva S,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are glad you liked our accommodations and found our location to be convenient. However, we are sorry for the inconveniences you had while you were here. Your feedback about the comfort of our bed is much appreciated as it helps us to understand how we can improve your experience in the future. We hope the positive aspects of your visit brings you back to us the next time you are in the area  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel was hands down the worst hotel experience in my life & I’ve frequented from 5 stars to 2 star hotels. Firstly, the rooms are small & the bathroom is smaller than a typical walk-in closet. They don’t even have fans & there is no noise barrier in the bathroom as the door just slide & not actually shut. The first night, the shower handle completely fell off. All that aside, the noise. I got no sleep in this hotel! We were on the 15th floor & could hear every garbage truck, motorcycle & person conversing out front of the hotel. To top it off, protesters started at 5am on a holiday with screaming on a loud speaker & banging on pots & pans & the front desk refused to even call the police to notify them. I’ve never experienced such a loud hotel & would highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear Michelle P.,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent visit. Our number one priority is for each guest to have an excellent stay, so we apologize that we failed to deliver in your case. We assure you this is not normal for us, and we hope you will come back soon so we can provide you with a better stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a recent trip to the Disneyland Resort. Every member of the staff was friendly and helpful, the hotel is beautiful and very modern. When we opened the door to the room I was very impressed with the aesthetic. The bed was the most comfortable hotel bed I think I have ever slept in, and we loved the open, simple layout of the room. Everything was the best of the best in our opinion.
Manager Response: Dear Mandy D,   Thank you for reviewing your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are thrilled you liked each and every aspect of our hotel, especially our courteous associates and comfortable rooms. Thank you again for your wonderful comments, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Stay and visit to DL park!
Summary: I chose this Marriott for The good reviews and knowing that it had been renovated. This hotel did not disappoint. The Rooms were renovated. They were spacious and the beds were comfortable. I did think that the shower lacked water pressure but the temperature was good. I loved the restaurant. We went for breakfast two days and they were very good. All of the staff was very nice and accommodating. There was a shuttle to the Disneyland resort right outside the hotel and that was convenient. You can buy tickets right at the front desk for five dollars. Some people on here mentioned that it was far away but it was not at all it’s right outside the doors on the green benches. That shuttle dropped off at the park right near the entrance. Overall we would definitely come to stay at
Manager Response: Dear lorid931,   Thank you for your wonderful comments about our outstanding service and for sharing your experience with us. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We will certainly share your compliments with our team! Thanks for your business, and please come back again for another fantastic stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The rooms are incredibly small with rather strange furnishings intended to make the room look larger.  Unfortunately, it doesn't work.  There are no towel bars in the bathroom, a tiny closet and came complete with someone else's hair in the shower.  Plus the hotel was under renovation on 19th floor, so lots of noise.  And the exterior was being painted, so hotel suggested keeping drapes shut during the day.  And the club room was open only for breakfast while we were there even though I had called the hotel directly to verify that the club room would be open in the evenings.  Staff was apologetic however I was disappointed with the room and using my points for a club level room when the club room was open for such limited hours.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen R.,  Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. Although we are confident some of these instances are isolated, this in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you an outstanding experience. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We visited this hotel for 5 nights back in August. During the time of our stay, they were doing construction. We were not notified of the construction until check-in. The front desk employee was exceptionally nice and offered to move our room to avoid the noise. I'm not even sure if she moved us because the noises were so loud, it sounded like they were drilling the walls right next to our room. The banging and drilling started first thing in the morning and woke us up several times. We had just made a cross country flight over here and were exhausted! To make matters worse, there was a brief period of about an hour where our room had no running water. We had to call down several times until we got water back again. When we brought this up to the manager and explained we needed
Manager Response: Dear LNG4510,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. Summary Heading: Business and fun in one location
Summary: Great location near Disney and the convention center. Rooms refurbished and friendly staff. The “Market” cafe is really convenient with many good food and drink options. It’s by far better than the “marketplace” in any Marriott vacation club resort despite the fact this is not a resort. It also opens early at 6 AM and this is a plus as restaurants at the hotel open at 6:30. Elevators are fast and very convenient. Nice gym on the ground floor. Pizza place is convenient. One concern though as with all Marriott hotels; they refurbished everything but came short on having doors and windows that are sound-proof!! Yes you can hear people on the pool from any floor if your room faces the pool. They kept the same old doors probably from 20 or 30 years ago. Two advices: Make sure that
Manager Response: Dear Mason2012,   Thank you for the nice review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We appreciate you mentioning the features you most enjoyed, and we are pleased that Starbucks and Pizza Hut made that list. However, we are sorry you were disturbed at night by noise from the other guests of the hotel. Please come back for another visit and we will make sure that you have a quiet and restful stay with us.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Orange county, close to restaurants and Disney
Summary: Had stayed here a few years ago and when we were traveling back to the area wanted to stay here again.  was not disappointed. The hotel staff understands they are a Disney hotel and they are always friendly and helpful.  some of the greatest Marriott staff i have ever met.   the Nfuse bar area is great for lunch or dinner and also for wine, beer or mixed drinks.  always many people at the bar and most are friendly and willing to talk.
Manager Response: Dear CCW711,  Thank you for choosing us once more and for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad our ideal location worked well for you and that you had a great experience at our bar! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here when attending a convention, but had my family with me.  beautiful clean hotel with comfy rooms.  Kids loved the pool area.  they have a pizza place in the lobby and i think i could have eaten there everyday.  Id go back just for the pizza!
Manager Response: Dear ultraviolet_33,   We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights from 19-21 December, we wanted to head down to Disney. The location was great, walking distance to a lot of restaurants, shops and of course Disney land. We were informed about construction and potential noise, but this was unbearable. Also, when we walked in, something big was covered right as you walk in all during our stay.. and wasn’t pleasant looking. In my opinion, they should have shut down the section they are planning to renovate and do not let anyone stay. I saw construction people were walking in and getting everything ready while we are walking out to checkout as if we are distributing them. Bed was also very uncomfortable, we could be the last one to sleep in this bed though.

We hope that you will consider a return visit when our improvements have been completed to experience our renewed and refreshed hotel first hand.   We look forward to welcoming you back soon for a much more enjoyable experience.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Make sure to ask about CONSTRUCTION
Summary: There is current renovations going on, the drilling during the day is VERY loud.  Our room was nicely renovated but we could hear the kids next door ALL night.  Between that and the construction, we got very little rest. NO upgrades for Marriott Elite members which is unusual.  This hotel is close to Disneyland and it certainly felt like the focus was on that, as if they were doing us a favor.The Restaurant and room service has a limited menu.  There is a small Pizza place and a PRICEY Marketplace.  We found better choices walking across the street to Hilton where the staff was friendly.  The MUSIC played in the Hotel is terrible!! Someone needs to check on that.  Next time we will try the Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear teresanan,   Thank you for your candid review. I deeply apologize that you were not made aware of our renovations before you made your reservation. We do our best to minimize the impact our improvements make on our guests, however we apologize once more for you not being about to enjoy your stay to the fullest due to the noise. First we will reach out to our booking partners in hopes of better communicating to our guests about our current renovations in progress. Also your comments have been shared among the team to ensure we're working our hardest to eliminate these issues. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance to come back and enjoy our new and improved hotel.   Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here as part of a Disney holiday. The room is small, but fairly well appointed. It didn’t work well for us as breakfast for four (free child) was around $100 per day and there wasn’t a nearby alternative. It’s a really nice hotel, with a good takeaway pizza option, and the staff were really friendly. It’s a 15 minute walk to Disney, and if you turn right outside the hotel, over the crosswalk with Morton’s the steakhouse to your left there are free shuttle buses to the park. To the left of this crosswalk in one block is supermarkets and restaurants, and restaurants to the right in a block or two. If I was going back I’d stay in a suite with a kitchen, which I don’t think this hotel offers. Eating out constantly is expensive and unhealthy.
Manager Response: Dear James_hamilton44,  Thank you for sharing the details of your visit to the Anaheim Marriott. We are happy to know you were pleased with most aspects of our hotel and that you especially highlighted our location situated just a couple of blocks from Disney. It was a pleasure serving you, and we are looking forward to accommodating you again very soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Room not cleaned from Sat 22 to 25 Dec 2018 due to skipping Housekeeping
Summary: We arrived at 10.30 pm on Fri 21 Dec 2018 and checked in. The receptionist encouraged us to sign up for Marriot Rewards. The room would be cleaned after 3 days. So I thought our rubbish bins would be emptied on Monday 24 Dec. After a whole day out on Mon 24 and returning late at night, imagine our disappointment when we returned to the room and the bins were still in that state.  It was our 4th night in Marriot. (Fri, Sat, Sun and Mon). I actually went outside to the ice room and housekeeping room on the 12th floor to see if I could dispose of my own trash in some communal bin. There was none.  Anyway, no more joining Rewards programme. Would rather have a clean room. Luckily did not join Hyatt Centric SF Rewards programme.
Manager Response: Dear boon lin l,	  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations regarding housekeeping service in your room during your experience. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

No magic morning (please read fine print on the tickets) 4. Paid shuttle to Disney Parks.(Tip: You can walk to the Toy Story parking lot across the street and take a free shuttle from there.)

Summary: Clean hotel with lots of amenities including Starbucks, market, pizza, lounge, gym, pool and restaurant.  15 min walk to Disney or take a shuttle for a few bucks per person.  No bathroom fan or place to hang towel 😕

Summary: Was here for three nights and had great stay like always. Had a renovated room with wooden floors and a beautiful city view. I want to give a shout out to the staff working the concierge lounge because their customer service is always outstanding. Definitely my favorite place to stay when I’m in Anaheim.

Summary: Was here for 5-nights for a quick trip to Disneyland and then for a Regionals Pokemon tournament. I was in one of the newer rooms with the hard wood floors. I have to be honest, it was a little weird at first not having a rug under me but since I use socks a lot, it wasn't too much of an issue. The bathroom was very large and the beds were very comfortable. The Anaheim Marriott has a concierge desk for just Disneyland and it was with this person that helped me obtain everything I needed to know about the park. They also sell the tickets there, too. Don't bother with the gates, just get them ahead of time at the hotel. I ate in their main restaurant 3x and then their "market" 2x. Everything was very good although an obscene amount of brussel sprouts with most meals. Maybe they

The front desk receptionist name Louie (which I later came to realize is a freeking manager), was very arrogant, short tempered, and condescending towards all our simple questions like where can we get hot water, where are the elevators, etc.... Then I come down an hour later for our baggage and ask him where it is, and no matter how hard i try to get his attention he keeps staring down at his computer helping no customers. Another lady from the other far end of the table came and helped me. When i brought this to there attention the next morning the other front desk manager

Summary Heading: Generally a very good conference Marriott.?
Summary: Stayed 5 nights for a big event at the conference centre for which the hotel is perfect for. Whole hotel seemed fresh and clean, rooms spacious with a balcony and excellent shower. Used the restaurant once for breakfast which at $26 seemed a bit expensive although food was great. Staff were pleasant and helpful when engaged. One small issue, the market shop charges $4 for a small bottle of water. We all recognise hotel mark-up but that’s just greedy. Would definitely stay here again.

Summary: From the moment we were greeted by the Valet's and Bell Hop's we felt welcomed. We were greeted with warm and friendly smiles and great service. We were given a room very quickly even though it was 10 in the morning.  The room was large and open. The hard floors made them seem like they were always dirty. We even took our shoes off at the door to help avoid tracking in rocks, but our feet were always black. There was only one place to hang up a towel, kind of hard to conserve water when one of us was consistently having to throw a towel on the ground due to lack of places to hang them up. We also found multiple things behind the desk that had fallen back there from guests previous stays.  Overall a good stay. It was in a great location and you would have never known that

Summary Heading: Not the best but, I enjoyed the stay
Summary: Me and my family, stayed at the Marriott over the weekend. We went to Disneyland there. The hotel very nice looking but, the room we stayed at was was very average for a 4 star hotel. The employees were very nice but, the hotel it’s self was average.

Summary: This hotel was wonderful. The room was nice. There is a sit down restaurant and a quick service place and both were good. We spent several days at Disneyland and took the ART, which was very easy and convenient, it was also a pretty easy walk. This is a great hotel for a family Disneyland trip.

For example, Stephen Macias, the Safety & Security Supervisor, was really wonderful with my six year old daughter yesterday after she had received a splinter deep in her foot. My daughter's foot was in a lot of pain and she did not want anyone to touch it. Mr. Macias was very patient and for over an hour her consoled my daughter and kept her calm and made her laugh. He earned her trust and in the end calmed her down enough to allow him to pull the splinter out. He stayed with us and helped us for over an hour and not once did he lose his patience. He was very kind and he cared about my baby and making sure he would not leave our side until he
Manager Response: Dear FarAway582265,  We are so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Summary: Beautiful hotel. We stayed here a few months ago and the hotel staff were very accomodating, especially the HK staff named Irma while there our room was always spotless not only she did her job well but she took the time to write a farewell message what a great touch. Thank you for the hospitality.

Summary: I was in Anaheim for a conference at the convention center.  I was offered rooms in this hotel and the Hilton across the street.  I could not be happier with my choice.  While my business associate was disappointed with the Hilton, the Marriott was newly updated.  I enjoyed the fresh, clean room with modern furniture and bathroom fixtures.  The tv was huge!  I also enjoyed a late night room service dinner.  All around, this was a great stay.

I am trying to work, and for two days all I hear is loud drilling above me and at times it sounds like bowling balls are being dropped and rolled around the floor! My room vibrates at times with the drilling noise. It gets so loud at times that I can’t even hear the TV!  Do you care about the comfort of your guest? Why would you place anyone in the rooms under or around the construction?   I do not recommend this hotel because I do not feel they are concerned with the comfort of their guest.  Very disappointing as it is a
Manager Response: Dear angelahG4656DV,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. We apologize for the issues you experienced due to our renovations. We understand your frustration with all of the noise that occurs with a construction project. We hope you that you will consider a return visit to our hotel when the renovations have been completed to experience our renewed and refreshed hotel firsthand. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Every staff person I dealt with at this hotel was very friendly, professional and courteous. The location is perfect for conferences at the convention center. My room was remodeled recently and was comfortable. The only issue I had is with noise. My room was on the 8th floor overlooking the pool and the pool bar. I could hear people at the bar by the pool later at night even though I was 8 stories up. Then I could hear the cleaning crew by the pool early in the morning. I would recommend getting a room that doesn’t overlook the pool if you want a restful nights sleep.
Manager Response: Dear TTWolf,  Thank you for the nice review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are glad to know you had a pleasant time with us and that you were impressed with the service provided by our staff. That being said, I am sorry noise disrupted your comfort. We value your feedback and hope the positive aspects of your visit will bring you back here.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I am here for a convention. They are so ill prepared. I have been waiting 3 hours for a room.  They told me they had several checkouts & checkins.  Why didn’t they bring more staff in to help?  Every time I called, I was told housekeeping was working on my room.  This was over a 90 minutes time frame. No room turnover should take 90 minutes.  A very disorganized and mismanaged hotel.   I finally got a room at 4:30, give or take. Housekeeping is going crazy. I could barely get down the hall.  Hire more people!
Manager Response: Dear CinPos,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs during check-in. We are committed to delivering an outstanding experience to all who visit, and we apologize this was not the case for you. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope you will give us another chance to make a better impression.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: It was a nice stay. Luckily we got a room in the smaller tower since there was construction going on at the main tower. Service was great, got to do early check in. Service was good at the restaurant outdoors. Garage is a little far walk but nice to have. Distance is abit further than I'd like to Disneyland but there are local shuttles available for a small fee. Nice hotel. Nice area.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer Y,  Thank you for sharing your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you had a pleasant stay and that you particularly liked our attentive service. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back very soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying in this hotel. We typically choose a Disneyland Hotel but I'm a Marriott FAN and stay at Marriotts whenever I can. We had a great experience here. The hotel is beautiful, restaurant was excellent, the bar was super fun and to sit outside by the pool and still be in the bar area was excellent! We enjoyed the pool too, although small, the lounge chairs were very nice and staff was there to take your drink order poolside. Love that! Our room was great! High floor with a balcony overlooking the pool. It was nice to sit outside in the morning and enjoy coffee. My only complaint is the neighbors who smoke on the patio....smoke was coming our way and into our room when our slider was open. 100% smoke free (including the balcony would be amazing!). It was
Manager Response: Dear Sightseer755147,  Thank you for sharing a detailed version of your experience at the Anaheim Marriott. We are so delighted to read you were impressed with our key on-site amenities which contributed to a pleasant experience. Thank you again for highlighting our convenient location, and we are looking forward to your next trip to this city.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Ignored, Dusted, and Sick. There is no gold elite status here.
Summary: As part of my work, I attend the same convention every year. This year, I chose the Marriott, as I have gold elite status and wanted to see if the annual fee is worth it. For the short answer, "No, your fee is not worth it. You are nobody to Marriott."  Here are the details. I used the app to check in, hoping for the "guaranteed, pending availability" upgrade that I pay my fee for. I normally use the app, because I am allergic to feather pillows. I entered the request, and upon showing up later, the desk clerk: (1) didn't acknowledge my hard-earned status, (2) didn't appear to credit me with my arrival bonus, (3) didn't give me a guaranteed upgrade, and (4) to add insult to injury, put me in a room with an air conditioner that was coated in a blanket of dust, had broken and
Manager Response: Dear docworm,  Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. Although we are confident some of these instances are isolated, this in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you an outstanding experience. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: One of the better hotels I have stayed in lately.  Rooms look almost new, modern touches.  Staff friendly and attentive.  Located a little way from Disneyland.  Great location,  Highly recommend valet parking.  Parking is expensive to begin with, $25 or so a day and valet is $6 more plus whatever you want to tip.  Every time we called down for the car it was there waiting for us, did not have to find in the parking garage and just dropped off car when we came back.  The computer run elevators were also cool. Punch in your floor and you were assigned an elevator.  Great stay. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear Thomas R,   Thank you for the feedback regarding your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are so glad you were able to take advantage of our convenient and friendly valet service. We want our guests to enjoy a relaxing stay, and this is just one of the ways we try to make things easier for them. We are grateful for your recommendation and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed here twice this year... AMAZING!
Summary: This property is beautiful, service is excellent, and is close by Disneyland (about a 20 minute walk). Stayed here with my kids in May and they provided my daughter with a $25 hotel credit to use for her birthday and even gave her a balloon (kids love balloons)! They also credited us to have free parking. Rooms have refrigerators but no microwaves. :(    When I stayed again in October, the service was the same although the left wing of the hotel was going through light construction. In my opinion, their restaurant is a little too bougie for me and is over priced. No simple items like fries, chicken fingers, burgers, etc. They were even out of chicken wings! The drinks were over priced as well (with no refills), so I went to the pizza place call Slice in the hotel. Very good
Manager Response: Dear mylove829,   Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! Thanks for repeat business, and we look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I traveled to Anaheim for a convention being held near the Anaheim Marriott.  I am a rewards club member and had requested a higher floor for my room.  I was given a room on the 3rd floor.  The room was nice sized, clean and decorated well.  The bathroom was way to small.  There was no fan in the bathroom and you could sit on the toilet, brush your teeth in the sink and turn on the shower all without moving.  That was a disappointment.  However, the staff was nice, the restaurant was good and they had a Starbucks inside, which was awesome.
Manager Response: Dear caralea09,   Thank you for choosing Anaheim Marriott while here for a convention. We are glad you liked our comfortable accommodations and that you enjoyed our service and facilities. We appreciate your loyalty towards our brand and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: If you have any reason to be in or around downtown San Diego, this is a WONDERFUL Marriott property.  The beds are ridiculously comfortable; the rooms nice sized & the grounds are absolutely gorgeous!  You can also easily walk to pretty much everything in the Gaslamp District.
Manager Response: Dear WestCoastRagnar,  Thank you so much for the awesome remarks. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thanks again for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you recommending us and are eagerly looking forward to your next trip in the future.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Best elevator system I have ever seen
Summary: This is an excellent property. The front desk help was wonderful. We used the concierge to get tickets to Knott's and saved a lot of money. the room was beautiful. The only complaint was it uses one of those barn doors for the bathrooms, I don't really like those much.....the star of the show is the elevator system......you punch in your floor on a key pad and then it tells you which of the 6 elevators you will use, then you get elevator and it is programmed to go straight to the floor. I never had to wait for an elevator.
Manager Response: Dear elvis247,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott. It’s so great to know our service and hospitality exceeded your expectations and that you had a comfortable experience. Thank you for sharing the key details of our hotel, and we look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Not sure where to put the second suitcase or store your stuff?  Maybe the floor?
Summary: I am very happy we are in a renovated room on the 11th floor. Everything is new. Wood floors (well, fake wood floors) throughout. New bathroom fixtures, 3/8th inch heavy sliding glass door shower. All new furniture.  The problem with these current hotel upgrades is the designers are sacrificing storage and room utility for sleekness and cost saving. We had the same problem at a Hyatt Centrix in Miami Beach last month.  There is no place to put a second suitcase or store your stuff.... difficult to even hang your clothes in the closet.... Cruise ships rooms, with a third the space, are better designed and stay neater than current hotel rooms.  Here is a disappointment: We reserved a king bed room, and were assigned a room with two double beds. We immediately called the front desk
Manager Response: Dear differentname,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to post your review. We are happy to see you enjoyed our recently renovated guest room. However, we apologize for the issues you faced with lack of storage. We are also sorry there was a problem with your reservation and the room you requested was unavailable. We know no amount of apologies will make up for the inconvenience, but we truly are sorry. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us an opportunity in the future to regain your trust.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, close to Disneyland, Excellent Customer Service
Summary: On a weekend trip for my son’s birthday, we stayed at the Anaheim Marriott. The hotel has gone through a recent renovation and lobby, pool area and Infuse restaurant/bar were clean, nice and modern.  Room details — We stayed in room 1936 which was close to the elevator.  While it may not bother some, we did end up using the white noise app to cancel out sound.   The room featured two double beds, lots of outlets to charge devices, a small desk, mini fridge and safe.  The bathrooms were the least maintained spaces in the building (or at least the room in which we stayed) and are in need of an update.  The view was excellent and we could see the Disneyland fireworks in the evening.  Hotel details — We upgraded to Club level which is well worth the additional fee as they provided a
Manager Response: Dear GB A,  Thank you for including the Anaheim Marriott in your son’s birthday plans. We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your family's vacation.  After a fun-filled day at the park, we are so happy you were able to relax in your clean, comfortable room and enjoy all the world-class amenities! Thanks again for your detailed feedback as well as recommendation - we look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another memorable trip!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a company sponsored trip and we were disappointed in their rooms. The hotel was pretty nice but the rooms were very dated. I would definitely not spend the money to stay here if I was going to Disney. It’s proximity to the convention center and to Disney was very Convenient for us.
Manager Response: Dear matthO5835PI,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations in regards to your guest room. We will share your comments with our department heads. However, please know we are currecntly updating areas of our hotel on a rotating basis. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I didn’t stay at the hotel but had several drinks in the bar. Great drinks and good food and especially the appetisers. The wine list was excellent and the staff super. Enjoyed my visits over from the Hilton. Good fun all round
Manager Response: Dear Doug G,   Thank you for visiting nFuse Bar & Kitchen and for sharing your wonderful comments. We are delighted you had a great dining experience with us and that you also enjoyed our courteous service. We hope to see you again at the Anaheim Marriott.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I confess - I like full-service hotels and I like this one.  Excellent personal service.  The desk staff is well trained and very welcoming.  In fact, Shaun Williams - Guest Service Representative, remembered my name two days after we met for maybe 5 minutes - very impressive!  The hotel is excellent, service was superb, the food was grand and the bar was relaxed and offered a good atmosphere for both business and personal discourse.  Great place - I'd stay here again, in fact, for the few extra dollars it would cost to stay here, I'd chooses it quickly over any other Mid-Range accommodation in the area.
Manager Response: Dear RIVERMAN63,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! Shaun will be so delighted to know your compliments. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have stayed in the hotel before, when going to Disneyland on vacation.  The lobby and restaurant are very nice and clean.  When booking online it shows different room variations you can choose from. Be careful because my most recent stay, I was supposed to have a balcony/city view - which I had in the past to see the fireworks in the distance from Disneyland.  Well this time that was not the case even though that’s what I had booked. The room you book is not guaranteed. I was told upon check in that they only had two rooms to choose from. Both on low floors, one with a balcony that we could not step out into because it was under construction and the other room was no balcony at all.  The room was very small, even with two beds. The hotel was hosting a big event at the time of
Manager Response: Dear Krysblair,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment in the room. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Booked this hotel for the last 4 nights of our honeymoon so we could go to Disneyland. Although the hotel is in a great location and reasonably priced we got zero sleep!!! There is massive building work going on in the hotel which is very very loud, and that combined with the fact that the fire alarm went of 2/4 nights (continuously for over 20 mins at 3am and 6am!). When we did finally fall sleep on day two, house keeping very loudly knocked on our door and woke us up (even though we had the ‘do not disturb’ sign on the door!). Believe me, dragging yourself around disneyland when you have had less than 4 hours sleep a night is not fun! We did complain to the hotel staff, but they didn’t seem shocked and didn’t seem to care.    Other problems: The complimentary bottle of water
Manager Response: Dear Katiedeloyde,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for the issues with the noise levels, room service, and other issues mentioned. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel staff super friendly and helpful; hotel restaurant food is ynmmy.
Summary: I stayed at the Marriott with a friend who was attending a conference and I just pretty much played! The hotel staff were super courteous and helpful. We had to check our bags until our room was ready. When we got our room the concierge took our bags to our room for us and answered any questions we had. The parking at this hotel is great as well, The hotel restaurant I believe 'Nfusion had a great lunch menu. I ate lunch with 5 other people and everyone was very happy with their meal, the service and the price. They have killer tacos and an adult grilled cheese sandwich. The cappuccino was good as well. Close to Disneyland, take the shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Deanna M,  Thank you so much for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations!   We are glad you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to serving you and your friend again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel with top notch staff and amenities
Summary: Staff with a smile from the moment you arrive to check out.  Everyone seemed to love their jobs from concierge to dining to front desk.  Elevator system is impressive and efficient in getting you around.  Quiet and comfortable rooms, tons of amenities and lots of room to relax.  Would for sure stay again!
Manager Response: Dear John R,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: While the location down the street from Disneyland (about a 10 minute walk) obviously draws some tourists, the hotel is really geared toward convention and business traffic. The convention spaces are well thought-out, including lots of convenient break-out areas.  "The Market" (a Starbucks with breakfast and sandwiches) was convenient and relatively fast; great place for a quick side conversation during a meeting because it's right next to the main convention space.  "nFuse," the primary hotel bar, had excellent food, and was similarly good for side meetings or lunch discussions. I was impressed that each time we went there, the staff was sensitive to our conversations—they didn't interrupt when we were in the middle of something—and over a period of a couple of days, they got
Manager Response: Dear Matthew P,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney for your business trip! We are delighted to know you found our location to be perfect for your needs and had a wonderful stay. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we can't wait to welcome you back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager
