Summary: We stayed one night for a business meeting and it was a very nice hotel. The bed was comfortable, if we wanted to walk somewhere to grab a bite, we could have. Staff was very accommodating and there is a (limited options) Starbucks onsite. Not surprisingly, it was crazy-crowded with families for Disneyland.It would have been nice to have a separate pool area for kids.  If I NEEDED to be in this area, I'd absolutely go back. It wouldn't be my first choice, just because of all the noisy kids. LOL Our room overlooked the pool (didn't even think about asking if there were any not facing pool) and by mid-morning it was fairly noisy. If you are going to the convention center, it's adjacent, so that's a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa Q,   Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott. We enjoyed reading your review and learning about the highlights of your stay. We appreciate your comments about our location, excellent customer service and the many amenities we offer. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to see you again soon on your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: I was here in August 2018 for a convention. The room was a bit odd for a supposed handicap room but was ok. It would be fine for an otherwise able bodied deaf person (high beds, deep sinks, slippery shower). Food at the hotel and and the Hilton across the way is expensive.
Manager Response: Dear garyvc,  Thank you for taking the time to post a nice review of Anaheim Marriott. We always want every guest to have a pleasant experience, and we are glad to see we were able to accomplish this while you were here. However, we're sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We hope you will choose us again so we can impress you on your next trip as well.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager ​​​​​​​

Summary: We recently stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for two nights while attending a conference. The beds were amazingly comfortable and the room was large, clean and comfortable. The only negative was the AC didn't really work in our room. It was a little warm.  From the front desk, servers in all the restaurants to the bellhops. We were treated very well. The staff were very professional, and a couple went above and beyond to ensure our stay was extra special. Our waitress at the pool and restaurant was fantastic.  The pool was a good mix of shaded and open. lots of large towels to use at the pool.   We had breakfast delivered to the room the first morning. It was ok. I would probably skip the room service next time. it came from the Market and for the cost it wasn't what i was
Manager Response: Dear Andrea M,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott while you were here for a conference and for your recommendation. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel, clean and updated. Front desk was very helpful and accommodating. Shuttle for Disneyland stops right in front of the hotel , no need to walk, but you can if you want, 10-15 walk to front gate, or closer if you are just going Downtown Disney. Restaurant in the hotel  serves great breakfast in the morning. Very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Pavlina G,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your vacation. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: They are currently renovating, painting the exterior and what not, I think the hours were 8am- 5pm so it didn’t bother me. Walk to Disneyland in 15-20 minutes, it’s a safe walk with restaurants and stores the entire way. The hotel bar was trendy and a nice place to hang. There were food trucks outside near the convention center with great tacos. Rooms were normal nothing fancy, but nice hotel.. FYI if shipping a package to them, ship to the fed ex next door and save $20 per calendar day, mine wasn’t even 24 hours and I got hit with $40 because it was over 2 different days.
Manager Response: Dear Brian M,  Thank you for sharing the key details of your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad we met most of your expectations and that you especially mentioned our convenient location. We value your feedback and hope to welcome you back whenever you are back in this area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: If they get your order correct the Hotel is nice
Summary: Poor initial experience. I reserved a King Suite through Costco however when arriving they stated they had no Kings available and that they dont reserve room types. My paperwork said otherwise. The first room they gave us was old and bed was very uncomfortable. Once we got the room we were supposed to the room was nice with a nice view.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel A.,  We are sorry there was a problem with your reservation and the room you requested was unavailable. We know no amount of apologies will make up for the inconvenience, but we truly are sorry. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us an opportunity in the future to regain your trust.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: At this hotel for a couple of days for a conference. Meeting facilities are great, and handles large groups/conferences well. The challenge is the current remodel/renovation of various guest rooms. I had to sneak up to my room to take a couple of calls during the conference, and there is so much noise in the room directly above me, it has been impossible. The loud lobby would have been a better choice. Let's be clear - these are extensive renovations happening, so there are lots of loud power tools that started before 8 AM. Not to mention some rather colorful commentary from the workers throughout the afternoon, which I can hear directly through the vents in my room. Not what I would call appropriate for a hotel of this caliber. With almost 1,000 rooms in this hotel, I'm really
Manager Response: Dear Lisambcdn,  We were disappointed to learn your experience was anything short of outstanding. Please accept our apologies as well as assurance that your concerns about the construction have been noted and will be addressed. Thank you for being our valued guest, and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was only there a night as I decided to head back to LA a night early to see my cousin as plans had changed. So this is based on pretty much, a place to put my head down. If you're planning on Disneyland then honestly, most of your time will be out of the hotel.  All staff encountered (concierge, front desk, bus, cleaning, room service) were all incredibly friendly and helpful. Any questions, just ask them, you will be helped. I felt welcomed and safe being there alone.  I stayed last year. My room was nice and clean, the bed comfy. I actually found the room quite spacious and bright. The bathroom was clean and in working order.  I did order room service and it was great. No complaints. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear MinxiiT,   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott for your overnight stay. We are delighted to read you loved our courteous service and comfortable accommodations. It was our pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: What in the world is this hotel thinking?  Rooms are being converted to a new style which looks like a space ship hostel.  The desk, chair, and ottoman have been removed and replaced by a single chair which looks like one from a library.  Beds are very very low on a wood platform.  Kings have been removed for double beds  which are so small they look like a twin.  Tubs have been removed and replace with a shower.  Soap dish is tiny.  Carpet has been replaced by cheap gray laminate floors.  I can only assume this hotel has to dummy down  and look like a budget motel for new JW being built.  AC was slow to cool and sounded like a freight train.    Lobby was still nice and good service from the front desk.  Currently, the 14-19 flora have been downgraded and made into a hostel.
Manager Response: Dear Bev2227,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment with the appearance of our hotel. We will share your comments with our department heads. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity in the future.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: usually one takes a hotel so he can have a hot shower and can sleep good in a quite area. so no hot water in the shower, only warm water, even if u complain for 2 days they do nothing. if u get a room, even 2 rooms away from the elevator, the noise of the elevator moving is so strong u can not sleep. I have been on the 17 floor, and even if u close the door of the balcony - too much noise. apparently something wrong with the way they build this hotel. I really expected better with the name of Mario !!
Manager Response: Dear danamandler,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for the problems with the hot water and noise levels. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My daughter and I had the best stay!  Great rooms, amazing pool and such friendly staff!  Nice shuttle to Disneyland that is always on time and easy to get to.  Big big thank you to MaryLu in nfuse restaurant who was the nicest lady and made my daughter feel so special on our mommy daughter trip.  When we paid for our breakfast marylu come runnig to give my daughter a Minnie Mouse tshirt and Minnie Mouse ears for our Disneyland day, she is such a sweetheart, she definitely made my daughters day.  Thank you for such a thoughtful gift.
Manager Response: Dear 915kristyf,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at the Anaheim Marriott. We agree with your remarks that MaryLu is an awesome member of our great team. Our staff works hard to create memorable experiences for every guest. We will pass on your gracious comments, as we know that she will truly appreciate it. We look forward to welcoming you and your daughter back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager ​

Summary: My visit was was part of a conference being held at The Marriott’s own conference centre.   As so many have commented here, the level of service from the staff is very professional, and from the moment to walk through their doors to the reception and all other areas I have not a single negative observation.   For the conference side, (500+), the event went off seamlessly, or at least if it didn’t you didn’t notice anything was wrong !!  The catering was of good quality and very enjoyable.   The foyer area is very spacious and smart and when waiting between sessions it was certainly a comfortable area to get on with some work or indeed just relax. Full marks for the background music choices as well.   Just off the foyer I’d the bar area which was a good place to relax in the
Manager Response: Dear Chris C,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott while you were here for a conference and for your recommendation. It was a pleasure to read about the excellent service you received from our staff. This is what we strive to do every day, so thanks for acknowledging our efforts. We have taken a note of your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome back on a future visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager ​

Summary Heading: Customer service shines.. even through a few hiccups
Summary: Customer Service was phenomenal from the moment we arrived. Front Desk Rep was so kind and helpful with our check in & right away informed us of the discounted parking rate (yay!) & possible construction noises we might experience during our stay, I very much appreciated that as I had a baby with me. What I wish she would warned us about was the lobby/pool bar. Our room was a few floors up in the main tower facing the pool & bar area and once we came back to the room from a long day at the parks with a sleeping baby, it was LOUD. We didn't realize the bar would echo up that loudly. We also were unfortunate enough to have a floor that reeked of weed and neighbors who were "stuck" on their balcony basically giving the lobby bar competition until way late in the night. Any other
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A short walk to the convention center and a short ride to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is a quick ride to Disneyland and to many places to eat and drink. It is a quick uber to downtown Disney too. The hotel is quite nice - very clean and updated. The staff is great. The hotel bar is nice but overpriced. This hotel is worth a second stay.
Manager Response: Dear B W,  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you found our location to be perfect for your needs and had an enjoyable stay. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Anaheim Marriott – Great Staff – Everyone was so Polite.
Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott near the convention center this past weekend for 2 nights.  We stayed in room #1638 which was recently renovated and faced the Clarion Hotel next door (east?).  The hotel was really nice as we would expect from a Marriott property.  On a super positive note, every single employee at this hotel, from the valet, bus, cleaning, front desk, bar and restaurant people were all incredibly friendly and helpful.  Thank you all.  Everyone was so pleasant and genuinely happy.  The entire staff here was incredible.  Wow!  We were disappointed at the view and were hoping to see fireworks from Disneyland.  We were not even sure if this was possible.  We had a few observations in that we missed a sofa in our room.  Also, a few of the power outlets did not
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, great staff, needs some improvement
Summary: Staff was lovely and incredibly friendly. I've stayed at many Marriotts and High End Resorts with my travels and this was a great stay. I know they are going through some construction and rennos but hey, all hotels have to. Room was nice and bed was comfortable. When i wasnt out with work or fun I was in the gym. Now.. i must say this fitness center needs some HELP! it has so much potential.. Im not a fan at all of the equipment brand they have .. life fitness is such a cheap knock off.. I always wonder why hotels in SOCAL dont get high end, quality equipment.. fitness is so important in this area. I have always had problems with this brand of equipment any time im forced to use it. hate it. Hopefully they will clean this space up as it is large and has alot of potential. There
Manager Response: Dear richards0nm34,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. However, we are sorry for not meeting some of your expectations with reagrds to our fitness center. We have taken a note of your feedback in order to improve our facilities going forward. We appreciate your loyalty towards our brand look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We arrived late in the evening coming from Los Angeles airport. Very tired. Told me we would have a balcony. Unbelievably it looks over a parking lot filled with dumpsters. And at 6:38 in the morning a large crew of men with hysters and forklifts begin working and laughing and beeping right underneath our window. I could’ve easily slept for a while longer. I called the front desk and they just said they were standard sorry reading a rehearsed script, and could move me the next night if there was room. Big meh. I really don’t think they could’ve cared less. So since they woke me up I might as well go to TripAdvisor express my experience. I wish it had been different. Don’t use room 376.
Manager Response: Dear DermDude1,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment with your view and the inconvenience the construction noise caused. We always want our guests to have an excellent experience and we will share your comments with our department heads. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Heavy construction starts promptly at 8 a.m. non stop till 5ish.  Do not book this hotel unless you plan to vacation in a construction zone! Hotel never warned us nor offered any compensation! Oh well!!
Manager Response: Dear Fearless134299,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We take precautions so our guests are not disturbed during our renovation. However, it still gets loud and dusty at times, so we apologize for this inconvenience. We would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back after our renovations have been completed. We look forward to your next visit so that we can provide a more pleasant stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We wanted a place close to friends but not to expensive for a one night trip. We found it at the Irvine Marriott. It’s in the business district of Irvine but still very nice plus close to freeways. Room was comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear bpi45,  Thank you for the wonderful feedback about the Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney. We are delighted to know you found our location to be perfect for your needs and had a comfortable stay. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I read a million Disneyland hotel reviews before I settled on this property. In the end, I was very pleased with my choice. It was convenient to the Disney parks, and an in-house Disney specialist helped us purchase day-of tickets so that we didn't have to wait in a long line at the entrance to Disneyland. As SPG/Marriott members, we enjoyed the complimentary breakfast at the top of the hotel. It included lots of fresh fruit, in addition to the usual suspects. We asked for a fireworks view room, but I suspect the hotel across the street really blocks any good views. We also appreciated the attractive courtyard pool. It was big enough to accommodate many guests at once. Our room was attractive and up-to-date. The hotel was also relatively quiet, especially considering how many
Manager Response: Dear Cassidy144,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you enjoyed your graciously appointed room and our wonderful facilities. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My husband and I have been going to Disneyland every year and I can finally say , we have found the best hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland. The Anaheim Marriott, is the ONE and only hotel, where you can stay at and everything is convenient to you. From its beautiful  landscape and water fountains outside to the clean lobby with beautiful flowers, the staff are very friendly , to the pool and restaurants, this is your one stop hotel. And to get to the park it was easy and convenient just purchase a ART ticket at the lobby and you can use it all day. The room we were at was at the 10th floor of the Oasis Tower, beautiful clean room, amazing view and very comfortable bed which is very important after 8hrs of walking in the park.  Thank you Anaheim Marriott, for making our
Manager Response: Dear Malua H,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights. Executive floor has  good breakfast.  Rooms are quiet... old bathroom layout though, but as spending day at Disney doesn't really matter.  Gym is quite small though... Good security.  Shuttles to Disney are frequent.  Good staff!
Manager Response: Dear MichelAlbert,  Thank you for the kind review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! After a fun-filled day at the park, we are so happy you were able to relax in your comfortable room. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Checked into the Anaheim Marriott for a business convention.  The room was in great condition and all amenities were top notch also.  I truly enjoy staying at Marriotts as they always keep their hotels in great shape and fix any problems right away.  Can not wait to visit the next one !!
Manager Response: Dear Scott H,   We are delighted you chose to stay at the Anaheim Marriott and that you enjoyed your experience. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate your loyalty towards our brand and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here over the labor day weekend. When we arrived at the hotel it was very easy to find. We just parked in front during check-in and they explained during check-in where to park. Check in was a breeze. During check-in they explained that there was a $24 a night parking fee. Then immediately told me that they would only charge us $12 a night, so that was a nice surprise. Even though I had booked a double bed room they were able to accommodate our request for a king bed. The hotel is older but they have recently went through refurbishment so it felt sparking and new. The beds were very comfortable. The bathroom was huge and the amenities were very nice. We didn't have a chance to use the pool or fitness center so cannot comment on that. I wouldn't say it is within walking
Manager Response: Dear juhoo26,  Thank you for the kind review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are glad to know that your room provided the comforts you expected and that you enjoyed all of the in-room amenities we provide. We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This was truly the worst hotel experience I have ever had. We arrived and it was so difficult to figure out where to park we circled around 3 times before the valet told us where to go and that we could take a ticket, even though we would get a new ticket upon check-in. When we arrived at check-in, the employee told us that we would not have a king bed (even though we PAID EXTRA for one) and would instead have two full size beds. We showed her the documentation proving we paid extra for this and she said it was not her problem because we booked them as a 'good neighbor hotel' through the Disney travel company. I argued with her about this for 20 minutes before calling Disney. Disney insisted that it was a guaranteed King bed since we paid extra for it and called the hotel
Manager Response: Dear christine g.,  We are sorry there was a problem with your reservation and the room you requested was unavailable. We know no amount of apologies will make up for the inconvenience, but we truly are sorry. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us an opportunity in the future to regain your trust.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A perfect hotel for a Disney Mini Vacation
Summary: The service at this hotel has been impeccable since the moment we arrived. The hotel is clean, close to Disney and most importantly very family friendly. The highlight of our stay was William from concierge. He is the true epitome of a customer service all-star! Highly recommend this hotel and if you have any questions about the property or surrounding area, he’s your guy! Thanks again for a great Labor Day stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ckohn,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your vacation. We are also glad to know William surpassed your expectations and took a great care of you. Thanks again for recommending us, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: I was there for a conference
Summary: This is a nice hotel.  The staff were nice , the food was good , and the pool area was very nice. If you have access to the concierge level go will especially enjoy this hotel. It is about a 15 minute walk to downtown Disney
Manager Response: Dear mrmackay,   Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott while here for a conference. We are delighted you enjoyed our courteous service and convenient location as well as the food we serve. It was our pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: The Most Accommodating Hotel I Experienced
Summary: This truly was a wonderful hotel to stay at.  The staff went out of their way to make a guest feel so welcome.  Beds were the most comfortable and rooms very clean.  Food was fabulous on the premises of this hotel.  Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Travtripper,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you were not only impressed with our courteous associates and well-kept rooms but also with our delicious food offerings. Thank you again for being our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel has it all. Located one block from Disneyworld and close to many restaurants, it's ideal for families or conferences. It features a variety of eateries, a pizzeria and a Marketplace (soups, sandwiches, build a salad) plus Starbucks coffee. The two pools and hot tub area have food and beverage service. Concierge is very helpful for booking restaurants, cars and attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Shamyshores2,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know our service and amenities met your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County and hope to welcome you back very soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Conveniet to all Disney and Restaurants
Summary: Hotel is nicely decorated, always love to see the sculptures and artwork.  It has a couple of eateries nFuse, Pizza Slice and a Market Place as well as room service.  We were attending a conference and it was wonderful for that ...many large conference rooms, nicely appointed. Final night banquet had good food and was served quickly.  Lovely pool with part of it shaded, nice for me!  The room was very nice with very comfortable beds and pillows.  Walking distance to Disney and many restaurants.  My only complaint was that I noticed the last few nights that there was a smell of mildew coming out of the air conditioner vent...hope that it gets taken care of.
Manager Response: Dear CJOue,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney!  We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your vacation.  After a fun-filled day at the park, we are so happy you were able to relax in your clean, comfortable room.  It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here last night and our visit was amazing.  At check-in, Paloma made us feel welcomed and taken care of and was more than happy to take care of our requests.  The room was beautiful and a great value. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear stellarchewy,  Thank you for the fabulous review! We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. It’s great to know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. Paloma will be so delighted to hear your compliments. We appreciate you choosing us and look forward to welcoming you and your boyfriend again very soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Our family and I enjoyed our stay at Anaheim Marriott - not only was it close to many restaurants, it was also very close to the Disneyland Parks.   They have a great restaurant, nfuse and their room service, Fresh Bites have great menu selections as well.
Manager Response: Dear JC V,  Thank you for choosing Anaheim Marriott for your accommodation and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you & your family had a wonderful stay with us and enjoyed our excellent location and warm hospitality. Thanks for taking advantage of our hotel restaurant during your stay. Our chef delights in preparing mouth-watering treats. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Attended a conference at this location.  The $31 price to park, yes folks it’s really $31 bucks, was lowered to $18.50 for our event.  I was charged $18 one day, $18.50 the next, and $19.50 the third day.  Complaining to the on-site parking operations manager fell on deaf ears.  Hotel management apologized but says parking is managed by a separate entity.  Recommend an alternate location to park.  Shop around.
Manager Response: Dear Mark C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment with the price for parking. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Customer service was excellent.  Hotel lobby was modern and appealing!  Guest room was very spacious, comfortable and clean.  Convenient location.  This hotel is a wonderful place to stay for a vacation at Disneyland and business at the Convention Center!
Manager Response: Dear MemoryMaker2011,  We are delighted you enjoyed every aspect of your stay at Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County and look forward to having you as our guest again in the future!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We went as family group to Disneyland and stayed in the Anaheim Marriott. The place is great for families. The rooms are big enough, but the service was excellent.  The front desk has very nice people and they helped me overtime I had questions, they told me about the maintenance in the building and the noise I might have in the requested area, so we could change our rooms.  The restaurant was the best, all the staff was very helpful and patient and nice with our children which we appreciate. The buffet was really good.  Definitely is a great place to stay in Anaheim. We will definitely be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear Tatiana R,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott.  Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you and your family again for another memorable experience!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great place for a conference or a casual stay
Summary: I stayed at the hotel for a business conference but also got to take a short trip to Disney. The staff and conference amenities were great and their food was the best conference food I’ve ever had. I loved that everything was easy to find and on one floor. The room temps, like any conference were very variable so dress in layers. The sleeping room was fairly standard although my room had a terrible view as some, I understand, have views of the fireworks and Disney but that’s how it goes sometimes. It is a decent walk to Disneyland, Downtown Disney and California adventure but not a very long walk, about 15-20 minutes and it only takes that long due to stoplights but the bus transportation is readily and easily available right outside the hotel and runs under $6 round trip for a
Manager Response: Dear John B,  Thank you for your kind words about the Anaheim Marriott while here for your convention. We are glad you were pleased with most aspects of our hotel and had an overall comfortable time with us. Thanks again for recommending our convenient conference facilities, and we hope to welcome you back on your next trip to Orange County!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Nothing really too special about the hotel. The rooms are pretty plain, not bad at all but not outstanding. It is a huge hotel and really the only thing to do around there is a convention at the convention centre (great location wise if you are doing that) or Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear _liam_abbott_,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted knowing you had a pleasant stay. However, we are sorry for problems that inconvenienced you, and we are taking steps to keep them from happening in the future. We enjoyed having you with us and hope you will choose us next time.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We checked in on a Thursday and it wa a great, awesome poolside service, awesome check-in, awesome valet.   Fast forward to a Saturday- whoa! The pool was full, trash overflowing, no towels- dirty wet towels everywhere, dishes out everywhere for hours.   Here is where my biggest complaint comes in- if you want any sort of a service poolside - forget it. The wait staff avoids you like the plague, couldn’t order food or drinks to save our life. We even sent our son to snag a waitress when she came out- we waived as he pointed to us and she spent the next hour avoiding us. We alerted the front desk thinking the restaurant manager would come out and take care of everything- nothing. We finally went to the market to get our kids drinks and went to slice the pizza place to get food to
Manager Response: Dear Andrea J.,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs over the weekend. We are committed to delivering an outstanding experience to all who visit, and we apologize this was not the case for you. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope you will give us another chance to make a better impression.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Great staff, very informative, and always courteous.  I was there for 4 days for business, and it was a relaxing, professional, and efficient place.  Your car is ready quickly, maid service was excellent, and the food was very good.  Recommend this place for work or personal use.
Manager Response: Dear TravelEverywhere63,  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience. Thanks so much for recommending us to the future guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A convention hotel on Convention Way
Summary: Nice Lobby, rooms ok, bathroom in need of updating.  Too big for the pool area. I don't like the modern room service concept...no trays only take away containers, so there are cardboard food boxes and half eaten pizza strewn throughout the corridors.    Oh, and I saw a cockroach in the corridor by the Starbuck Market area near FedEx. It could have been worse....
Manager Response: Dear lilycatLondon,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we appreciate your compliments about our lobby. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment with the appearance of our hotel, the room service, and other issues you mentioned. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was going to Orange County to attend a wedding. I booked a room at a Holiday Inn Express in Santa Ana back in May. This hotel was supposed open sometime in July and I thought, “cool, I get to stay at a brand new hotel, I’ve never done that before.”  Less than 48 hours before I was due to check-in the Holiday Inn Express called me and told me they were not open and would not be opened that weekend. WHAT?!?! LESS THAN 48 HOURS BEFORE I WAS DUE TO CHECK-IN. They told me they had me at another hotel but then couldn’t find my confirmation number or details.   Panicked, I hit the internet and found a fantastic deal on Priceline for the Anaheim Marriott. I had never used Priceline before and was kind of thinking that I would get a leftover room and was expecting shoddy customer
Manager Response: Dear Shannon D,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott! We are thrilled you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and were especially pleased with our well-maintained rooms and cordial associates. Thanks for your feedback, and we look forward to your return visit.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The staff are gracious, friendly and helpful. There are a variety of savory food choices and venues in the hotel, and the proximity to Disneyland is a bonus. The rooms are comfortable and clean and if you enjoy walking, you can relax by walking around the area.
Manager Response: Dear erichV8860NX,   Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney. We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for you. It is also great to know you were able to relax in your clean & comfortable room and our team left an everlasting impression. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for a convention and some extra days at Disney.  The property is well taken care of and the whole resort is gorgeous.  I loved that they had a Starbucks and Slice Pizza - perfect when you don't want to pay a lot for a meal in the hotel restaurant (I did not eat there but it appeared to be pricey).  The rooms were clean and housekeeping was adequate. Beds were definitely comfortable.  My only complaint was that the air conditioning wasn't that cold - even when the temp was set to 64, the room was still not cool.  We were able to purchase passes for the Anaheim Resort Transportation buses to Disneyland at the main desk - although they were a bit more expensive than purchasing directly from ART.  The bus stop is conveniently right in front of the
Manager Response: none

Summary: It´s very close to Disneyland. There is a Starbucks coffee in lobby area. Also there is a Disneyland Tickets sale spot in lobby. There´s a computer and printer in lobby accessible to print park tickets.
Manager Response: Dear Joellemty,  Thank you for the nice review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney. We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for you. It was our pleasure hosting you, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel and staff.  Great balcony room with view.  Close proximity to convention center, restaurants and entertainment venues.  We have stayed at the Anaheim Marriott several times in the past for a major annual medical conference.  The staff are always welcoming, helpful, friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Dear JohnCon,  We appreciate your consistent support of the Anaheim Marriott! We are glad we met all of your expectations and that our excellent associates made it for an exceptional experience. Thanks for being our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon for another enjoyable stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my family this week and we had a great experience.  I attended a conference held at the hotel.  The accommodations were nice.  The hotel was clean.  The kids enjoyed the pool area and we all took advantage of the on-site market, Starbucks and pizzeria.  It was convenient to local attractions.  I'd highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear heather8032018,  Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you & your family had a pleasant stay with us while you were here for a conference and liked our clean & well-maintained facility and our family-friendly amenities. Thanks so much for recommending us to future guests, and we hope to see you again soon.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The location of the hotel is the best for a family trip to Disney, with a credit edge of the shuttle bus every 20 minutes! The staff are nice! I am really grateful to EVELYN FAGAN, ALEX AMARANTOS, and the front office manager ZUYEN URBINA! Be careful that some of the rooms may be very noisy!
Manager Response: Dear Cambridgelawn,   Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! We are thrilled that our location a couple of blocks from Disney was perfect for your family trip. It is also wonderful to read that our excellent service and hospitality exceeded your expectations. Thanks for your feedback, and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great Property. Lie to at Check In
Summary: The property is great, great location. When I first checked in I valet parked my car.  Then when I went to the front desk, the older gentleman was very nice and said, do not pay for that I will waive your parking for self parking if you want to do that.  I said I wanted it to be secure. He stated that the self parking was more secure than valet because valet is parked outside and self parking was inside. Then I asked if itll be free. He handed me his card and insisted it would be. I was charged for parking. I then went down before I left and told the front desk again what I was told. They printed me a sheet saying it was waived again. Today I look and they charged me on my credit card. I called again today and she said...it was discounted to $12 nothing else can be done. Again
Manager Response: Dear timandkristin,   Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and would like to offer our sincerest apologies for your stay being anything less than perfect. We are truly sorry for the difficulties you experienced during your stay, however we appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention so we may take corrective action. We will share your concerns with the appropriate department in order for them to take care of these issues right away. Again we thank you for being our guest. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance to provide you with a better stay on your next visit to this area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Dirty Diaper found in my room!!
Summary: I booked a quick Disney trip with the kids. It’s supposed to be a non-smoking hotel  but other people on the floor were smoking marijuana. I reported it being that two kids have asthma. The girl and two boys appeared as if nothing was going to be done. No follow up or apology was given to me. We had to place towels at the base of our door to keep the smell/smoke out of our room. To top it off, we then we found a dirty diaper in our room. I reported it immediately. The manager Costa came to speak with me. He took a photo and placed the dirty diaper in a plastic bag. Upon check out I spoke with a female manager who proceeded to tell me the diaper wasn’t dirty and it was clean. Really?  I’m wondering if she smelled it or touched it or better yet, did she send it to a lab to see
Manager Response: Dear Rose O,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and concerns regarding your recent visit to our hotel. We deeply regret proving you with the level of service you received. Issues such as these are uncharacteristic of our hotel and please be assured that we are taking every action possible to prevent these issues moving forward. As our guest you deserve the absolute best experience we have to offer which upsets me even further that we've left you feeling the way you do. I'd ask that you please contact me at the hotel directly in hopes we can fully resolve this matter. Again we truly appreciate your decision to stay with us. I hope to hear from you soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We were not informed of a construction project on the 10 floor and were given a room on the 9th floor. The noise was unbearable from 8:30 am until 5:30 pm. You could not work, watch tv, or relax during those hours. Our only option was to change rooms after complaining multiple times. Our  second complaint was the housekeeping...our room was never cleaned before 4:30 pm. I guess they were avoiding the construction noise as well. Would not recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear julpoky,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations with housekeeping and for the inconvenience the construction caused. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Hotel was very nice and clean, good location to Disney.  ART bus pickup right outside makes it convenient.  Marketplace was very pricey (but most Marriott marketplaces are) as well as the restaurant.  The pizza place in the hotel does have a good pizza place for not a bad price!  Staff was great, however when we checked in they told us because I was a great rewards member they were upgrading our room, I asked if it had a balcony, they said yes it does.  We were excited.  Imagine our disappointment when we were looking at the AC units on top of a roof next door.  Room was very big, but balcony was a waste, at least it didn't cost me anything!
Manager Response: Dear debbies378,   We appreciate your loyalty to our brand and are glad to welcome you at the Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted you liked our convenient location and courteous service. Although we did our best to accommodate your needs, we are sorry for not meeting your expectations with your room. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a future visit.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: The worst value for your money
Summary: This is not the first time I stay at this hotel. Over the years I have seen the hotel deteriorate but nothing like I witnessed this month.   Although I asked for king bed , upon arrival I was told it’s not available although on the booking site it said it was. After few conversations with reception I was given the room with king bed.  The room small cramped with the worst set up, the bathroom old and the pipes all rusted out .  The furniture is dated and the air condition is loud and doesn’t work in a summer time where it’s so hot outside   The whole duration of my stay the hotel was under renovation from smell to noise to water dripping.  For all the money that I spent on this room ( to mention it was quite expensive ) I got nothing . No comfort, no relaxation and poor value
Manager Response: Dear M2266,  Thank you for being our guest. Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. We value your loyalty and staying with us more than once. We apologize for the issues with your room, the reservation, the odor and other issues mentioned. We promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Spent one night and enjoyed the smart TV and pool.  The room service was delicious and we liked having a pickup option that saved us from paying extra for the room service fee. The pool staff and front desk staff were professional and pleasant.  Will definitely stay again when coming through Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear MindyAguon,  Thanks for taking the time to review your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are thrilled you enjoyed our mouthwatering food and were also pleased with the great service provided by our associates. Please be assured we will share your compliments with our entire team. Thanks again for being our guest, and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I brought my daughter and granddaughter to Disney for a last minute trip. The Marriott was available so we thought we'd give it a try. You can walk to Disney from the hotel, but it's not close - a little over a mile. That was no issue, as we knew it when we booked the hotel. What I found lacking was the service and knowledge of the front desk staff.  First of all, we were put into a handicap room without being asked. Again, I could live with that. However, when they asked if we were self-parking, they never told me nor gave me the pass you need to get out of the garage, so when we went to dinner that night I had to pay an additional $26 to get out. The front desk was receptive when I went to complain, saying they'd comp the parking. However, when the bill came they hadn't done
Manager Response: Dear Sue A,   Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us your feedback. Our goal is to ensure every guest enjoys a friendly, accommodating and genuinely caring experience, so we regret to hear that your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We are sorry you experienced difficulties during your stay, and more importantly, that you felt we were not responsive to your needs. Your comments will be shared with the appropriate team to make sure these issues are resolved. Thank you again for being our guest. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance to provide you with the level of service you've come to expect from our hotel.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here and forgot to take pictures. Anyway, we had a great time even though I spent most of my time at Starbucks. Very nice rooms I had a connecting room with my mom which was pretty kool. I enjoyed my birthday it was all of our first time in California and we sure did make the best of it.  We booked a trip with Enjoy the Mountains” atv trail....I highly recommend the staff was so nice and so was the trail even though it was difficult to get to. California had a lot to offer that we couldn’t get to do in the few short days we were there... I Can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Ms_Smith2011,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott while here for your birthday. We are glad you liked your comfortable room and were pleased with the excellent service provided by our associates. We will definitely share your compliments with our entire staff. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your next visit!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have stayed here multiple times over the last couple of years for conventions and conferences at the Anaheim Convention Center. What makes this hotel nice is that it is a very short walk to the facility, and that the rooms are in excellent condition. The Marriott Club is also well-appointed, with an excellent breakfast that is surely better than what they are serving at any convention. The rooms are clean, and the staff are very friendly. I will definitely stay here in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Christopher R,  Thank you for returning to the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a wonderful stay with us and loved our well-maintained facility, friendly staff, and delicious breakfast. Thanks again, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Your experience will vary significantly depending on what is happening at the convention center during your stay.  If that is the reason for your visit, then this hotel is great!  However, it was not the reason for our stay.  The lobby was overrun with conference goers networking and making sales pitches at all hours of the day.   The room itself met expectations, it was clean, in decent shape, and well stocked.  One huge exception being the noise from said conference.  One morning in particular (perhaps “kick off?) there was loud music blasted and an MC speaking.  Pool hours are prompt and heavily enforced at 10pm.  Walking back through the lobby the bar was overpopulated and looked like a frat party.  There are other hotels nearby that are significantly superior in the same
Manager Response: Dear Chantelle P,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are truly sorry to hear of your less than satisfactory experience with our hotel and hope you will accept our sincerest apologies. We appreciate your valuable feedback as it helps us identify the areas in which we can improve our guests experience. I was disappointed to learn of our shortcomings. That you were inconvenienced as you were is deeply regrettable but I can assure you we will do everything within our power to improve upon this matter. Thank you again for choosing our hotel. If you give us the chance, we guarantee we’ll win you back.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Anaheim Marriott Outstanding Customer Service with Can Do Attitude!
Summary: We Stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for Work then For the Volleyball Tournament. The staff is outstanding! Exceptional service from the time you check in to the time we left for our next destination. It’s everything a guest would want in a hotel in fact exceeds any expectations! Restaurant Infuse is one of the Best Hotel Restaurants we ever dined at nationwide. If I had one recommendation for the hotel! Guests should Stay at this hotel! We will be back for tournament again! Check out the garden near the outdoor patio!
Manager Response: Dear Sandy W,  Thank you for choosing Anaheim Marriott for your accommodation and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a wonderful stay with us and liked our great customer service and everything else we offer. Thanks for taking advantage of our hotel restaurant Infuse. We will pass on your gracious comments to our Food & Beverage staff and let them know their efforts are not going unnoticed. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was at the Anaheim Marriott for VidCon. It was very convenient since it was right next to the convention center. The hotel itself is a little outdated for a Marriot but to me, it was okay because we had very very good discounted rates for VidCon. If you were to go to a convention or just stay there, I think Hilton (right across from Marriot) would be a better choice. Our room was also very very far away and was a very long walk from the elevator. If you have younger children, disabilities, or just lazy you should request for it to be a close room because ours was a MILE away at the end of the hall (especially when you're carrying a million things and super tired).
Manager Response: Dear Ashley C,  Thank you for sharing your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We are happy to know you had a good stay with us while you were here for your conference. The next time you visit us please feel free to request a room near the elevator and we will readily help you. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Whenever I travel in the US I almost always stay in a Marriott because they are always consistent. Great hotels, wonderful service and comfortable beds. And they make sure that it’s consistent across all of their properties.   Apart from this one.   Marriott have clearly decided they do not need to invest in this hotel because they have a captive audience with Disney and the Convention centre. The rooms are old and tired, falling far far below the normal Marriott standard. The bathrooms have not been updated in decades and feel much more like something you find in a motel. They have just started a modernisation programme but I wouldn’t stay here until that is complete.   On the plus side the staff on the ground are doing their best to work with what they have. We had great
Manager Response: Dear George M,  Thank you for being our guest and for your compliments about our team. Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. Although we are confident some of these instances are isolated, this in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you an outstanding experience. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel is older,  we had to have maintenance to the room a  couple of times, we went 3 days without room service.  Hotel is nice but dated, pool area is small and no where enough seating.  We stayed 10 days and not once were we able to get loungers.
Manager Response: Dear kari t,   Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay with us. We are truly sorry that the condition of the areas you mentioned were not up to par and prevented you from leaving our hotel with a favorable impression. Our hotel does encompass quite a bit of real estate and we do our best to make sure every area is spotlessly maintained. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and we are already working to address the problems. We are sorry you were disappointed with the size of our swimming pool, which is as generous as our space allows. We want our property to be a relaxing retreat and will continue to work diligently to make sure our guests are thoroughly impressed with every aspect of their stay. Thank you again for being our guest. We hope you will consider giving us a second chance to provide you with a better stay on your next visit to this area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The staff at this hotel go above and beyond.  The lobby is beautiful. We’ve stayed here several times. Nightly rate is very reasonable. Close to the theme parks.  Rooms are clean and they have secured parking. (For an additional fee)
Manager Response: Dear maryannf1,  Thank you for returning to the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad you liked the service provided by our excellent staff members and found us to be reasonably priced. Thanks again for all your great feedback,  and we look forward to your next visit!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, check events before you go
Summary: I was visiting for a conference so had no choice about the dates. There was an event involving an outdoor band which played until midnight. When I called down to complain I was told there was nothing they could do. I’d be incredibly upset if I had brought small children to see Disneyland and they were kept up all night by a super loud band which kept 4 hotels full of people awake all night. The toilet tank overflowed two nights in a row. I reported it the next morning after the first time and it wasn’t fixed until it overflowed again. The market is great for grabbing coffee or breakfast. Lots of selection. I also ate at the hotel restaurant which was good but pricey ($25 hamburger).
Manager Response: Dear Sandra W,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us your feedback. We are truly sorry for the issues you experienced with the noise coming from the live band. We sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations and regret we were unable to resolve your issues during your stay with us. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest. We hope you will consider giving us an opportunity in the future to provide you with the level of service I know we're capable of providing.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This is my second time staying at the Marriott Anaheim Resort. My first time was back in October 2017 when my husband and I visited Disneyland/California for our 20th Anniversary. We had a wonderful experience and decided to stay at this resort again when we brought our teenage girls for our July 4th California vacation. Both experiences were great! The hotel is clean, all the employees are super helpful, and the location is perfect (within walking distance to many nearby restaurants and shops). The concierge lounge is very impressive! During our first stay, the lounge was located on a separate floor. It is now located around the lobby by their restaurants. I would highly recommend families to try their lounge. It is worth the upgrade fee if you’re not a Marriott Gold/Platinum
Manager Response: Dear Rania26,  Thank you for returning to the Anaheim Marriott. We appreciate your loyalty as a Gold Elite member in the Marriott Rewards Program. We are glad you liked each and every aspect of our hotel and had a wonderful experience. Thanks again for recommending our beautiful property, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel! Stayed here for 8 nights and everything was fabulous. The customer service at this location is always superb. Mr. Shaun Williams was great at the front desk and was able to accommodate everything I was looking for. The staff in the concierge lounge were also great and kept the place very clean. Overall wonderful experience and I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear rpg209,  Thanks for reviewing your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Our goal is for every guest to have a great experience, so we're delighted to know you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us. We will definitely share your compliments with Shaun. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel! Rooms are good/typical Marriott rooms. Great gym with plenty of equipment.  Excellent hotel location (short walk to Disneyland). Pool is shallow pool only (max about 4.5’) but nice and is in cozy courtyard setting.  Good restaurant for all meals (nfuse) and loved the market and pizzeria in the hotel.   The staff truly make this hotel and is my reason for the top rating...every single interaction we had with the staff was absolutely superb. This includes all... from housekeeping (great group on the 8th floor this weekend) to the doormen to the front desk staff to the fabulous Pablo C -a gem of a waiter at Nfuse.  Nice job Marriott on assembling a great group at Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear maelkimo,  Thank you for the fantastic review of Anaheim Marriott. It is a pleasure to know you had a wonderful stay with us and loved our perfect location, great customer service, and well-appointed accommodations. We are also glad you had a chance to dine at our hotel restaurant, and thoroughly enjoyed your experience. I will share your compliments with Pablo, for a job well done. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: The Best Place to Stay for a Convention
Summary: This hotel is almost attached to the Anaheim Convention Centre so it (or the Hilton) are the most convenient places to stay when attending a Convention. The only downside with this hotel is the rooms are small and the pool area should be renovated; otherwise it is fantastic!  The food at the main Restaurant is some of the best Restaurant food I have ever had!!  There is a lively Bar. All of the staff are very friendly and helpful. They have a shuttle to Disney but if your primary purpose I'd to go to Disney I would stay at a closer hotel. The hotel is very close to the Anaheim Angel's baseball Park. We took an Uber to the game which was $15.00.
Manager Response: Dear Biff5804,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are pleased our location was convenient for you and that you especially enjoyed your time at our restaurant. Thanks again for recommending us, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was impressed by the Anaheim Marriot. From the service, to the elevators speed, and amenities. We stayed there for the Vidcon convention, so it was an easy walk to the Convention Center. ut one of the rare hotels where you did not hear people walking above your floor. The bed was very comfy, ac worked great which is a big thing for me. Security at night and noise level was excellent. The pool was a great pool for my 13 year old with half of it being shaded. Drinks were pricey but its to be expected at a nice hotel. One word of advice, I did not rent a car, but make a run to the grocery store for general supplies such as food and water. I had to buy from the hotel store and as you know they usually mark up the price. Other than that, I would highly reccommend a stay here
Manager Response: Dear Charles M,  Thanks for recommending us to the future travelers. We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending an event at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience, and we look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I visited for a conference. Hotel staff were polite and professional. My room had a nice view and a balcony. Conference rooms were all nicely kept. The Starbucks marketplace had really nice breakfast options.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie Y,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are pleased to know you had a great stay with us while here for a conference and liked our well-appointed accommodations and friendly staff. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the Marriott several times so I decided to book it again for another trip to Vidcon. It was a busy week and I had some hiccups during this stay. The pros: the property is right across from the convention center allowing my kids easy access to come and go to the hotel as they pleased. There was heightened security measures because of the events and many Youtubers staying on the property. The property has a convenient market, starbucks, several restaurants on the property.  The cons: very bad service from the pool staff, I had to hunt down my card after opening a tab and trying to order additional food for my kids at the pool. The waitress never came back with it, never said that she was leaving and had turned my card in to loss prevention. Their wifi kept
Manager Response: Dear Iris N,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and concerns regarding your recent stay with us. I was devastated to hear you had such a bad experience with us. We are known for our great customer service and attention to detail in everything that we do. But we completely understand that our reputation is not something we should hide behind. That you were inconvenienced as you were is deeply regrettable but I can assure you we will do everything within our power to improve upon this matter. Thank you again for choosing our hotel. If you give us the chance, we guarantee we’ll win you back.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was hit by a biker the day before checking in and had notified the reception that I had bandages on both my knees. Despite this and despite being a solo female business traveller, I was given a room in the corner of the 7th floor, a very long walk from the elevator. Every time I dialed 0 or the service button on the phone from my room (room 701) for food or medical questions, there was no response 9 out of 10 times.  When I once got through, I asked if the hotel could help me with scissors to cut my gauze bandage, and some hydrogen peroxide. I had all other supplies with me. They first said ok. Then a woman called back and was very curt with telling me that the hotel cannot provide those supplies, and that I should "GO TO A CVS NEARBY, OR BUY SCISSORS FROM THE GIFT SHOP". I
Manager Response: Dear Avantika G,  Thanks for being our guest and taking the time to review your stay with us. We are truly sorry for not living up to the proper standards during your recent visit and we apologize for the location of your room and service you received. We want our guests' to see our dedication to them in everything we do, and we apologize this is not what happened. We appreciate your business and hope we can welcome you back to provide a better stay and we wish you a speedy recovery.  Best Regards, Alexina Beauperthuy Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: The Marriott missed the marker. I would not stay here again.
Summary: The reason I gave the Marriott only 2 stars is due to the following:  At 4:30 AM the individual in the next room was making quite a bit of noise. All of a sudden, someone began knocking on her door. When she didn't answer, the person banged on the door with the side of their fist, like a cop would do. I saw a man with a wire going into his ear from the peep hole. I suppose it could have been security. The sliding door to the balcony is loud when it opens and louder when it closes. The person in the next room was smoking on the balcony on a regular basis. Not only did I inquire if smoking on the balcony was allowed (it's not), I reported the activity. Even though the front desk stated they would alert security, the individual continued to smoke. I informed the person smoking was
Manager Response: Dear Robin W,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Please accept our apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. Although we are confident some of these instances are isolated, this in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you an outstanding experience. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a Tournament at the convention center. VERY convenient location. Comfortable room and bed. Excellent bar downstairs and the Club Loinge breakfast was terrific. Only criticism was valet parking at times seemed overwhelmed. I will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Bart M,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending an event at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. We are happy that our facilities and accommodations provided you with a comfortable experience. Thank you for the compliments, and we look forward to your next visit.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Plan on getting the opposite of what you request here
Summary: Booked this hotel 5 months in advance, paid extra on my reservation for a city view room.  Fast forward to check in where I'm told I have to wait 3 hours until check in time.  That's fine, I realize it's a very busy hotel that apparently doesn't give consideration to Marriott reward members so I give my phone number as they tell me they'll call when the room is ready.  Then I wait.  And wait.  Finally at 415 after watching a steady stream of people check in, I ask if my room is ready and they say yes.  My upgraded "city view" reservation with a high floor is a third floor room with literally a view of dirty rooftop air vents.  I return to the front desk to show him my reservation is booked for a city view room and the desk clerk tells me it was a request only.  No, the high
Manager Response: Dear llkirtaz,   We were disappointed to read your feedback and hope you will accept our apologies for problems you experienced. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we did not live up to your expectations. We assure you this is not acceptable, nor is it normal at our hotel, and measures are being taken to reinforce procedures to prevent these types of issues from occurring again. We hope you will see this for the isolated incident that it was and stay with us again.  Kindly,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Easy access to Convention Center and DL
Summary: I booked four rooms for a birthday gathering.  They arranged for all of our rooms to be on the same floor.  Hotel was sold out due to a sporting tournament and convention event but was able to check in early.  Front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.   Several of us had rooms with a tiny balcony.  As Gold Reward members we had the breakfast buffet on the Concierge level on the 18th floor.  The Concierge room was very clean. Food offering was the standard hotel egg, sausage/bacon, pastries, breads, yogurt, oatmeal etc and replenished quickly.  Variety of fresh fruit and drink options. Non dairy milk was available when I asked.  Staff was attentive and helpful when I needed to ask for ingredients to several items.  The Concierge room was not open during the day on the
Manager Response: Dear elephas,  Thanks for reviewing your stay at the Anaheim Marriott and for recognizing our excellent staff members. We are glad you liked our convenient location and also enjoyed our delicious breakfast buffet. Your feedback with regard to your bathroom door has been shared with our maintenance team to do the needful. We appreciate your loyalty as a Platinum Elite member, and look forward to welcoming you and your friends back soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Recently spent 2 nights here with a friend while visiting Disneyland. Hotel was very modern and clean. Pool and hot tub were great. Lots of places to eat close by and walking distance to Disneyland. Also the bus that goes to Disney is just outside the main lobby. Great family hotel as well, seen many many families enjoying their time at the pool.
Manager Response: Dear AnneViola,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you & your friend had a wonderful stay with us and enjoyed our well-maintained facility and our convenient location in the heart of Downtown Disney. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Good Facilities let down by poor rooms
Summary: The hotel has good facilities such as an outdoor pool and an excellent gym with a selection of machines and free weights. There is a good selection of restaurants and cafes. Though it must be said even by hotel standards they are incredibly over priced (Think salad box with chicken over $15 plus coke $4) that being said the pizza shop was excellent and represented much better value. The hotel is a good 25 minute walk from the entrance to Disneyland so you may not want to keep coming and going to the hotel throughout the day. The hotel does offer a paid shuttle though it is almost just as easy to walk 5 minutes down the road to the Disney Toy Story car park and take their free shuttle to and from Disneyland which runs far more frequently. Unfortunately the rooms are a little
Manager Response: Dear ChordsMark,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment with our prices, the appearance of your room and the shower. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here for a meeting last week.  I wanted to share my great experience with housekeeping and loss prevention. I had left my bose headset and housekeys in the room. I contacted them 2 days later. They had them and fed ex’d them overnight without charging me. Very honest staff and great experience with loss prevention
Manager Response: Dear Denisetx,  Thank you for the wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: We had a great time at this hotel!
Summary: First let me start by saying this hotel really met our expectations definately with having a long stay (5 days). I accompanied my husband for a conference and it was also his birthday weekend and this hotel is in a great location to anything you may need and just a short uber ride to the Orange Outlets. We were comp'ed to a larger room with a balcony in the Oasis tower **Note there are some reviews citing this tower to not have a balcony.. that's not completely true the corner rooms have balconies while the other may not. The pool area is gorg and the gym is by far one of the best Ive ever witnessed in a hotel. The staff was sweet and very help... one funny story... So I'd called in advance to let them know it would be my husband's birthday and I wanted to have a surprise
