Manager Response: Dear angela H,  Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott in the heart of Downtown Disney! Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations. We understand the importance of details that make up a great stay and are happy knowing you enjoyed you and your husband had an enjoyable time with us. We look forward to seeing you again whenever you are back here!    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: After many miles and numerous stops we arrived at this location.... from the moment the valet greeted us and Joe from the bell desk escorted us to the front desk we felt welcomed to A. M. The front desk personnel we super friendly and efficient and once again Joe made sure we settled into our room with ease and helpful tips. The hotel was having a HUGE convention and all surrounding hotels and common areas: parking lots we packed.... not to worry our friends at Bell/ Valet took great care of my large truck. EVERYONE in this hotel greeted and talked to us at every instance even though they were slammed with convention guests.... The bar manager (sorry forgot name) makes top shelf bloody Mary’s.... Food was excellent, breakfast, snacks, late nights... nice selection and delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Abner10,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad we exceeded all your expectations and that our wonderful staff made it for an exceptional experience. We will definitely share your compliments with Joe. Reviews such as yours mean a lot! Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you both back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Front check in desk was fast and friendly. Early  check in room ready No pool .I attended a conference . Spacious conference rooms. All rooms on one  level .Easy transfer to next conference room. Restaurants on the same level. Loved the made to order fresh pizza restaurant with any and as many toppings at no extra cost on the main level.. The room was clean .The housekeeping staff friendly. Shuttle available in front of hotel  to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear desmond417,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are pleased to know you had a great stay with us and liked our friendly staff, well-equipped facility, and clean accommodations. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Its a good hotel, went there around a yeah ago! The room was nice, AC good, and a perfect stay otherwice! :D :D It had a lovely pool, the beds was good, there was no sound at night and the service was polite and nice.
Manager Response: Dear danielbunckenburg,   Thank you for returning to the Anaheim Marriott for your stay. We are pleased to know you had an excellent stay with us and loved our amazing facility, comfortable accommodations, and friendly service. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: There were 5 of us in the room and they insisted on giving us 3 of everything the room wasn't cleaned until after 5 0 clock bins were never emptied and we had a flood in the bathroom and nobody ever came to sort it out we had to clean it up with towels
Manager Response: Dear KIRKJinty,   We were disappointed to read your feedback and hope you will accept our apologies for problems you experienced. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we did not live up to your expectations. We assure you this is not acceptable, nor is it normal at our hotel, and measures are being taken to reinforce procedures to prevent these types of issues from occurring again. We hope you will see this for the isolated incident that it was and stay with us again.  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Rein was very nice and helpful whenever we needed help. He was also very polite and patient. The hotel is also very beautiful and great to look at. The rooms are very roomy and cozy, and are very comfortable. The entire hotel in general is very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Thu V,  Thank you for staying with us at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you had a wonderful stay with us and loved our outstanding service & hospitality, along with your well-appointed room. We will be sure to share your compliments with Rein, for a job well done. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My family stayed here for about 2 weeks. The rooms were very spacious and all of the staff were friendly. It's not luxurious, but accommodations were great for the price, especially around Disney area. Breakfasts were decent as well. Very close to shopping. Parking is not free.
Manager Response: Dear ranger8,   Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality your family received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you all again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: If you are at a conference at the convention center, than this is a great hotel to stay at. The room was clean and there are food courts downstairs to eat at because the restaurant at the hotel isn't very good.
Manager Response: Dear terryprod,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending an event at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. We are happy our service and hospitality exceeded your expectations. Thanks for the feedback, and we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Really awesome service - property is blah - yet good people and great location
Summary: I never thought I would give a "Convention" hotel or one that caters to Disneyland, which is next door,  such a high rating..... and clearly this is the best Marriott I have been in.  Yet the service rocks and they know what they are doing.  They clearly process a lot of people as it is a large hotel, yet they do it so well and in such a very nice way.  Even the elevators are streamlined to add speed and you never really need to wait.  There is a small, mall-like food court in the hotel and a Starbucks in the Hotel across the pathway.   Key however, and the real reason for a fourth star comes down to very good and very, very quick room service set up.  No more nebulous 30-90 minute delays seen at regular hotels - think 10 minutes and it is there.... and it tastes really good.
Manager Response: Dear Gre P,  Thank you for staying with us at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you had a great time with us and liked our quality service and accommodations. Thanks again, and we hope to see you soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great Marriott property in the heart of Anaheim, CA!
Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at the Anaheim Marriott for pleasure when a friend visiting from San Diego was in town.  Charles checked me in and I have to say his customer service level was top notch and very personable welcoming me and my friend to the property.  The room we had was great facing the hotel's pool area.  We grabbed a quick bite and drinks at the hotel's lobby bar before heading out.  Alex was our server and asked us where we were visiting from, offered recommendations in the area and was genuinely interested in ensuring we were having a pleasant stay.  Thank you Charles and Alex for making us feel right at home and among friends!
Manager Response: Dear ryerye0514,  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott and for taking the time to write a review about your wonderful experience. It was a pleasure to read that Charles and Alex provided excellent service and helped to make your stay a pleasant one. Please be assured that we will share your comments with them. It was our pleasure hosting you and your friend, and we hope you will choose us whenever you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Been here 3 days, 3 more to go. Hotel is very nice, lots of amenities and choices of places to eat. Very convenient to the   Convention center and Hilton. Short walk to Disney and safe to do so even after dark. Room 1451 is a corner room with lots of windows and a private balcony in the Oasis Tower facing the Hilton. Only complain is windows are not sound proof, even on floor 14. You can hear everything outside until it quiets down. GREAT STAY!!
Manager Response: Dear AZTraveler85616,  Thank you for the fantastic review of Anaheim Marriott. It is a pleasure to know you are having an amazing stay with us and loved our Downtown Disney location, along with your comfortable accommodation. We hope your remaining stay with us also continues in the same way.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Well, let me begin... i would not say this Marriott is a 4star to start off. I'd say a 3star, yes..but definitely not a 4 star. To get a 4 star you'd have to have quite some amenities, service, standard to acquire that and they didn't achieve that. Why I say that.. let me point it out here.  #1- prior to checking in, I called in to inform Marriott about our Rewards numberbecause I booked it through Priceline, I wanted to make sure whatever it is get credited. Btw, note this folks, if you book your reservation through 3rd party.. you don't get points credited at all. Which don't make sense because they still get paid by the 3rd party. Lol. It's not like we get it for free. Hahaha.  But fine whatever. You'll only get credited on incidental charges. And, I requested for our bedroom
Manager Response: Dear cynch72,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We were disappointed to read your feedback and hope you will accept our  sincerest apologies for problems you experienced. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we deeply regret that we did not live up to those expectations. We assure you this is not acceptable, nor is it normal at our hotel, and measures are being taken to reinforce procedures to prevent these types of issues from occurring again. We hope you will see this for the isolated incident that it was and stay with us again. Thank you so much for being our guest. It was a real pleasure serving you. We wish you all the best with your future travels. Take care!  Kindly,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Attended a convention at the Anaheim convention center for two nights in June.  Very grateful for the great nearby lodging. Felt slightly dated but still very comfortable and everything I needed.  Only (very slight) negatives were the popcorn ceiling (70s?) and no minibar/refrigerator. But the room was big, the bed comfortable, the people nice and the food at the bar was good and reasonably priced. Overall great experience.
Manager Response: Dear shelley221,  Thank you for your nice feedback about the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you liked your well-appointed room and had an overall enjoyable stay. That being said, I am sorry we fell short in some of your expectations. We value your feedback and hope the positive aspects of your visit will bring you back to our hotel in the future.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Room was pretty standard, had everything I would expect from a Marriott- hair dryer, iron, comfy beds, perfect temperature, super clean plus I really like their green program where if you don't use their cleaning service you get points on your account- helping saving money and the planet! The end is what gave me 5 stars- after a long day at disney they let me keep my luggage with their bellhop until much later than a normal checkout time and then the bellhop guys even gave me some free seltzer water while I waited! Put a great smile on my face and left a great lasting impression. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Amanda D,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted to know you had an excellent stay with us and liked our well-appointed room, great service, and convenient location. Thanks again for your kind words and recommendation, and we look forward to your next visit Orange County.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I chose this hotel for its location as I wouldn’t have a car with me.  The park is walkable from the hotel but there’s also a shuttle bus which you can buy a ticket for. The room was a great size and clean. The bathroom felt like it needed updating and I needed to get the shower fixed when I first arrived. I stayed for 5 nights and would generally recommend the hotel.  The staff were friendly. The food was nice and the bar and restaurant were nice. The pool was a good size, but there were people waiting for the sun loungers. I feel like they should provide complimentary WiFi as it’s expensive if you’re not a rewards member.
Manager Response: Dear KtLou104,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you had a great stay with us and liked our location in the heart of Downtown Disney, along with your clean & well-appointed room. Thanks again for recommending us, and on behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: I may not be the best judge of this hotel as I prefer to think of a hotel as a place to sleep.  If I’m not sleeping, I prefer to be “out and about”.  This Joel is too nice to be utilized in this manner.  It is next to the Convention Center, so it has to be nice.  I arrived with my son and we were both on motorcycles.  You wouldn’t think this would be a problem in Southern California, but they weren’t sure what to do with us.  I was not allowed to use the hotel cart to take my bags to my room, and it was difficult to find someone to do it for me.  Since it was a convention, the room was extremely expensive.  The room was small and a little worn around the edges.  The outside of the hotel could use a little freshening up as well.  We didn’t use the pool but I’m sure it was nice.
Manager Response: Dear vntr66,   Thank you for staying with us at Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. It is nice to know you & your son had a pleasant stay with us and liked our convenient location. We are sorry for the inconvenience you had experienced and have shared your feedback with our management team to make sure we enhance our future guest experience. Thanks again, and we hope to see you soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Check in was easy - wifi $14.95 per day unless signed up to Marriott rewards programme. Comfortable room with small bathroom. Within walking distance for Disneyland.   Sadly though, we had an issue with a small parcel which we were to have delivered to our last stay in USA. I had rung ahead to let the hotel know it was coming, when and for whom. I spoke to a nice man called Mark who explained that it would cost a fee to have it stored until we arrived. As we were totally unaware of this, he helped us with a lesser charge and told us to see him when we got there. We went to pick up the parcel when we arrived but upon further exploration we found that it had indeed been delivered to the hotel but 10 days later had been sent back to the company because our reservation was under my
Manager Response: Dear Claire C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for the issues with your delivery and the service you received. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My friend and I were in Anaheim Marriott for a conference. We stayed for 4 nights.   The night before we checked out we went to the front desk and ask if it was possible to add my name to the reservation (which was under my friends name) so I could also present the receipt to my employer for my reimbursements. The lady at the front desk said they could actually split the bill between us, however, we should wait until the day of our checkout when all of the charges are in.  On the day of the checkout though, the person who “assisted” us was NOT so helpful. When we told him of our request to split the bill like what the other Marriott staff told us the night before, he said: “there’s a line behind you, there are other customers checking out”. I don’t know why he forgot we were
Manager Response: Dear Re_explore1252,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for the issues with the service you received. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: First impression start at front desk, Francisco is very accommodating and has CAN DO attitude... love it. We called 30 minute ahead of checking in to add 1 more room to our reservation, when check in the reservation still not update but thanks to front desk, Francisco, who went above and beyond to make sure we happy of what we got and if any thing he can do to make our stay better. Then jack, bellman who is so helpful... then the list goes on.     Hotel is situated in perfect location right next to convention center, lots of restaurants in the area in less than 10 minutes walk or just down stair in the hotel itself. FYI Valet parking is $31 (about par with other hotel in the area)   Our rooms are located in 18th floor which is called concierge floor with concierge lounge
Manager Response: Dear ASW22,  Thank you for choosing Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a pleasant stay with us and liked our friendly service and convenient location. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Oasis at end of day. We had just returned from Disneyland and they had cookies in the lobby. But, when we went up to the room to drop off our things and came back down the cookies were gone. When we explained the situation, one of the front desk managers went to the concierge lounge and brought us down cookies. Thank you for helping us rejuvenate after a long day.
Manager Response: Dear  Jason J,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had an amazing stay with us and liked our warm hospitality. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I want to start by saying we stay at this hotel often. However this will be our last.  On the morning of our checkout, I woke up and jumped in the shower, hubby still asleep, privacy sign out or so we thought. Apparently someone took our sign because as I was stepping out of shower, hubby was stumbling to the door which was locked and latched thank goodness because apparently the maid had called maintenance who came with a drill who tried to get into the room. Really?!?  I was naked, my husband as well and neither of us were really awake. There was no phone call to the room asking if we want service just a man with a drill ready to take off our lock.  Wow!!   Yeah we won’t be back!! Guard your privacy signs.   Checkin wasn’t any better. They assigned us our room, got our keys
Manager Response: Dear Ginger G,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the problems which inconvenienced you. Although we are confident some of these instances are isolated, this in no way excuses the fact that we failed to provide you an outstanding experience. We value your loyalty to our brand and promise that immediate steps will be taken to ensure we do not repeat these mistakes. We hope you will consider a future visit so we can better demonstrate our commitment to service excellence.Thank you once again for being our guest. Take care and safe travels!  Best Regards, , Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel has some of the most helpful and friendly employees of any hotel that I have ever stayed at . That alone sets this hotel apart from others I have stayed in....and this includes some of the best hotels in the US,Europe and Asia. This is the first time I have stayed at this hotel but it won’t be the last.
Manager Response: Dear Eugene C,  Thank you for your great comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: When I was invited to my grand daughter’s dance competition and convention, our choice of hotel was naturally where the convention was.  Besides the convenience of the location - go down stairs we were at the convention - the hotel also offered good restaurants, markets with coffee (Starbucks too !) and snacks, fruits.  There is Disney desk in the lobby. They offered a ‘convention discounted ticket’ $84 after 4pm. I decided to treat my grand daughter with a quick visit to Disneyland. We had a great time !!!
Manager Response: Dear worldwonder805,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a pleasant stay with us and our location was convenient for your needs. It was a pleasure having you with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Be sure and ask for Sasan in the hotel restaurant - he does an incredible job of anticipating the needs of families. He is particularly good with large groups. He is very thorough, friendly and remembers well the details of your food order.
Manager Response: Dear mikeA0604WA,   Thank you for sharing your gracious comments about the exceptional service you received from Sasan. He has a great passion for providing outstanding hospitality, so we are pleased to share your wonderful comments with him. Thanks for being our guest. We look forward to your next stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Excellent location nice amenities and price . Parking is far so I recommend valet parking . It's by lots of food and the park. We rented scooters for Disneyland and road them home jyst fine . The restaraunt was nice too and has a Starbucks. We loved it.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,   We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: It was easy to walk to Disney Land as well as the convention center.  Very good bar downstairs.  Staff was easy to work with.  Good room service.  Funny thing, the price of the room varied greatly day by day - a complete surprise to me at check out.
Manager Response: Dear cjs003,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are thrilled to know you loved our location and the service we offered. We hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with pay for parking fee
Summary: Yes the hotel is nice, but I didn't appreciate the $25 per day parking fee. If you stay here paying for parking is a rip-off. Otherwise everything was fine, but I won't stay again because of parking charge.
Manager Response: Dear Robert B,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott. It’s a pleasure knowing you had a great time with us and loved many aspects of our hotel. However, we are sorry that you were disappointed with the parking fee. We truly hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The customer service at this Marriott location is impeccable. The entire staff is very friendly and helpful. Great food on site, walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. You can’t go wrong here.
Manager Response: Dear Gina,   Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted to know you had an amazing stay with us and loved our perfect location and prompt services. It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This is my second time staying at this location and after my first visit a month prior, I knew that I wanted to stay here anytime I was in the near area. I went to Disneyland last time and the hotel made sure that we were very well taken care of and gave us fantastic recommendations. This second time visiting what really stood out to me was the service from the front desk, Alexandra made us feel very comfortable and was an absolute pleasure to talk to. Her service was impeccable and she gave us an awesome recommendation to try a nearby sushi place. Aside from the great service that we received, the hotel also has a very nice gym that even I, as an avid gym goer, was impressed by. They have a coffee shop as well as a little market for quick food. They have a restaurant, gift
Manager Response: Dear Spencer R,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Anaheim Marriott once again an for sharing your wonderful review. We are thrilled to read you were impressed with everything our hotel has to offer, especially the service provided by Alexandra. Your compliments will make their day. We appreciate you sharing your nice comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Good location for Disney but not right in the thick of things
Summary: I was here for work and really enjoyed my stay. The room was very nicely decorated and looked recently refreshed. The bathroom was tiny but I didn't spend tons of time there. :)  The bell desk was incredibly helpful. I needed their help with a few things and they really helped a lot. I'd say most everyone was quite friendly except the concierge. I don't know her name, but a woman with short hair. Just not very engaging when I asked for help thinking of ways to get to downtown LA besides a standard taxi. She seemed a bit snooty. I remember the LAX Marriott always has drivers they can call to drive me places, but I'm not knocking her for not having driver recommendations, I'm knocking her for being snooty. I would like to call out Maria in the Club Lounge. She seemed to be there
Manager Response: Dear Susanila,    Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you had a great stay with us and liked your well-appointed room, along with the service provided by our friendly staff. I will share your compliments with Maria for a job well done, and on behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina, Front Office Manager

Summary: My first visit to this Marriott and I was pleasantly surprised.  The lobby had the nicest smell and is nicely decorated.  Check in was a breeze and the clerk was so friendly and welcoming.  The elevators are a hoot and every new hotel should install them.  Our room had a nice balcony and overlooked the pool and had a nice city view.  The room size is average and could be a bit bigger.  Huge TV and if you have a Netflix account you can log in and view.  The hotel also had HBO where other properties sometimes don't.  Beds were super comfortable.  We ordered a pizza from room service and it was super quick delivery.  Ate at the Infuse bar and they have a nice cocktail selection and we also had the buffet.  The waitress was so sweet and made sure we had everything we needed.  Even
Manager Response: Dear slotsgal,   Thank you for staying with us at Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. We are glad to know you had a pleasant stay with us and liked our amazing service and well-equipped room. On behalf of everyone here, we invite you to stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a work conference. The conference space and organization of rooms was great. The hotel rooms were nice but nothing spectacular. Pool was really nice as well. No complimentary breakfast or coffee. Food at the market was at least about 1/3 more than what you could pay eating outside of the hotel. If you’re looking for a convenient location with all the updates, this is a great place. If you need practicality for your other scheduled CA adventures outside of the hotel, look for something cheaper.
Manager Response: Dear Emily F,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and for your disappointment with the hotel rooms, breakfast, and your overall experience. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: If there's one thing the US do well, it's size and comfort!!
Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights on a work conference last October. The staff in all departments of the hotel were superb. Friendly, helpful and just so so nice. The food was excellent, craft beers on tap at the bar, conference facilities as good as I've every seen..... would love to have stayed longer... but I was needed the next week, in Blackpool! :)
Manager Response: Dear Sutty67,  Thank you for sharing a wonderful review of the Anaheim Marriott. Service and facilities are the best assets that we can offer to our guests, and we are glad to know you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you again for another memorable trip.    Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed here with my 3 children and it was amazing. The kids loved how close it was to Disney and there is an affordable shuttle that drops you off and picks you off. The pool was my favorite part of the hotel. Some may find it too shallow but at 4ft it was perfect for my younger children. The pool side restaurant service kept this mommy happy. Lunch pool side!
Manager Response: Dear jenniferbZ8966GX,  Thank you for your nice feedback about the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know our location worked well for you and that enjoyed your time with your family. We hope to be your hotel of choice whenever you are back in this area.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I've always loved this location.  I love the covered pool, I loved how they used to have great childrens activity (not sure if they still do, kids are grown)  how they used to be able to eat free,  late check out, accommodating front desk staff,  great daily deals.  $19.00 dinner buffet with awesome salad and vegetables and beverage ( i spent $16.00 on a turkey leg at disney)   the front desk staff.  parking is $12..00 but most every hotel is doing it now  kinda like how most of the hotels are charging resort fees in vegas
Manager Response: Dear Esthertravels,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about the outstanding service and hospitality you received from us at the Anaheim Marriott. Our main priority is your comfort and convenience, and we appreciate you taking the time to let others know we went over and above to meet your expectations! We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The jewel in the crown here is the nFuse lounge and restaurant. Great grub, ambience and above all such personalized service. After a long day at the rat house, a perfect place to devour those crunchy little calamari with a bottle(believe me you need a bottle post the mouse visit) of wine. Rooms are what you expect at semi higher end Marriott. No second thoughts on coming back again .. and again.!!
Manager Response: Dear Kastle_Kreator,  We are delighted you chose to stay at Anaheim Marriott while attending an event at the beautiful Anaheim Convention Center, just steps from our hotel. We are happy our service and hospitality exceeded your expectations, and we look forward to your next visit with us. Thank you for the compliments!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: It was absolutely not possible to chat in the lobby, or make phone calls. The music was SUPER LOUD, and if try to go out..... the music is there too.... You need literally go away from the hotel to make a phone call. It was very disturbing. Someone decide that instead of background tune you have to be in Disco mode. I spent 3 days for my business trip, and needed to be on the phone with clients. Not only I couldn't hear anything, my clients noticed numerous times "are you on vacation? Should we talk when you are available?" This is unacceptable for this level hotel.... I asked person at the reception if it possible to make the music quieter but they said we dont have access to this.  It wasnt comfortable in the room as well. If your windows turned to the front entrance expect to
Manager Response: Dear  Sergey K,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We were sorry we did not live up to your expectations and sincerely apologize for the noise levels. We will share your comments with our department heads to ensure corrective action is taken. We would appreciate you giving us another opportunity so you can experience the hotel as you should have on this visit.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The staff were wonderful and the hotel is just beautiful. We stayed to go to Disneyland and will definitely be back. I didn’t see any difference with staying outside of the park. Keep the great work!!
Manager Response: Dear Youtravelgirl,   We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know we exceeded your expectations for an absolutely perfect experience. We appreciate you choosing us for your visit to Orange County.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Location & Service just a walk away from Disneyland
Summary: I spend a great deal of time traveling and know that hotels overbook to ensure they make money.  If you check-in late in the day, you may be sent to a sister hotel for the night..which is what happened to me this weekend.  Inconvenient, yes, but it happens.  Its how well the hotel has trained their staff in customer service that makes the difference in your stay.  Although the Anaheim Marriott Convention Way overbooked, Floyd provided extraordinary customer service.  Its true, we lost some time, but the staff went out of their way to make our stay more comfortable. Tony is the best Valet and Doorman I've had in a long time and Cameron provided exceptional Bell service.  Selina's room service was quick and efficient while keeping a friendly smile and greeting every morning.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda,  Thank you for being our guest at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your review. It is a pleasure to know you had a wonderful stay with us and loved our perfect location, along with the service provided by our friendly staff. I will share your compliments with Floyd, Tony, and Cameron, for a job well done. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Being a Platinum Elite member in Marriott as well as a Lifetime Platinum in SPG, we were not acknowledged upon arrival and given a less than acceptable room even though my portfolio and room request upon booking was specific. Other than this, hotel and business conference was excellent thus the 4 star rating.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent family option near the parks
Summary: The hotel was good, rooms are spacious, breakfast buffet had many options for kids and adults.  We had dinner one night and was also good.  Parks are walking distance but we opted for the shuttle, you can get tickets Roundtrip at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Gelseyf, thank you for choosing to stay at the Anaheim Marriott and for sharing your amazing experience. We are thrilled to know you loved the comfort of your spacious room and were impressed with the convenience of our location. Thanks once more for allowing us to be of service, and we hope to have the pleasure of doing so again on your next trip.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel is great, would stay here again. Front desk check-in experience was great I think his name was Floyd who checked us in, was super helpful and accommodating. Had issue with internet and as we didn’t have our Marriott membership number they sorted it all out. Disneyland is in walking distance but there is a shuttle service right out front of hotel, there is a charge. Pool looked good and we ate at the hotel first night just for convenience was good food and service not to overly priced.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Avg hotel, less than desirable service

Upon arrival that wasn’t the case so we got a rollaway for the kids. They charged us $20/night for the rollaway without telling us upfront. Overall the room was fine - we basically only slept there. Walking distance to Disneyland which was nice. The bar staff was nice and Bell hops were very helpful. Valet has a lot to be desired. When we first arrived we told them we were just checking in and dropped off luggage as we had dinner plans. They said they would hold the car. 10 minutes later we return and have to wait 15 minutes for them to retrieve the car. Valet staff is never around. They are usually in the back of

Summary: We stayed here for a week while visiting Disneyland . We were for the most part happy with our room. The bathrooms are small and need updating . But the beds were soooo comfortable and probably the best I have slept in. Nice big tvs as well. We did not enjoy the fourth floor as the balcony had a wall and not railing so was unable to see the pool view. Also make sure to lock patio door as balcony is shared with a room beside . The rooms were quiet. The elevators are awesome and very fast ! Must say I am spoiled now for having to not push the button while inside. The entry and pool are beautiful and always smelled lovely. The pizza place in the lobby with made to order pizza was fantastic , had several later night pizza snacks here. Lovely pool side tables with fires at night for
Manager Response: none

Summary: If I hadn't been working on an event at the convention center, I wouldn't have chosen this location myself. If you are, the location is absolutely the key factor in selecting the hotel. I found the bathroom a bit outdated. The door on my room, and the locking mechanism, were difficult the whole time. I loved the larger-than-average TV though, and the rooms with balconies offer an excellent option if you want to check the temperature yourself. The elevators are a step above though! They seem odd at first (you type in your floor if you are on lobby level) but they make the system incredibly efficient.
Manager Response: Dear Cathryn W,   Thank you for your candid review. We were disappointed to read your feedback and hope you will accept our apologies for problems you experienced. Summary: I'm a Marriott Gold Elite member and made a spontaneous trip to Anaheim to visit my son.  This was not a Disneyland visit, so I was kind of hesitant in booking this Marriott because I didn't want to be in the thick of tourists.  He had been a student at Chapman in Orange for 4 years and we never stayed at this hotel because we were usually moving him in or out and needed easy access to our car and his belongings. That was a shame!  I loved this hotel.  It has a resort feel, so I felt we were someplace special...a vacation. As a Gold Elite member, I get some perks that come in handy.  The line to check-in was quite long when we arrived, but the Elite line had no one in it, so check-in was a breeze and we had our keys within minutes.  I had booked the cheapest AAA rate room online
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice place, though out of the regular family joe's budget!

City bus picks you up right in front of motel ($5.50 a day).  Very safe area.  Pool are very nice, but the water in both the regular pool and the hot tub are not pleasant, our kids do not enjoy swimming here.  The Market is a breakfast/lunch/ coffee shop type place and it's setup is designed horriblely.  Menus are listed in bad locations, if you need a simple cup of coffee you can wait  a long while to be helped.  Wasn't to impressed with the friendlyness either if the employee's at The Market .  Hotel parking $25 a day, that hurt being there for a 6 days. Garage is a long walk to the elevators to get to your room.   Rooms are
Manager Response: Dear Biggerbulls,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled to know that you loved our staff and the safe and convenient location. The front desk staff also has attitude whenever we ask for help. Granted, it was a very busy period when we stayed because of a huge event/conference, but for the rate this hotel charges, the service they give is not at par with similar hotels. Frankly, it was like staying at a motel in terms of the lack of service. The pool area was also very noisy every night of our stay and the staff were not doing anything to remind the guests to be quiet. I will not stay at
Manager Response: Dear Ben M,   Thank you for your review of our hotel. Summary: Quick caveat: I'm a big fan of Marriott properties and have been to numerous hotels all around the world in the past.  The hotel is a tad dated, but the service is quite good. Some minor improvements could be made. For example, I booked on the AAA with breakfast rate, but I had to inquire about how to redeem the breakfast the following morning. Like I said, very minor because I had the vouchers waiting for me at the front desk right away. Everything was clean and the room was serviced very well. Many restaurants and retail nearby. Check-in was effortless as was check-out.  "Rein" should be specifically mentioned here as a stellar employee and guest advocate. He by himself gets the full 5 stars.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel. Rooms are very comfortable and well appointed. Starbucks inside the hotel is great.  I was there for a conference and the meeting rooms are nice but COLD!  Be sure and bring a jacket if you're going to a meeting! Banquet food was all good.  Very near to Disney - I could see the nightly fireworks from my patio!  There is also a small fridge in the room which is nice.  I'd recommend For business or pleasure stay
Manager Response: Dear RedKO_13,  Thank you for your nice feedback about the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you liked our convenient location and had a pleasant time being with us. Summary Heading: One of the Best Options Near Disney
Summary: If you are not up for spending the $$$ for Disney’s Grand Californian Hotel, this is probably the next nicest option at a fraction of the price. A friendly staff, pretty good restaurant and nice pool combine with comfortable rooms to make this a good family or biz destination hotel for a couple days.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just spent another great week in Anaheim and the Marriot is one of my favorite hotels. Great location and a lot of activities nearby. I was disappointed they took out Starbucks but they did upgrade the pizza place, which was good. Alexandra, looks like a model was very helpful and a wealth of knowledge about the surrounding area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not too many Mickey ears even though you VERY near Disneyland
Summary: If you have to be in Anaheim in business, the Marriott at the Convention Center is a great option.  Hotel is close to highways, quiet, many options for dining and many places close by for dinning out.  The staff are friendly and helpful.  Three of the five nights I stayed the hotel was booked.  You would never it.  So quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I took my family on a Disneyland trip in August and had a delightful stay at the Anaheim Marriott. The room was nice and clean with a kitchenette. The roof top pool was very nice and relaxing after a long day at the park. They even showed movies at the pool with free popcorn.. the kids loved that! The breakfasts served in the morning were very good and made for a nice start to the day. I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A gem of a hotel! Superb staff and service during super busy time.
Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for a 3 days conference. It’s our second time here but the first was over 10 years ago. We are so impressed with the staff and the superb level of service at this place. The hotel was completely booked. There were other things going on besides our conference. Staff worked their bottoms off I’m sure but you would never know it. Everyone always smiled and went out of their ways. A HUGE shoot out to Ms Heather at the concierge lounge. She is a complete gem. Remembers our names each time. Thank you, Heather and thank you amarriott. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear MLD31,  Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Marriott. Our entire staff works hard to attain our guest’s satisfaction in every possible way, and we admire you recognizing their efforts. Summary: Rooms were nice, though bathrooms are a bit small and tight.  I was here attending a convention. Overall nice hotel and would stay again simply because location to convention center was great. I felt that the staff was overwhelmed by size of convention and seemed like the hotel bars and restaurants could not keep up and it was slow getting service at times.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Arrived very early (11am) in the day for my three night stay and figured I would have to store my luggage. However, they had a room available and after a very pleasant check in I was in my room about 5 minutes after walking in the door. My room was in the second tower (Oasis Tower I believe). The room was clean and comfortable. It is an older property and the size and condition of the bathroom reflected this fact. The bathroom could stand a remodel. The room had a fridge, a small closet, and a nice sized work desk. WiFi was good, but only other chains, there appeared to be no free WiFi in the lobby and meeting rooms.  I was there for a conference and the meeting rooms and support staff were nice and efficient. My room was cleaned very quickly each morning. The hotel is in a
Manager Response: none

Summary: Attending the trade show I knew it was going to be busy but wow it really was.   They did a good job considering. Rooms were clean. Service friendly.   Only issue was noise but it was expected as it was a trade show
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worse Marriott, seems like a night club instead of a hotel

By the time the people left and finished talking it was around 1am. We are at an 8th floor. The music and the people were so loud, it seemed that the party was next door.  I had to wake up for an early meeting, of course I was not able to rest due to the party.   When we called the hotel manager she seemed more concerned with the hotel’s revenue than the guests.   Her responses were totally inconsiderate and not offered any solutions to the problem of the loud party.    Personnel at the restaurants are also rude and all
Manager Response: Dear Vivieyra,   Thank you for sharing your feedback. We are very disappointed you feel our hotel and facilities did not provide the value you were expecting. Summary Heading: Overall good but details fall short
Summary: Front desk staff was friendly and efficient. Porters were helpful and accommodating. I liked the full service Starbucks that was really more of a food court and an easy/ quick source for breakfast or lunch. Elevators had somewhat of a learning curve but once mastered, provided efficient travel between floors. Even during peak occupancy of the hotel, I never had to wait long for an elevator. Food was decent and restaurant service was good. Nice gift shop on site. Room accommodations missed the mark for me based on the following: Electrical outlets were sparse and only accessible by crawling on the floor and under the desk. Alarm clock did not always work properly. Oddly shaped room with what seemed to be a lot of wasted space. The bed was rather lumpy, On my first night, the bed
Manager Response: Dear SAMT2002,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your comments. We appreciate your feedback and are delighted knowing you had a pleasant stay. Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great business hotel with all the offerings
Summary: I am here on Business and this hotel has everything you will need. It is huge in size and to much walking if your a tourist and wanting to go places but for a leave in the morning and back in the afternoon..top notch. Have straight forward rooms with views to offer of sunshine and the mountains or Disney in the background. Staff are great and always around..Good food options inside hotel. Mainly, it has clean rooms, good employees and seems to care your being taken care of..I did have a problem with my fridge not working and the manner in which they took care of it was first class...

Summary Heading: Good hotel but showing its age

A few issues: 1) Rooms getting a bit shabby and showing their age. 2) Pool hard to relax because of multiple music feeds coming in from all directions. 3) Rooms could have been cleaner THANKS!

Summary: Overall, this is a great hotel, next to the convention center, with nearby restaurants. We did have a noise issue with our room located facing the pool area and were offered a new room right away without hesitation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed in this hotel while in town for a conference with my husband.  Staff are all courteous & friendly.  Did not have any rooms with king beds when we checked in but 2 double beds were sufficient but preference would have been the king.  The room was clean & had a refrigerator & coffee maker & tea available to make in the room.  WiFi was free & easy to access.  The marketplace had a good assortment of foods for breakfast but the prices were somewhat expensive($14 for oatmeal, 2 small boiled eggs, an orange, coffee.)  The buffet in the restaurant was $25 which I did not try.  Meetings were in the convention center which is just right across the street.  The hotel is also very close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the hotel with my husband and a friend in February.  The staff at the Anaheim Marriott were amazing. I have not had this great of service in a long time. The buffet breakfast was so good! Best waffle I have ever had and such a nice waitress. It was easy to walk to Disneyland but there was also an ART stop right outside the hotel. The room was clean and spacious I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Make sure you sign up for the Marriott rewards to get the free WiFi though!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sons family went to Monster Jam at Anaheim Stadium and we got rooms thru a booking site. The rate was great. I did call to make sure we got 2 beds.The room was a little small. IF you get 2 beds realize they are not queen beds, a little small. Bathroom is small. Check in was easy, except be aware hey charge $25 for parking, the front desk needs to give you a ticket so you can come and go. They didnt do that so we had to go back down to front desk. Also if you have trouble walking be aware the parking garage is far far away from the Lobby. You have to walk past all the the conventions rooms, also if they have conventions going on there is a lot of people around. Not sure if I would stay at this location, based on the charge for parking. I am already  paying for rooms and food,

Summary: We stayed here for Disneyland. We had a good night sleep before and after. Honestly after coming from Disney the bed in the room was amazing. It felt just perfect for my tired back and legs from all the walking and standing in line that we did. The room was good size and everything was perfect. However they charge for internet if you are not a member of their establishment and for the water too even if you were. Hotel location is great and staff were amazing.
Manager Response: Dear youngSaudiTraveller,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. The shuttle is $5.50 per person. Plenty of restaurants within a five minute drive.

I would recommend the Hilton across the street if you are looking for a nicer stay and experience.

Summary Heading: Conference Hotel By All Means, Good for Business
Summary: As a business person the Anaheim Marriott is for us the location for our annual sales conference - a great place that offers everything I need for a full week. Staff is flexible and friendly, all necessary amenities are available and transportation to LA airport is easy to come by. Happy to come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cherry on top of my short trip. Really elegant and clean place with great service. Made my jetlag bearable.   Upon arrival I was checked in really fast and with no issues. There was a mistake in my reservation (NOT due to hotel's fault, keep in mind!) and it was fixed at the front desk within seconds by a very friendly staff that is going an extra mile to assist you. The room was very comfortable and clean, with daily cleaning service. Towels changed daily, as are the toiletries. Lobby is really nice meeting spot, could have few more extra seats available as it's a huge place, but it's nothing to hold against the hotel. Restaurant is nice and pleasant, breakfasts are really tasty, with a great choice of food - from various types of bread to sweet buns and croissants to yogurts
Manager Response: Dear Tootthie,  We are so glad your conference brought you to the Anaheim Marriott. Summary: I recently stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for a conference. The hotel staff were so friendly and helpful.  I had a nice, spacious room with a balcony.  The Marriott beds are very comfortable and the room clean. It was a wonderful surprise to have a Smart TV in my room.  The bathrooms could use an update as they do not match the rest of the modern hotel, especially since they had no heater or fan, and could use new tiles.  I did not go to the pool, but it looked very inviting.  There is a Starbucks/quick service restaurant on site, which was good for quick bite. The nFuse restaurant had great food and drink, and super nice waitstaff, but it is very pricey.  The hotel has many event rooms that were well-kept.  There are several other hotels in the immediate area and a lot more
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice room, good food, great staff.
Summary: We picked the Anaheim Marriott because it's reasonably priced and walking distance from Disney - 2 adults and a 10 year old made the walk twice in just under 20 min - it's a good location. But, the highlight of our stay was a front desk employee named Shaun who was a former Disney cast member and chatted up our kiddo about the newest rides. By the time we got to our room our child was SOOO excited to get to the park the next day. Our room was huge and we loved that one wall was all windows. I also loved that instead of standard room service they have an option where you can come pick up the food and save the delivery fee. The food was ready really quickly and was very good - we had pizza which 3 of us couldn't finish and guacamole which my daughter totally loved. The selection
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for a conference. The hotel was nice - lobby, restaurant and bar were well appointed. Pool seemed lovely...was small but seemed to work fine since the hotel seems to be mostly for conferences or those heading to Disney, and not really for those spending all day by the pool. Service was above and beyond. Every single staff member I encountered was very friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom were a little beat up and a felt a bit tired. Room was spotless and the housekeeping was on point - just felt like it was time for a fresh coat of paint in the guest room and a bathroom update. While I would consider the room average, the staff made the stay a pleasant one!

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott in January 2018 for a conference.  I had a room with a balcony that had a city view.  Overall, the rooms are clean and filled with all of the usual amenities (coffee maker, refrigerator, iron and ironing board, etc.).  My room was equipped with a Smart TV which was an unexpected perk, and the bed was comfortable.  My room, was on the smaller side, and the bathroom was much smaller than most other hotels I had been in.   Aside from that, everything was great - the service was quick and the people are friendly.  It's in a great location for business and very close to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear DC20005,   Thank you for your nice feedback about the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to know you liked our in-room amenities and that the attentive service provided by our associates added to your joy. We hope to welcome you again whenever your travels bring you back here.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice rooms and location - CRAZY BOLT ON FEES
Summary: The room and location were perfect for our trip to Disney. Spacious room, reasonably priced and clean. What I didn’t like was the charges for our parking. I actually couldn’t believe we were being charged to park our car in the garage each day as well as resort fees and paying for the room. I feel this is really taking advantage of customers and bleeding them dry.  If I hadn’t had that unpleasant shock at the end the rating would have been higher.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location for business and family. Disneyland is very handy. Facilities are excellent and service is superb. Marriott hospitality as always is first class. Luxury in an excellent location to explore LA.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My son and I were very comfortable in this beautiful, modern hotel. The pool is huge and the hot tub was fabulous, our room was clean with very comfortable beds and pillows. There are plenty of options for food and snacks. It may be a bit of a walk to the park but the bus is very efficient so we never had to wait long.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is more of a business hotel than a holliday resort. It will still do great for a family on vacation, with a pool area and all the ammusments in Anaheim and LA near by. You cant do wrong by choosing this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The bed mattress  need's to be replaced. The property is in need of renovation. Its conveniently located to Disney land. They do take forever to clean the rooms you would need to call them. The folks are friendly and nice. They do go out of there way to see if you need anything.

Summary: My husband and I were on a mini-vacation to a Disneyland and my mom and I used to stay here when I was younger.  When we walked in, the lobby had definitely changed, but the service was still amazing.  When we checked in, it was a Friday.  We asked the gentleman who checked us in what we could do for fun on a Friday night. He recommended the Anaheim Packing District - best recommendation!  Our room faced a staff parking lot and onto some residences. Saturday night there was a large party that kept us up, but it was nothing the hotel could have fixed. We took the ART to Disneyland and back as we were putting on a ton of steps every day and we wanted to save our feet t.  Found the service timely and excellent and close to the entrance of the hotel. We were close to the elevator

Summary: My family and boyfriend stayed here during a 3 week trip of America. The hotel was a brilliant pick. Disneyland is an easy walk from the hotel and the hotel does have a shuttle bus (payable) if you would like to get the bus there.   It is a long way away from downtown but if you have a car or book a trip this is no issue.   Room was spotless and the balcony with table and chairs was a lovely to sit out on and watch the sunset over the busy city.  The hotel has a pool bus as the hotel itself is huge there is a struggle finding a sunbed!   Inside the hotel there is a Starbucks and also a Pizza Hut express if you didn’t want to eat/drink at the hotels restaurant or bar for any reason.   Only thing we didn’t appreciate was the ‘complimentary’ bottle of water wasn’t free. We received

This is absolutely nothing unique or interesting about this hotel, but there is nothing wrong with it. The gym is ok. The food at the restaurant isn't good but the service is good and staff is nice.  There is a pool but it's mainly for the families going to Disney.  The rooms are average.  I can't help but think there are nicer hotels in the area, but in traveling to Anaheim for business I feel like it's a decent option.  I have no idea.  I've never had less of an opinion of anything in my life.

Summary: Nice to come back to this hotel again.  Friendly staff and comfortable room with nice amenities.  Convenient shuttle bus service over to Disneyland.  Concierge Lounge was very busy and had a nice breakfast selection.  Always my favorite hotel to stay at when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Look, don't get me wrong, it's fine. It's actually even nice. I would go so far as to say "good," but Tripadvisor doesn't give us that option. It's between "Average" and "Very Good," and I'm sorry, but the Anaheim Marriott is not "VERY good." It's just pretty good. You get room service within 30 minutes or so most of the night, the architecture is actually kinda interesting if you sit by the pool and look up at the bank of balconies, and it's extremely convenient if you're a convention-goer as I was. But it's nothing spectacular. It's also near Disneyland, though I must admit it took us 45 minutes to get there when we took the not-free bus which the front desk bizarrely recommended (we had no idea it was so close as we were not there for Disneyland.....we could have walked very

Summary: The experience in the hotel was good, the location it's really convenient for know the city, near from disney, the convention center is great and the hotel has all what you need for a good stay. The only thing for mention it's they charge the internet.  Good hotel for been in anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: OK but overpriced for quality of services and product
Summary: The hotel had a lot of staff, but they were mostly standing around says hI and good day all very cheerful. However when it came to a F& B outlet each morning was filled with lines, slow inattentive service and it takes forever to get a latte or coffee, some of it might be because staff was too busy having conversations among themselves. Prices are high since service levels and quality aren't high. Bathroom was not very well cleaned and HVAC system antiquated at best. The control was very hard to adjust and needed to be set at above 77 just to keep room comfortable. Bell staff was nice but the luggage storage area must be at the Hilton for as long as it took to get it. At least the staff informed you that it would be a long time to get bags. Nfusion bar/ restaurant had nice bar

Summary: We stayed at this Marriott just before Christmas 2017.  The hotel lobby is very grand and extremely clean. There is a Starbucks, a bar and a resturant within the lobby. There is a pool just off the lobby. If you are going to the Disney parks, it is worth buying park tickets in the hotel lobby. The price is the same, but you don't have to wait in a queue. There is a bus service directly outside the hotel which takes you to the Disney parks, and other locations. The lobby staff are plentiful, professional and very helpful. Check in was quick and efficient. We had a double room, the beds were comfortable, the bathroom and room were very clean. There is a fridge and tea and coffee facilities in the room and a very large tv in the room.  The only negatives: you have to pay for wifi
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best choice beside the convention center
Summary: When I checked in, they put me in the Oasis tower corner room. The Oasis tower has its own street access, which is good allowing you to bypass the main lobby. The room is much smaller, but seems much newer, than rooms at the Hilton across it, with a huge TV as well. It came with a lot of windows, and even a balcony. The natural light gives the room a great vibe.   Bed was comfortable, linen soft. Bathroom was small, as was the room, so if you have kids, it's gonna be tight. Closet space is also very small  If you're here for a conference, it is the place to be. If it's with family and kids, it will be tight

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights prior to Xmas with my family to see Disneyland, at the start of our USA holiday. Nice 4 star hotel, great location, nice room and very nice staff. Easy walking to Disney Parks and a good choice of restaurants nearby.  Would recommend!

Summary: The facility is nice, above average. The rooms are standard, clean, and offer the typical amenities.  Oh, except, the tv service, in addition to normal television, also offers netflix and hulu.  Kinda cool.  But the staff, they go out of their way to make sure your requests and needs are accommodated.  The dollar is not their guide.  I needed just one page printed.  The concierge offered to print it for me, and save me the trouble and money of going to the business center.  (Reminds me of Miracle on 34th Street) where the almighty dollar is not as important as the customer.  Huge, huge plus!!!  The standard just became above average.  :D

Summary: This is our second year staying here over New Year’s. The service was excellent. The rooms were clean and the Concierge Lounge was like most good Marriott lounges, with very helpful and accommodating staff.

Summary: This was our 3 time staying at the Anaheim Marriott.  We attend Vidcon and the location can't be beat.  The rooms are typical however they are clean and comfortable. We loved how it was delivered too.  Meals come in to go boxes and bags however it is packaged very classy!  Sounds strange but we liked it.  We have already booked our room at the Marriott for this coming Vidcon!

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights while attending a wrestling tournament at the convention center. The location is great. The kids enjoyed the heated pool. Nothing bad about staying here. You can walk to everything nearby.

Although the room could stand a little update, the hotel was very nice, clean, and staff had good customer service. I would definitely stay there again!

You definitely cannot store your tablet, laptop, etc. Not sure why they did not put a new safe as there's definitely a room under the cabinet by the coffee machine.  There's a small refrigerator in the room. Parking is $25 per night.  Overall, I may go back for the fancy gym and elevator.

That been said, Uber or Lyft is much more economical and cost

Staff in all areas of the hotel were friendly and helpful. Amenities including the pool/whirlpool area, outdoor space, wifi, Netflix streaming, and solid on-site dining were much appreciated at the end of long conference days.

Summary Heading: Family trip to Disneyland great place to stay
Summary: We were going to Disneyland the first week of December. From the time we arrived at the hotel till we checked out we enjoyed our stay. We had 5 adults and 3 rooms. The hotel check in the staff was great to get us located all together. The rooms were very comfortable and the lobby is very welcoming. On our first day we enjoyed dinner at the restaurant in the hotel. The service and food was excellent.  We love the benefit of being able to catch the shuttle bus out front of the hotel and go directly to the park entrance. The shuttle runs frequently from the time the park open till shortly after the close of the park the cost is very low  and worth the convenience. We will return.

Summary Heading: Great service and good location for us
Summary: Stayed here for six nights in December. This was a two part trip as I was here for a convention with my wife and kids coming out later for Disneyland. This hotel met our needs for both portions of the trip. Staff and service was excellent. They were welcoming and helpful with both myself and my family. Room was clean and comfortable. Was not the largest but still met our needs. About a 20 minute walk to Disneyland but we found the bus service to be convenient.
Manager Response: Dear OmahaMike,  We are happy you experienced an outstanding visit at Anaheim Marriott and that our staff took great care of you. Thank you so much for your kind comments and we hope to welcome you back again soon!   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

The hostess at the restaurant even remembered us and welcomed us back. The concierge sold Disneyland tickets which was super convenient as we did not have to wait in line at the park and they also sold cheap all-day shuttle bus tickets for us to get around the area. The rooms are perfect, you can smell the cleanliness when you walk in the room.  If you arrive before your room is ready they will store your luggage for you while you head out for the day.

Now I️ do understand security measures and appreciate that they take these precautions but was a little worried about what to do.    Ow comes the best service ever.  I️ could have just been brushed off s d given the its our policy speech but I️ had the pleasure of speaking with the guest agent Katie she informed me of the
Manager Response: Dear jj21398,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful comments about the service you received from our courteous associates, especially Katie. Your kind comments will be shared with her and the entire team for a job well done. All of us at Anaheim Marriott is looking forward to welcoming you and have a pleasurable stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Stay here only if you can book a renovated room.
Summary: The first room I had on the first night was so outdated and bad (but clean).  The carpet felt gross and the bathroom was very old. There was no safe for valuables.  I seriously considered checking out and moving to another hotel.  When I checked in I asked for foam pillows and I never received them. The pillow in the sanitary case was lumpy and gross.  There was also something that looked like a camera in the vent in the shower.  I covered it up with tissue. I felt unsafe and I even wondered how secure the main door lock was.  My voice mail light was blinking, but when I hit the VM button 3 times, nothing happened.  That was not a good night at this hotel!   On a side note, I walked down to the pool and it was closed.  So, the next day I went back and the super strong smell of
Manager Response: Dear ReneeChicago, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to post a review. We're sorry our hotel did not meet all your expectations, however we are pleased to read we were able to move you to another room that meet your expectations. We agree there are areas within the hotel which are beginning to show their age. We will share your feedback with the people in our organization who are responsible for formulating plans for future renovations. Our goal is to deliver the best service of any hotel in the area, and we hope you'll make plans to stay with us again! Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Another nice stay with this hotel situated near Disneyland and easy access to the I5.  As I am a Marriott Gold Elite, I was given an upgraded room which was basically a larger size room.  Unfortunately, the room was close to the rooftop heating or air conditioning units which created a constant humming noise.  I asked the maintenance people to have a look but they gave no real explanation.  I was disappointed that they did not point out the cause of the noise before I subsequently figured it out.  I informed the front desk about the noise upon check out but they only offered an apology.   A little disappointed there was no small compensation since the noise did affect our quality of sleep.  As I intend to stay again next year, the front desk associate did show me the floor map
Manager Response: Dear WEI339, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay. We appreciate your loyalty to our property and for being a Marriott Gold Elite rewards member. While we're glad you experienced a good stay and enjoyed your upgraded accommodations and the Concierge Lounge, we apologize that you were disturbed by the noise from other the HVAC units. Your comments remind us there is always room for improvement and we will review your feedback with our engineering team. We hope you will come back and see us the next time you are in our area. - we value your comments!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The restaurant here had amazing service. Mario q made the whole experience homey!He was really fast with our food, and the food was amazing,He constantly checked on us to see if there was anything else we needed with out being to pushy. I cant wait to come back here!! thank you Mario!
Manager Response: Dear JESSICA A,  Thank you for being our guest at Anaheim Marriott. We take pride in our service and the quality of the food we serve. We will pass on your gracious comments with Mario and also with our Food & Beverage staff and let them know their efforts are not going unnoticed. Thanks again for your kind comments, and we hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: So a gorup of 6 persons and we sat un the NFU restaurant, just dont go to the NFU the service food sucks. Took 1hr to bring and thw servicw was not complete and have to cancel they wont eaven apoligize.
Manager Response: Dear Iñigo, thank you for taking the time to review our restaurant. We apologize that the service and food quality did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and assure you we are always looking for ways to improve. We hope you'll join us again for a much-improved dining experience.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay if your going to Disneyland. Walk or take the bus.
Summary: Drove in and the valet captain noticed we had a handicapped placard. He then told us we could park for no charge in the valet lot! Saved us $75.00 for the three days we were there. Great idea. The employees were all real nice people. Always smiling and asking if they would help with anything. They also have special internet room rates with big savings. Loved our stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your excellent review of Anaheim Marriott. We are delighted to read you were impressed with courteous service and that our location was perfect for your needs. Thanks again for being our guest, and we look forward to welcoming you both back soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott Anaheim for 5 nights. The check in was nice and easy - the girl who assisted us was helpful and smiley.  We felt that the hotel caters more for business guests/people who are using the convention centre, rather than tourists.  The concierge wasn’t really that helpful when we asked about renting a car, I had to keep repeating myself as he didn’t really listen to what I was asking/informing. We ended up just going to a car rental agency and asking them about driving around.  The room itself was nice. Spacious and light, and bathroom facilities were good.  Upon leaving, the check out was nice and easy, although we wanted to check our bags with the bell boy for around 20mins while we went and picked up our car. He informed that it would take at least 20mins
Manager Response: Dear Katie, thank you for taking time to review our hotel. While we're glad you had a pleasant stay overall, please accept our apologies for the service issues you experienced. We are committed to providing great service to our guests, and we'll share your comments with our team to improve moving forward. We appreciate your business and hope you will be back to see us on your next trip to the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Next to Convention center, close to Disney parks
Summary: Nice hotel, nice lobby, nice pool, nice fitness. Great service. Rooms are somehow outdated, tiny washroom.  Beds are quite small (unless you get king bed) 15 min walk to the Disney park.  There is a Hertz counter just next to the hotel, which might be very convenient for exploring around.
Manager Response: Dear Oudhay, we appreciate your great comments. We're delighted to know we were successful in providing you with a memorable stay. Thanks for your specific feedback about the size of the bathroom. We're glad that our location and amenities made a much better impression. Thank you again for being our guest. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: All was well with my four night business stay.  Room was spacious, opted out of room cleaning (traveling solo) and took rewards points instead.  Went to front desk once to get fresh towels, not a problem. One minute walk to Convention Center and a twenty minute walk to Disneyland or Downtown Disney.  Food for workshops at hotel was very good, better than anticipated.  Would return here for business or pleasure again!
Manager Response: Dear P D,  I am happy to read about your wonderful stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are thrilled to know you loved our convenient location and your spacious room. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The lobby of this hotel was fantastic. Upscale and bustling in a fun way. The onsite restaurant had amazing food. The elevator system was very efficient. The bell staff in the lobby were extremely helpful and attentive. The shuttle to Disney is very close. The rooms were fresh and modern. Great view from the balcony. I only had two concerns. First, oddly enough, was the location of the toilet paper roll. I was traveling for business and many co-workers commented on its odd location under the vanity. Second, request a room away from the elevator. They're noisy from adjacent rooms.
Manager Response: Dear castaway9317, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your feedback.
