Our goal is to provide an exceptional experience for our guests, and we're glad to see you loved so many aspects of your stay. However, your comments highlight areas where we can improve. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a five-star stay!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Just average with some annoying issues
Summary: On the plus side, the rooms were nice and clean -- about what you would expect from a large, business-oriented hotel chain. The staff was friendly and accommodating.  The downsides: -Upon arrival, both in-room phones did not work. Somehow the plugs had come loose from the wall jacks. Took us a while to figure out why they did not work. -Instead of ordering room service, we chose to call down to the restaurant and pick up our food. We were told to come down in 20 minutes, but food wasn't ready. More like 30 minutes. Returned to our room and no spoon for the soup. Had to go back down to get one. Then discovered salad dressing was missing. Had to go down a THIRD time. -The interiors, including the rooms, are just so bland. Beige and gray. Who wants to look at that? How about a
Manager Response: Dear MateoGP, thank you for taking time to post your online review. It is our mission to provide our guests with the best experience possible, and we're glad you had an okay stay overall. However, please accept our apologies for the troubles you had with your food order. Your concerns have been shared with our team, and we will work to ensure this was an isolated event. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: When we arrived on a Saturday they where really busy.  The front desk was very quick and helpful.  The hotel is older but very well maintained.  The room sizes are very good and they had fridges in all rooms.  The pool area is very nice and 50% covered with a medium sized hot tub.  Great stay for 3 days in Disneyland, we will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear butch6521, thank you for the great review! We love knowing how pleased you were with our location and appreciated everything we have to offer. It was our pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely staff and great pool and on site amenities!
Summary: We stayed here in June for 3 nights - it was our first visit to Anaheim. The staff was lovely and Sage (front desk) was an exceptionally nice guy who made sure my young daughter and I were in a room that put us close to everything we needed, and had a nice view of the pool! We didn't spend too much time on property, as we were there for Disneyland, but I did find the gift shop on site to be excellent as I was able to grab a few items I needed...and a few I just wanted. My daughter loved the pool and my husband joined us the night after we arrived was equally as please with everything. I'd definitely stay here again. This was a solid Marriott. Thanks again, Sage!
Manager Response: Dear a_bells, thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We couldn't be happier that you appreciated the great amenities we offer and the excellent service provided by our team member. This is the type of experience we want all of our guests to enjoy. We look forward to welcoming you back whenever your travels bring you back to the area!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Marriott unilaterally cancelled my reservation because they were overbooked
Summary: I had a reservation for two nights this week at this hotel.  They emailed me two days ahead of the reservation and said "As requested, we have cancelled your reservation."  I did not make the request and when I called to ask what happened, they said they were overbooked and cancelled my reservation.  They've offered to make a reservation at the Hilton across the street but not pay for it.  I don't think I'll ever stay at a Marriott again.  I didn't realize hotels would ever do this for a customer.
Manager Response: Dear Andrea, we sincerely apologize that we did not have any available rooms when you arrived at our hotel. We understand your frustration and assure you we made every attempt to correct the matter. With that being said, your comments will be shared with the appropriate team to avoid situations like this in the future. Again, we are sorry for the inconvenience and hope you will choose to book a room with us in future.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The service is quite standard, nothing special to mention about this business hotel. We stayed there during the bizzlard e-sport exhibition, so it is quite crowded. The staff for the breakfast duplicate the same allocation to different customers, resulting in that we lost our seats after getting some food. It was quite awkward, and nobody came to help us.   The food of room service at midnight is average, getting us full after a whole day in Disney after firework show.
Manager Response: Dear Ian, thank you for taking time to post your review. We're delighted you loved so many aspects of the hotel and, overall, you had a wonderful stay. We apologize for the issue during breakfast. We'll be sure to share your comments with our team to improve this area. It was our pleasure having you as our guest, and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel but not good for families
Summary: We had to stay here one night because Courtyard was full. Booked on Expedia and, although one room was designated for 2 Adults and 2 children, it had only a single king sized bed. Furthermore, the very unhelpful receptionist advised us that a room could accommodate only one cot. Lucky we had two rooms so one child slept in Grandparents Room. This Hotel is right next door to the Convention Center and is probably great for Convention attendees. Not recommended for families. Also note is too far to walk to Disneyland with children, Bus travel looked painful and time consuming...
Manager Response: Dear BPutt, thank you for your recent visit to our hotel. We are committed to offering every one of our guests an exceptional stay, and we apologize that you were unhappy with your accommodations and our service. We are always looking for ways we can improve and we will take your feedback into account. Your comments are appreciated and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you and your family back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Lobby is grand but not all rooms are.  I have never been to a hotel where the employees are so so so heavily trained to say “I’m sorry” when you address a problem or make a complaint but lack zero ability to take care of the problem.  Zero at being proactive.  Runny eggs at  onicerge breakfast looked liked soup.  I’m sorry hey said but it was never changed.  Temp concierge lounge was so cold.  I’m sorry they said but no one ever called mx to heat it up.  Concierge lounge was not moved because of the holidays.  They included the lounge for those staying there for the beauty pageant.  The lounge is suppose to be an exclusive place for the elites to go.  It is a privilege earned.  It is not suppose to be used for the general public or as part of a rate plan.The hotel should be
Manager Response: Dear Bev2227,  Thank you for being a loyal member of our Marriott Rewards program. We were disappointed to read that you had a less than favorable experience at our hotel.  We are sorry for not providing the service you deserved and that our team was not responsive to your concerns. Please rest assured that this is not our typical way of treating guests, and the next time you are here, we will more than make up for the shortcomings of this stay. We have shared your comments with the appropriate departments and we have taken immediate steps to address those issues outlined in your review so that they don’t happen again. We look forward proving ourselves to you on your next visit.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Slow, surly front desk.  When you put in a request for a room location, they make you repeat it 5-7 times and act as though did not hear you.  They insisted my comments we’re not in my reservation. They offered a room in a location opposite what I request.  Are they deaf or making life hard??   For the holidays, lounge was moved to an iceberg cold room on lower level.  Get your food in one room and walk down the hall to sit in a tiny room. No computer access. Who came up with this crazy stupid idea.  Use the lounge.  That’s what we paid for.  Hotel was busy with people’s skill pageant (not beauty).  Show as out front was senseless noise blabbing they thru the windows along with a strobe light.  Why are they not in a ballroom!!
Manager Response: Dear Gerry, we appreciate you taking the time to write a review. Please accept our apologies for your experience throughout our hotel and not meeting your expectations regarding service. Your comments have been shared with our team to ensure we provide the great experience we strive for every day. We hope to welcome you back again, and we wish you safe travels.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: If you are attending any event in the Anaheim Convention center then this is the place to stay! We were able to walk to the convention center which took only 5 minutes from our hotel. The lobby has been completely renovated to look like a new hotel and the restaurant NFUSIN has the most amazing Calamari appetizer ever!! Our hotel room was small but very cozy and we had a balcony and there was a fridge and safe in our room. This hotel is close to Disney and also located close to many restaurants like PF Chang etc. It is only about 15-20 from John Wayne airport so an easy drive to catch a flight. Room rates were pretty good but we enjoyed the feel of the whole hotel and especially the convenience of it's location.   Bathrooms are small but workout facility had new equipment and
Manager Response: Dear Dan, thank you for your nice review regarding your recent stay with us. We're glad we were able to meet your expectations by providing great service as well as clean, comfortable accommodations. As you mentioned, our location near many venues like the convention center is a big hit with many guests. Thanks again, and we look forward to having you stay with us again!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: First time at this property and it was a good stay. Room was spacious and comfortable. Bathroom could be updated, but it was okay. Staff extremely friendly and professional. Pricing as expected for convention center hotel. Nice gift shop, if a bit expensive. Great pool and fitness center. Nice lounges.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.  We are pleased to read how happy you were with your spacious accommodations, amenities and wonderful staff.  Your satisfaction is very important to us as we constantly strive to make your experience a great one. We hope to welcome you back soon for another enjoyable stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: great location if you're going to convention center
Summary: for a marriott, this is just okay. after staying at this location, i actually prefer SpringHill Suites by Marriott more than Anaheim Marriott - especially if you're going to disneyland.  when you pull up to the lobby area, it looks really nice. looks like things were remodeled. The elevators were modern but once you're in the room it's just okay. The bathroom is extremely small.   Their Concierge lounge is nice. We were here on the weekends so we got to use the lounge for breakfast. Food is decent, lots of beverages to choose from though: orange juice, grapefruit juice, apple juice, cranberry juice, sodas, milk, alcoholic beverages, bottled waters, coffee, and tea.  They have really good fresh fruits during breakfast.   i like the options they have and the staffs were friendly.
Manager Response: Dear agbells, thank you for staying with us and sharing your review. We are glad you were able to take advantage of many of our well-stocked concierge lounge and that you enjoyed our terrific location. However, we're sorry the bathroom size was a concern for you. We have a variety of room sizes available and will be happy to offer you another option the next time you stay with us. Thanks again, and we hope you will choose us the next time you visit the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: The Marriott Needs A Little Disney Magic
Summary: I recently stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for two days to study prior to an important California exam. I arrived at the hotel and was immediately greeted with a warm welcome by the valet. I made it to the check-in area and was delayed a little by a disagreement between another guest and front desk staff. They opened another spot and whisked me through check-in. All in all, it was seamless. I'm used to the Ritz and their club level rooms being on the same floor or tower as the club. That wasn't the case at this hotel and their club area. I was put in the Oasis tower which has been updated when it really needs to be renovated. The room was beyond small and this room overlooked the motor court of the hotel. To say it was loud at all times would be an understatement. Not to mention,
Manager Response: Dear John, thank you for being our guest recently. Please accept our apologies for failing to provide you a pleasant stay. Your comments have prompted us to double our efforts so we can be sure to meet the high standards you expect from us every single stay. We look forward to you giving us another chance during a future stay.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here (& literally just checked out!) for 5 days for a meeting at the convention center. If you are there for a meeting this is THE hotel to stay at. You are close to everything- the convention center, the other hotels and the town. And disneyland, because I saw it every day. I have to say, when a big meeting like we had comes, it is probably easy to not be nice to your guests because they need the hotel and they aren't necessarily repeat customers. But this hotel treated us and pretty much everyone like an honored, repeat guest. The were always kind and sincere and helpful. The went out of their way with just about everything. Everyone smiles here.Phones are picked up and you hear them smiling. I will thank you so much for saving us place for a group on twitter at the
Manager Response: Dear Martha G,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Anaheim Marriott while you were here for a meeting. It’s wonderful to know our location was ideal for your needs and that our staff met and exceeded your expectations. I will be sure to share your compliments with my team, especially with Alyssa. Your feedback is much appreciated, and we cannot wait to host you again in the future.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel was nice and the customer service was amazing. We got there with no hassle and received our key within 5 minutes. The lady that was in charge of keeping our room clean did an amazing job the 5 days we stayed. Everything was clean and folded she even organized our stuff. Great place.
Manager Response: Dear YessiJeff, thank you for posting such kind comments about our hotel, especially about our staff. We make every effort to provide service that is above and beyond your expectations, so we are pleased to see that you loved your stay. We hope to welcome you again soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A very nice hotel that could use some catching up to modern standards.
Summary: First of all: I don't know about you, but I can't help but think that if I'm paying $300+ a night for a room (and yes, expect rates to be around $350/night if you're staying during a convention), it feels really tacky for the hotel to charge for internet access in rooms or a bottle of water. Which it, unfortunately, does. Come on, Marriott, basic free wi-fi for customers is something I've come to expect from 4-star hotels, and while I know that charging for drinking water is a widespread habit, it lowers my opinion of the establishment every time.   As for the room, I have no criticisms about the gloriously comfy bed, but the shower controls could really use some improvement -- a single knob doesn't allow controlling water pressure, and getting the temperature right requires a
Manager Response: Dear pigeonchess, thank you for being our guest during your convention. We appreciate all of your feedback, good and bad, and will be sure to share your comments with the appropriate individuals in our organization as we plan for the future. With that being said, we're sorry for not meeting the high standards you expect from our brand. Thanks again, and we do look forward to welcoming you back for another stay.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed overnight on 2 day trip to Disneyland.  Hotel is nicely renovated, our room on the concierge floor was very nice and very clean.  Distance to parks is walk-able but a city operated shuttle will take you for about $5 for the day.  We would definitely stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Zeusallover, thank you for confirming how convenient our location is - we couldn't agree more! We appreciate your compliments about our hotel as well. Thanks so much and we look forward to your next stay with us.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel is clean and rooms are not bad but beware of the hidden fees. Had to pay $25/day for parking, $13/day for wifi and they charge $20/day per package for packages. I think my fees added up to be higher than the room cost.  The nice thing about this hotel is the gym, pool, and really large TV in the rooms. Other than that it's hard to justify the hidden fees
Manager Response: Dear dhpark, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry our fees came as a surprise to you. This information is posted on our website for our guests prior to booking and we relay this information at check-in. We're glad you had an enjoyable stay overall and appreciated our amenities. Thank you for being our guest, and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Not overwhelmed but not disappointed either
Summary: I haven't stayed in Anaheim in a while for business, but I thought the rate for the Marriott seemed reasonable and looked very nice. My business partner had stayed here before and mentioned rates can be as high as $400 and I'm not seeing that. We paid $169 and for that price I would say I was pretty pleased. I would not pay more however. It's a little outdated. Chain link safety lock on the door, old and odd shower knob (never even seen one like this before!), no USB ports in the room, but overall, still pretty nice.  I felt the beds were pretty hard so I wouldn't say I had the best night sleep. Nice little balcony off the room and overall, pretty quiet.  I was a little worried being near the elevator, but noise was not an issue. To sum it up, I was satisfied for what I paid,
Manager Response: Dear chelly12364, thank you for returning to our hotel for another business trip. We appreciate you pointing out not only what you liked, but also the areas where extra effort on our part is needed. We're glad you still had an enjoyable stay and we'll share your comments with our team as we plan for future improvements. Thanks again, we hope you will choose us the next time you visit Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We have a fabulous stay at the Marriott recently. Super friendly staff, great location, and very clean, well maintained rooms. It is in an excellent location, being close to both Disneyland and the Convention Center.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, thank you for your recent stay at Anaheim Marriott! We're so glad you had a great experience throughout the hotel. We love what we do, but it is always nice to be recognized for a job well done. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I would expect a four star hotel to not add on fees for shuttle or internet, so that is annoying. Plus my bed is lumpy and The tub is old and discolored. Lobby is nice and offers a quick breakfast option. Overall, probably not a 4 star experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We are sorry the additional fees came as a surprise to you as well as for the problems in your room. We will review your feedback with our team to make sure all information is being presented clearly upon arrival. We're glad your overall stay was enjoyable and hope to welcome you back for a five-star experience.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Staff all very friendly and helpful beautiful and comfortable room. Perfect location for attending Blizzcon!  Only thing they could improve on is speed of rexpose to online inquiries (sometimes took more than 2 weeksto receive a response).
Manager Response: Dear Robin, we are so happy you chose the Anaheim Marriott for your recent convention, and appreciate your acknowledging our terrific staff and accommodations. We appreciate your business and hope you will choose us every time you are in the area!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Long walk from street, Long walk form Parking Garage, Slightly Outdated
Summary: This Marriott caters to conventions as it is right beside the Anaheim Convention Center. The Hotel itself also has a decent sized contention wing as well. The hotel has complete amenities including a pool, gym, Starbucks, Bar, and Restaurant - so you'll be well taken care of here.   The rooms were on the smaller size and probably in need of a renovation. The room grouts had a tad a mildew and the shower hardware was covered in hardwater deposits. The mini-bar door was also waterlogged - it looked like someone spilled some liquid on the door and damaged it. Rest of the room is fine... it would be suitable for 2 adults and 2 small children, but if 4 were to sleep in it, it would be a very tight fit.  My major gripe is how far the parking is from the room - you need to walk through
Manager Response: Dear coolspot18,  We are so glad you chose to stay with us. Thank you so much for letting us know that overall you enjoyed your time here and liked all of the amenities we have to offer as well as complimentary wi-fi for our rewards members. We also appreciate you letting us know where improvements might be needed so we will be sharing this with our housekeeping team and discussing ways we can be more efficient in our daily tasks. Thank you for being our guest and we do hope you will return soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My friend and I are both Southern California natives but knowing we'd be going to Disneyland for Halloween and having a few drinks, we decided to stay safe and not drive.   I live outside the USA now so I booked two nights so we could catch up and then the next day take our time going to see Nightmare Before Christmas take over the Haunted Mansion.   I've stayed in many hotels both overpriced and average and found the room price to be fair, the room was very large (#1631), had a refrigerator (but no mini bar) and comfy beds.   While I waited for her to arrive I had a drink out by the pool area just outside the indoor part of the bar. My waiter was attentive and happy to help.   Dinner! A very tempting room service menu that wasn't painfully overpriced like comparable hotels. If
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are happy to hear that your overall stay was pleasant and that you enjoyed a few of our amenities while you were here. We were disappointed to hear that your stay was not perfect and for that we apologize. We hope that if you are ever in the area, you will stay with us again. Thank you for being our guest!   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great Service, but convention ruined it a bit
Summary: I stayed here with the family over a weekend as we went to Disneyland for the Halloween Party. This is a convention hotel and I usually have no problem with conventioneers. I attend a few and usually people are at the convention and rarely in their room. We happen to be there during a weekend where a political convention was taking place, so security was heightened. Again, not really an issue.  I'm a Marriott guy and there are many Marriott properties in this area. I chose this hotel because I am a Gold member and they have a lounge here. I figure, good opportunity to save on breakfast and have snacks and drinks available during the day. Turns out the lounge was closed from noon and later for private events during our stay. I don't feel this is right. The lounge should have been
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very sorry that you experienced the issues that you did while you were with us. We apologize that the lounge was not available and that there were some noise issues in your room due to the convention. We never want our guests to be inconvenienced but we are glad that you were happy with the rest of your stay. We hope to see you again soon if you are ever in the area.   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for 6 nights in October while attending a conference at the Grand Californian Hotel. The proximity to the park is great which makes it easily walkable-there is the ART bus that conveniently stopped right in front of the hotel as well. Our room was a bit on the smaller side but it was clean and modern. The bed was very comfortable. The service was exceptional. Check in and out was a breeze. We had access to the concierge lounge as we are gold members and the food there was great. All the meals we had at the hotel restaurant Nfuse and room service were all delicious. We will definitely be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear SamO104,  Thank you for being a loyal Marriott customer and choosing the Anaheim Marriott for your stay while in the area. We are thrilled to read that you loved our front-desk service, convenient location which was perfect for your needs, as well as your clean & comfortable room. It was great to have you here, and we look forward to your next stay with us soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Best Bacon Bloody Mary in California! If you are anywhere near D’land.... make sure you pop in and ask Ricardo to make you Lara’s BBM... he is the best bartender this side of New Orleans! The rooms and service a great too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this awesome review.  We are glad that everything went so well during your stay and that Ricardo and his Bloody Mary's made for a memorable experience. Please accept our special thanks for recognizing our all-star staff members, as they truly love to deliver exceptional customer service to each and every guest. We appreciate your kind review and look forward to your next stay.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This my first time to Anaheim. We booked here for two night so that we could visit Disney and for my daughter's birthday. And Jeniffer arrange a surprise for my daughter !  We have a good memory at Marriott Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Eric C,  Thank you for the wonderful review.  We appreciate you taking time to share your experience with other travelers. Our team will be pleased to know they had a role in making your stay and your daughter's birthday with us a memorable one. Thanks for allowing us to be of service. We hope to have the pleasure of doing so again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: When I checked out of this hotel, I was so happy with my stay and all set to write a raving review. Then I encountered the sarcastic, aggressive bell service attendant and the extremely arrogant concierge, William. It's a shame how the negative experiences stays with you more than the positive. Apart from these two people and experiences, I had a great stay. We were visiting the area for Disneyland and chose the Anaheim Marriott due to affordability and the price difference with Disney hotels. Surprisingly, I actually preferred my stay here to previous stays at Disney hotels in the area. Location is great with a variety of restaurants and shops nearby and and there is a shuttle service that frequently runs to Disneyland and California Adventure entrance, costing $5.50 per person
Manager Response: Dear BaliY, Thank you for staying at our hotel and for taking the time to post a review. We are glad that you enjoyed our well appointed rooms, our great location and convenient shuttle to Disneyland. We are sorry for the problems you encountered with our staff. We are working to remedy these issues so that, next time, your stay will be absolutely perfect. You are a valued customer, and everything we do is aimed at providing you with an excellent experience. Please come back and see us again. Sincerely, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Sometimes when a hotel is on the modern side, they lack in the comforts you're looking for in a hotel, not this Marriott.  The rooms are a nice size, though the bathroom was a bit small, but the beds are very comfortable!  Pillows are great and there were plenty of them.   The elevator bank in the Tower area was quick and easy to navigate, it's different because you choose your floor before you enter the elevator.   The hotel's restaurant was open for breakfast the night I stayed and it was outstanding, I highly recommend it.  The service at the front desk was very helpful, explained the transportation service to Disneyland, which is only blocks away!
Manager Response: Dear Dobegirl50,   We are delighted you had an excellent stay. Thank you for the fantastic review! We especially appreciate your awesome comments about spacious rooms, comfortable beds and our outstanding breakfast. We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit.  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We have stayed in Marriott's around the world. We booked here for one night so that we could visit Disney.  Upon arrival, we were kindly greeted and allowed to check in early with our Elite status.  The lobby area is nice, and newly renovated.  The rooms . . . not so much.  The room was a bit smaller than our typical Marriott room and the bathroom was way too small and not functionally designed.  There was some paint chipping on the door and it just was not anything to brag about.  We only stayed one night so it was fine, but for a longer stay, 3 or more nights, we wouldn't have been happy.  The rooms need to be renovated to keep up with the renovated lobby.     The little interaction we had on our one night stay with the hotel staff was all positive. The 3 star is strictly due
Manager Response: Dear Melissa K,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We value your comments and apologize that your room did not meet your expectations. We will certainly take your feedback into consideration when planning future improvements. We are so glad to see there were other aspects of your stay that you enjoyed. We thank you for being our guest and hope you will stay with us again on your next trip to the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: No wi-free in room. No digital safe in room is with key like century 19 and very very small. No friendly staff. No good location. No good pool area. No good cost benefit. No to everything. WORST. TERRIBLE
Manager Response: Dear SilSaoPaulo,  Thank you for staying with us. Please accept our sincere apology that you left disappointed. You deserved a comfortable and stress-free stay, and we did not live up to your expectations. We hope you will accept our apologies and consider giving us another chance to show you the outstanding visit that we typically provide. Thank you for being our guest.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Shockingly bad! Total complete garbage. Do not stay here!
Summary: This hotel was incredibly awful. Don't know how it gets any good reviews at all.  Don't be fooled by the photos of the lobby. That's been renovated but nothing else. The carpets, fittings and mattresses appear to be 30 years old at least When we arrived late at night, the room hadn't been prepared to be feather free. We had to wait and wait. Eventually we got to the room and were horrified by the condition of the room.. The carpet was dirty, there was dust everywhere and items the previous guest had left behind. Then we saw the toilet. It was filthy and had not been cleaned. There was also mould in the bathroom. The staff weren't that interested and wanted us to wait until the morning for it to be cleaned! We left as soon as we could.  As former loyal Marriott customer, we have
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for being a loyal Marriott customer and for taking time to evaluate your stay. We are truly sorry that we did not live up to the standards that you expected from us. We have taken note of the issues you outlined and will be working with our team to improve these areas. We are committed to providing you with the best accommodations and service, so we apologize that we fell short during this visit. It would be greatly appreciated if you would contact us directly with more details on the service and cleanliness issues you mentioned in your review. Thank you again and we hope that you will give us another chance in the future to provide you with the hospitality you deserve.   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager 714 748 2451  zuyen.urbina@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Well Kept Hotel with Great staff, location and outdoor pool
Summary: My family visited this hotel for a two night stay, the reason for picking this place is its location: this hotel is 1.6 miles away from Disneyland Park. The hotel staff are very passionate and friendly, they listen to our requests and try their best to help. My kids absolutely loved the outdoor pool here, it is a lot of work trying to get them to return to the hotel room. The room is a bit old but still well maintained. We will definitely stay at this hotel if we visit Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your awesome review of our hotel. We are glad that our staff was friendly and that your kids had a great time at the pool. Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with other travelers and look forward to seeing you again.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: love this hotel staff are friendly and the locations is next to Disneyland what more can you ask for :) as well as some pharmacies and restaurants nearby. breakfast buffet is excellent as well. housekeeping is always doing an excellent job in keeping the room tidy and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet and that our staff was accommodating. We hope you had a great time while you were visiting and that we will see you again soon.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A Little Bit of Luxury in the Disneyland Area
Summary: We recently stayed at the Anaheim Marriott near Disneyland.  No, we weren't tourists visiting the park.  We were nearby Orange neighbors displaced by the Canyon 2 fire.  We had just gotten home from an extended trip the night before, and had to leave our home because of the danger.  We were tired from travel, and wanted to stay in a nice hotel to recover from the trip.  We told the staff about our situation, and they bent over backwards to make our stay a pleasant one.  We received a number of perks and could tell that members of he staff really cared about our comfort.  We also noticed how well trained everyone was, and how they treated everyone.  High marks to the Marriott organization, and especially  the Anaheim Marriott.
Manager Response: Dear James,   Thank you for taking time to review your stay. We are very sorry to hear that you were displaced by the fire in the area but are happy that you chose to stay with us. It was a pleasure reading about the excellent service you received from our staff. This is what we strive to do every day, so we thank you for acknowledging our efforts. Thanks again for allowing us to be of service. We hope to have the pleasure of doing so again in the near future.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My husband and I had a birthday celebration in La Mirada, so we decided to treat ourselves to an overnight stay.  Our check in was uber fast (we were able to check-in online using the Marriott app), which gave us time to head down to the bar before for a cocktail and small bite before we had to change and head out.  The hotel location allowed us to get to La Mirada in approx. 15 min.  Also, from our FANTASTIC upper level room view we could see that the Big “A” was just down the street (about 5 min. drive).  Best of all, should you be heading to Disneyland, it’s directly across the street!  Now back to the bar, the most AMAZING bartenders and Bloody Mary’s!
Manager Response: Dear Psicokitty,   Thank you for the terrific review and for letting us know that your experience was nothing short of perfect. We are happy that your room and all the amenities were to your liking, and that you had a great time at the bar. Thank you for your compliments about our bartenders. They truly are amazing at what they do. Thanks so much for choosing to stay with us. We can’t wait to welcome you back.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 10 nights in September and enjoyed our stay. The hotel is very large and also busy with regular conferences taking place and the bar area gets extremely noisy with everyone trying to talk louder than the person next to them which is no fault of the hotel. The room was a decent size with a balcony but had 2 smaller double beds instead of 1 king or queen which would have been nicer. My only complaint apart from a $100 charge to my room from the restaurant that I knew nothing about was the $25 a night charge for parking. We were here for a holiday and I think the hotel should have a more favourable rate for people staying longer than a couple of nights. At that price you would think the hotel was opposite the gates for Disneyland but it is a good 25 minute walk.
Manager Response: Dear glennwhu1,  Thank you for letting us know that, overall, you enjoyed your stay. We do, however, apologize that your visit with us was anything less than perfect. Although we understand your frustration with parking, please know that we review our pricing regularly to make sure that we are priced competitively. We appreciate your business and hope that other aspects of your stay will bring you back to our hotel the next time you are in the area. Thank you for being our guest.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Don't Be an Early Riser and Expect Coffee
Summary: Day two of a four day trip.  Have an early meeting across town.  Come down at 5:15 for a coffee and maybe a pastry to find nothing opens until 6AM.  Really??  The room service menu is really a restaurant menu that allows room service or  pick-up.  Menu clearly states beverages available 24/7 along with limited menu from 1AM to 6AM. A reasonable person would assume you could get coffee in the lobby.  Now to cleanliness of the room...almost passable, almost...the red marks on bathroom door jamb may be blood, I have been avoiding eye contact with it in an attempt to decieve myself.  Filth is in the crevices...the Hilton may have been a better choice...
Manager Response: Dear Sawdogs,  Please accept our apologies for not having coffee when you were on your way out in the morning. We will certainly take your thoughts on this into consideration. Also, we do not take cleanliness issues lightly - it has to be priority #1. Please know what you described is unacceptable and will be addressed.  We appreciate your business and hope you will consider giving us another opportunity to serve you in the future.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I was most surprised by this hotel with the size and comfort of my room.  I was in the Oasis Tower with a great view of the city.  Though you are very close to Disneyland, you did feel like you were in a park hotel.  Very easy access to the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Lani07LF,  Thank you for your recent stay. We are thrilled our spacious rooms, convenient location, and great views were perfect for you. We appreciate you being our guest and we hope we to be your hotel of choice each time you visit Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I recently had a conference here and I am quite impressed with the venue. The rooms were spacious but at times a bit chilly. The chairs were comfortable. The food served was pretty good. The bathrooms were clean. And the staff quite friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Hardrocker888,  Thank you so much for letting us know you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott while here for your conference. We are glad to see you that our spacious rooms and friendly staff help make your visit great. We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Was there for a conference, everything with the conference was fine.  The table service at the bar slow!  The beds were too soft and the pillows were way to soft   I had four on my bed and all four did not make one good pillow .  Chair in my room looked old and smelled like another person BO: yuck.  There were two of us in the room and asked housekeeping for more bathroom products and it never came; so I went to CVS.
Manager Response: Dear mspatron,  Thank you for staying with us. Please accept our apologies that you did not receive the bathroom products you asked for and for any inconvenience this may have caused. In the future, please feel free give us a call at the front desk. We will be sure you get you what you need. We appreciate you being our guest and hope you will stay with us again the next time you are in the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The rug is dirty- things just aren’t clean. Great location and it works for business but not a great impression. Not the quality for a Marriott I’m used to. The restaurant was ok but nothing special. Nothing special in the meeting rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy M,  Thank you for review. We are glad to see that or the most part, you enjoyed our hotel. Please know that we take cleanliness very seriously and steps are already underway to ensure the rug in the room you occupied is cleaned. We hope you will give us a second chance for a better stay the next time you are in the area. We're confident your experience will exceed the high standards you have come to expect from our brand.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: It's always a pleasure to stay at this property-they make traveling easy! And, if I didn't know better, I'd swear it was in the South as the staff exudes hospitality. For instance: the front desk personnel stand in front of the desk and greet customers, the bellmen offer help without being pushy, and the staff in the concierge lounge clear plates and replenish food quickly. Great customer service. Our room was huge-king bed, chair, desk, and still plenty of room to do a cartwheel. The flatscreen tv was also huge and offered a Netflix option so we could indulge in our guilty pleasures while traveling. A few improvements could be made, however: the bathroom is tiny-1 person at a time, the sliding door to the balcony requires a bit of muscle to open/close, and there isn't a
Manager Response: Dear PostcardPassenger,  Many thanks for your outstanding review and for being our guest. Reading your feedback definitely made our day! With a mission to provide superior customer service, we take great pride in serving your needs and are delighted to know that we have met your expectations. We appreciate your kind remarks about our team and our well-appointed guest rooms. Your feedback will be shared with the rest of the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service. Thank you again, and we hope you will stay with us in future!  Thank you,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I am here for a business meeting at the Anaheim Convention Center. It is literally a 1 minute walk and super close to DisneyLand.  The pool is indoor/outdoor and the food was great as well. Overall, I would definitely recommend staying here for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear tracyspears,   We are thrilled you had such a wonderful stay and that everything was to your liking. Thank you for sharing with fellow travelers about our convenient location near a myriad of businesses and points of interest. We appreciate your recommendation and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for another excellent visit. Safe travels!   Thank you,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for two nights for a company event.  There were several convention activities going on but everything ran smoothly.  I especially liked the elevators to the rooms - they were fast and very efficient - even though the hotel was packed, you never have to wait for a hotel!!  The check-in process was great and my room was very clean and quiet.  The staff at this hotel is friendly and efficient.  The convention center was easy to navigate and everything was within easy walking distance including some great restaurants.  One of the best convention centers I've been to.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen V,  We are thrilled to see you loved your stay with us and that you were thoroughly impressed with our elevators. We get so many compliments on our super efficient system so I'm glad this was your experience. Also, thank you for mentioning how much you loved the convention center and our great staff. We will be sure to share your compliments with our team. We appreciate your business and hope you will stay with us again soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Stayed for two nights for a meeting. Front door staff were friendly and helpful. Lobby was clean and spacious. Room was not available but they checked me in and called when room ready. Room was clean and but was standard hotel room size. Flat screen TV was huge but would not work when we arrived. Someone came up quickly and solved the problem with a system reboot when we called. Had a room on 11th floor with a balcony and could hear people on ground level entering and leaving the hotel but it was not too bad. Something to consider though if you are on a lower floor and go to bed early. Elevators are different than any I had seen before and you have to input your floor into a keypad and it assigns you to a specific one.  It seemed efficient and there was seldom any wait. Overall
Manager Response: Dear DavidT,  We appreciate your gracious feedback regarding your stay while attending a meeting at our hotel. We host a lot of meetings, so it is always great to learn from meeting attendees that they had such an enjoyable visit. We hope to have you back soon, whether it is for another meeting or while traveling on your own to this area. Thank you again for sharing your review with us.  Sincerely, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Convention event-great location easy walk to Disney
Summary: Packed hotel with multiple convention activities, lots of families. Elevators were fast. Room was comfy. Restaurant at the hotel was excellent for dinner, easy, and very courteous with my kid.  Pool was fun too. Super easy walk for breakfast in the morning at Storyteller Cafe (at the Grand Californian-great way to see true Disney characters without having to pay to go in the park-and great buffet!!, make a reservation)
Manager Response: Dear AcA349,  Thank you so much for letting us know how much you enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us. We will be sure to share your compliments with our team and they know their efforts do not go unnoticed. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: First vist to this hotel and no regrets.  Even though I was not there for the local attractions such a Disneyland it provided all I needed. Good access to the local Freeways, plenty of food and dining options and good location for many other attractions and shopping if required. On top of that naturally next to the convention centre as well should it be that type of stay.  I stayed on the Club level floor and the view towards Disneyland was good and got the benefit of the evening fireworks shows as well.  Lifts in the hotel are ultra modern and fast.  Club level lounge was great many choices across the day and very well worth it thats for sure and the staff were truly very friendly and made you feel very welcome indeed.  Car park options for self parking are just next door for a
Manager Response: Dear David T,  Thank you for letting us know how much you loved your stay at the Anaheim Marriott, especially our close proximity to the freeways and food options. We hope you will make us your hotel of choice each time your travels bring you back to the area.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This is not our first visit (and will probably keep visiting).   This is a great Marriott. Love the proximity to the convention center. Our stay was comfortable and pleasant. Staff is always super helpful and courteous 24 hours.  Beds are comfortable.   Didn't try the restaurants but food ordered for room service was great. The event space is also nice and is connected to the self park. Which is about $25 unless you have a special rate (valet is $31). Concierge level is available to Gold and Platinum members.   The pool area looked really nice to though I didn't get a chance to use it.   The elevators seemed weird at first but the concept makes it very efficient. Never had to wait for an elevator no matter how busy it got. Cool system - hope they roll it to other Marriotts too.
Manager Response: Dear Jubin E, thank you for being our guest and for your repeat visit, it really is the best compliment we can receive. We are so pleased you enjoyed our facilities and that you had such a great experience. Your detailed review really paints a great picture for future guests to know the level of service and accommodations they can expect. Thanks again for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit, we hope it's sooner than later!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This is a review for a visit a few years ago to the Marriott, but one that deserves being shared nevertheless.  Our room had a Disney view and it came with breakfast for 4.  The process of checking in was quick considering how busy the hotel was ( hint to other hotels have more stations open for tired travelers to check in).  Easy access to the parks with the ART shuttle and an afternoon discounted access to the parks for convention attendees.  Parking could have been better, but Overall a great 3 night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Silvertiger,  Thank you for the great review and for letting us know how much you enjoyed your visit. We are glad to see that our easy access to the parks, included breakfast, and other aspects of your stay were perfect for your families needs. Thanks so much for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Totally loved this place ... it’s grand ... massive huge and beautiful   Contemporary.. altruistic ... loved it   Hospitality and the food is wonderful   Do go down for breakfast.. a good healthy spread and an ever smiling Chef  Loved the rooms .. spacious and beautiful... esp the personalised welcome message in the tv   Makes you feel good   These guys are quick and efficient even with all the traffic
Manager Response: Dear vr280580,  We appreciate you letting us know that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for mentioning our wonderful staff. They work hard to provide excellent service so we are glad to see this was your experience! We hope to see you again soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: As a fan of the Marriott brand I really enjoyed this property. For our family vacation the proximity to Disney and LA was key in choosing it. The staff overall is very friendly and accommodating. We initially had a room in the newer tower but asked to be moved to the original one because the rooms there had balconies and we prefer fresh air vs a/c. Front desk staff was very accommodating and even offered for us to see the room first before completing the upgrade. They also offered us an executive room upgrade because it offers more square footage and it made a lot of difference for us as a family of 5. It was well worth the $40 dollars per night in upgrade fee. We also used a rollaway and my son was very comfortable on it. The housekeeping staff was also very fast and
Manager Response: Dear newyork_travelguru75,  Thank for the detailed review. We are so glad to see you loved every aspect of your stay from our accommodating staff to our great location. We do our best to provide an extraordinary stay to each of our guests and I'm glad to see this was your families experience. We hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Same great hotel /but different tower from our visit in June
Summary: Staff was helpful  room was clean ,rusty frame on bath door. Towels were above the norm . No fuss room food Delivery - no traditional room service. Lobby was comfortable    Looks like renovations are in the works. Last June there were food outlets and a huge Starbucks.  We were  here for a  Disney weekend  there's a shuttle service to the theme parks every twenty min just outside the Lobby . This is a great place for our needs. Also they have a great gym.
Manager Response: Dear brucebush,  We are so glad we were able to meet your needs during your trip to the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for letting us know about the shower door in your room. We will have that taken care of right away. We appreciate your loyalty and your business and hope you will stay with us again the next time you are in Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: A 15 minute walk from Disneyland/California Adventure and lovely, modern hotel
Summary: The staff when checking in and checking out were absolutely brilliant - very helpful and polite. We booked king rooms which it turned out there was only 2 out of the 3 we booked available (my husband and I were staying with his parents, his sister and her boyfriend). Rather than try and argue against it (like we'd had at other hotels with the same problem on this trip), the man at check in was apologetic and gave my husband and I $50 room credit for the inconvenience. We opted to use this for the parking charge we would have staying there for 2 days but could have used this for room service or restaurants/bars within the hotel instead.  We didn't really use any of the hotel amenities as it was a stop off for us to do Disneyland and Disney California Adventure, but it was very
Manager Response: Dear Helen C,  We are thrilled to see our location was a perfect landing place for your vacation and that you were thoroughly impressed with our team at check-in. Our goal is to provide a clean, comfortable stay to all of our guests so we are glad this was your experience. We hope you choose the Anaheim Marriott the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at the Marriott Hotel, Anaheim for 5 nights. The hotel is an excellent place to stay. Great amenities, spotlessly clean and friendly staff. I would highly recommend staying there. A special mention to 2 staff members - Aurelia, who cleaned our room , what a delightful lady and so friendly.  I had a bad cough and she was just so incredibly caring. Also William, Consierge, he was so helpful, happy and friendlier than most. Marriott you are lucky to have these 2 employees.   Dianne Trafford. Melbourne, Australia.
Manager Response: Dear Dianne T,  Thank you for staying at the Anaheim Marriott. We were thrilled to read your comments about the great service you received from our staff, and how they exceeded your expectations. Thank you for mentioning Aurelia and William. They are true assets to our team and we will be sure to pass on your compliments to them. It was our pleasure to serve you and we hope to have you back with us again in future!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: A cozy large enough hotel, not like the HUGE Hilton across the road with it's many conference attendees roaming about, that's well maintained, and a quick shuttle ride to Disney. Though this Marriott is next to the convention center it doesn't have the conference traffic of the larger Hilton. There were many people staying here, yet it was quiet and not teeming with people. The rooms are average sized, well maintained, and quiet. The hotel is kept clean and it's modern decor is blends in throughout. The pool is large, clean and welcoming after a long day. Plus, it was relatively quiet with few children in the pool. Of course, if you want to use it there will be a horde of children splashy about. The concierge room is nicely furnished with the food well prepared and presented.
Manager Response: Dear traveleurope610,  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your visit to the Anaheim Marriott. We are so glad to see that our concierge room and pool area were added bonuses for you. We appreciate your detailed review and hope you will stay with us again the next time you are in Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Great hotel for business travelers.  Hotel had good amenities, and great rooms.  Restaurant, patio, cafe, and other perks plus great access to nearby restaurants.  Staff were also very hospitable.  Definitely a thumbs up!
Manager Response: Dear CalgaryC&M,  Thank you for choosing our hotel while you were in Anaheim for business. We're delighted to read that we were able to provide all the amenities you needed and that you especially liked our comfortable rooms and excellent location. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back to the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Well Prepared for the Conventioneer and Mouseketeer
Summary: Large Marriott in the core Anaheim area (really no downtown to speak of) adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center and a short walk (<15 minutes) to Disney parks.  Very good service, fast, very helpful, attentive and friendly.  Of course very knowledgeable about the area attractions as well as dining selections, driving directions, etc.  And nicely done refresh - public spaces are open, bright and new.  Breathing new life into an older building.  Fairly typical Marriott room - large enough, comfortable beds, plenty of pillows, work desk, really big TV.  A bit stingy on the bathroom space, but manageable.  Small patios in rooms in one tower, some with nice views away from the convention center and other hotels.  Also a few rooms in a lower section overlooking the pool area - way
Manager Response: Dear mastiffdad,  We thoroughly enjoyed reading your comments and want to thank you for sharing such a pleasant and detailed review. We're glad you enjoyed everything while you were here—from our excellent location and facilities to our helpful and friendly staff. Thanks so much for your positive feedback. We look forward to your next stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My family and I had the pleasure of staying at this property in August. Our stay fell at the same time as my daughters birthday and the hotel went above and beyond to help make my daughters birthday special. I had asked the front desk to blow up some balloons that I had bought and we came back to the room after a long day at Disney to a big personalized birthday banner, card, and balloons. Paula and Elini - THANK YOU for doing something so special for my girl! This family-friendly hotel is a great option for Disney goers because you take the hopper bus to Disney and be there in 5-minutes and it is significantly cheaper than a Disney property. After a long day at the park, we came back to the property and had a nice dinner by the pool while the kids played.
Manager Response: Dear aridgeway2016,  Thank you for the wonderful review and taking time to share your experience with your fellow travelers. We are so glad our staff made your daughter feel welcome on her birthday! We will be sure to share your compliments with Paula and Elini to let them know their efforts did not go unnoticed. We appreciate the recognition and look forward to welcoming you back to the Anaheim Marriott. Safe Travels!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: A big hotel that caters mainly for business conferences as it is next to  the conference centre. Room was large and clean but no free WiFi with a per device charge. I stayed at 4 hotels on this trip and this was the only one without free WiFi.  The staff were friendly and helpful and the room was cleaned daily to a good standard.  Air con was good and this was essential that week as outside was 42 degrees.  Car parking is very expensive with the overnight charge of c$20.  Close to disney , about a 20 minute walk
Manager Response: Dear Steve T,  We enjoyed reading your comments and want to thank you for sharing your review. We're glad we were able to meet most of your expectations. Please know that we do offer complimentary WIFI in our lobby and all public areas of the hotel. We are sorry if you were not made aware of this. Thank you for staying with us and look forward to your next stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: My girlfriend and I spent five days here in Sept/2017 and were very impressed, especially for the price. The staff were amazing, and the hotel was very nice and well kept up. I couldn't walk through the lobby without numerous staff asking if I needed anything or asking how my day was going. The lobby area was beautiful and very well maintained. Very nice pool area with restaurant service, and the restaurant was very nice with very good food. Our room was perfect with a nice large balcony overlooking the pool, loved it!!   We will definitely return next time we visit Anaheim!!
Manager Response: Dear 226randy,  We are thrilled you and your girlfriend enjoyed so many aspects of your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. Thank you for mentioning our team. We work hard to provide outstanding service to each of our guests so we glad this was your experience. Please come again soon!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The place to stay if you are in town for a convention and excellent if that conference means you're getting up early!   Rooms and hotel itself were very good. Pool was nice but service was slow/lacking there.
Manager Response: Dear Chr15t1n3,  We appreciate you letting us know you enjoyed your stay here while attending your conference. We hope we will be your hotel of choice, whether that be for business or pleasure, the next time you are in the area!  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Brilliant hotel for business or leisure
Summary: The entrance to the hotel is grand and  gives an excellent first impression, reception team were welcoming and very helpful. Rooms were luxury with comfortable beds and useful amenities.  Plenty of general stores, restaurants and pharmacies within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Tyler C,  Thanks so much for the fabulous review! We love receiving feedback from our guests and are happy to read about your great stay with us. Thanks also for mentioning how much you appreciated our comfortable rooms and friendly team. Reviews like yours make our jobs even more rewarding. We look forward to your next stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent service, great for convention or conference
Summary: This was a very clean, comfortable, reliable hotel that offered a great place to stay. It's nice but still affordable, with really good restaurant options. Nfuse, the main restaurant and bar in the hotel, is one of the best hotel restaurants I've ever experienced in terms of the quality of the food. The cocktail menu is expansive, and small bites are easy to share and very tasty. The breakfast buffet was great and so was lunch. Honestly, I preferred to eat there over any of the other places nearby.  There was one day our room was not cleaned, but we slept in, so that might have been more us than them. If you sit outside in the evening to enjoy a drink on the patio, expect that you'll have to flag down a server, but once you do, it goes just fine.  Rooms were comfortable and
Manager Response: Dear Robyn S,  Thank you for the nice review!  We are glad your stay was enjoyable and that we were able to meet your expectations at an affordable rate. We couldn't be more pleased that you enjoyed your visit at the Anaheim Marriott and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a future stay.   Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel, like most things in America, is so huge we didn't comprehend until we visited, however the service was very personal and friendly which is unusual for such a large complex. The rooms were clean, bright and well maintained. The pool area was a welcome sight in the 35 degree heat we experienced during our stay, they should really make more of this, although it was relatively small it was a great facility.  There was free to use pool towels and iced water available which was great.  Within the hotel there was a Starbucks and a Pizza Hut outlet, great for grabbing food after an exhausting day in the parks.  Perfect location for access to the Disney parks (within walking distance but also on the ART lines) and next to the convention centre.
Manager Response: Dear NaomiRGreen, We appreciate you letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay with us. Our guests are usually impressed with our great pool area and awesome location and I'm glad to see this was your experience as well. We hope we will be your hotel of choice each time your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Thank you, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Hotel was great , great location near Disneyland and restaurants. Only issue we had TV wouldn't work and they didn't get it fixed and staff were not very friendly about discounting room due to this issue  One was actually quite rude. Apart from that was a nice hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know you enjoyed your visit. We apologize for your encounter at our front desk and thank you for informing us of this incident. We can understand your disappointment and I assure this will be addressed. Counting on your kind generosity to accept our apology, we hope you will consider returning to our hotel on your next visit to this area. We appreciate your business and would welcome the opportunity to restore a favorable impression of our hotel in the future.  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We checked in for a 7 day conference and WOW the Lobby IS AWSOME.  Though everything would be fine but when we got to our room, it was still not clean with leftover trash on the floor, No Closet ( a box not nearly enough for a seven day stay).  When we asked to change rooms, they had no more.  What a disappointment as we stay in Marriott's quite frequently.  When we were told there was no other options, we checked out the next morning and went to the Hilton across the street and were treated like Royalty. I was called by Cooperate HQ however and the Manager and they apologized and gave is some points that we will use to stay in the Marriott in Indianapolis the next conference in October.
Manager Response: Dear D0g0nIt, thank you for taking the time to complete a review. It's nice to read you impressed with our lobby, but we're very sorry your room was prepared properly upon your arrival and you were less than thrilled with the room size. We're glad that our management team was able to provide you points for the inconveniences you experienced. Thanks for being our guest and we hope to welcome you back for a much better stay.  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We stayed here during our Disney half marathon weekend. The hotel lobby is clean and modern. The rooms are slightly dated but is maintained well and is clean. The shuttle to Disney was great and very convenient. It's a little more then half a mile walk away to Disney Land but with the humidity at the time we were there it was very convenient. Overall the hotel was great and I highly recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear JmaNyc718,  Thank you for recommending the Anaheim Marriott to family and friends. That says a lot about how much you enjoyed your time with us. We appreciate you choosing our hotel and we hope you will stay with us again for the half marathon next year. Thanks for being our guest!  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Had a king room on the concierge level. Bathroom was small and could use updating but the room was clean, quiet and nice. Large flat screen. Great (free) breakfast in concierge lounge and unlimited bottle water and soda. Evening snacks and dessert were tasty. Shuttle to Disney was $5.50 per day per person and worked great - walk would have been ok but hey, we walked a lot AT Disney (2 days). Spent one day driving the PCH (Laguna, Dana Point - AWESOME! and San Clemente). Location of the hotel (15 min from SNA, 25 from Laguna, blocks from Disney) was super. Hotel staff were great.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph S,  Thank you for your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are so glad you were able to enjoy your time in our hotel as well as some of the surrounding areas. The PCH really is a lot of fun on a beautiful day! We hope we will be your hotel of choice each time you visit Anaheim!  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: The only reason I am giving this hotel a 4 and not a 5 is that I prefer small boutique hotels.  But this hotel was gorgeous! I was ther e for work at a nearby theme park, but is a hub hotel for conventions as well.  The lobby and bar area on entry is stunning and the staff was very friendly.  I never waited more than 5 minutes for my car from valet, which pleasantly surprised me because they were so busy.  Cute little pool area! There is a Starbucks and a Pizza Hut inside of the hotel, but give their restaurant a try, it's worth it's!
Manager Response: Dear Darla H,  We appreciate you letting us know you loved our hotel and all of the wonderful amenities we have to offer, especially since you prefer smaller boutique hotels. With our onsite Starbucks and Pizza Hut along with our friendly and efficient staff, we feel we have a lot to offer our guests and we are glad you agree! We do hope you will come back to see us again the next time you are in Anaheim. Thank you for being our guest.   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Found the hotel to be fairly good overall, close enough to walk to Disney if you have older children.  Anaheim transit makes a stop in front of the hotel which is nice. They don't mention it but be advised there is a charge for parking even as a guest of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear, L T,  We appreciate you letting us and fellow travelers know that you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott. We are glad to see that our close proximity to Disney was a bonus for you and your family. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, modern, clean hotel near Disney!  Expensive parking.
Summary: I was awarded this hotel after booking on Hotwire.  I was meeting up with some friends who were spending a week at Disney.  I only needed an overnight stay as I was planning one day at the park and then heading home on the last flight out of SNA.  The hotel is everything you’d expect from this type of property… clean, modern, updated and efficiently ran.    You’ll love your room… it’s clean and updated.  Well decorated.  Tons of amenities from a Starbucks, mini-food court, gym, and more.   The hotel is blocks away from Disney…. I suggest taking a short Uber/Lyft/Taxi ride to the park.  That’s what I did and it worked well.  Don’t park a car in the hotel’s garage… it’s way too expensive.  The only snag I had was with the parking.  I was dropping off a rental car at the Hertz
Manager Response: Dear gqjustin,  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your time with us and thank you for letting us know how impressed you were with Brandon. We will be sure to share your compliments with him. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel as a base for sightseeing around Los Angeles as it was close to downtown Disney so that we had something to do on a night. Taxi to downtown Disney was about $15.   The hotel is very modern with a lovely bar area, restaurant, shop and Starbucks.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Amorley32,  Thank you for letting us know how much you loved your stay at the Anaheim Marriott, especially our close proximity to downtown Los Angeles and Disney. We hope you will make us your hotel of choice each time your travels bring you back to the area.  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: We just got back from staying at Marriott Anaheim Marriott.  It is no doubt beautiful but bug infested.  I came home with bites all over my body.  We also had to call housekeeping to remove very large insects from our room!  The staff was super nice and apologetic.  They came and removed bugs quickly.  I am sure that once they realize there is a major problem...they will fix it.  We also had to wipe off the cob webs from the sliding glass door to get to patio.  There is defiantly a bug problem at the Marriott Anaheim Convention.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are so sorry about the problem you described with your room. Though we are confident this was an isolated incident, we take these concerns seriously. As your review is anonymous, we would appreciate additional information to identify the room you occupied so we may properly investigate and follow up. It was our pleasure accommodating you, and we hope to have the opportunity to resolve your concern to your satisfaction.  Zuyen Urbina  Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: GREAT Elevator Service and Convenient Convention Location
Summary: This is a very nice Marriott property. I was very impressed with their porter service. I had numerous deliveries and all were very helpful! It was a very short walk to the convention center. Their elevator service is different but great. I heard from other guests that they waited "forever" at the adjacent Hilton. You press your floor number and it gives you which elevator of that you go on... i think there were 5. This eliminated the congestion and there were a lot of people!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know you had a great stay. We get so many compliments on our elevator service so we are glad you liked it, too. You are right - this does eliminate a lot of congestion and frustration, especially during our busiest times. Thank you for being our guest and we hope to see you again soon!  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: First and foremost, the Anaheim Marriott knows how to treat loyal customers. Our service has been top notch and the staff has outdone themselves during our past two stays. This has become our go to property in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear GreatTravelrime,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are pleased to know how much you continue to enjoy our hotel! We want your stay with us to feel like home and be as comfortable as possible. Thank you for your loyalty and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Lovely hotel with wide spacious foyer, restaurants, Pizza Hut, shop, Starbucks and FedEx on the ground floor.   The best feature for me was the professional staff who were efficient and courteous throughout my stay. I only had one sour faced, PMSing female serve me with cuteness and attitude issue, which I called and complained about and no doubt she was dealt with by duty manager. He fully apologised on her behalf.  Jennifer and Heather from the Concierge were  amazing. They dealt with my queries on a day trip to LA and had me booked in by the time I dropped by to pay the deposit. Jennifer also tracked the Supershuttle service for me which I had booked the day before for LAX and when it was not to be seen, she contacted the service and walked me right up to them as they had
Manager Response: Dear Shenad18,  We appreciate your review and are happy you enjoyed your overall stay with us! Thank you for your kind remarks with regards to our friendly service, our well-appointed rooms, and efficient Concierge team. Our staff works diligently to provide excellent service at all times and your feedback is truly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon. Safe travels!   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel to be near Disneyland. The location was great and only 11 miles to Disneyland. The hotel had a beautiful and spacious pool area to hang out with family. Especially at night, the pool lights were very modern and offered a relaxing environment. Our room was clean, nice & spacious. No issues to report whatsoever.
Manager Response: Dear Marlo T  Thank you for your recent stay. We are so happy to hear that you loved every aspect of your visit and that our location was perfect for your needs. We hope you will choose to stay with us every time you are back in Anaheim!  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manage

Summary: Here on business and this was my 'home' for 5 days while at a convention. the hotel is super nice, great service, and really updated/modern. there is a full starbucks inside (not just a 'we brew starbucks,' really nice fitness center. the bar is cool but a bit pricey for drinks and food. The pool looks nice but i didn't get to go...  regardless - great place to stay and lots of things around to eat and do for just a quick taxi/uber ride!
Manager Response: Dear rachmeal03,  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and loved our great location and amenities. We want all of our guests to feel at home while here and we are glad to see we are reaching our goal. We thank you for your business and hope you will choose to stay with us again the next time you are in Anaheim!  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager
