Summary: The hotel was very nice, but not great.  The room was no better than an average Best Western in the mid-west.  My opinion is that it is extremely overpriced.  The tub did not drain properly so we ended up showering and standing in the water.  The sink faucets leaked when turned on.  The bed was comfortable and the patio had a nice view of the convention center and Disney Land. I was also a bit flabbergasted at the daily charge for parking our car!  BTY, don't drink the bottled water in the room - it is not complimentary!
Manager Response: Dear gaylordbrown,  Thank you for your recent visit to our hotel and for your review. We are committed to offering every one of our guests an exceptional stay, and we apologize that we did not do so for your visit. Thank you for letting us know about the tub drain and leaky sink faucet in your bathroom. We will be sure to have those items serviced right away. Thank you again for your candid feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to make a much better impression on a future stay.   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel I only stayed there for 1 night. Walking distance to disney, disney down town and to all the resturant. location is great,  Lobby is new . big hotel .Clean , nice pool, expensive parking but it looks like it is the same everywhere in this area.
Manager Response: Dear VWfromOrlando,  Thank you for staying with us, and for your wonderful feedback. We are thrilled that you loved our terrific location as well as our hotel and facilities. It's encouraging to receive comments like yours that let us know we are meeting our goal of service excellence. Thank you again for choosing the Anaheim Marriott. We hope to have you stay with us again!  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: On checking into hotel we were given rooms on the ground floor, we had adjoining rooms with our friends, similar rooms but their wardrobe could not be called a wardrobe! They also did not have a safe, we called to ask about this and were told they could use one in the hall as not all rooms had safes. They were offered another room on the ground floor.  I then opened our fridge to find old food, I took it to reception to let them know, I handed this to the duty manager who apologised but as I walked away it was clearly a good laugh for the staff! On checking our reservation confirmation we had booked rooms with city views, back to reception to ask about this as our view was a car park. The duty manager (Charles) checked this for us and we were informed this was not guaranteed. We
Manager Response: Dear Flop45,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review. It's great to see that, overall, you enjoyed your visit to our city. Thank you for mentioning our concierge team. We will certainly let them know their efforts do not go unnoticed. We are sorry for the issues you had with your room and for the unpleasant experience at our front desk. Please know that what you described is not typical and we will be sharing your comments with our team to make sure neither of these concerns is repeated in the future.  If you wouldn't mind, please contact me at your earliest convenience. I would appreciate the opportunity to speak to you more about your stay.   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager 714 748 2451  zuyen.urbina@marriott.com

Summary: So let me start by saying that I notified the hotel about our 11 PM check in.  We went to the front desk which is not properly marked nor has any sort of line to follow....people everywhere.   We purchased the Romance Package which give you King or Two Queen, Balcony, City View, $100 Dollar Credit for hotel use at Restaurants (one restaurant is all the have), chocolate covered strawberries and champagne and 2 drinks at Nfuse Bar.  So the very courteous Front Desk agent calls In-Room dining to tell them we are now checking in and to bring up the Amenity which they then tell her is has been dropped off already..  The rest of the process went fine regarding check in except they tell us we are in the far tower and not the main tower, and we proceed to our room.  The Champagne is
Manager Response: Dear lisatailorjoniec,  Thank you for your recent stay and for your review. Our hotel typically receives high ratings for customer service, so I am very disappointed to hear about your experience.  We appreciate you letting us know that your Romance Package and our Room Service could have been better. We will certainly share this with our Food and Beverage team and discuss where improvements are needed. Thank you, again, for your feedback as it gives us the information we need to better serve our guests. We appreciate your business and hope you will consider a second chance for a better stay the next time you are in Anaheim.   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This is our third annual stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  The property is always clean and well maintained, although some of the rooms and carpet are looking a bit tired and dated.   The pool area and nFuse bar and grill are nice, but space can be limited if hotel occupancy is high making it hard to find a chair to lay out on an afternoon break from Disney.   The hotel itself is next door to the convention center and Hilton and as such has excellent transportation access.  In fact, it is on both the #4 and #5 bus routes to Disney so the parks are only 5-10 minutes away by bus.  And you can buy day bus tickets at the hotel very cheaply providing multiple uses per day back and forth to DisneyLand.   A great value with great DisneyLand access.
Manager Response: Dear JamesENicholson,  Thank you for returning to stay with us. There is no better compliment than a guest who keeps coming back time after time! We're so glad you continue to enjoy our convenient location to Disney and many amenities. It is always a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we look forward to your next stay!   Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Quick and courteous check-in. Conveniently located by the Anaheim Convention Center.   The room was spacious, clean, very well maintained, and well appointed. The only thing missing was a microwave.   A very pleasant stay. No complaints.
Manager Response: Dear FUL-QWVR,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We are pleased to know how much you liked your guest room! We want your stay with us to feel like home and be as comfortable as possible. We appreciate your kind review and hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I stayed here with FBLA students in June. The check in was chaotic as the front desk told both my groups two different things. After about 10 minutes, the realized their error and we were able to check in quickly. The rooms were beautiful. My room was on a corner and had a large balcony that over looked the city and the convention center. The room itself had a full wall of windows and a king bed. It was large, but the bathroom was small in comparison. As I was there for the convention, the hotel is clearly a great spot, located next to the Anaheim convention center. We spent 3 days at Disney, so the ease of access was perfect. Another chaperone told me about the bus service, which I wish the front desk would have told me about. The bus was an easy purchase at the front desk and
Manager Response: Dear asvmdmom,  We appreciate the outstanding review. We're delighted that you loved your spacious room with a view and convenient location to the Convention Center and Disneyland. Your comfort is our number one priority, so it's nice to know we met your expectations. Thanks for choosing to stay with us. We would love to host you again the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Overall Property Is Good. Need Update.
Summary: The Hotel was Good. Main floor lobby were clean and impressive. No one took care of my elite status. But they offered free internet because I am a elite member. The bedroom was good and clean. Washrooms needs to be updated. It was old. The suite was not at all usable. I would give 3.5 stars overall. They can charge a bit more for updated suites.
Manager Response: Dear Simaks,  We appreciate your loyalty and for being an elite rewards member. Please accept our apologies for not giving you the treatment that you deserved. Our front desk staff is trained to make sure that our Rewards Members are given the acknowledgment, upgrades and perks that they deserve, so we're sorry we failed to do this when you visited us. Please rest assured that this is not our typical way of treating guests, and the next time you are here, we will more than make up for the shortcomings of this stay. Please feel free to reach out to me to discuss any further details regarding your stay.  We look forward proving ourselves to you on your next visit.  Sincerely, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager 714 748 2451  zuyen.urbina@marriott.com

Summary: Personable staff. Accommodations met our needs for family of five. Elevator system is the best: enter floor outside elevator bank rather than inside elevator.  Enjoyed all the meals at the restaurants in the hotel. Starbucks is in the lobby! Bus transportation to and from Disneyland met our needs.
Manager Response: Dear alugirl1947,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We're glad that your family was so happy with our comfortable accommodations, personable staff and great elevator system.  We take great pride in delivering excellent service, so comments like yours assure us that we are on the right track. Thanks again and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel is located by the convention center. They could improve Customer Service at the front desk. I had a couple of issues and dealing with the female desk attendant was not the most friendly. They say no before you even finish your sentence.   Self-park is $25 a night.  Restaurant food is ok. Housekeeping was excellent. Bed was comfortable. Accommodates my feather-free need.  Front desk attendants lack customer service skills. Not all of them but 3 females I interacted with need more training. They were rude. Every other service wiener was super friendly....from valet to housekeeping.
Manager Response: Dear Alyssa S,  Please accept our apologies for the customer service issues you experienced and for failing to provide you with a stress-free stay. It is always our goal to provide excellent guest service, so we regret that we did not provide the level of attention we normally do. We promise you that we will use your evaluation to step up our game. If we can be of further assistance, feel free to reach out to us via the information below. We hope that you will give us another chance to show you our hospitality and stay with us the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager 714 748 2451  zuyen.urbina@marriott.com

Summary: We stayed here for three nights, whilst my husband attended a conference.  We stayed in a room in the Oasis Tower on the 10th floor. The room itself was of a good size and well decorated.  The bathroom was fine, with a shower over a shallow bath tub. Only minor issue was that there didn't seem to be a safe in the room (either that or it was so well hidden that it was extra safe), which made me about nervous about leaving our passports, but other than that there were no issues. My husband found the hotel extremely convenient for the convention centre.  Whilst he was at the convention I went to Disneyland...the hotel is about a 20 minute walk each way and there always seemed to be plenty of people about. Would I stay here again?  For a convention...yes, it is so convenient.  For
Manager Response: Dear Victoria T,  Thanks so much for your kind review. We are delighted you enjoyed your spacious room and convenient location to the Convention Center and Disneyland. Your feedback is the best performance measure we have, so thanks again for taking the time to post your comments. We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: I want to try to be objective with this review but it will be difficult because the check in experience was so horrible. We had called the hotel prior to booking and received information that confirmed we wanted to stay here. We reserved several rooms. Upon check in at the Elite member desk, we were told that we received incorrect information. The man checking us in was completely incompetent and unfortunately, I did not get his name. He called the front desk manager, Charles Castle who was rude, condescending and dismissive and without care told me I could call his boss, which I did. Because only one room was ready, I had to go back down to the desk. I shared with them that I had called Zuyen Urbina and had not received a call back. The person at the desk told me she was not
Manager Response: Dear celmo46,  It was disappointing to read about your experience at our hotel. This is not the impression that we like our guests to leave with.  We apologize that you encountered problems with your reservations and we were unable to resolve them to your satisfaction. Even more distressing is the fact that you were met with anything other than friendly service in the process. This is not acceptable, and we will redouble our efforts to ensure this does not happen again. We truly hope you will give us another chance to prove we are committed to providing outstanding accommodations and service.  Sincerely, Front Office Manager

Summary: This was a business trip.  For this purpose, the facilities of the hotel were wonderful. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable.  I stayed at the Oasis Tower which seemed to be the newest section of the hotel.  Beds were comfortable and I love the enormous TV screen.  Like most chains in their higher end hotels, you have to pay for internet!! I find this very annoying. The restaurant had nice creative food choices.  The pool was nice and had plenty of shade areas. The business facilities were convention type and convenient.  This hotel is located 35 minutes walk to Disneyland where I went for lunch one day. Because the hotel is next door to the convention center, it would be very convenient if you have an event at the convention center.  However, because of the size of the
Manager Response: Dear Sandra S,  We are so glad your conference brought you to stay with us.  With our flexible, upscale facilities and our convenient location,  our goal is make sure every event we host is outstanding. We're thrilled to learn we met that expectation for you, and we hope to have the pleasure of a return visit soon!  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary: Location can't be beat if you're going to the convention center. The pool area was nice and so was the lobby. Staff were great. It seemed like they skipped the bathrooms during the renovation process--the age of the building is very apparent the moment you take a look at the bathtub. The majority of the hotel has a more high-end feeling but small things (like the sliding doors to the balcony and locks on the room door, both of which were old and didn't slide well) were not updated and make the rooms feel a bit run down.
Manager Response: Dear Travel_Junkie745685,  Thank you for taking time to post your review. We're delighted you loved so many aspects of the hotel and, overall, you had a wonderful stay. We apologize you were disappointed in the bathtubs and had troubles with the locks.  We have notified our maintenance team of the lock situation and they are working to repair those.  Thanks for being our guest. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Great location - good food - friendly staff
Summary: A couple of my friends stayed here recently to attend a couple of baseball games at Angels stadium. Check in was excellent, room was ideal and overall service was wonderful and friendly. One small issue - pool is rather small - not big enough when hotel is near capacity.
Manager Response: Dear  rslopez1,  We appreciate your excellent review and are happy you enjoyed your overall stay with us! Thank you for your kind remarks with regards to our friendly service, our well-appointed rooms, and efficient check-in process. Our team works diligently to provide excellent service at all times and your feedback is truly appreciated. In addition, we appreciated your suggestion regarding the pool, and know that we will share your comments with the appropriate individuals in our organization when we plan for future updates. We are glad this did not overshadow the rest of your stay, and hope to welcome you back soon. Safe travels!   Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Disneyland Holiday with three young kids
Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for 8 nights this past July.  We had a wonderful time.  Staff and amenities were great.  Close enough to walk to Disneyland, not so much on the way home because the kids are tired but the Shuttle bus from Disneyland was perfect.    We were helped and looked after by Kristy at the font desk.  I cannot say enough about how wonderful she was.  She consistently went above and beyond to make sure our stay was a happy one.  My kids nicknamed her Epic Kristy she was so friendly and helpful.    The only slight negative I have was that one of our rooms was a little "tired" but still very clean.    We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear aneata77,  Thanks so much for the terrific review. We are pleased everything went great for you during your visit and that our wonderful location near Disneyland and awesome staff made it even better.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Zuyen Urbina Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Nice combo of family and business
Summary: I am here on business but most are here for Disney. The hotel balances the two clientele well. Nice rooms. Wish the Starbucks in the hotel opened before 6. Friendly staff. My desk chair did not adjust for height and they replaced it with no hassle.   Love Marriotts and this is a good one.
Manager Response: Dear marjoryrobertson,  It was a pleasure having you as our guest.  We appreciate your kind words and compliments regarding your stay. We strive to make our guests' travel needs as easy as possible during their visit, and we are happy we could assist you with your desk chair. Thanks again for staying with us - we appreciate your business!  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: You can expect an hotel to be next to a convention centre and a major theme park to be busy and upon our arrival it was full of convention attendees and theme park visitors  Despite this we were quickly registered and given our rooms and made our way to the lifts  although we were not told which part of the hotel we were staying in so initially went to the wrong lifts  Like many hotels you key in your floor and your lift  is indicated by the keypad  Room was to typical Marriott standard, clean modern large TV , fridge , iron , hair dryer , good number of towels  and lots of power points , plug sockets , no USB , Netflix and YouTube built into the TV Comfortable bed lots of pillows, soft headboard. Some noise during the day , music, and fireworks at night during my particular
Manager Response: Dear tcaslondon, We so appreciate the great feedback and that you thoroughly enjoyed your visit with us. We are a busy hotel, and its great to know how well we handled our guests and made your stay so memorable. From our wonderful clean room, breakfast buffet, pool, to our awesome location. We hope to welcome you back again soon for another great experience. Safe travels!  Regards, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: This place was great first time I visited last year. I had to visit again. Same great service like always and staff very helpful. If you ever in anahiem this is the place to stay. Thank you and hope too visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Chasez22,  Thank you for returning to stay with us. There is no better compliment than a guest who keeps coming back time after time! We're so glad you continue to enjoy our great service. It is always a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we look forward to your next stay! Thanks again.  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Valet staff is first class. Hotel is beautiful! Elevators are quick and the entry pad directs you to an elevator organized for maximum efficiency. The elevators were never slow to arrive.  Only bell hops are allowed to use the luggage carts. We called at 7 am and it took 10 minutes for them to find someone to send up. Don't plan to leave at the last minute.
Manager Response: Dear Perryville_John,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  Our highest priority is making sure you have a comfortable and carefree stay, and we're glad we could make that happen for you. Thank you for taking time out of your day to recognize our efforts. We hope to welcome you again soon!  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Nice clean hotel with friendly and helpful staff. Close to Disneyland and restaurants with a short drive to The Outlets at Orange. Our only complaint was the location of the parking garage to the rooms.Parking was $39 and the walk from the parking garage to the rooms were a bit much even though you were inside the hotel. Not only that but you have to walk through events that may be going on if you self-park in the garage. While there, we walked through 2 wedding receptions and a karate event to get to our room. Other than that we had a nice stay and will stay there in the future. Instead of self-parking we will valet :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review, most especially the kind comments about our staff. It's important to us that all our guests have a great experience, and we're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting you again.  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Small room & cold water at the pool
Summary: My whole entire family & myself stayed at the Anaheim Marriott July 22nd. When we got inside the room, it was beautiful with the balcony but it was kinda small. Then I took the kids to the pool & the water was cold so they didn't even get a chance to enjoy. However, they designed the pool real nice. The service people were very helpful but the Front Desk staff was a different story. Nobody smiled at you as you approached the front desk. They seem like they were all in the bad mood, snotty faces & we didn't even get greeted. Which was very strange.  My husband is an Elite Member for Marriott & maybe will stay here again in the future but we sure hope that they train their staff to smile, be happy, be polite & most of all show that the customer is important. After all we are what
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid comments about your stay at our hotel. We were disappointed to read your feedback, and we apologize for your less than stellar stay. Our team prides itself on delivering wonderful hospitality, so we're sorry this was not your experience with us. Rest assured that we take these reviews seriously and then fine-tune procedures to help ensure we do not repeat mistakes. We hope you will consider giving us another chance so we can make this up to you the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: A nice hotel .the lobby is very nice and luxury ,the rooms are clean but not that luxury but it is nice . The hotel has pizza hut and starbucks . Its lication is very close to dianey land but you cant see the fire works from the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Wafaa N,  Thanks so much for the nice review. We are pleased everything went great for you during your visit and that our wonderful location near Disneyland made it even better. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: We recently stayed here while visiting Disneyland. The location and proximity to the park was fantastic. The lobby area and restaurant appear to have been recently updated which was nice. The service was good and everyone definitely was helpful. My biggest complaint was the pool area. We were looking forward to using the pool and amenities and the pictures are misleading. The pool is much smaller than it appeared and was so over crowded while we were in town it was tough to enjoy. They have a Pizza Hut and Starbucks which was convenient, but the food at the hotel was just ok. For the prices, it wasn't worth it. I come to expect a little more from hotels with big price tags so I was a bit disappointed. All and all, a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Keith G,  Thank you for the kind review. We're so glad our location worked well for you and that you appreciated being so close to Disneyland. Thanks for being our guest. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel if going to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here in the summer of 2016. Easy shuttle service around block to Disneyland. Costs are very minimal. Rooms are nice but not too fancy. Pool leaves something to be desired. If your desire is to spend time in Disneyland with a nice, clean hotel to reside at you will be very happy.
Manager Response: Dear John K,  Thank you for the great review! We love knowing how pleased you were with our location and appreciated the easy access to Disneyland. Thanks for choosing to stay with us.  We hope you will make the same choice when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: This is our "go to" hotel and the first time ever we were disappointed. Overall the hotel is welcoming and the staff is nice. This trip we were put in a room that you don't want to stay in. The air conditioner did not work and the view out the window was pipes and the sorts. Next time I'm sure it will be better.
Manager Response: Dear lorna r,  Thank you for your honest evaluation. It is obvious from your comments that we didn't live up to your expectations. Please accept our apology for the air conditioning issues. We have notified our maintenance team so they can repair the unit.  We will work diligently to make sure we are more consistent in our service delivery. We hope you will consider a return visit as we would welcome the opportunity to restore your confidence in our hotel.  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Be prepared to pay for everything. The room price literally only includes the room:  Parking - $30 - 40 / night Internet - $12.95 / 24 hours or $16.95 / 24 hours for enhanced high speed Disney transit - $13 / person for the day (however, the park is within walking distance)  The majority of guests seem to drive so the parking situation is not ideal. It is unclear to me why validated parking is not offered to Marriott guests.
Manager Response: cmo000,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay and for sharing your experience online. We apologize that you had an unsatisfactory experience, as we truly take pride in our service to our guests.  We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Stayed here while attending the D23 Expo.  The location for conventions is perfect. We arrived around 11:30 am and were fortunate to be able to get into our room right away. The Staff was very friendly and helpful.  However if I had known that our room was as far away from the elevator as you could get I would have had the bellman help with the luggage.   There is a Starbucks that was open from 6am until 6pm, and a Pizza hut that was open from 5pm until about 11pm ( I think it closed earlier during the week).   The only issues we had were with housekeeping. We returned to our room about 5pm after being gone since 7am and our room wasn't cleaned. We also ran out of Kleenex and it took two days to get it replaced. Minor details, but still worth mentioning. the room was good,
Manager Response: Dear Mikky4,  Thank you for the great review! We love knowing how pleased you were with our location and appreciated the easy access to the convention center. We hope you will make the same choice when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: The property is located within walking distance to Disneyland for anyone wanting to do the walk. We opted in for the multi day bus pass which helped a lot for getting to and from the hotel and the park. The only negative part of our stay was when we checked in and asked for a luggage cart and were told that we could not take one our selves and that the bellman had to assist us to unload our belongings onto the cart and to the room. Once we convinced the bellman to allow us to unload our own car, I felt like my every move was being watched between the bellman and valet. I overheard valet telling the bellman to keep an eye on us and the luggage cart.
Manager Response: Dear snocera,  Thank you for the review. We're so glad our location worked well for you and that you appreciated being so close to Disneyland. Thanks for being our guest. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Good Place to Stay for Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights at the Marriott surrounding our visit to the D23 Expo. Upon our arrival, we were greeted by the bell staff, who were very efficient. I self-parked, which was fairly convenient. Liked the high-tech call system for the elevators! Our room was spotless, very comfortable, with a large bathroom (we had a disabled-accessible room). Cool night-lighting in the bases of the bedside lamps. Due to some allergy issues, we needed a microwave to be able to heat up some food items, and the hotel sent one right up for us. On one day, our room hadn't been cleaned when we arrived back at about 7 p.m. This wasn't a big deal for us, and the front desk sent up new drinkware and towels upon our request. Check-out was easy. Would definitely stay here again if we return to the Expo.
Manager Response: Dear Crystal P,  Thank you for the great review! We love knowing how pleased you were with our location and appreciated the easy access to the convention center. Thanks for choosing to stay with us. We hope you will make the same choice when your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: This hotel needs some attention. Room was ok, a bit tired. Bathroom was really small. Would be hard for more than one person to get ready at once. Our event had many issues so I probably wouldn't hold another event there, but I can see it would work well for a family Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy1013,  We are very sorry you were disappointed with some aspects of your stay. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. Although we fell short of meeting your expectations this time, we hope you will consider staying with us on your next visit to the area so we can better deliver the experience you should always expect from us.  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: The hotel has great facilities for a convention. Additionally the staff from reception to food services to the maids were friendly, worked hard to satisfy.    All meals served were excellent plus an evening reception featured an almost endless supply of great appetizers to include new potatoes topped with caviar.   Our room was okay, dated with a small bathroom. However, even number rooms above the 10th floor have a wonderful view of the evening fireworks at Disneyland.   The hotel is a 5 minute shuttle from Disneyland. Lot of families stay here, warms your heart to see all the little kids with their Mickey gear filled with amazement as you walk through the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Nineunder,  Thanks so much for the terrific review. We are pleased everything went great for you during your visit and that our wonderful location made it even better. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to your next stay!  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Always a stay when going to NAMM
Summary: They have flipped the rooms recently & they are very clean & added more restaurants which is Great! We had a balcony room facing the Hilton. It was nice to be able to listen to all the music from the stages down below. Valet to the front desk were very efficient. Valet is a bit pricey but what hotel isn't now days. Love how close it is to the Convention Center, so convenient
Manager Response: Dear VegasNative1966,  Thank you for evaluating your stay.  Nothing is more important than your satisfaction, so we are delighted to know how happy you were with room and balcony. We appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back soon for another enjoyable stay.  Sincerely, Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: The Marriott in Anaheim convention center overbooked our reservation and when we arrived at 1 am they did not have a room for us. the staff at reception desk was rude and unsympathetic and sent us to a lesser quality hotel .   the rooms are small, the mattresses old and lumpy.
Manager Response: Dear delaparrara,  We're sorry there was a problem with your reservation and that the room you requested was unavailable. We know no amount of apologies will make up for the inconvenience, but we truly are sorry. Thank you for your feedback which is greatly appreciated.  Sincerely,  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott July 5-9 in room 510 (not a good view). We purchased the Disneyland package, which included a $100 gift card and parking for each day we stayed there -- this is a fantastic value (self-parking is $25 a day).   There's a shuttle outside the hotel that comes about every 20 minutes and takes you to Disneyland. The hotel is close enough to the park that you can come back to the hotel for a rest and to beat the heat - which is what we did.   We were very disappointed in the pool. It is VERY small, there are not near enough chaise lounges, and it only goes to about 4 1/2 feet deep. The hotel is huge. There are 2 towers and it must hold hundreds of guests. Imaging the majority of these guests coming back from a hot day at Disney and all heading to the
Manager Response: Dear redheadmom0216, Thank you for being our guest and for taking time to leave feedback. We are so glad that you were able to take advantage of the Disneyland package, and that we made it convenient to get to the park! However, we were disappointed to see that you were unhappy with our pool. We can see how at times of high occupancy, the pool could get a tad crowded. Even though there are certain times of the day when these areas are in heavy use, we always have staff available to tidy up as needed. You can always request that your room be serviced earlier in the day, and we try our best to accommodate all requests! Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope you will choose us again on your next visit to our area.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Having stayed at Marriotts in the past, I wasn't expecting much of our stay at the Anaheim Marriott but after parking and making our way towards the lobby, I was in awe of how nice the facilities were. It was definitely not the dinky and old-fashioned hotel I had in mind. It was very sleek and modern in a way that felt very cool. We came in to check in fairly late in the evening but there were people hanging out in the hotel lobby bar area and it had that dimmed, mysterious feel and look.  The room itself was very nice, bathroom was clean and bright - though in one room, the sink was slightly sectioned off from the toilet and shower/bathtub.  In the morning, we explored what the lobby had to offer - there was a restaurant offering full breakfast but we wanted something simpler
Manager Response: Dear imskimmy,  We are delighted you had an excellent stay at Anaheim Marriott! Thank you for the fantastic review! We especially appreciate your awesome comments about our facilities. We enjoyed having you as our guest and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Very nice club level lounge. Good selection of breakfast food and had a separate gluten free carb area. Staff was friendly and lobby is pretty. Our room was run down and the bathroom was dirty. I would not be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Kimyankee,  Thank you so much posting a review of your stay. It's nice to read that we met most of your expectations. However, we do apologize for the problems with your room. We have shared your comments with our housekeeping staff, and we will be more diligent in our efforts. We appreciate your valuable feedback and hope to have you stay with us again.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: It is very hard to describe in words how amazing this property is just on the guest service alone. We we made the reservation with a gentleman named Ryan that works at the front desk he was not only accommodating to a circumstance that we were having he was understanding super professional friendly and resolve the issue in more than a timely manner and when we checked in he found us personally to make sure that everything was alright absolutely incredible gentleman the Bellman was absolutely phenomenal and was on point in gave us great advice!! Annette was the lady that checked us into the room she was super accommodating that we wanted to stay an extra day and made sure it happened and even got a little plushie Goofy for my little girl she was super sweet and kind to my family
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We appreciate your review very much. It is very good to read these excellent comments about our staff. I will make sure they know how happy you are! We look forward to seeing you again next time you visit Disneyland!  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Nice hotel located very close to the Convention Center and a short walk to the Disneyland Resort. The only negative aspect of this was the fact that I had to wait over 3 and a half hours to receive my room card. Rooms should be ready at 4, that is the policy of this hotel and clearly, they did not follow this. This was unacceptable. Other than that, the hotel was beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear beno318, Thank you for being our guest and for leaving feedback. We are so glad that you were pleased with the location of our property. All rooms should be ready at the posted check in time of 4:00. At times of high occupancy slight delays can occur. However the situation you described does not meet our standards, and we will use this to improve our service levels. We are so sorry for the inconvenience, and we hope you will give us another chance to make a more favorable impression in the future.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: Took grandkids to Disneyland and this place is very central. Shuttle or15 min walk. Cost on shuttle cheaper for multi days. Great pool. Kids eat free if adults eat at least an entree so breakfast works out cheap. Staff exceptionally helpful and friendly. Lots of eating places within walking distance. Very happy with Marriott as always.
Manager Response: Dear GieS418, thanks for including the Anaheim Marriott in your travel plans. We are thrilled that you enjoyed kid-friendly features we offer. Our team works hard to provide your entire family with a memorable stay, so we're glad that we accomplished this during your visit. Thanks for your kind comments and we look forward to having you visit again.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Not for old folks wanting peace and quiet!
Summary: My wife attended a higher ed conference and I accompanied her.  Nice place, attentive staff but, it is close to Disneyland so lots of families and this was also Vidcon, across the street.  Sort of noisy though at 10 PM it was quiet, and the Disney fireworks ended.  The mix of serious conference attendees, families visiting Disney and Vidcon were a bit much but all in all, it was fine.  Security was in evidence as well, due to the event.  If you want peace and quiet, this is not the place.  If you want convenience when visiting Disneyland but want an upscale hotel with a real restaurant and bar, this is a good choice.  I brought my service dog along and they put us in the first floor, which was helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Timothy, thank you for reviewing your stay! We’re grateful to know how much you enjoyed our location and our friendly team, but sorry you were disturbed by noise from other guests of the hotel and outside noise. We wish we had the opportunity to address the issue while you were here as we would have done our best to ensure you were comfortable. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will come back to see us soon.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: I have mixed feelings about this hotel but it is overall better than the Hilton Anaheim. This hotel does not have free wifi, there is a daily fee unless you are a rewards member. So if you plan to stay here, look into it. The service was really good, I asked for several things brought to the room and they took care of it. Unlike the Hilton, their gym is completely free to use everyday which is a major plus. It costs $14 daily at the Hilton. The pool is nice as well. If you have a third person, it is and extra $20/night so keep that in mind. The location is great for Disneyland (there is a shuttle available 5.50/person for the whole day), as well as the Anaheim convention center. It has a starbucks and a pizza hut inside, and there is an IHOP within walking distance. The room was
Manager Response: Dear Shaylajacquelyn, thank you for being our guest. We enjoyed reading your review and learning about the highlights of your stay, but also areas where we can improve. We appreciate your comments about our location and the many amenities we offer. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope to see you again soon on your next visit.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, Convenient Hotel Minutes From Disney!
Summary: Came into town for the Yankees vs Angels game with my wife and son.  Check in was smooth and easy.  Front desk staff were all courteous and helpful.  Lobby area was roomy with a large bar/restaurant area.  Parking was easy, however, it is a long walk from the parking garage to the elevators to get to your room.  Doesn't really make sense why you would have to walk through the meeting rooms/banquet rooms to get to the elevator/lobby area.  Anyway, there is a Pizza Hut and a Starbucks in the lobby area and there is a convenient shuttle available for all who wish to hop on to get to Disneyland and California Adventure.  For us, it was perfectly convenient because it was only 5-10 minutes away from Angel Stadium.  Be aware that you have to navigate through a round-a-bout if you are
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for writing a review of your recent visit. We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay and your comments were wonderful to read. We look forward to sharing your compliments with our team. Please come back and visit us soon! Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Don't let the lobby fool you!
Summary: Our stay at  Anaheim Marriott Suites, was a true disappointment! We have stayed at neighboring hotels in that area in the past few years, and decided to give the Anaheim Marriott Suites a try based on other Marriott hotels that we have stayed at. I wish we would have stayed elsewhere. The hotel staff were pleasant to deal with, and accommodating to our needs during our stay. Our complaint is the hotel building and rooms itself. The lobby is were any cleanliness ends with this property. Our room was on the eighth floor of this hotel. The carpeting in the elevator, and hallway areas should have been a warning to us. It looks like used, second hand carpeting from a 1980's Las Vegas casino. It also looked like it hasn't been properly cleaned in years. The windows on our floor were
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We appreciate your loyalty to our hotels, and we apologize for not meeting your expectations. Our hotels are known for their attention to detail and great service, and we are sorry we let you down. Your comments will be reviewed with our team to ensure we focus on correcting and preventing such mistakes. We hope you will give us an opportunity in the future to regain your trust. Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Conveniently located to Anaheim Convention Centres and Disneyland/Disney Adventure
Summary: Positives Located within walking distance to: - 5min walk to the convention centre - 15/20min walk to Disney theme parks - 5/20min walk to off site breakfast, lunch and dinner options - laundry facilities onsite for families - clean and very quiet, a good place to sleep off a big day at the theme parks - purchase Disney entry tickets from hotel foyer and get great advice from the sales staff.  Visitor Tips FOOD - in addition to the hotel bar there is a Starbucks onsite and pizza place in the foyer, but a short walk towards Disney gives many other choices.  - we bought sandwhich making things, kept in the bar fridge DISNEY - you can pay for and use the local ART buses if not keen to walk to/from parks at hotel desk, save and purchase multi day passes - if going to Disney allow
Manager Response: Dear Angelfish_Queensland  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad you enjoyed our convenient location close to a myriad of local attractions and theme parks! This is certainly one of the major perks our hotel offers to guests. However, we regret that the room you requested was unavailable and are terribly sorry for the frustration this undoubtedly caused. At times, we have guests stay over unexpectedly and it does cause an impact to our arriving guests.  We want your stay to be a positive and enjoyable experience, and we will address your concerns with our team to ensure we are consistently upholding the service standards we hold ourselves to on a daily basis. Thank you again, and we hope you will consider a return visit so we can have the opportunity to make it up to you.   Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary Heading: Service going downhill since only a year ago!
Summary: I recently stayed for 3nights at the Anaheim Marriott, returning because I had a wonderful experience during my stay with my family a year ago. Despite prices increasing, I believed that it was worth returning. How disappointing it is to now regret coming back. When my family and I arrived, we noticed the hotel was extremely busy with a number of conferences/tournaments happening. I had made the reservation 3 months in advance directly on the Marriott site with specific requests which included being in the same room. While I can appreciate best efforts made to accommodate this request, it didn't seem too difficult to relocate me to another room after I asked for a change when I checked in at front desk. Things were fine until the second day when my family and I returned to the
Manager Response: Dear KiwiWinn, thank you for posting a review of your recent stay. We're disappointed that we did not provide you a better experience and sincerely apologize for the difficulties that negatively influenced your otherwise great impression of our hotel. What you experienced on this visit is not typical of our hospitality, but regardless, it should not have happened. Please be assured your concerns have been communicated to the appropriate team members and we will work diligently to make sure we are more consistent in our service delivery. We hope you will consider a return visit as we would welcome the opportunity to restore your confidence in our hotel.  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed here on our Disneyland trip.  This is a late reveiw and am writing because the great memory of our stay is still with me.  We arrived early before check in time.  Tired, and just wanting to shower after a long trip.  We were given keys to our room right away by Mark Fujiwara at the front desk.  Talk about grateful.  Our room was just lovely.  Clean and comfortable.  Also Not being familiar with logistics and hotels, we got pretty lucky as there is a bus that comes by on the 1/2 hour which took us to Disneyland and anywhere near on the bus route.  We chose a great place to stay for our Disneyland vacation.  We ecountered Mark a few more times and his generous hospitality made us feel very well taken care of.  Thank you so much.
Manager Response: Dear Cheyenne Bal S  Thank you for the wonderful review! I am delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and that you had such a good experience. Thank you for the kind words about our staff member Mark. I will pass along your comments to him. I am also glad that you liked your room and the convenient bus to Disneyland. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to see you again soon!  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: For the price and location the Anaheim Marriott was a great choice. Easy walking distance to DisneyLand and California Adventure or the bus stops directly in front of the hotel if you plan to take the bus to/from the parks. There are lots of restaurants in walking distance to the hotel or they offer a restaurant and room service.    The lobby has definitely been updated, the rooms have not. They need some serious attention. Our balcony door was a workout trying to get it open, the bathrooms are small, carpet and decor is old, but all that said the rooms are not 'bad'. The rooms could just use some updating. They were clean and well serviced. Service was great from housekeeping and guest services. If anything a little slow but we were visiting on Memorial Day weekend when the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this kind review and thoughtful feedback! We're happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and hope we have the chance to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: Stayed at the Marriott for three nights midweek recently and it was great.From the moment I entered  the lobby - a large well designed space to when I departed I had a wonderful expereince. All the staff would greet me and ask if I was requiring anything thruout the day -truly well trained staff who show they care about their guests experience during their stay. I enjoyed a wonderful meal at the infuse restaurant my first evening as well as many of the options at the bar and resturant by the pool .The gym was clean with current fitness machinery, fresh towels and even fruit for a post workout snack. My room was comfortable and had all the amenities I required. This was a very busy Hotel- during my stay there was  a large convention , many sport teams as well as families on
Manager Response: We're thrilled to read your 5-star review! Thank you very much for sharing your wonderful experience here. We are happy to know that our team went above and beyond in the service they provided you, and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Upscale hotel close to the park. Went for business trip and stayed a couple extra days for Disneyland. Great facilities for our convention, good food provided for the convention. Starbucks and deli were good. Didn't try the restaurant, can't comment. Many local and chain food options nearby. Pool gets crowded with kids (surprised face) pick and choose your times if  you want the pool or spa without them. Most places, Disneyland included are a decent walk, not short, or the ART bus frequents in from of the hotel every 20 minutes for $5 per person per day. If you are renting a car you have to pay $30? per day to park it on the property. Keep that in mind as it can quickly double your rental car costs, it may be better to do a rental on site for a day or two if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent review with us! We're so thrilled that you loved our convenient location and excellent meeting facilities. We greatly appreciate all of your feedback and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott on a trip that was part vacation/part convention. The staff were very courteous from the beginning and were able to provide us with the same room continually throughout our split stay reservations (one half personal, other half booked through the group). We utilized the desk for Disneyland tickets, and walked across the street to the kiosk in front of the Hilton to purchase multi day ART passes. This hotel was great for convenience to Disney.  Room was small and a little weary. Beds were doubles, not queens, which makes for a right squeeze for two adults. Bathroom was tiny. Over the full week stay, never did I get the complimentary bottles of water in my room that I've come to expect with my elite status, which was a disappointment.  Our room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. While we're pleased to have hosted you and to hear that our team was courteous and helpful, we're disappointed to hear that your room and amenities did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback as it allows us the opportunity to learn and grow for the future. Should you return to Anaheim, we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star stay that you deserve.

Summary: Lots of personal attention from check in to the restaurant to Starbucks. They make everything easy and quick.  The hotel is modern and the room comfortable. It was the one time I wished that hotels weren't doing away with minibars though as I got back to the room hungry but not willing to get room service. I liked that it was so close to the convention center, the Hilton where associates were staying and also we walked to downtown Disney for dinner one night. The concierge was able to get us a last minute table at the Jazz Kitchen. Other reviews mentioned it seeming tired, but I didn't see that at all. In fact their elevators are so modern it takes a minute to figure them out!
Manager Response: Dear sparkysimi, Thank you for being our guest and for the 5 star review. Our goal is to make our guests feel special and comfortable. Its wonderful to know we are succeeding in both. Our location is pretty amazing and we are so happy we met your travel and visiting needs. We look forward to your next trip to the area and hope its sooner than later!  Darren Munoz Resident Manager

Summary: The hotel staff are excellent. Always helpful and the service level is top-notch. There are plenty of restaurants close by and Disney is just down the road. For the shoppers there are plenty of shops at the Outlets at Orange a short distance away. If you are travelling from LAX you should allow up to 1½ hours transportation time depending on traffic.
Manager Response: We always love hearing from our guests and this is no exception. Thank you for your wonderful feedback regarding our staff and location. We're so glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: Room was clean and bed was very comfortable.  It was right next to the convention center making it easy to get to the show and convenient to get back, freshen up and go to the evening activities.  Hotel bar was a great layout for all the convention groups to meet and socialize.  Only strange thing is the toilet paper rolls are basically hidden below the vanity?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! It's wonderful to hear that you loved our property for easy convention center access. We're also thrilled that you found our guest rooms comfortable and our property well laid out. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I stayed here for my last trip to Disneyland.  The room was clean and bed comfortable. The Anaheim Resort Transit stop was located conveniently nearby when heading to the parks.  The breakfast in the concierge lounge was good.  i would consider this hotel for future visits to the House of the Mouse.
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5-star review, Joann! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: You will be surprised how clean and modern this hotel is.  Not to mention the great service from all staff in the hotel...from the valet guy to the maids.  Highly recommended especially because it is near to many awesome attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for this amazing review, Victoria! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, including our service and our great location. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: When you arrive at the hotel it looks good, nice reception and a busy bar area, all good. But the rooms are in need of a makeover, it all feels a bit tired, and really not up to 2017 standard. A big gym is a plus, and so is location for those wanting to go to Disney or the nearby convention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting this review, Casper. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, including our gym and our great location. We appreciate your feedback as well and we hope to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary: We chose to stay at this hotel because of its proximity to Disneyland which was a 15 minute walk away (or 5 minutes on a shuttle bus).  The hotel was clean and the staff were friendly and professional.  Our room was fine regarding space, and the room was cleaned well each day.  We ate breakfast at the hotel one morning - a little pricey but the food was great.  A Starbucks store is situated within the hotel (near a conference centre).  Breakfast was available at this store.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, including our great location, service and your dining experience. We hope to welcome you back again on your next visit!

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott for a Convention we were attending. As the hotel was right next to the Convention the location was FANTASTIC! The hotel was clean and the service was very good. The only real issue I had was that altough we booked a King we were given a room with two queen beds. The room decor was nothing spectacular but comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review! We're very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our hotel clean and our service top-notch. We're sorry to hear there were no king rooms available at your time of check-in and we certainly hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Rooms a bit tired, housekeeping issue
Summary: Foyer is nice and staff work hard in bar.  The rooms need updating as a little tired now.  My main complaint was that in the first day my "green choice" was ignored.  I complained and then my room was not cleaned for the rest of the stay, despite messages in their app to this effect.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review. We're happy to see that you enjoyed your experience at the bar and that our staff provided top notch service. We apologize for your experience with housekeeping, and we greatly appreciate this feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the future for a 5-star experience.

Summary Heading: Lounge food...wait to hit the road
Summary: Hotel is still new looking, nice lobby and the ever so awesome elevators.  Why is the concierge  lounge not open 24/7?  Crazy to not have access to computers and water.  Lounge food quality seems to have gone downhill.  Wait to hit the road. Last several  times had massive bowel blowout after breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all of your valuable feedback, both positive and constructive. We're sorry that your experience didn't exceed your expectations and we hope to have the chance to improve upon your stay in the future.

Summary: We had a wedding reception at the Marriott Anaheim two weeks ago. The location is perfect as it is in the center of the main area around Disneyland. The wedding planning team was very helpful and provides excellent services... special shoutout to Mollie, our event manager.  The food is delicious.  We definitely commend this hotel and will host other event there in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and congratulations! We're thrilled we could be a part of the special day and appreciate your kind words about Mollie. We look forward to hosting with you again soon.

Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel and will definitely remember them in the future. We loved them and were impressed. We booked through Marriott directly and they have a Disney package deal. This was a last minute trip to Disneyland over Memorial Day weekend and I was impressed they still had this package available. The package included the room and a $100 gift card for Disney per night, along with self parking and shuttle tickets for 2 adults and 2 kids. We stayed 3 nights and got 3 $100 gift cards for each room.     One of the only mistakes made during the trip was the gift cards that came with the package. Only one set of gift cards was ready when we checked in and there should have been two sets since we booked two rooms. The person checking us in at night noticed this
Manager Response: Thank you for such an amazing review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience special. We're sorry for the mix up with your gift cards and parking charges, but we're happy to know that our team was able to get this fixed right away. We'll be sure to pass these kind words on to our front desk team as well as our bell staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again on your next visit!

Summary: I have had the good fortune of traveling to yet another hotel staffing Mr. Pedraza (formerly with the Costa Mesa Marriott). He has a sixth sense of sorts when it comes to customer service and is a natural for the hospitality profession. The hotel has a spacious, comfortable bar and the pool is a half-enclosed variety that is particularly popular with families. Self parking a longer trek to the hotel lobby than normal so recommend valet parking for those concerned. Great gift shop and best elevators around---no up or down choices (that's correct); just punch in your floor and board the elevator. Waiting time is minimized. Very high marks for this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review, Mark. We're so glad you enjoyed a positive stay and that our property's conveniences could make it even better. We appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Great view in high floor. The room was clean and comfort.  Near Disney just 15 minutes on foot. Front desk was nice! A pizza Hut and Starbucks in the lobby. We recommend ! The bad thing was the self parking 26 dollars per night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. While we do keep our pricing in line with other hotels in the area, we appreciate your feedback. We're so glad you enjoyed our cozy accommodations and convenient property features. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: We have the absolute best stays here!  The staff are always so helpful and friendly.  This stay they were particularly amazing!  Starting with Valet services & Bell to check in as well as Room service. My only regret is we didn't get names so we could let management know how great those who assisted us were!  This is a quiet hotel even when two bus loads of teens are staying.  The rooms are spacious enough and clean.  The elevators are great we have lived these since our first stay! It's a silly thing but so nice when it's a busy weekend no huddling for an open elevator punch your floor and it directs you to the elevator for you!   The new to go eat in or bites are fabulous absolutely love the packaging!  We stay often for events in the area and this will be fabulous for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your experience with us! We're delighted to hear that our team has gone above and beyond to exceed your expectations and that that you truly enjoyed your overall stay. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another 5-star visit in the very near future.

Summary: The hotel lived up to their reputation.  Nice and clean. Pool was nice, and clean. A great time for the family, close to Disneyland.. the shuttle was convenient.  Staff was helpful with requests..i really have nothing more to say.. very good hotel to stay at
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review! We're pleased to hear you enjoyed our conveneint location and our staff. We hope you'll return in the near future for another brilliant experience.

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for 4-days and was pleased with the hotel staff, the cleanliness and comfort of my room.  I wasn't sure to expect as it is an older property, but they have had a relatively recent renovation in 2014.  The room was perfect for working and relaxing, new flat screen TV with a good choice of stations and hotel information.  The room service was good and the meals that I had throughout the stay during meetings was well prepared.  I do not have one complaint, just a positive Marriott experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed our staff and servcice. We hope you'll join us again soon for another brilliant stay!

Summary: This is an amazing Hotel. The beds are super comfortable and the rooms are spacious and clean. The staff is friendly and helpful particularly those in the Concierge Lounge. One of my favorite parts of the hotel was the elevators. I know that sounds funny but I never had to wait for an elevator. Instead of pressing the floors once you arrived inside the elevator there were keypads outside and you simply selected your floor and it directed you to the elevator that you wanted that's making for a very efficient system. Meeting rooms were excellent
Manager Response: Thank you for such an amazing 5-star review! We're so happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and we're glad you enjoyed our concierge lounge, meeting rooms and elevators as well. We hope to welcome you back again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great customer service and great location
Summary: Check-in was easy, valet was helpful every single time, and rooms were pretty decent.  They provide pack and plays for families with very young children, so that was also really beneficial.  Our view of the roof was pretty dissatisfying, but we also got a really great rate on the room.  The hotel is walking distance to restaurants and theme parks.  There's a Starbucks right in the hotel which was an added benefit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you and your family have enjoyed your stay overall, and we truly look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent visit in the near future.

Summary: The hotel was built in 1981 and rooms were renovated in 2014.  The lobby is very nice, a first class Marriott with full service, valet and bellmen.  There is a full service Starbucks with food in the lobby which can get very crowded and a nice bistro next to it with good breakfast foods/sandwiches.  We stayed on the 16th floor with balcony.  The room is your typical Marriott size, very small bathroom and okay sized room with a 42” TV.  The room has a refrigerator and coffee maker.  The beds were fairly comfortable and carpet looked clean. Room was nicely decorated and looked modern.  This Marriott has the newer elevator system where you enter the floor number at a panel outside and it tells you which elevator to wait for.  Love that system as your wait times are much shorter and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share both your positive and constructive feedback with us, Travis. We're glad you enjoyed our property features such as the on-site Starbucks and our convenient elevator, and are happy to hear you enjoyed our modern and refreshed look. We're disappointed that your breakfast in the concierge lounge did not meet expectations and that you experienced delays at our valet, but appreciate your feedback and will review your comments with our team. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you again soon and not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Near Disney but little else to offer
Summary: We stayed here recently.  Hubby was at a conference so I needed things to do as I was not at the conference.  If you aren't interested in Disney, everything else is a bus ride away.  Even the nearby restaurants were all chains vs having any local spots.  The hotel itself did not have a spa (mani-pedi) but I could at least go across the driveway to the Hilton where they did have this offering.    Food was ok.  Ate in the bar area, the pool and in the bistro type cafe (for breakfast).  Front desk persons were helpful.  We were initially put in a 1st floor room with slider that opened to the parking lot whose door lock did not even work -- the only way it "locked" was to use the bar that kept the door closed.  Awful dark room.  Next morning we asked at the front desk to be moved.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us, as it gives us the opportunity to learn and improve. We're disappointed to hear that you did not exprience that kind of 5-star stay that we aim to provide for our wonderful guests, and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the flawless visit that you deserve.

Summary Heading: Megan made this visit SO special!
Summary: Last weekend we stayed at the Marriott in Anaheim. As Annual Pass-holders at Disneyland and Disney's California Adventure, we travel to Anaheim multiple times a year to stay at the hotel and visit the parks for a day or two. We always have a great time and we love staying at the Marriott.  We've been doing this on and off for years, and have traveled from around the USA to make our visits. We usually spend birthdays, and celebrate other special occasions, at the parks and at the hotel; this weekend was no different.  Every. Single. Time -- the staff makes us feel welcomed, at home, and special. Many of the people, we see time and again on our visits. I think it speaks well for the hotel that there are so many people on staff there whom we recognize and who recognize us.   I want
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughtful review with us. We are so appreciative of your loyalty and are grateful to be your hotel of choice when in Anaheim. We pride ourselves on the world-class service we provide our guests and are thrilled to hear that Megan and Bridgette delivered on this for you to help you celebrate the special occasion. We look forward to making many more memories and welcoming you again soon!

Summary: Great Hotel .....close to convention center...wonderful breakfast buffet. ...exellent staff...conveniently located to good restaurants........ shuttle transportation to and from Disney Land and Knotts Berry Farm.....
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review, Dennis. We're so glad you enjoyed our delicious breakfast buffet, prime location and friendly staff. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Easy walking distance to DisneyLand, Downtown Disney and California Adventure Park.  Starbucks and Market Place onsite for convenient breakfast before day in the parks.  Rooms are a little dated, but beds are new and comfortable.  I didn't use the pool, but it looked nice.  If I was going back to DisneyLand I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this 4-star review, Christine! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us as well as our great location. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary: We came to this Marriott to go watch a baseball game at the Angel's stadium. It was pretty close, maybe 10 or 15 minutes at most from the stadium. The front desk agent that checked us in was awesome! I believe his name was Sage! He went above and beyond getting us a king bed and also taking care of the parking.  The fellas at the nfuse bar Ricardo and Luis were also very nice! The service definitely made the difference in the stay. The only lame part about this Marriott is that they make you pay $20 for a late check-out at 2pm. Other than that, it was good!
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review! We're so glad you joined us and that our team could provide you with exceptional service throughout your stay. We also appreciate your feedback about our late check-out fee and hope to welcome you again soon for another wonderful visit.

Summary: Pros: location is walking distance for Disney and eateries. We were 5 people in one room and it was spacious enough. Clean room and bathrooms were nice as well. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Its is very economical if u are a bog family and don't want to pay for 2 rooms.  Cons: have to pay for every thing additional such as parking, roller bed, wifi, whereas these things are free in a lot of other hotels around eg Ramada
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share both your positive and constructive feedback, Radhika. We're glad you enjoyed our spacious accommodations and prime location We do try to keep our parking costs in line with other hotels in the area but we appreciate your feedback. You may be happy to hear for your next visit that we do offer complimentary in-room wi-fi to Marriott Rewards members who book directly. Complimentary wi-fi can also be enjoyed in our public areas, such as our lobby. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Solid Marriott stay even though the hotel is older.  Nice bar area and lobby is large and has many seating areas. Active concierge desk helps with local attractions. Walkable to Disney parks without being right in the midst of the crowds.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We're so glad you enjoyed our property and that our concierge could provide you with great local recommendtions. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: I stayed here while attending a conference at the Convention Center which was a short block walk to get there. Also, a short walk to restaurants and convenient store.  The local transportation picks up right in front of the hotel and is amazing.Very close to Disneyland. The hotel staff was professional, gracious, and helpful. The decor was contemporary but had a warm feel to it. Each room has a balcony with chairs plus a small fridge and coffee maker.  If you are a Marriott Rewards member, your internet is free. Nice swimming pool, bar/lounge, and restaurant.
Manager Response: We're so happy to read this review, Carol. We're glad you enjoyed our prime location, updated feel, and property features. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: I give this a 2.5 star rating, particularly keeping in mind what other Marriott properties I have experienced are like.     The Anaheim Marriott is overall a very nicely decorated and modern property.  It definitely has some wow factor when you walk into the lobby.  I've stayed at a lot of Marriott properties over the years, so I had a good feeling about this.  My husband and I stayed one night this past weekend to go to Disneyland. We had requested a king bed, but when we got upstairs there were two double beds.  Thinking that maybe there was a mistake, I called downstairs and asked kindly if there were any king beds left, and the woman I spoke to was terse in her response and rude in her tone, simply saying "no. we are out."    I want to be clear here- I was not upset that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. While we're pleased to have hosted you and to hear that you enjoyed our decor, we're disappointed to hear that your room and customer service experience did not meet your expectations. Should you return to Anaheim, we hope to have another opportunity to provide you with the 5-star experience that you deserve.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland. There is a shuttle stop right outside the hotel that drops you off at Disneyland and many other area locations. The price of the shuttle is $5.50 round trip, so it definitely is much more convenient than dealing with parking at Disneyland. However, the downside is that parking at the hotel is expensive. Hotel is also very close to the convention center as well. Hotel is huge and well appointed. There's a Starbucks and a Pizza Hut in the hotel. Beds are very comfortable!
Manager Response: Thank you for this fantastic review, Lisa! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of our great location and amenities. We appreciate your feedback regarding parking as well, and we hope to welcome you back again in the future!

Summary: A large, efficiently run Convention center with a hotel attached. That's my abiding impression of this well-oiled, professionally operated hotel which does what it says on the can. In a city which I find nondescript and dominated by the Disney empire machine (I confess to a deep prejudice having grown up near there), it is a place to work, meet and chat. Little more. The surrounding area is sanitized American bland, with branded stores and chains and the ubiquitous Mouse with black Disney buses transferring "cast members" back and forth to work. The hotel is functional, with everything working as it should. Rooms had nice small balconies. Only one restaurant which was pricy and didn't vary the menu. Pool is smallish and very publicly located in the centre of the accommodation
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this 4-star review! I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your feedback as well. I look forward to welcoming you on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel Stay I've Had in Years
Summary: Stellar customer service. There was a problem with my black out curtains leaking light into the room that woke me in the morning. I asked a gentleman at the front desk for help, and he sent someone to my room to tape the curtains to the wall so the light was minimized. All my meals were excellent, which is unusual (in my experience) for hotel food. My dietary needs of no gluten and no dairy were met with a smile. When my order of berries was inadvertently cleared from my table before I ate them, they were replaced graciously. Bell staff was very helpful in orienting me to my room. A superior stay in every way!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're delighted to hear that our team exceeded your expectations and that you truly enjoyed your dining experience. We truly look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you back for another 5-star stay.

Summary: Checked in to this Marriott to visit my daughter who just moved recently to the area, and to celebrate my birthday as well... Great hotel, specially the lobby, and convenient location... close to everything the area has to offer. I definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us! We're so glad you loved our hotel and our location. We hope it was a birthday to remember and we'd love to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Exactly what we needed for Disneyland weekend
