Summary: I stayed here with my wife and 2 young daughters this past Saturday night.  We booked the room through Priceline and got a great deal and were very happy with the location as we were headed to Disneyland on both Sat and Sun and wanted to stay nearby.  With check-in time listed at 4pm I called ahead and asked if we could park there in the morning and leave our belongings while we headed to Disneyland.  They said that wouldn't be a problem and to check with the front desk to see if our room was available, which it was when we got there at 9:30am.  This worked out perfectly as we unloaded everything in the room and were able to head out quickly.  Our room had 2 double beds and enough space for the hotel-provided pack-n-play crib.  My daughter loved the huge 55 inch TV that let us
Manager Response: We loved hearing that you were so pleasantly surprised by your stay with us! From our accommodations to our location, it sounds like you truly loved it all. We always love hearing from our guests and this is no exception. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel right near the parks!!
Summary: We stayed at the Marriott last month for 5 nights and really enjoyed our stay. Facilities are clean and the staff is excellent! I was given a corner room that had a small balcony. It was beautiful and I loved spending time out there. Housekeeping was very clean and prompt! Starbucks located in the hotel was very convenient. Also, room service was great too!   Best thing about this hotel is that if you don't mind walking, you can easily access Disney Land and California adventure. It takes about a 15 minute walk, but overall it is so easy! There are other restaurants up and down near the convention center as well if you get tired of room service.   Overall, fantastic experience. I highly recommend and really enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay! We're thrilled that you loved our staff, guest rooms and location. We truly loved hearing about your experience and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: I absolutely love this hotel!  I love the Oasis Tower and my favorite room has a corner balcony.  Fitness center is fantastic!  Plenty of equipment to keep my routine going.  Elite members get great care.    I use it for business but I would recommend staying here for pleasure as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're so happy to hear you've enjoyed your experiences with us and appreciate your recommendation. We look forward to many more five-star stays!

Summary: I stayed at this location while attending a conference last month.  The room was clean, updated and  comfortable with a great view of the Disney fireworks from the balcony. The front desk staff was extremely accommodating and friendly both while checking in and checking out. The room wasn't ready upon our very early arrival but within a short time my phone rang to tell me it was ready for us.  After a long day we decided to try the new dine in/carry out service for dinner.  The menu was reasonably priced but to save a couple of dollars I opted to pick the food up. I did not realize until I got back up to my room that no silverware or condiments were included in the take away bag.  It was a small oversight but an annoyance none the same.  However the food was very good and I
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful review with us, Christine. We're so glad you enjoyed your dining experience with us despite the oversight with the silverware and we appreciate your feedback about our Concierge Lounge staff. We disappointed to hear that you did not find the team friendly as hospitality and service are our priorities. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you again for a truly seamless stay.

Summary: Stayed here for Disneyland. We booked a family suite which was great for 6 people.  The place is great, breakfast wonderful and the kids enjoyed the pool outside.  The proximity to Disneyland is also very close.
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5-star review, Trisha! We're glad you and your family had a wonderful visit and we hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Second Time and another great stay
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for the second time in March 2017 while attending a conference.    My trip did not start so well as my bag did not make my plane.  The airline told me that they would deliver it to my hotel by Uber at midnight, I spoke with the hotel staff about this (I was worried how this worked), and they were very helpful in my options and assisted me by getting my back when it did finally arrive.  This was great start to my hotel experience and reminded me of the good customer service I had received in my previous trip.  Biggest change to the hotel is the new room service menu.  I’ve stayed at other Marriott’s and ordered room service and we were treated to the great service where they set up a lovely eating area and serve your food on glass plates, glass cups and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel again! It's wonderful to hear what keeps you coming back from our service to our location. We greatly appreciate all of your valuable feedback and we're glad that your stay only got better after the trouble with your bag! We hope to welcome you back for a third stay very soon.

Summary: We did 2 days at Disneyland and decided to spend the night at the Anaheim Marriott. It was a good choice because the hotel is just minutes away by car from Disneyland. Service was fantastic - car valet, bellman, front desk staff and housekeeping were all very friendly and helpful. The room was sufficient to accommodate our party, with good beds and an ample bathroom. And the rate was really affordable. We were staying at a cousin's place about an hour west of Anaheim, and it was a really good idea to stay at a hotel instead of doing the night and morning back commute. I would definitely recommend this hotel, and not just for those going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your Disneyland getaway! We're so glad you loved our location, service and guest rooms. It's wonderful to hear how pleased you were with your experience. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott last week as part of a school trip with an event at the Convention Center. The hotel was completely full of very busy teenagers and the staff was excellent! They were patient, friendly, and helpful. The rooms were a nice size, very clean and just what we needed after our long days. I never made it to the pool, but others in the group who did said it was very nice.  If you want a room with a view, avoid the odd rooms between 301 and 319. We had a view of the roof and woke the first morning to men walking around right outside our open window. Not a big deal but not quite what we were expecting.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review, Suzanne! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay and that you found our staff friendly and accommodating. We appreciate your feedback regarding the view as well and hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again on your next visit.

Summary: Had a work trip and took some customers to Disneyland for the day (VIP tour), since this was a work trip, I picked a Marriott chain, the breakfast lounge was great with all the basics.  took the ART to Disney and that was fine.. the room was nice and clean and I even had a view from my room for the nightly fireworks. the only thing that bothered me was there were there little fruit flies in my room, I must have killed about 4 or 5 of them.  other than that, great option to be close to the park and not break bank.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful 4-star review! We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of our great location and views. We're sorry about your experience with the flies and we will pass this along to management right away. We hope to welcome you back again on your next visit.

Summary: Enjoyed our room with balcony view of the Disneyland Fireworks.  Clean and spacious.  The staff was friendly from the housekeeping staff to the front desk, doormen and concierge.  The location is fabulous for the convention center and Disneyland and wherever else you want to go in Anaheim.  Hertz was conveniently located here for our one-day side trip to the beach. Restaurant was very good too!  The fitness center and pool were a plus for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review. We're thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location and the fireworks. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay Great Staff Very Friendly!
Summary: This is a great Marriott to stay, Please choose this hotel over the others in the area because you will not regret it! I stayed over a week here and every time the staff was friendly accommodating and always did their very best to meet our needs!  You will not be disappointed
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredibly generous review! It was a pleasure hosting you for a week in Anaheim. We always love hearing when our staff makes an impression on our guests for their friendly service. Thank you and come see us again soon!

Summary: A nice stay recently at the Anaheim Marriott.  We stayed 5 nights, with 2 rooms.  The rooms were nice, clean, and well kept up.  All the employees were very nice.  We did room service a few times - breakfast was good & big servings.  The late night turkey sandwiches were delicious.  We ate downstairs one evening and the food and service were good.    They do say this is not a noise free hotel - we didn't experience any noise ourselves - but one night after getting back from Disneyland at midnight & then ordering room service - I think we might have disturbed our neighbors (he was pacing the halls when I went for ice & took a photo of me, I'm probably someone's Facebook rant)!  Oops!   The only issue we had was that I booked a package through the airline - it means my reservation
Manager Response: Michelle, we are thrilled to read your wonderful 4-star review. It sounds like you truly enjoyed your visit with us and were able to take full advantage of our location and amenities. We're concerned about your experience at check-in, however, as we strive to provide top-notch to all of our guests. We will pass this feedback on to our team. We thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience here. We hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: I experienced absolutely tremendous service from everyone at the hotel: valet service, check in attendants and everyone else I interacted with. This is the type of service that helped build Marriott into a great brand.  Absolutely Brilliant
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that your experienced tremendous service for our team! We truly look foward to welcoming you back for another five-star stay in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disney, Multi cultural setting.
Summary: Nice , clean rooms , wi-fi , all convenience in one , Starbucks, fitness center, bar,  Next to the convention center and many restaurants close by with variety of food.  Multi cultural setting for all tourist of all nations and cultures, Very diverse.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous 5-star review! We're so happy to hear that you found your room to be clean and comfortable, and that our location was in close proximity to all of your needs throughout your stay. We truly look forward to our next opportunity to host you in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is well located 3 blocks from disney, the restaurants are very good and they close late, so after a disneyland day you can grab a bite. Rooms are spacious,  and the service is excellent. Even though it is an anaheim hotel it is not noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your generous review! From our location to our guest rooms, it sounds like you truly found our hotel to be perfect for your stay. We're also thrilled that you experienced such notable service from our team! Come see us again soon!

Summary Heading: State-of-the-art rooms, beautiful location, very clean
Summary: I was recently at this hotel for a business trip and it is one of the better hotels I've stayed at. I had a beautiful room on one of the highest levels, overlooking Anaheim. The room was just so clean and the stay was overall very comfortable. There is a Starbucks in the hotel and a restaurant and bar. It's a very nice property and I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're so glad you enjoyed your stay in our cozy accommodations and the convenience of our on-site Starbucks and NFuse restaurant. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the hotel primarily because it is next to the convention center where I was attending a conference. The hotel lobby was beautiful and chique. The lobby bar seemed to be hopping all the time, despite the outrageous price for drinks. The fitness center was nicely outfitted and very convenient. The rooms were OK, nothing really special. The Wi-Fi was strong throughout the hotel which was nice. All in all not a bad place.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We're glad you enjoyed the convenience of our fitness center during your visit and appreciate your feedback about our drink pricing. We hope to welcome you again for a seamless stay in Anaheim.

Summary: The lobby is beautiful but that is where it stops. Room was very disappointing in layout. No real closet, so the box that was intended to be used was not large enough to hold the ironing board which had to lean up against the side; not enough hangers for our weeks worth of business clothes!  The room was not cleaned properly ( old toiletries on the bathroom floor,glasses not replaced from prior use). When we called to change rooms we were argued with by the staff!  Not enough space to place luggage any where out of sight and from under foot.  We were booked for a week, but rebooked next door at the Hilton at a much nicer room rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us, Beth. While we're pleased to have hosted you, we're disappointed to hear that you didn't find your room to be clean and that our customer service team was not helpful. Please know that we truly value your feedback and we will forward it to our management team to look into further. We hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star stay that you deserve.

Summary: Amazing view!  Great beds and better.. extremely friendly service.  The 7 year old said "the bed massaged his sore feet" after long days at Disney.  Was definitely a hit with the kiddies.  Slight hiccup with really loud neighbors/music at 1:30 AM one night which hotel security resolved quickly. Would definitely stay again.  Most of the family was across the street at the Hilton and told me they wouldn't stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review! We're thrilled our friendly team could provide you with exceptional service during your stay and that your children enjoyed our cozy accommodations. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Convenient to Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I spent four nights here on a business trip.  My room was spacious, and the king bed was comfortable and featured very nice, soft sheets.  The hotel is located right next to the convention center, so it wasn't necessary to have a car during my stay.  The staff were friendly and efficient - I was please to find that the maid came to tidy up in the morning instead of the afternoon, as is the case with so many hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay with us on business! From our comfortable accommodations to our convenient location, it sounds like our hotel perfectly met your needs. We're very happy to hear that our staff provided such wonderful service as well. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but not 4-star despite all the amenities
Summary: A very large and clean hotel. Rooms were well cleaned and comfortable, if a bit dark.   Wall safe was very small, suitable only for documents and an electronic tablets etc. and was of the key type - rather than the electronic combination locks that are now more usual.   Air-conditioning worked well, was easily controlled, and was reasonably quiet.   In-room service was like ordering a take-away meal in that it came in plastic and cardboard packages - no ceramic plates, glasses or metal cutlery, which was disappointing.   I was there for almost a week. It was mostly quiet for that time, with the notable exception of the first night, when there was a lot of loud music playing somewhere nearby - possibly in one of the neighbouring rooms. I was woken at about midnight be a member of
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. While we're thrilled to hear that you loved our comfortable accommodations and spacious property, we're sorry to hear that not every aspect of your stay was as seamless. We do apologize that you were woken up one night and we appreciate you letting us know. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel good for Business and Pleasure
Summary: I spent a week at this hotel and was part of our Convention Planning Team.  The Hotel was very accommodating to our needs and our attendees loved staying here.  The meeting space was ample and the proximity to Disneyland is perfect!  Not to far, not to close!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay! It's great to hear that our team was so accommodating during your time here and that our meeting space proved to be perfect for you. Thank you for all of your feedback and we hope to see you in Anaheim again soon!

Summary: Yes, the rooms are small but this is great hotel near everything. The service is always exceptional and the front desk gal, Bridget was extremely helpful during our stay. The place is kept clean and the pool are is beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're thrilled that you loved our location. It's also wonderful to hear about the exceptional service you experienced throughout your stay. Thank you for letting us know about Bridget's hospitality! We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great Marriott and Great Convention Facilities
Summary: This hotel is in walking distance of Disneyland, but I was there for a convention with 4000 people. Hotel staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms very clean and updated. The food served at the convention was very good. Our meals were warn to hot. At one meal we had steak and it was very warm and cooked medium, had to do with 4000 people.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, Carl. We're glad we could host you during this convention and that you found our staff friendly and rooms comfortable. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Super clean and close to everything.
Summary: I was very pleased with everything about this hotel. Super clean and nearby everything. I had a lots of business events happening at the convention and this was so convinient. Disney is right there too.
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that you were pleased with your stay, Celeste! We truly look forward to your next seamless visit in Anaheim.

Summary: Went here for the annual Key Club Convention, (2500 high school students!) The rooms are a little small but still very nice and the bed was very comfortable. As a chaperone I had a room to myself which was great. They have rooms with balconies but mine did not. Check in was a little dicey since so many people arrived at once, so they might've been a little better prepared for that. The Bellman, Tyson, was very helpful. Even went out of his way to walk me to a spot I was looking for instead of just telling me where to go. We used their meeting rooms for most of our presentations and the big convention center building nearby for our whole group sessions. Very convenient having the two buildings so close together. There is a small restaurant and cocktail lounge in the lobby, but I
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're delighted to hear that Tyson was helpful and that you enjoyed your stay overall. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless visit.

Summary Heading: Meet family from out of town at the Marriott Anaheim
Summary: Nice comfortable clean  room , my daughters and granddaughter loved the bed (mattress) .. they slept well, the staff was friendly and helpful from  the valet to the bellman and the front desk agent... plenty of self parking and we also had a balcony with nice view of the pool and of Anaheim.. the food was delicious and breakfast was cheaper then I hop so do yourself a favor and eat breakfast at the hotel if you want to save a few dollars.. I enjoyed the hotel and would stay here again in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed the comforts of your room and that our team was friendly and helpful throughout your visit.

Summary: The staff is excellent and the facility is outstanding...that said you do pay a premium for all that you get.  This is my second time here and I must say that this trip is as expected, excellent.   Close to many attractions and places to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're delighted to hear that our team was outstanding and we truly look forward to welcoming you back for another great visit.

Summary: I don't know how anyone would give this place a bad review?  It's a beautiful place, and everyone was very friendly.  Rooms were great and the beds were comfy.  What a great location too, within walking distance of the Disney parks and a lot of great places to dine.  The pool and spa areas were very clean, and there were a lot of folks enjoying it.  My girls got such a big kick that a Starbucks was located there.  And it was great to be able to buy shuttle tickets at the hotel.  It was very convenient.  I have to come back down within the next year with my boys, and we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review, Nellie! We're delighted to hear that you found our team to be friendly and helpful and that your room was comfortable and clean. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Most of the Staff were Great, the room was ok
Summary: We arrived at the Anaheim Marriott after staying at an Embassy Suites in San Diego for a few days.  Maybe the Embassy Suites spoiled us, but the Marriott did not match up.  When we first arrived, I was approached by three valet parkers/concierges at the front entrance by my car.  They were like vultures looking for tips.  When I told them I could carry my own bags and was using the self parking, they were not so friendly and the look of disdain was obvious.   We went in to check in and the front desk staff were fabulous.  They were friendly, quick, efficient and made sure all of our requests were met.  They changed my opinion of the hotel instantly after dealing with the outside staff.  We then went to our room, it was ok.  The room is not very big for a family of four, but it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us, Aly. While we're pleased to hear that our front desk team exceeded your expectations, we're disappointed to hear that you were not pleased with your stay overall. Should you return to Anaheim, we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star stay that you deserve.

Summary: The lobby is beautiful, fun bar atmosphere that can be loud. Food is amazing & staff are very attentive. I think the rooms were on the low end for a Marriott property. Very small bathrooms, beds & rooms in general. I'm a light sleeper and many noises could be heard between rooms. I was here on business but there were many families here as Disney tourists, so be prepared for a kid friendly hotel. Nice overall, just not what I expected form a higher end Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review, Margaret. While we're thrilled to hear that our team and lobby exceeded your expectations, we're disappointed to hear that you were bothered by noise in your room. We truly hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star stay that you deserve.

Summary: attended a small convention/meeting at this property and was most pleased with my stay. Restaurant/bar offered a great selection of gluten free foods, including breads, which is most unusual. Room was nicely and freshly updated, very quiet evening for sleeping.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review, Bill! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our gluten-free options as well as the comfort of your room. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless stay.

Summary: My fiancé and I have stayed here a few times now for our weekend trips to Disneyland. The staff is always exceptional! I would love to give a shout out to Alexandria at the front desk for going above and beyond to insure our last stay was enjoyable.   -Leah
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review! We are delighted to hear that your stay with us exceeded your expectations and that our team was exceptional. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another brilliant visit.

Summary: Advertised as a five star but it falls short in so many regards. Kudos to the staff who were all great from top to bottom. Helpful and pleasant. Hotel itself is dated in a lot of places. Sawed off rusty pipe in the shower. Very dusty in places. Plumbing showing under sink is nasty looking. Towels have seen some use. Thin walls with lots of noise. Beware the throngs of kids going to Disney which didn't fit with our business convention. Heater super loud when kicked in to the point it could wake us. Pool area was clean. Other than staff the place didn't stick out in any ways to go higher than a three in comparison to other similar places we have stayed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. While we're very happy to hear that you loved our exceptional staff, we're sorry to hear that not every aspect of your stay was as flawless. We appreciate all of your constructive feedback and we hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a five-star stay in the future.

Summary: A very nice hotel. it is an older hotel they have refurbished. The public spaces are beautiful. We had an amazing breakfast one morning with very attentive staff. The courtyard side of the hotel can be noisy. We moved rooms and it was much quieter. If you are interested in going to Disney you can buy a bus ticket for the Art bus to Disney for $5 per person round trip at the front desk. The Art bus is the bright blue local bus transportation system. It picks up at the hotel  and dropped us right at the security check point for Disney. Coming home we didn't wait long at all for the bus home. The hotel also has a full starbucks. The beds are very comfortable and the staff were very helpful and polite.The rooms are on the small side.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful 4-star review, Susan! We're thrilled to see you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found our staff attentive and friendly. We're happy you were able to take advantage of the Art Bus and our convenient location as well. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: We took a sisters' girl trip to Disneyland and ended up staying at the Anaheim Marriott. When we arrived, the hotel's exterior was beautiful and the valet attendants were very informative. We were advised that valet fee would be $31/day and when we asked about self-parking, he told us that it would be $26/day. Even he cringed a bit having to tell us that. We just chalked this up to the convention center being right next door.   Next, we went to the check-in counter expecting just to drop off our bags and head over to Disneyland. It was a nice surprise that they had our room all ready for early check in, so we got to get settled in a bit before heading out. The lady who helped us was very nice and gave us all the info we needed.   The room was remodeled and very sleek looking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our accommodations during your stay and appreciate your constructive comments. You may be happy to hear for your next visit that we do offer complimentary in-room wi-fi to Marriott Rewards members who book directly. Complimentary wi-fi can also be enjoyed in our public areas, such as our lobby. We hope for the opportunity to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott this week for a work conference.  Every experience I had with each staff member was exceptional but there was one that stood out beyond the others.    The valet staff, specifically Marshall, was beyond helpful.  Unbeknownst to me, he had noticed there was something wrong with one of the tires on my car.  He went out of his way to bring my car around for me just to make sure he could inform me.  I would have been clueless otherwise.  Working in the service industry, I believe real value comes from those who go above and beyond even when it is not required.    My overall experience was great and I would recommend anyone to stay at this hotel for any engagement.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your review, Olivia. We're thrilled you enjoyed your overall stay and are so happy that our team could provide you with exceptional customer service. We pride ourselves on our hospitality and know how important it is in providing our guests with a seamless experience. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel, amazing customer service!! Will be back for sure :)
Summary: We spent New Years Eve 2016 and a few days after at this hotel. Room was awesome, hotel was surprisingly quiet and the staff....incredible! I want to give a special thanks to Cameron and Mark, they went above and beyond to help me out to have a friend come and visit me. They helped me with parking and they will know what I am talking about. I was beyond thankful and appreciative and so was my friend. Thank you all again, we will be back!!!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your excellent 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your New Year's Eve experience and that your room exceeded your expectations. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless stay.

Summary Heading: Mixed bag of worn and new
Summary: While my room was remodeled already, and functional, I saw others that were in old condition with furniture that has seen better days. Bathrooms are ranging from small to tiny.  Meeting rooms are a mixed bag as well.. big banquet room has noisy A/C. Small rooms on the 3rd level have not a whole lot of light and feel like bunkers. Banquet food was tasteless. No flavors, not enough salt, overcooked.  Gym is well equipped with lots of machines and training options.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. While we're pleased to have hosted you, we're disappointed to hear that you did not receive the 5-star stay that you deserve. We will forward your feedback to our team and hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back for a seamless stay.

Summary: This is a big hotel with large conference facilities and a several hundred bedrooms.  My room was a corner which had a small balcony and was a decent size.  The bathroom was very dated.  Overall serviceable but no luxuries.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our balcony. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: Wanted to like but it failed me....
Summary: As a very loyal Marriott customer (Platinum Elite) I usually look forward to staying at new properties especially since this one has an attractive and modern physical facility.  Let me say the good news first.  If I was just reviewing the staff and building, I would give this place five stars but as a business traveler there were certain epic fails. Security:  While this hotel is set back in an upscale hotel/business park the guests are somewhat suspect as the hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland so it not the usual upscale Marriott customer base.  So there are wild children running around this hotel just about every where even until late at night meaning 11pm.  If you need to sleep early, forget it.  Also if you have a room overlooking the pool, you will endure hear
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your positive and constructive feedback with us. We're thrilled that you loved our staff and property. We're very sorry to hear about your disappointment in our atmosphere for business travel and the experience on your balcony. We appreciate you filling us in so we can address your concerns internally. We hope to welcome you back for a seamless stay in the future.

Summary: This big hotel that is overly priced was chosen for Nam Nationals. The Pizza Hut inside was three times the price compared to the pizza huts in Mo. The rooms are very small especially when you have four people in it. The bathroom squeezes two people to get everything ready for the kids for rehearsals. I can say that the huge conference rooms had the space needed for all of our competitions thanksgiving dinner was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed Thanksgiving dinner and the conference space. However, we're disappointed to hear we failed to meet expectations with respect to pricing and our rooms. We appreciate your sincere and honest feedback and hope to welcome you again so we have another chance to meet those expectations.

Summary Heading: Very nice Marriott, but can get noisy at night.
Summary: I recently stayed 2 nights at the Anaheim Marriott which is located right next to the Orange County Convention Center.  I was actually not there for a convention, which kept the rates reasonable, but I choose this property because I knew the location is great and it was a full service property.  The hotel is very large, but the staff is actually very friendly, and the place doesn't feel like some vast convention hotels.  My check in was fast and friendly and I was quickly off to my room.  I did use the self-service parking in the hotel which is easy, but be aware that it is a far walk from the garage to the main part of the hotel if you're dragging a bunch of luggage.  My king room was a little on the small side, but was perfect for me being a solo business traveler.  I loved
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We love hearing that you found our location ideal, our staff friendly and our beer selection excellent. We truly enjoyed reading your review and we appreciate all of your feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: We were recently in the area for a hockey tournament and decided to stay a couple extra days.  For the tournament we stayed at another brand property of similar level.  This hotel was immediately a stand-out.  Great service from the staff across the board.  The hotel is clean and comfortable and the location is central to Disney and steps away from the convention center.  We will definitely make this our go to property when we visit the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that our team went above and beyond to exceed your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to welcoming you back for another brilliant visit.

Summary: I visited this hotel because I was attending a conference there. The conference rooms were excellent and had great acoustics. Internet was fast. The hotel is located close to the convention center and that was a big plus as well.
Manager Response: We're delighted to read your great review! It pleases us to hear that our Wi-Fi and conference rooms exceeded your expectations and we look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless visit.

Summary: Typically I review a hotel for the beds, cleanliness, service and overall experience. However, this experience was so bad, I have to give a huge thumbs down and report what happened to us. So, it was late and we waited to go to the jacuzzi thinking the kids would be out of the spa and there would be fewer people. So, we hit the spa within open hours and it was standing room only. We got about 15 minutes and staff from the hotel came and stood over all the people and shouted for people to get out. I thought the rest of the people were together and the person shouting was their camp counselor. I had no idea that the hostile shouting person, with folded arms, worked for Marriott. When everyone got out and my friend and I were still sitting in the spa, she shouted at us. We were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review. We're sorry to hear about your experience at the spa and we will be passing this along to our team for review. We appreciate your feedback regarding the room amenities and parking cost and hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a flawless visit.

Summary: From check in to leaving ..top notch hotel ...lovely dinner ...attentive staff., Lovely room on the top floor.Restaurant does not look great from the lobby but once you go past the Bar/TV area is is very comfortable .
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent 5-star review! We hope to welcome you back again for another excellent stay in the very near future.

Summary: We arrived about 7.30am and they let us check in early which was great after a 13 hour flight. Staff were nice, room was clean, close to Disneyland and places to eat. There is a Starbucks and pizza Hut in the hotel too which was handy. No negatives at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're delighted to hear that our team went above and beyond to exceed your expectations and that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent visit.

Summary: Very nice, welcoming and friendly staff. Clean rooms and nice breakfast. A variety of restaurants and coffee shops in and around the hotel. Walking distance to Disney land. Recommend this place for families and Disney land visitors.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're delighted to hear that you found your room to be clean and that our team exceeded your expectations. We hope to welcome you for another brilliant stay in the near future.

Summary Heading: They really did take good care of us there.
Summary: Clean room - friendly staff..right next to convention center - actually some of the conference events were in the hotel itself.  I really truly had no complaints whatsoever.  A little pricier than some of the other ones, but really convenient if you were not into long walks or didn't have time to race around getting ground transportation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We couldn't be happier to hear that you had a seamless stay at our hotel. From our location to our staff, it sounds like you enjoyed it all. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: It is a great place if you attend a convention (2 min walk) or want to visit Disneyland (5 min by bus or car). Not so much if yu want to be LA downtown or close to the beach. I have stayed at this hotel twice for longer periods (7 days) and enjoyed the stay - rooms are clean and big, different facilities (especially if you combine the choice with Hilton right in front), quick room service. What I appreciate most is the friendliness of the staff. There is also a choice of shops and restaurants around (not to mention downtown Disney). The only thing I regretted this time is that my room was right above a huge central A/C unit which made a lot of noise all night (and day of course) long so I could not enjoy a very mild February weather.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, Joanna! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland and that you found our rooms to be clean and spacious. We hope to welcome you back to Anaheim again in the very near future.

Summary: The place is clean and rooms pretty standard, but the staff isn't friendly or very accommodating. When we booked a standard room, the request was made in the comment for a king bed. Then checked in via a mobile app and it said we checked in for a king room, soI assumed that's what I'll get. We get there, walk into a room, it's two double beds. I called front desk and requested a king. They said they only have a suite with a murphy, or pull down, king bed. I askedif it's comfortable and was told YES. Not only was it the most uncomfortable bed I have ever slept in, it was not even a king, it was a queen. Then I wasted more time talking to staff and trying to go back to the original room, which I was no longer able to do because they were sold out for the night. In all this, all I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. While we're pleased to have hosted you, we're disappointed to hear that you did not receive the 5-star service that you deserve. Please feel free to reach out to us directly so that we may learn more about your experience and look into this further. Thank you.

Summary: While the property is dated, the value as a full service Marriott is definitely something to consider. As usual, we received top notch customer service from the staff during our stay. The hotel  also has the most interesting elevator call system that I have ever seen. We will stay at the Anaheim Marriott again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your great review! We're happy to hear that our customer service was top notch and that you enjoyed your stay overall. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless visit.

Summary: Really it was very nice to stay and attend a conference in Anaheim Marriott Very nice hotel Excellent facilities Perfect staff Meeting room and conference hall was very good  Room was very nice Service was excellent  Bed was very comfortable  Restaurant was awesome  Near by to all places
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, Mohsen! We truly look forward to exceeding your expectations again in the near future.

Summary: Whenever I have to travel to Los Angeles (which I hate to do) I almost always stay at the Anaheim Marriott.  Hard to beat the prices particularly because of the quality of the Hotel and location.  Lots of restaurants around this location and 2 blocks from Disneyland!  We haven't been to Disneyland in years but we almost always stay at this Hotel.  The parking fee is pretty outrageous but the rest of this Hotel is really great.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay, Paul. We're so glad to be your choice when visiting the area and are thrilled to hear you've enjoyed your experiences with us. We hope to continue welcoming you on your trips to Los Angeles and thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: Family of five perfectly served with a two room suite. Hotel perfectly situated in Anaheim/Garden Grove area. More of a business hotel than family resort, but close to Disney Land this hotel is a perfect chiose also for families on vacation.
Manager Response: We couldn't be happier to hear that our hotel was so perfect for your travels! It's great to hear that your family loved our guest rooms and location. Thank you for providing us with your feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our visit to Disneyland. It is also close to the convention center. There is a convenient shuttle that will take you to the drop off area of Disneyland. We took Uber instead. The shuttle looked a little crowded for our liking. This hotel is very clean and although slightly dated is is well maintained. The staff met all of out needs and lived up to the standard of Marriott. we will definitely stay here again when coming to Disneyland. Make sure you book in advanced availability can be an issue last minute with any hotel near the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your Disneyland vacation! We love hearing that our location, staff and cleanliness met all of your expectations. We truly enjoyed reading your review and we hope you'll join us again soon.

Summary: Terrific property, so close to Disneyland! The staff was very helpful and my daughter loved the free breakfast;) we even had time for a quick swim in the pool with some children she met, what a fun stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed breakfast and your swim. We hope to welcome you again soon for another brilliant stay.

Summary: The business (concierge) lounge and floor are not worth the additional expense. In spite of being assured otherwise at the time of reservation and checking, the concierge lounge is closed (locked) for even coffee outside of "open" hours. Thus, access to business equipment including printers and a quiet place to work are not available.  Except for very basic buffet breakfast, including plastic scrambled eggs, the lounge is also closed Friday and Saturday, defeating the whole purpose of the lounge.   The concierge level room is also outdated and in dire need of renovations -- which were promised by the manager 3 years ago.    These are the main reasons for me to write this response. Many unfulfilled promises and a far overpriced Marriott. My colleagues at the Hilton across the way
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We're sorry to hear that your experience did not live up to expectations. We appreciate your honest and constructive feedback and hope you'll give us another chance to meet those expectations.

Summary: This is a very large hotel within walking distance of Disneyland and next to the convention center.  I was there for a convention.  The hotel is very organized and professional.  My room was good, very spacious and clean.  The hallways were clean, everything was in working order.  But honestly, a hotel is a hotel.  It is the customer service that makes the difference.  The employees at the Marriott were exceptional.  It is like the Disney magic spread across the street to the Marriott.  Everyone smiles, greets you, and helps.  Very impressive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed our convenient location and your room. We hope to welcome you again for another brilliant stay.

Summary: I stayed here for a large conference. The hotel is ok, some sections are dated and need some remodeling. They had some water coming down the ceiling when it was raining heavy in LA area.   The rooms are nice, but the 2 rooms I was assigned to horrible view. The 1st one was overseeing a mechanical corridor that has a lot noise at night. I asked to be switched which they did, but my second room had same view of corridor of a lot HVAC, but no noise this time.  The wifi in the room only worked for my laptop not for my iPhone and iPad. That is baaad. I thought it was me, but all the colleagues I talked to they had the same issue. We end up using our Verizon MIFI.   If not for my company hotel selection I would not stay here.   The whole lunch service and setup for large group was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review, Sarmad. We're sorry to hear we did not meet expectations with respect to your room and appreciate your feedback about the HVAC. We hope you'll give us another chance to meet expectations and offer you a 5-star experience.

Summary: Renovated and oh, so nice!  Spacious room, nice bathroom, comfy bed.  Loved the breakfast setup that had a room for the food separate from the tables & chairs.  Good breakfast buffet with one exception - the meat selections.  Would have liked to have bacon offered daily.  Within walking distance of Disney and there is a CVS in the adjacent parking area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're thrilled you enjoyed breakfast and our convenient location. We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: This is a nice hotel.  Breakfast at their restaurant was good, but a little pricey.  However, the concierge service was outstanding.  There was a problem with a shuttle service (not Marriott's shuttle but an outside company), and Mr. Bryant went over and above to arrange transportation and apologized profusely for the inconvenience caused by the shuttle service, even though his hotel was not at fault.  The location is perfect for the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland.  There are restaurants in all price ranges within a mile.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your great review, Marilyn! We pride our team on their outstanding hospitality so we're very happy to hear that we could deliver on this for you and that you enjoyed our convenient location. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Travelled in August 2016, myself and 2 daughters (15 & 22). This hotel is right across the street from a Walmart, and a small store that sells liquor and tobacco if that interests you. Excellent restaurants literally 2 minutes from the hotel as well. Nice outdoor pool. Fitness facility. Staff were pleasant, all rooms here are suites, and it was spacious enough for 3 women to share. Super clean, and comfy beds. We didn't go to Disney, but it was near Disney, easily accessible by ART. On the route. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your Anaheim travels! We're thrilled you loved our convenient location, friendly staff and comfortable accommodations. We greatly appreciate your positive feedback and we hope to welcome you back very soon!

Summary: I go in this hotel for business reason on a regular base. The atmosphere is perfect for relax and for a good rest. Very good gym. Rooms are confortable, very quite and well sound proof. Receptionists and concierge staff are kind and more than useful for helping. If you are in the area, Marriott is definetely an hotel I would suggest for you stay. In the hoyel you can find Starbucks and Pizza Hut. Bar is great and service super quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know what keeps you coming back time and time again. We're delighted that you love our atmosphere, fitness center, guest rooms and more. Thank you for your review and recommendation. Until next time!

Summary: I travel a lot and most of the hotels I stay at are Marriott-family brands.  This hotel stood out right from the start--checking in I mentioned in passing that I would have a redeye flight back East a few days later and the gentleman checking me in immediately asked if a late checkout would be helpful (it was).  The facility was clean and very close to the convention center.  A lot of employees impressed me with simple, genuine smiles and greetings.  The restaurant was the only drawback, with an odd menu selection, but it wasn't enough to offset the attentive hotel employees and quality facilities.  Well done!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. We greatly appreciate your loyalty to Marriott as well! From our service to our location, we're thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the constructive feedback regarding our restaurant as well. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Attentive friendly staff! Great location next to convention center
Summary: Wonderful experience ( business trip) . The staff makes this marriot a shining star. Every single staff member we encountered was super genuine and went out of their way to assist our few needs. This is our first visit in this area, so I have zero baseline to compare the value/ amenities of this property relevant to the competition. The staff, is great, I have been around the world and back...some of the best in the business. The hotel lobby is elegant- I assume most travelers choose this marriot because of its proximity to the convention center- it is not really for kids, or vacation party people- which is great for those business travelers that are used to luxury, but not over the top . The rooms themselves are on the smaller side. They have everything in a compact space,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. We're thrilled that you loved our excellent staff, elegant decor and convenient location. We pride our team on their outstanding hospitality and we're thrilled you recognized that. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I visited the Anaheim  Marriott for the first time and was totally impressed. A friendly valet welcomes you and gives you the choice of valet or self parking.  At the front desk, Megan was wonderful. I had booked my reservation the night before and it had yet to show up in their system, but not to worry,  Megan knew exactly where to look and quickly retrieved it. The rooms are modern and comfortable. My view from the oasis tower was beautiful. Its nextdoor neighbors are the convention center and Disneyland!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review with us, Kevin. We're so glad Megan could help get you settled in to your room and that you enjoyed our gorgeous view and convenient location! We hope to welcome you for another five-star stay soon.

Summary: I was in town for a conference at the hotel.  I must say the hotel is simply beautiful!!!!  I learned this is one of the oldest hotels in the area; they did an EXCELLENT job remodeling.  I had a King bed with a view of the pool and restaurant.  My only disappointment was that the sliding door doesn't open to the balcony!  Why have chairs and a table if you can't enjoy them relaxing on the balcony?!?!?   You have plenty of eating options which are walking distance.  If you don't want to walk, you can jump on the bus transit for $2 per ride or just buy a pass for un,limited access which is cheaper.  You have the option to buy an ART pass (resort transit) or the local city bus pass.  I of course, took advantage of the ART pass because I wanted to go to the Outlet Mall lol.
Manager Response: Thank you or your generous 5-star review! We're so happy to hear that our property exceeded your expectations and that you truly enjoyed your room and our pool. We truly appreciate your feedback regarding the sliding glass door and will pass it along to our team. Should you return to Anaheim, we're excited to welcome you back for another seamless stay.

Summary: We came for an overnight stay before going to Disneyland.  Loved this property!  We have stayed in a least 12 area hotels over the years.  The Anaheim Marriott had the best service of them all.  It was our first stay as a Marriott Gold.  We received an upgraded room on the top floor with a lovely bathroom with vessel sinks  and a separate tub and shower.  We had a ;balcony with Disney views,  We think our room was the bedroom portion of the Chairman's Suite.  The concierge  lounge was pristine, well-staffed, and stocked with plentiful and delicious food. We arrived at 10 pm and left before 7 the following morning.  We are eager to return and enjoy the amenities of the property.  We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room upgrade and that the concierge lounge exceeded your expectations. We can't wait to welcome you back for another seamless stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and well managed
Summary: I attended a conference there and this hotel is clean, with excellent customer service, and clearly is well managed. The fitness center is robust, food there is good, and surprisingly, the stairwells are clean and nice. The concierge level is nice as well. The location is walkable to chain restaurants and Uber to more local. Request a high floor with a balcony. It is a it chaotic when there are several conferences going on, but they manage it well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that our team exceeded your expectations and that our proximity to the nearby area was convenient to all of your needs. Should you return to Anaheim, we truly look forward to welcoming you back for another seamless stay.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the condition of the room and facility based on previous reviews.  My room appeared fairly freshly painted and updated.  Public spaces were pleasant too.  Be aware that the Hotel is very busy and a bit loud. I was kept awake one night by a partying group.  Having a balcony is nice.  The safe was too small to hold my macbook. Staff is very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. While we're thrilled to hear that our accommodations exceeded your expectations, we're disappointed you were kept up late by other guests. We know how important a restful night of sleep is, so we hope for the opportunity to welcome you back for a five-star experience in every way in the future. Thank you again for your review!

Summary: Had a wonderful nights stay .  The young lady that checked me in , Alex, was quite friendly and set the tone for a wonderful rest of my stay. Rooms are clean and it is pretty easy to get anywhere easy . If you do t have a car it isn't easy to get anywhere but the restaurant onsite is quite good .
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review, Michael. We're thrilled you enjoyed your room and your dining experience. We hope to welcome you again for another brilliant stay!

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for a business trip. My stay was 5 days 4 nights.  To start, the location of this hotel is decent. Not great, but not bad. There are quite a few restaurants within walking distance like Bubba Gump Shrimp and the Cheesecake Factory, and a few others. I only ate one meal at the hotel. I had breakfast one morning. Steak and eggs. it was a decent meal, not too bad on price I suppose. Like $20ish. There is a buffet option, but is $26. I've had Vegas breakfast buffets for less.   One thing I wanted to get to do while I was there was go to Disney with my team from work. unfortunately, we didn't get to make it to the actual park due to time, but did make it to downtown Disney. I will not review that. We took an Uber from our hotel. it was about $11 total
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent business trip to our hotel. We're thrilled that you loved our exceptional staff. We also appreciate all of your constructive input as well. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a five-star stay when you have enough time to experience Disneyland as well!

Summary: We were given a room with a great view. We were able to watch fireworks from our room which was great. Room was very small. We were given 2 double bed. 2 kids and 2 adults. Room was older and needs some updating. Bed's were ok. Pool was heated but while we were there someone broke a glass in the pool and pool had to be drained so it was cold - hard to swim in. Hot tub is great but small only 9 people can really fit in it. It was nice to have pizza hut and Starbucks in the hotel. Internet is way to expensive and half of the time it doesn't work. Parking is also very expensive and it can be a far walk to the room.  Room was very expensive - we were very disappointed of what we got.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are pleased that you were able to watch the fireworks from your guest room, we're very sorry to hear about the pool and that you were displeased with the added parking and wi-fi fees. We really appreciate your feedback and will pass it on to the team. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience.

Summary: When I arrived I was informed that Marriott has removed all my points as I hadn't stayed in 2 years. Disappointing. Although my room was clean and comfortable, I could hear every single word including phone conversations from the room next door. Extremely glad it was another business traveler, not a family or honeymooners! You have to enter your floor before you get on an elevator. It does make the wait time shorter but I saw a number of people forget, then have to get out and wait for another elevator.  The balcony was nice and hotel staff was lovely. Very nice workout room as well. The reason for 3 stars is the sound problem. Again, because I could hear every sound form next door, I would not bring my children here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your guest room, we are sorry to hear that you found the walls to be thin. It's pleasing to hear that you found our staff to be great. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience at our hotel.

Summary: The hotel itself is centrally located right next to the Anaheim Convention Center and about one block from Disneyland.  Check in was a breeze, the front desk staff was very friendly.  Dinner in the main restaurant was excellent, if pricey.  Stayed at the hotel as they were hosting a conference.  Enjoyed the conference facilities and common areas.  My room itself could use a bit of an update:  the shower-tub combo was unimpressive, and the carpet looked like it was several years old.  My major complaint was the location of my room.  I was on the 2nd floor of the back side of the Oasis Tower, which was fine for my conference, but all night I was hit with the sound of a high pitched noise coming from the HVAC system outside my window.  Did not get the uninterrupted sleep I would
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us. While we're pleased to have hosted you, we're disappointed to hear that our accommodations did not meet your expectations. We truly hope to have another opportunity to host you and wow you with the 5-star visit that we aim to provide our wonderful guests.

Summary: The staff at this location is top notch. Since this was a working vacation for me, I asked that a flatscreen monitor be placed in my room to use in conjunction with my laptop and my request was fulfilled. Room is good sized, comfortable beds. Small fridge and coffee maker in the room. Balcony was large enough for two chairs and a small table. Perfect for afternoon breaks from work. Some down points - tv remote didn't work. Most remotes have a feature where you can scroll through channels. On this one you had to enter your channel number each time. Peeling paint on the bathroom door and no exhaust fan either. Stains on carpet, but nothing major. Outlets on the side of the tv closest to the desk didn't work. I didn't call the staff on any of these things because it didn't detract
Manager Response: none

Summary: Chose this hotel as I was attending a conference in the attached convention center - it was a great choice! Not only was it extremely convenient to participate in the conference but i also appreciated the short walk to  Disneyland and plethora of restaurants. Hotel staff were some of the most pleasant, attentive, and guest oriented I have experienced. Everywhere I went it seemed a friendly employee was cleaning, polishing, and maintaining the lovely facility. No matter what the employee's position, they offered a polite greeting and were ready to assist with any request I made. I was impressed and will be sure to make my reservations here for all my future stays in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Complimentary Coffee Would Make It Better
Summary: Nice property, professional and courteous hotel staff, especially the valet. I stayed recently for a convention. I was surprised to not find the typical Marriott complimentary coffee near the entryway. As a chain they need to be consistent. There is a Starbucks onsite but I'm not a big fan and when I did go there a worker was rude to me because I unwittingly cut in line. There was a poorly placed sign that states the line starts here but the problem is there are different ways of entering the area and the way I entered I did not see the sign.  My balcony door would not close but maintenance promptly addressed the problem. Also, the elevators were really nice and quick.  The hotel restaurant has decent food and very attentive staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be professional, we're sorry to hear that you had a poor experience at Starbucks. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope to have the chance to improve upon your recent visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Conveniently located near Disneyland & the convention center
Summary: This is an updated hotel with all of the amenities and at a much more reasonable rate than a Disney property. Rooms are spacious and clean. The hotel restaurants are good. Service is always excellent. It's not on Disneyland property, but convenient to get to the park by bus. There's a Disney ticket agent on-site so you can purchase tickets before leaving the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amenities and your spacious guest room. It's pleasing to hear that you found our staff to be excellent as well. We hope to host you in the future for another enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel of choice for NAMM shows
Summary: Stayed here for the NAMM 2017 show and was impressed with all of the changes and updating happening at this hotel.  We were arriving early and called to check on our room and we were told it wouldn't be ready for about 45 min.  However when we arrived they had a room available and it was perfect.  We were in a corner room with a balcony overlooking the front of the hotel and the concert stage allowed us perfect viewing of various acts performing.  We tried their new room service menu and were surprised when the food arrived in 20 minutes as quoted. We have been staying at this hotel for years now for this yearly event and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your corner guest room. It's great that you found the room service to be quick and delicious. It's wonderful that you were impressed with your stay with us for NAMM and we look forward to hosting you again in the future!

Summary: Good location near DL and next to the convention center.  Lobby and staff were very good and elevators were easy to use and didn't have to wait.  ROOMS:  Rooms were updated with newer carpet and headboard.  But it really needs to be totally updated.  The sliding doors to the balcony were metal and it was metal on metal when opening and closing.  Not very smooth.  The door did not close all the way. You could see to the outside through the edge of the door. This made it louder and let in a lot of outside air.  The AC worked but not well.  Probably due to the amount of outside air.  Not very efficient.    The bathrooms only had a towel hook on the back of the door.  With very little air circulation the towels did not dry. I brought mine into the room and put them on top of the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we're glad that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location and friendly staff, we're sorry to hear found issues with your guest room. Your feedback is really appreciated and we hope to have the chance to improve upon your stay in the future.

Summary: Amazing Marriott property - as always.  Within short walking distance to Disneyland - maybe 10-15 minutes max.  Wonderful accommodations, Starbucks in lobby, bar in lobby, personnel go out of their way to assist you.  Was able to check into my room upon arrival at around noon - unheard of usually.  Excellent property.
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review. W are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, excellent staff and accommodations. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights while we were participating in Run Disney's Rebel Challenge (10K and 1/2 Marathon over a Sat and Sun). We were so impressed with this hotel. The property was VERY busy with an entire contingent of dance moms and kids. The staff could easily have been completely overwhelmed but handled the capacity crowd in an excellent manner. Keith, one of the bartenders at nFuse, was outstanding. It's people like him who make us want to return to this Marriott. Great bartender!   The hotel itself is located adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center and is a short walk from the park entrances. Lots of restaurants around...although we were so happy with the restaurant (and didn't really want to walk a lot after all of our running!) that we ended up
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be outstanding throughout the hotel. It's wonderful that you enjoyed our hotels' close proximity to the local attractions, as well as the dining at nFuse. We really appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: So, Marriott Corporate has a new Room Service program called Fresh Bites... Lol! It's all pre-made and overly packaged, no substitutions! I'm appalled by the waste! In order to get what we wanted (eggs & fruit) we had to order three breakfasts and ended throwing away the ham, bagels, fried potatoes. Beyond the food wasted breakfast for two = 3 heavy plastic containers, 2 large cardboard shopping bags, disposable cutlery, cups and napkins. Won't be doing that again! Probably won't stay at a Marriott again...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed in the room service experience. Your feedback will be passed on to our team. We hope to have the chance to improve upon your stay in the future so that we can restore your faith in the Marriott brand.

Summary: This property is very nice, and we felt, less congested than other surrounding hotels on the busiest night of the year at Disneyland, New Years Eve!!  We were on the 9th floor and could see the top of the fireworks happening at Disney.  If this is a priority, you should stay at a hotel with a view.  The $5 all day shuttle was ideal - and a deal maker for us without a car.  When they say you can walk, keep in mind, you've been pounding pavement all day and it's not across the street.....so glad we had the shuttle.  The reason for not the top rating is the bathrooms in the rooms for 4 are surprisingly small - we had two people in the room and it was tight with one small little sink/counter area.  Small toilet/shower area as well.    The Starbucks on property is nice.  We did not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the view of the fireworks from your guest room, as well as the delicious dining options on property. We are sorry to hear about the issue you experienced with Disney reservations and your guest room cleaning. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed on. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future for a seamless stay.

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Good Location, Average Property
Summary: We stayed here over the Christmas holiday, where we basically used it as a place to sleep. The property itself was quite dated (the bathroom looks like it belongs in a motel), and the rooms are pretty much average; however, the staff on this property is definitely exceptional. They went out of their way to make sure that we felt special, and everyone was definitely friendly. They made our stay very memorable. If there would be one reason why you would choose this property over the Hilton (or any other hotel in the area), it would definitely be the staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be exceptional and made your stay very memorable. Your kind input is definitely appreciated and will be passed on. We hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Small bumpy start, but good ending
Summary: Booked our room during the Thanksgiving promo that Marriott had and got a good deal. For two nights over New Year's eve weekend, I  prepaid a little over $350.  Marriott needs to run more promo like this!   Fast forward to our check in day on 12/30,  they confirmed me for one night only.  I showed them my confirmed reservation on my mobile app and all was fixed including the rate.  We stayed in the Oasis tower.  The elevator structure was different but I liked it.  You input your floor number before you get on and it tells you which elevator bank to take.  Though it was quite busy, we never had to wait long for any of the elevators.  The room was standard, two doubles with a mini-fridge.  We had a view of Harbor Blvd which was fine as we were high up enough on the 14th floor so
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your five-star review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed the smart elevators, concierge lounge and our hotels' convenient location. We really appreciate your taking the time to share your feedback with us and we hope to host you for another incredible stay in the future.

Summary: The hotel is very nice, food is great, Hertz implant very useful, good gym, pizza hut and starbucks inside the hotel very useful!!! Great meeting/ball rooms (although I came for vacations as an event planner could not help to sneak hahaha) as in every Marriot beds are unbelievably comfortable! what I did not like... self parking is very expensive per day!! 25 USD/night. Would stay again anyway!!! Very close to Disneyland, from room 1149 you can see Disney California Adventure from the window. Many places to eat around (walking distance).
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the delicious dining options, we as well as the comfortable guest beds. Your feedback regarding the self-parking​ fee is appreciated. We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope to host you again in the future.

Summary: Well I thought it would be a better idea to stay at the Marriott rather then the Disneyland hotel for me and my family but is was not what we thought.   I travel all over the world and I mostly stay at Marriott Hotels. So when things like this happen I'm very supported and confused.   We traveled from India to come to Disneyland for Christmas and my birthday. We stayed at the Marriott because I thought I would be treated better. I called a month before and asked questions about the hotel before we booked.   1. I wanted a view of the Disneyland park and I wrote it on my reservations I paid more for this. Then when I called I asked again. They said yes. Then when I check in they said yes I had a view. Then when I got to my room I can just see the front of the Hilton! So no view of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Dan. We are very disappointed to hear about your experience. We strive to give all of our customers a five-star stay and are saddened to hear that this is not what you received. If you could please privately message us with your reservation information we would be happy to improve upon your recent experience.

Summary Heading: The room was large and the staff were incredibly attentive
Summary: We came to Anaheim with one real purpose - spending all of our time at Disneyland! However, we arrived on a plane from Australia and were at the hotel by about 10am. Fortunately for us our hotel room was ready straight away which was amazing given the 3 of us had not slept a wink in the 14hr flight over!   Danielle checked us in and she immediately made us feel welcome and at home. She also gave us advice on the local outlet shopping and the transport services available. The hotel room was, as described in the title, quite large as we had asked for a room with 2 Queen beds.  We had a "city" facing room on the 15th floor which much to our surprise gave us a view of the fireworks from Disneyland each night.  Disneyland was an easy walk from the hotel but the Anaheim buses which
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful trip to Anaheim from Australia. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and the excellent service provided by our staff. Your feedback regarding the wi-fi is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future should you return to Disneyland!

Summary: Impecable service, this Marriott is next to the Anaheim Convention Center. The rooms are a bit dated and the hanging losers very small (I don't know how a couple would manage it staying for multiple days), but the staff makes up for obsolete rooms. The public spaces, including lounge, lobby and restaurant are all updated and very nice. As indicated the staff were over the top in all encounters. As an example, I left a jacket hanging in the closet during and early am exit. I call the hotel about 6 hours later, they located the jacket, and fedexed it to me the same day at no charge. Very impressive. I recommend the property for their hospitality and as a great place to stay when in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the incredible service provided by our staff. It's wonderful that you were able to receive the jacket you left in your room. We really appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: Recently stayed here for a convention.  The location is great, close to the convention center, several restaurants and Disneyland.  The pool side restaurant was very good, a bit pricey, but good.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. It's great that you enjoyed our hotel's convenient location and delicious cuisine. We are pleased that you found your guest room to be clean and comfortable. We hope to host you in the future for another great stay.

Summary: I used to stay at this place all the time when i was a child. They have done major renovations and its the perfect mix of business and family.  Walking distance to the Convention Center, and there are two shuttle stops for the Disneyland buses
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you have been enjoying your stays with us over the years. It's great that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!

Summary: We have stayed at this property twice now, both times were for trips to Disneyland.  The location is great - very easy to walk or take the ART buses to the parks.
