SO nice to have room service option until 1AM, and love having a Starbucks on property. If you are considering the Hilton vs. here - stay at the Marriott! I walked over to the Hilton for an ATM (the ones in the Marriott were not working) and it was so chaotic - I'm not sure on size difference but this Marriott always seems a bit calmer, and quieter. The bell staff at check-in were so polite - love how easy self parking in the garage is. Theo at the Front Desk is WONDERFUL. Highly recommend and can't wait to come back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, as well as the excellent service provided by our staff. We value your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great food, Evening bar and very clean!
Summary: Had a wonderful 4 nights stay this summer. The whole place was very clean and we ate very well. The pool side restaurant was excellent. Best Martinis at the bar!  We were always greeted warmly and the concierge services was excellent. The pool was clean and it felt like a mini oasis!
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed our clean hotel and delicious cuisine. We love to learn that our staff was very welcoming. We appreciate your feedback and hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: The hotel is clean, and rooms are spacious. Staffs are nice and helpful. The location is just few minutes close to Disney land. There are two coffee shops beside restaurant and a small shop ( small market) where you can buy needed stuffs any time during the day. Overall experience was nice!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room, dining options and our helpful staff. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to host you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and Convention Center
Summary: Stayed two nights at this property in a king sized room on the 14th floor.  The room was oddly shaped- the bed was quite far from the tv- so we just didn't watch. I booked this hotel because it was a full service property. They have a restaurant, lounge, room service, etc. When I decided to order room service, I found out that it was more of a 'quick bite' service that you could either have delivered for $5.00 or go down to the restaurant and pick up yourself. I was taken aback. I just wanted to order a nice meal on actual plates with actual silverware! I decided to pick it up and bring it back to the room. The food was very good-it was a nice surprise--even though it was in plastic containers.  The staff seemed nice and everything was clean. There is a Starbucks near the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the delicious room service, as well as the kind service provided by our staff. Your feedback regarding the guest rooms and parking fee is appreciated. We hope to welcome you back in the future for another pleasant stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Rooms are comfortable and the safety measures are noticeable.  Hotel handles incredible number of people for key conventions.   Would suggest more lobby seating is needed for peak convention times.   Can be loud at times.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for sharing both your positive and constructive feedback. It's great to hear that you loved our security measures and comfortable guest rooms. Thank you for your suggestion on additional lobby seating. We truly appreciate that and we hope to welcome you back for teh kind of five-star stay you deserve in the future.

Summary: This is a beautiful property, the lobby is large and was so nicely decorated for the holidays.  I think the bar was nice too, however there was a convention there while I was staying so it was way too crowded and couldn't get near it.  The staff is very nice and helpful and check in wasn't too long, I did upgrade for this stay so our room was really nice, from the 18th floor you can see the fireworks from Disneyland. The main issue was the convention has some sort of event going  on with live music  in the park area in-between the 2 hotels and it was so loud!  Window-shaking  loud, wake  you up loud. I called to see how long it was going to last( at 10 pm) and was told it was over at 10- well it went on for another 40 minutes- that part was not good.  After a long day at
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Meredith! It's wonderful to hear that you loved our helpful staff, beautiful property and nice guest rooms. We're sorry to hear about the noise you experienced and we appreciate you filling us in. Should you return to the Anaheim area in the future, we hope to welcome you back for a seamless stay.

Summary: Overall, this hotel is pretty good for a big convention hotel.  Decent rooms, a good restaurant, and a good lobby bar.    All the things you would need in a convention property.    The service is what makes this hotel better than expected.  All the staff I encountered were more than helpful and friendly.   Many times the staff went out of their way to help me and make suggestions.   Something you don't get at all hotels.   I would stay at this hotel again.     Also, a short walk to downtown Disney, which is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing such a kind review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our rooms, dining and the service that our staff provided. We strive to provide the best service possible, and we truly appreciate hearing this. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future!

Summary: We were here two nights for a convention.  Our room was comfortable and clean, though the bathroom was small.  The carpeting had a strange pattern that made it look threadbare, but it was an optical illusion.  The bathroom door had peeling paint, the shower head provided a feeble spray, probably this is considered a water conservation feature.  There was billing confusion between my company and the hotel, may have been our fault but their staff was slow and indifferent about solving the problem.  On the plus side the modern elevators, where you punch in the floor before getting on are excellent as is the fitness room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your honest feedback with us. While we're glad that you found your room comfortable, we're very sorry to hear that you experienced issues with your bill. We apologize for the inconvenience and we appreciate you letting us know. We assure you that the less than exceptional service you experienced is not typical of our team and we'll be sure to address your concerns internally. We hope to welcome you back for a seamless stay in the future.

Summary Heading: great location... $5 day shuttle to Disneyland!
Summary: Great hotel if you want to go to Disneyland. For $5 you can use the express shuttle to Disneyland. This includes unlimited rides for the day. The shuttle leaves every 20 minutes. The Shuttle starts one hour before the park opens. We spent 4 hours at the park and went back to the hotel to rest up and went back for the night fireworks. The ride takes about 10 minutes. The hotel staff was super nice and the rooms were very nice. The rooms have  refrigerators. We used the room service which was very good . Highly recommend especially if you are going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for sharing with us about your recent stay! It's great to hear that you loved our convenient location, friendly staff and delicious in-room dining. Thank you for both your review and your recommendation. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Clean comfortable rooms in a newer appearing hotel. Good service, quiet room. Fast elevators! The place was busy with the Sony Playstation Experience 2016 going on next door, but the hotel is spacious enough to accommodate the crowds! Everything you want is close at hand. Walking distance to fine dining and Disneyland! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review, Jeff! We're thrilled that you found our guest rooms clean and comfortable, our service excellent and our location ideal. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay very soon!

Summary Heading: Good stay, small room in need of minor repairs
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights for a visit to Disneyland.  Unfortunately we landed just as there was a National Miss Teen America thing going on so it was packed with kids/parents competing.  We had booked a club level room but because of the competition the club level was moved from the 18th floor to the lower level so it was a bit of a depressing feeling being in the basement.  That being said, the staff were very helpful and friendly.  The food itself was good, nothing fancy but certainly good enough. Our room was on the 19th floor with a great view of Disneyland fireworks.  The issue we had with the room was that it was a bit dated and the door to the balcony was actually coming away from the wall so very hard to open and close.  We also had to share a balcony with the room
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! While we're disappointed to hear that you were bothered by the pageant, we're happy to hear that our team helped contribute to your overall great experience and that you enjoyed your accommodations. Should you return to Anaheim, we hope to welcome you back for a seamless stay.

Summary: The hotel is situated right on the entrance of the convention center and is very convenient if you have a conference in town. It is about two block from Disney – it is walkable, though I would not recommend doing that with children. The local bus station is right here and can take you to Disney.  The hotels have two towers, one with balconies all around and one without.  The hotel is older structure, and there is no way around that. That said the interiors are well kept with a warm and inviting lobby. The rooms themselves are up to par – but do not expect any luxury. This is a business hotel and at that, it doing well. My King size bed room included a chair, a desk, large high definition TV (though with very few channels in HD – in 2016 this seems to be very disappointing). The
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We're thrilled to hear that our property was central to all of your traveling needs and that you enjoyed your stay with us, overall. Should you return to the Anaheim area, we sincerely look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay.

Summary: Stayed here after a two week tour in Japan we enjoyed ourselves very much...great food service and amenities I would recommend the Marriott every time if you have the budget for it never will you be dissatisfied
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We're thrilled that you loved our excellent dining and amenities. Thank you for your generous recommendation. We loved reading your review and hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: Great hotel and staff . The hotel is so clean and it was so close to Wondercon. The restaurant and other shops were great in the hotel. There is a starbucks and other greats shops. Also there is a workout room. The restaurant has very good food not bad prices. Service for the restaurant good. The location is walking distance is close to Disneyland and a lot of restaurants and bars. Room at hotel are clean and new looking. Staff very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, rafiano1. We're happy to hear you enjoyed the many conveniences of our property, from shops to dining outlets, as well as our prime location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: Our family and friends stayed here last year for our wedding.  The rooms were clean, the staff was friendly.  We enjoyed relaxing by the pool and the location was perfect for our guests who wanted to visit Disneyland!
Manager Response: What an honor it is to have been a part of your love story. Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your special day with us! We love hearing that you found our guest rooms clean, our staff friendly and our location perfect for your guests. Thank you again and we hope you'll come back and see us soon.

Summary Heading: Nice, Clean, Comfortable and Close to the Parks
Summary: Although I stayed for work, of course I enjoyed the location, close to Downtown Disney (just a short walk).    The hotel is clean, has a Starbucks and deli/cafe that gets extremely busy in the morning when there is an event or two in the ballrooms.  The gym is large, but my suggestion?  If you'd like to get an hour's workout in, do so by 6 or 6:15 a.m. so you can grab coffee and whatever else you'd like before a convention if that's what you're there for.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to learn about your 5-star experience with us, Sadie! Nothing delights us more than knowing that you enjoyed our prime location and that you were able to work up a sweat inside our spacious fitness center. Should your travels bring you back to Anaheim,  it would be our pleasure to welcome you again.

Summary: My friend and I came down for a trip to Disneyland.  She is a breast cancer survivor so I wanted to do something special for her. I worked with Jennifer in concierge to have a fruit basket and balloons put in the room on our arrival day. Friend was surprised! Jennifer was a great help.   The room was very comfortable. Beds were great after a long day of walking at the park. If you are a step counter, I had 24,000 at the end of the day so you know I was beat!! Room was clean and decent size for two people. Might be a little snug for a whole family. We had a city view so faced away from Disneyland on the 19th floor. Nice big balcony with chairs and a small table. Would have been nice to have a few more bottles of water in the room but we had access to the concierge lounge so were
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear that your room exceeded your expectations and that our team went above and beyond to contribute to your wonderful stay. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to providing you with another seamless stay.

Summary: The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. The hotel is centrally located and a short walk away from a large number of restaurants and entertainment options. Additionally, it is on the shuttle route for Disneyland, which makes getting around very easy.   The staff (front desk, concierge, housekeeping and restaurant) were consistently friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room and our conveniently located hotel. Your positive feedback regarding our kind staff and shuttle to Disney is appreciated. We hope to welcome you again in the future!

Summary: Stayed here for a week while hubby was at a work conference and enjoyed the stay very much. Hotel is very modern and clean and has good food options on hand.The kids and I liked hanging out at the heated pool and spent most morning out there until we would head over to Disney for the afternoon. Our room was nice and clean with a balcony facing the pool. I would definately recommend this Hotel especially with the proximity to Disney!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our hotel. It's wonderful that you and your family enjoyed everything from the pool to the guest room balcony. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: Great and amazing hotel. Extremely beautiful with the Starbucks right inside. Great lobby area, restaurants and bar. The staff made me feel so welcome when I arrived. Kristy was amazing and so helpful. I had two reservations and she was able to help me connect them all the while with a great personality and wonderful smile!  Again special thanks to Kristy who was great, friendly, accomodating and amazing. Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the Starbucks, lobby and nFuse. It's great to hear that you received incredible service from our friendly staff. We hope to host you in the future for another five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I may be a bit exhausted after traveling all day, but I found there to be no signs for the pool location.  I even encountered a sarcastic employee down in Nfuse after I found the pool on my own.  I wondered whether there was another entrance to the pool or if I had to go through Nfuse to get there.  I was also very confused by the map of the hotel I was given, as it is just simply too bunched up and not clear.  One other thing I was hoping to get was a room with a balcony.  I was led to believe that every room had a balcony by the Marriott website.  Not true.  My room has a view of the convention center with no balcony and an air conditioner that seems to be barely working.  I'm not one to complain and may just be overtired.  Im sure my experience will improve by the time I
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Brendan. We truly value and appreciate your honest feedback so we can address your concerns internally. We're sorry to hear that your experience was less than ideal and we ensure you this is not typical of the kind of experience we strive to provide. We hope the rest of your stay was more enjoyable and we would love to welcome you back for a seamless experience in the future.

Summary: It was a pleasure to stay here. It looks like it's been newly renovated. The room was very well insulated against noise,  the air conditioning was quiet and effective. I believe each room has a balcony. Extra features in the facilities included a fabulous fitness center, beautiful pool is heated, and the restaurant was lovely. It's only a block away from Disneyland too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your guest room, as well as the fitness center and pool. It's great that you found our hotel to be conveniently located. We hope to have the chance to host​ you in the future.

Summary: Firstly, i would like to commend all of the staff @ Marriot Anaheim. We have been travelling for 4 weeks now across the world in over 12 Hotels and the Hospitality and friendliness you recieve as a guest here is world class!  Id especially like to mention Alicia at the front desk and Archie at the bell desk for their efforts. The finish and fit of the hotel is modern, you can see everything is well taken care of and presented nicely. Our room was fresh, clean and well presented also. The only thing that could be better would be that the bathroom size is very small. Good range of food @nfuse restaraunt and poolside service dining is also good. If you thinking of staying here for Disneyland i would reccomend it. Walking took us 10-15min to reach front gates. Alternatively they
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful feedback. We are pleased to hear that you received world-class service during your stay with us. It's wonderful that you enjoyed your clean guest room, dining experience and transportation to Disneyland​. Your feedback is really appreciated. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary Heading: A hotel you can recommend to your friends
Summary: The hotel has nice location, high quality food with efficient cervices , being close to the convention center is a bonus and we had party nights in the open walking areas beside the hotel. the rooms are nice and clean.  The staff are friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the clean guest rooms and our helpful staff. It's wonderful that you were fond of our hotels' close proximity to the convention center. We hope to host you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: I sometimes have stayed at the Courtyard in Santa Ana when I need to be in the area, which can be more expensive (which is not justified in my opinion), but this is my second stay here.  It is a very nice hotel.  I was upgraded to a king suite in the Oasis Tower, and it's huge with a very large table that was great for me to spread out my work since I had to get work done during my stay.  It's close to Disneyland so there can be traffic, but I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your suite in the Oasis Tower. Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed on. We hope to host you in the future for another five-star experience.

Summary: I felt like I was going to the penthouse here, being in a corner room on the top floor. Even though it was "just" a "regular" room, it was very cozy and welcoming. The layout and decor were nice, although it was disappointing that the refrigerator didn't work.  Housekeeping was very nice, not only giving me extra tea bags (kudos to *any* hotel that recognizes that not everyone drinks coffee) but even doing daily turndown service.  I was very pleasantly surprised at the nightly room rate, albeit a discounted convention rate, but still nice/unexpected.  Marriott probably has nothing to do with it, but wow, as convenient as it was to have a Starbucks off the main lobby, boy were the breakfast sandwiches expensive.  What Marriott *does* have *everything* to do with is the parking
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you were impressed with your guest room and enjoyed the service provided by our staff. It's wonderful that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location and Starbucks. Your feedback regarding the parking fee is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay!

Summary: Stayed here 3 nights, walked to Disneyland as it wasn't far but they do offer a shuttle at $5pp for there and back per day. Nice hotel, staff were friendly and gave us some discounts where they could..  Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' close proximity to Disneyland, as well as our friendly staff. Your feedback is really appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future!

Summary: Three weeks Prior to our arrival I called to request a king bed for my husband that it 6'5" and a dbl would not fit comfortably. Upon arrival we were told there are none left except a room on the ground floor with a walk in shower. No problem we thought so we took it only to discover it was an ADA room and had a shower that would only accommodate a wheelchair person or someone less than 4'5" tall and no option for it to be raised. We requested a different room which we received graciously and it was a very lovely room with a view so we were pleased. Only advice was the check in desk should have described the first room better. Otherwise out stay was very nice and the hotel is very clean and staff in each area were wonderful especially the restaurant where I met Jazmin who was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we're sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the first guest room you were assigned, we are delighted that you were pleased with your new room. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be friendly and enjoyed your dining experience at nFuse. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: This is a fairly typical Marriott of an older age.  Bathrooms are small with tub/shower combo.    Room is large, quiet, clean and well maintained with the exception of the smelly shower curtain that needed to have been replaced at least several days ago. Everything worked which from my experience in major hotels is a 50-50 proposition.  One of the pleasing features of the hotel are the elevators where you plug in your floor destination outside the elevator car.  This greatly optimizes the speed by which you get an elevator.  The concierge lounge and the fitness area met expectations and were fairly Marriott standard.  But similar to the sleeping room, by and large, everything in the fitness room worked and was well maintained.  The Southern Cal crowd is fitness savvy so expect
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your well-maintained guest room, concierge lounge, and the fitness room. It's wonderful that you found the cuisine at nFuse to be delicious. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to host you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Enjoy Disney by Staying at Anaheim Marriott!
Summary: I have to say....the service at this hotel was amazing! We have stayed in more expensive hotels...we have stayed in other Marriotts, but the service we received exceeded our expectations! From the first day when we met bellhop Hank (who never forgot my name) through the email we received WHILE WE WERE STILL AT THE HOTEL asking if everything was meeting our expectations...this was top notch service.   We stopped across the street just to see what the Hilton had to offer...but our hotel SMELLED GOOD (like Satsuma) every time we entered and throughout each hallway. The hotel bath products were great and also smelled like Satsuma. The wait staff was very attentive and never let us go without anything we wanted. The brunch (with such a fun and friendly omelette chef) was great! Nice
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are delighted to hear that you felt our staff went above and beyond to meet your needs. It's great that you were fond of the pool, guest rooms and convenient shuttle to Disney. We really appreciate your feedback and hope to host you for another incredible stay soon.

Summary: Loved it there ! My boyfriend enjoyed the gym so much he practically spent half of his time there! Super friendly and very nice! Will be coming back soon! The valet workers are always so cool asking us what we were doing and what not. Lol. Room was beautiful and clean! Couldn't ask for a better view!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are pleased to hear that your boyfriend really enjoyed the fitness equipment. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be helpful and enjoyed your clean guest room. We hope to welcome you for another five-star stay in the future.

Summary: This was a last minute reservation, the staff was very helpful and accommodating. We love the suite with a lager living room and nice sized bedroom. Plenty of space for our family of 5 and our service dog. It's walkable to Disneyland, but a long walk. There is a shuttle, however you have to fold up strollers to ride the shuttle, it was easier to walk then unload all the kids and stuff to fold up strollers. My biggest concern is that the bed was extremely firm. I'm a side sleeper and my arms kept falling asleep and going numb because there was no give in the mattress.  The breakfast was great, we particularly liked the made to order omelettes. The service in the restaurant and from the bell men was also excellent. However upon arrival we asked the bell man for a few extra towels
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be accommodating and enjoyed the delicious breakfast. Your feedback regarding the guest room bedding is appreciated.  It's wonderful that you found our staff to be accommodating of your son's service dog. We greatly appreciated your feedback and hope to host you again in the future!

Summary: Kick to the curb any marketing that says this hotel is a 'convention' hotel. The lobby bar is exciting and packed every night. Right next door is a great open-air restaurant area that is very Calif.-chic. The rooms are bright and large, and the location is impossible to beat. Steps away are 14 micro-breweries, wine and cheese eateries, boutique shopping, and lots of places to check out. Anaheim is certainly not just about Disneyland anymore!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere at nFuse, as well as the bright and spacious guest rooms. It's wonderful that you really enjoyed the attractions in the Anaheim area. We hope to host you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary Heading: Convention Marriott with small Exec lounge
Summary: This is an OLD (1970s) property that has been renovated to Marriott corporate standards.  It has two towers that are very separate, but only one has the executive lounge in it.  If you are remotely thinking of paying for access, DON'T.  It's just not worth it.  Way too small for the size of property it serves.    Please know that this is a conference hotel and that is it's bread and butter.  It has a Hertz, FedEx, Starbucks, and Pizza hut to go on property.  Breakfast and lunch buffets in the restaurant are very good, but also VERY expensive.    Staff is very good given that it is a convention property.  If it were me, I'd stay at the many newer and less expensive properties that are close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. While we're glad that you enjoyed the excellent service, we are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with our property. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star experience​.

Summary: Where do I start- lost reservation, housekeeping skipped room, told email invoice , never done.  I was terribly disappointed! Better places to stay in the area - like the Hilton across the street and I recommend this being a platinum Marriott member
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are very disappointed to hear about your experience with your reservation and housekeeping. Your feedback will be passed along to our team so that we can assure this does not happen in the future. We hope to have the chance to host you again so that we can provide you with the five-star experience that you deserve.

Summary: I had a great stay here.  My bed was extremely comfortable, though the room (especially bathroom) looked a little dated. The location to the convention center and walking distance restaurants was nice. I wish there had been time to visit Disneyland, but I could see the fireworks from my room which was fun. The elevators took some getting used to, but I ended up loving them because they were so fast and efficient. I don't think I ever waited more than a few seconds for an elevator. I thought the food at the Marriott Club level was nice, though wish it opened for breakfast at 6:00 instead of 6:30 which is pretty late for the business crowd.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable guest bed, smart elevators and kind staff. It's wonderful that you were able to enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from your guest room. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to host you in the future for another wonderful stay.

Summary Heading: Great service, great value, close to amenities, nice ambiance
Summary: We stayed here for our visit to Disneyland, it was quiet a walking distance to the park, about 10 minutes max. And although there were other hotels that were  closer to the park, it didn't felt that this hotel was too secluded. Plus there are shuttle bus that go right to the main gate of both the Disneyland parks and downtown Disney. The service were great, staffs were very attentive and there is starbucks, pizza hut and a gift shop down the lobby in case you want to do a last minute souvenir shopping. Overall we had a pleasant stay, room was always clean. The bathroom is a bit small but it was nice and clean. Pool area is also nice, we didnt get the time to enjoy it but it seemed nice. We would love to stay again here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, excellent service and the clean guest rooms. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: The food at the hotel was excellent and you truly cannot beat the location for attending the convention center.  You are very well located to go to Disney or many other restaurants if you choose.  A very nice marriott!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the delicious cuisine and our hotels' convenient location. Your kind feedback is appreciated and we hope to host you again in the future.

Summary: Had a recent 5 night stay for a convention. Overall the stay was at best average. It is clear money has been spent on refreshing the paint etc. but the hotel is showing its age and you can't paint over everything. Room was decent but the bed was soft and clearly an old mattress. Staff were friendly and my room was well serviced. I found the food on site uninspired and over priced. One personal issue is the charging of 16.00 US per day for wifi ! I find it amazing that a major convention hotel with its proximity to the "House of Mickey"  feels the need to charge for this service or at such an exorbitant daily rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are pleased that you experienced friendly service from the staff, we're sorry to hear that you were disappointed in the wi-fi charges. Your input is greatly appreciated​ and will be passed on. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience.

Summary: We stayed for seven nights and we were very pleased with the room. The hotel was stylish and well presented. Everything was clean and tidy. Amenities were useful and easy to locate. Staff were pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your clean guest room and useful amenities. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be helpful. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another five-star experience.

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is a typical convention center hotel. The best part about it is the location: it's literally right next to the convention center and a short ($5) shuttle ride to Disneyland. Otherwise, it's rather hum-drum: we had a typical, cookie-cutter room, somewhat blandly furnished, with a very average bathroom. Top marks for the good air conditioning and friendly staff. Low marks for the Starbucks in the lobby, which had outrageously long lines in the morning. If your goal is to have decent accommodations close to the convention center, this is your place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for 5 days and visited the Disneyland Resort every day. At first we were hesitant to book this hotel as it is "off-site" and seemed quite far from the Disneyland resort. During our stay, we found that even on the super-crowded days and hours in Disneyland during October, it never took us more than 40 minutes to reach "door-to-door": from our hotel room until we entered the parks' gates. And that includes the lines to the bus (we used the ART number 4 or 5), the security lines, and the parks' gates lines.    There are two bus stations located right outside of the hotel, one serves the Marriott and the other is across the street, next to the Hilton. The bus stops first at the Hilton station, and many times it filled up quickly and left no seating
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be friendly and very helpful. We hope to host you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I spent two nights at the Anahem Marriott in conjunction with a convention at the  Anaheim Convention Center.  The Marriott (and the adjacent Hilton) are conveniently located at on the front side of the Convention Center.  This is really is convention hotel: if you are at the Marriott you are probably there for business, although I did see some families with children who were obviously visiting DisneyLand rather than sitting in sessions in the Convention Center.  The rooms are modest, but fortunately have been updated so that there are lots of power jacks to accomodate multiple electrical devices (phones, tablets, etc.)  The Executive Lounge on the 18th was floor comfortable and efficient -- and a nice end of day retreat from the main loud, crowded lobby bar. The morning
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to fill us in on your stay at the Anaheim Marriott, Casey. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the great location for conferences, but disappointed that you did not experience a flawless stay with us. We're glad you enjoyed the Executive Lounge center! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and to not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Summary: I stayed at the Marriott in May, 2016 for a convention and it was incredibly convenient.  A few of my colleagues had issues with getting their room at the facility due to overbooking. Marriott assured them that they would fix it with a credit / refund but it took a lot of follow up for anything to come of that.  Otherwise, the facility was nice.  the pool area was cool but it was surrounded by restaurant tables so it reduced the space available for just hanging out and increased the noise level.  The food is of course expensive which is common for these types of hotels but the quality was good and everything I ate was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed the food at nFuse, as well as the outdoor pool area. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to host you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary: We chose to stay over one night after visiting Disneyland.  I am a Marriott Gold Elite which gave me the benefit of use of their concierge lounge as well as a late checkout. We enjoyed their hor d'oeuvres and morning breakfast.  The complimentary fruits and refreshments were great as well.  The hotel location was close enough to Disneyland so we simply walked there. For children or the elderly, It would have been a nice feature if they had offered a complimentary shuttle or for a reasonable price.  The hotel location made access to the I5 quite easy.   The only little disappointment was their elevator security.  It allowed anyone in the hotel to access any floor in the hotel.  Most hotels require a key fob to enter the floor where their room is located.  The renovations to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the concierge lounge, guest rooms and our hotels' convenient location. Your feedback regarding the elevators is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another excellent stay.

Summary: If traveling to Anaheim for a convention or a fun visit to Disneyland, this hotel is great. Good size rooms and bathrooms. Coffee machine in the room with complimentary regular & decaf coffee and tea.Valet parking is expensive!
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, complimentary coffee and comfortable guest rooms. Summary Heading: Great view of the nightly Disneyland Fireworks
Summary: We were on a high floor in the hotel, facing Disneyland (north facing room), which meant it was quiet (also on the Concierge level) and allowed you to see the nightly fireworks at 9:30 pm released at Disneyland. The room was comfortable. The bathroom is small, but adequate. There was a king bed. Only one chair in the room makes for difficult sitting for two! The TV has an HDMI cable, but you can never select that as a choice, so if you bring your own movies/lap-top, you will not be able to connect. Great pool and hot tub area with bar and restaurant adjacent. Amazingly, they had free guest electric vehicle charging, including Tesla! But, you do have to pay for parking (which is not cheap!). Overall, a great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your guest room with a view of the Disneyland fireworks. Summary: Upon opening the room door, I immediately called down to be moved to my requested king bed instead of the two beds I believe to be full size in the room.  Listening to the "we are very busy and ....", speech, I knew I was done when he asked if I was a Rewards member.  Needless to say, my 6'-5" body used the little bed for 3 nights.  Property is clean and very convenient to the convention center.  For a return, I would try another property from the many to choose from so I won't have to sleep in a room for idea for children.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us, Don. While we are glad that you found our location ideal for the convention center and our property clean, we're sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your guest room. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed on. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future so that we can improve upon your stay.

Summary: Great location to convention center. Typical hotel. Kind of dated but clean. Would stay here again. Nice to have a Hyatt across the street so that I can get a Coke Zero. This Pepsi only stuff, at Marriott, is crazy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location and clean guest rooms. Your feedback regarding the soda offerings is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another pleasant stay.

Summary: Stayed here for one night as part of a Disneyland trip that ended up being 3 different hotels in 3 nights.  We had originally planned to stay 2 nights, but my daughter got sick so we had to check out early.  We had a great time at the Anaheim Marriott and everything is very up to date.  We ended up being placed in the older dingy looking tower, but luckily the inside was modern and well appointed.  The rooms felt pretty small, but they were clean and comfortable.  The pool is awesome, and was one of the best parts of our trip.  It was a little bit cooler when we went so it was never very busy which made it even better, but there was plenty of room had it been busy.  We opted to press the "service" button out by the pool to order drinks.  This is one of the reason why we gave
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet, kind service and our hotels' close proximity to Disneyland. Your feedback regarding the pool service is very much appreciated and will be passed on to our team. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay.

Summary: The room was clean enough but the food lacked in quality. The rooms are old and worn out with the tv shaking as you walked across the floor. Our sink was so stinky I had to close the plunger to brush my teeth. I left a note for the maid. Note gone sink still stinky. Couldn't say enough good things about the friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. Summary Heading: Nice stay for conference in September
Summary: Had a nice stay at the Anaheim Marriott during a work conference in September 2016. Check in was fast. SLOW internet but they upgraded me for free. Starbucks in hotel - friendly staff. Conference food was NOT good at all. That was a big disappointment as it was catered by the hotel. Room was large, clean and comfortable. Gym had few benches but plenty of treadmills, weights etc. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for a conference. Summary Heading: Great Hotel with everything you need for your holiday
Summary: The hotel is next to the convention centre so its busy all the time but you don't get that super busy feeling when staying here.  The staff at the is hotel are amazing.  Very professional and definitely look after the customer.  A credit to management.   The beds are comfy, the pool is great ( half in shade and half out).  The food is reasonably priced for what you would expect at a hotel.  There is a pizza hut and starbucks with a side little shop that sells sandwiches etc.  I did no use them however, there is a Fed Ex which for australians is expensive if you want to send some of your gear home if your over the weight from any souvenirs or gear you may buy on your holiday. You may sit to buy a box  to put your gear in.  There is also a hertz rental car desk.   There is a bus
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be excellent. Summary: This location is close to Los Angeles. While on business I visited and was very impressed with the amenities on site as well as eateries and vendors nearby. I had the opportunity to visit the Valley and Compton while on the west coast.

Summary Heading: Classy hotel but watch the extras
Summary: If you are going to Disney land this hotel is short shuttle ride away.  Comfortable and impeccable in its presentation.  You will find that you have to pay for parking ($25) and believe it or not, still have to pay for wifi (tiny hotels in the middle of nowhere don't charge but big hotels in the city still think they can charge).
Manager Response: Thanks for your amazing review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the short shuttle to Disneyland, as well as the comfortable guest rooms. Your feedback regarding parking and wi-fi is appreciated. We hope to host you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Had a two day training conference here and from the moment you walked in the door, I felt stress fall away.  Beautiful lobby/bar/restaurant area.  The lobby is a hub for morning coffee or afternoon drink and the ability to work at small tables on your laptop.  I was waiting for my Uber in the lobby and a server came over and asked if I would like an ice tea or water while I waited.  That's service.  Enjoy an evening cocktail outside by the pool-very relaxing. Also, loved the security feature of the elevators, very cool.  Would definitely stay here again when in Anaheim. Loved this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're pleased that you felt comfortable at our hotel and enjoyed the friendly service provided by our staff. It's great that you also enjoyed the smart elevators. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: A great option for business travelers. The lobby is well appointed, with less traffic than other another nearby hotel. Service was friendly -- from valet through housekeeping. My check-in was very nice, as the desk clerk went out of her way to accommodate my wish for a quiet room (there was a concert stage under construction in the plaza out front.)  I wound up in an ADA, far-corner room, with a balcony. Interesting configuration. I know people who require this accommodation, and I found some of the features puzzling. For me, it was comfortable and I was happy for my 5 night stay.  This hotel has a computerized elevator system-- which worked wonderfully in high traffic. Only once was there a line-- which was considerable-- but the elevator system helped manage the crowd

Summary Heading: huge hotel also huge on service excellence and quality - Recommend!
Summary: This Marriott property has 2 towers of overnight stay rooms, a huge convention center meeting rooms facility, and many other features that make this venue a winner if you need to stay in the Anaheim area.   The rooms are very bright (which I like) - not sure if that's part of a total rooms renovation or just added brighter lights; makes the room look more vibrant and new.  The Concierge Lounge here is stellar. They state they offer 'hors doerves' in the evening, but if what they served were hors doerves then I only need to eat hors doerves in the evening (salmon over tasty orzo pasta and stir-fry chicken over rice the two nights I enjoyed their evening concierge lounge - in addition to salad, fresh fruit, desserts, etc.). You definitely won't go hungry.   Their fitness center

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel!   It has an incredible exercise room

Summary Heading: Great staff makes all the difference
Summary: Stayed here for a week for a work conference. Rooms are large but dated- old TVs and air con. BUt, my stay was great because of the staff. From the desk staff to to the concierges, the breakfast wait staff and door men. Always smiling with endless helpful advice. Would happily revisit.

Summary: This is a pretty average hotel. The rooms are nice and big. Older but updated. Great location, close to Disney Land and the convention center. Beds are comfortable. We ordered room service and the food was fast and really great! You have to pay $12.95 a day for wifi, this is a huge negative for me.

Summary: We were in town for Minecon, so things were a bit on the busy side. Sadly our room a/c was weak at best and I could have done without some of the noise. Be smarter and ask for a room away from the elevators and not facing the street.  Poolside service was non-existent, sat there for at least two hrs with the kid and no one stopped to ask if Id like anything, oh well.

Summary: My family of 6 stayed at this hotel Mother's Day weekend during the Tinker-bell Half Marathon at Disneyland. The rooms were comfortable and clean and a good size . The staff was friendly , however they could have been slightly more prepared to answer questions about transportation for race participants . Transportation to Disneyland was easy , it's a bit of a walk but doable , but bus transportation was available . There's a Starbucks in the hotel which is always a plus . Overall a great hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable and clean room during your stay with for Tinker bell​ Half Marathon. Summary: So it is not the hotel's fault that I came down with the flu while staying there, however, it is their fault that the soda machine was empty for 5 days (on the 9th floor), the concierge couldn't tell me if there was a grocery delivery service or how to access it (there is Vons and Task Rabbit) nor could anyone at the facility manage to get me a Gatorade or any type of electrolyte drink (not on the room service menu).  To top it all off, the air conditioner in my room was broken, and the noise level from the cars was intolerable.  I will never stay at a big box Marriott again.  I will gladly pay more money for more personalized experience in where I feel like I am an actual guest in an establishment.  Two thumbs way down Marriott -- disappointing!

Summary: We came to Anaheim for Minecon 2016. It was the official hotel. Perfect location for walking to convention center. Easy Uber pick up spot. Seemed safe and well lit at night. Food trucks out in street were added bonus.

The room overall was clean, received new towels every night and had clean sheets.

Summary: This was my first stay at the Marriott. I have stayed across the street at the Hilton before but decided to give this property a try. It’s a smaller property so I liked that feel and the rooms seem more updated and comfortable.   Having a full service and large Starbucks with a marketplace in the hotel was also convenient. The biggest downfall of this property is the “room service.” This is a property where there is no real room service. Everything arrives pre-packaged in to-go containers. There are no trays or real silverware. To me this is an awful trend. Because of this to-go concept, the menu is limited and unappetizing. There is nothing I wanted to order from the menu. Summary Heading: BEST place to stay for business or pleasure

I even got a notification that our room key is ready.  When we got the key, I told front desk that I requested for a crib. She said it should be in our room. We didn't go to our room yet, we went out to grab lunch and when we came back, it's not yet there. I called to follow it up and it came quick.  Room The bed is very comfy as well as the pillows. The room is a good size. We were at 14th floor and we were surprised there's a balcony. We can hang outside and get some fresh air. When we were walking barefooted though,

Summary Heading: Nice, but a far one block from Disneyland
Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is a nice, business-centered hotel a block away from Disneyland.  Keep in mind that the city blocks here are tremendously huge, and it was quite a walk.  After a couple of walks, we ended up taking the Anaheim Transit District bus to and from Disney at a small fee.  You can buy the bus passes in the lobby store.  The room was good size, fairly updated, and clean.  There was nothing wrong with our stay, it just wasn't remarkable, but definitely not bad.   We enjoyed the Starbucks in the lobby (long waits) and otherwise, it was an enjoyable stay, but we never got to enjoy the pool after spending so much time at Disney.  It's fine for business, the Convention Center, and Disney if you don't mind the long walk or shuttle, but if you're going to walk to Disney

Summary: Perfect location if you're attending an event at the Anaheim Convention Center, since this Marriott and the Hilton are the closest hotels to the center. Also convenient to Disneyland. Many restaurants within one mile.   The room was great. Clean. Very comfortable bed with fluffy comforter and pillows, all covered in white bedding, not a gross bedspread that doesn't get washed after every guest.  Our room was on the 14th floor, and had a balcony you could actually walk out onto through the sliding glass door.  Room amenities included small refrigerator, individual coffee maker with a selection of teas as well.  Starbucks, Pizza Hut, and other restaurants are located inside this hotel, and on multiple trips to this area there have been food trucks just outside in the area between

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is an excellent property. I stayed here with my 16 year old and we went to Disneyland for her sweet 16! We chose to stay here since it's within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventures. It's a bit of a walk but its not more than 15 minutes .The only terrible thing is that there seems to be construction going on.  The hotel itself was excellent and the staff seemd to be very attentive and even went the extra mile for her birthday. Rooms are standard and we stayed on the concierge level as I am gold elite. After a lengthy reassurance by the staff  it was ok and

However, ART buses have a stop in the middle of the parkway between the Marriott and the Hilton across the street.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The front desk, housekeeping and food service staff all seemed sincere in trying to be friendly, helpful and wanting to do what they could to make the stay the best if could be. I thought that the customer service level exceeded that of the Disney parks, but the bar is a lot lower for the

It WAS Labor Day weekend and there were Disney-sponsored races that weekend.  First thing you will notice if you self-park, is that it is a hike from the parking structure elevator to check-in.  The hotel is immediately next to Anaheim Convention Center and, as a result, has a number of conference rooms/ballrooms on the ground floor level.  You pass by them on your trek to the lobby.  Once we got to the lobby check-in was a breeze.  We were actually given a choice of two pool-view rooms.  We elected to stay on the ground floor since there was a large wedding (we heard 400) taking place in the hotel that weekend, as well as a

Summary Heading: Pretty close to perfect, and a great location.
Summary: This is a hotel smack dab by the Anaheim Convention Center, approx. 1 mile walk or bus from the DisneyLand resort and it is just about perfect. Great pool, great concierge lounge, great house-keeping . . . yeah, I would stay here again, definitely  After dropping off our car with Avis nearby, we used the ART to get to / from DisneyLand.  Very convenient, as our ART passes were even delivered directly to the front desk before we arrived as this hotel is a "partner" hotel with Disney.

It's' great that you were able to travel with a rental car and the ART efficiently​. We hope to welcome you soon for another excellent stay!

Summary Heading: Great pool area.  Close to Disneyland.
Summary: Great checkin.  Spotless room.  Awesome pool area and spa.  Easy walk to Disneyland and safe walk at night.    Free wifi in lobby (or on your patio).  No free in room wifi (expensive).  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We love to hear that you enjoyed your clean guest room, free wi-fi and the pool area. It's great that you were fond of our hotels' convenient location and felt safe at our hotel. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary: Stayed for just a quick night on business.  Everything went according to plan with great service as you'd expect.  I had a low cost fare which was great and even more surprising is they upgraded me to a two level suite.  I did not know they even had suites like that but it's amazing.  Wish I had been there with my family for Disneyland.  The bar is great for eating and having a drink as well which is one of the reasons I'm happy I stayed here.  Very energetic and a great location for walking.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you received excellent service and was able to receive an upgraded room. It's great that you enjoyed your meal at nFuse as well. We hope to welcome you in the future whether it be for business or leisure.

Summary: Clean and tidy though somewhat dated decor in the room. Good size main room but bathroom was rather tight. Excellent location to Disneyland, a 20min walk or hop on the bus to be taken directly there. Beds are very comfortable! Staff were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, as well as your guest room. We love to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful. We hope to welcome you soon for another excellent​ stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Room was nice, bathroom small. Closet small. View was awful. Got a larger corner balcony king room. Stared at a roof top across the parking lot for 3 days. Didn't visit the bar, but expected hotel to be larger. Pool area also looked bigger in pics. Was just fine for our needs considering we were attending an event at the convention center for 3 days - but wouldn't necessarily go out of my way to stay here. Hotel asked for a $3 delivery fee to bring some empty glasses to the room which I though was ridiculous. But who's going to argue over 3 bucks when you're already spending so much money to be there?
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is a very clean. Trendy lobby and bar areas. Room service is very good  offering excellent value. Pool area is very beautiful however it would have been nice if it was open later. The rooms were nothing special very average. small bathroom but was nice to have the balcony. Very helpful staff. Door men were excellent always helping out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our clean hotel, as well as the excellent room service. It's great that you found our staff to be incredibly helpful. Your feedback regarding the pool hours and guest rooms is appreciated and will be passed on to our team. We hope to welcome you in the future for another great stay.

Summary: The Anaheim feels like a Marriott -- welcoming staff, spacious rooms, good public space, attentive conference personnel -- all of which adds up to a pleasant stay. Good café just off the lobby for breakfast and an expansive Starbucks for coffee, sandwiches and salads on the way to the conference rooms. Nicely situated right next to the Convention Center and across from the Hilton with Disneyland a short bus ride away. The rooms and hallways do show a lot of wear and tear that comes with a property that is constantly full -- a full revitalization should be somewhere in the plans for the next two years. Thanks to the staff for making it a good conference hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room, attentive staff and excellent meal options. It's great that you were fond of our hotels' close proximity to the Convention Center and Disneyland. We hope to welcome you soon for another stay whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary: Just returned today from a 5 night stay here for a Disney family vacation. This is our second stay here in the last one and a half years. I have stayed at the Disneyland Hotel multiple times, as well as at least four other Disney area properties. This is my favorite place to stay.  AESTHETICS: beautifully remodeled, modern decor, well-done, looks very high-end  LOCATION: walking distance to Disney parks, but also accessible via the ART (Anaheim shuttle)-- recommended if traveling with small children; across from the Hilton which has a food court inside and a nice gift shop; down from Convention Center entrance; walking distance to Morton's Steak House and IHOP.   AMENITIES: Restaurant, bar, room service, Starbucks, grab n go, bell service; 1600 watt blow dryer, iron, ironing
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' remodeling, convenient location, and high-quality guest rooms. It's wonderful that you were fond of the excellent service provided by our staff and affordable room rates. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim!

Summary: It is a brand Marriott with lots of extras. Nice pool area, close to Disneyland, next to the convention center. The staff is incredibly accommodating. Bars and restaurants are unique and reasonably priced. Will definitely be back when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the pool, nFuse restaurant, and our hotels' convenient location. Your kind feedback regarding our staff is appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you again in the future!

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is a 2-minute walk from the convention centre, 10-min walk to the Disney gate, and generally a great location for Anaheim-related activities. The facilities are good, including its own conference facilities. The rooms are average. We paid almost $300 per night (after conference discount) for a very standard double room; nothing fancy. In my experience the value proposition is significantly less than what I usually see on the conference circuit. Also the meals were very expensive -- eg, $30 for a salad!  Service was fair -- lines at check-in/reception were perennial and slow.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your valuable feedback, David. We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and value your input. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our meetings space, but are disappointed to hear that we did not exceed your expectations overall. We hope to have the chance to host you again in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star experience.

Summary: Pretty typical of the Marriott chain. Nothing that makes it stand out. The front desk was not the best but okay. The lobby was nice and spacious. The room was pretty standard. The bathroom was a little dated but okay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review on your stay with us. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our wonderful lobby and overall stay at our hotel. Should your travels bring you back to Anaheim, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and to exceed your expectations!

Summary: Lobby and hotel are very nice looking, elevators are modern and super cool and front desk very helpful.  Concierge lounge by Marriotts definition is suppose to be exclusive.  Well, it's not so exclusive when they let in a volleyball team of college students from Pahao college.  Nothing personal about them but I doubt a college student has stayed 50 nights to gain gold status.  Either the coach of the team let everyone in or the hotel made it part of the contract.  In he the first case, the lounge needs to be monitored.  In the second case, it would not be fair to elite members for the hotel to crowd the lounge. They have paid the price for exclusively.  Letting anyone in dilutes the privilege.  Te echo tell needs to fix the broken gate as you exit the parking garage.  It has
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. While we are glad that you enjoyed the smart elevators, lobby and helpful staff, we're sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the crowds in the concierge lounge. Your feedback regarding this and the exit gate are appreciated and will be passed on to our team. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star experience.

Summary: Went here on business- really loved the pool side space.  The hotel felt upscale- actually more upscale that I see most Marriotts.  It actually inspired me to remodel my deck space. It was a nice stay- thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the pool and our hotels' atmosphere. It's wonderful that our decor inspired you to remodel your own space! We hope to welcome you in the future for another wonderful stay in Anaheim.

Summary: My family and I stayed here August 14thru the the 21st.Before checking in I called for a few requests all of them were honored .The hotel is very clean modern and has a great staff.The concierge lounge is amazing.The food is plenty and the staff is friendly.Housekeeping was also great .I have stayed at the best hotels and have had long check ins ,dusty furniture and not able to get thru to the front desk.The Marriott runs this place like The Ritz .I would definatley return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your guest room. We love to learn that our staff met your requests prior to check-in and that you received incredible service. Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. WE look forward to welcoming you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay.  The staff was helpful from the moment we pulled into the drive way, at check-in/out and at the NFuse restaurant.  Very nice pool, atmosphere and in a very nice area of town.  CVS, Target and Disney all within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed the wonderful service provided by our staff, as well as the inviting atmosphere and pool areas. It's great that you were able to walk to the local attractions from our hotel. We hope to host you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent Four Night Stay for Disney
Summary: This was our first stay at this hotel and it was wonderful. The staff were very friendly and so helpful. We usually stay at hotels across the street from the parks, but this time I wanted a hotel that offered relaxation as well as a decent location. The Marriott was perfect for this. I originally booked at another hotel, but changed when I discovered that the Marriott had a great deal through Costco and included the little extras that Costco offers. I made the right decision.   My daughter and I arrived around 10:30 and were delighted that we could check into our room already! Such a bonus after taking an early morning flight (I checked to see that there was not a convention on the calendar at that time so perhaps they were less busy?). We stayed in the Oasis tower and found it
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are delighted to hear that you received incredible service from our staff and felt comfortable in your spacious guest room. It's great that you found our hotel to be conveniently located and were greeted with a warm welcome during each approach to the entrance. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star Anaheim vacation.

Summary: All looks really nice and exciting. We are really looking forward to our visit. We usually stay at the Embassy Suites in the same parking lot. However, we are venturing out to the Marriott this time. Embassy Suites doesn't seem to be quite what it used to be. The one downside to the Marriott is that the so called included breakfast is not actually included. I reserved our room with breakfast included for a higher price. However, looking further into it, it only includes breakfast for two. However, our reservation is for 6. It's a major downside to these accommodations.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and value your input. We are sorry to hear that the breakfast was not what you expected. We hope to have the chance to host you again in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star experience.

Summary Heading: Dated and in need of TLC
Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott in 2008 and while I know they completed a huge renovation in the 8 years since my last stay, not much has changed.  The lobby and elevators and flooring is certainly updated but the sleeping rooms!  The old bathrooms and loud a/c units are in desperate need of updating.  I was originally placed on the 2nd floor overlooking the self-park parking lot. My balcony was directly over cars so when I walked into the room all I could see were people standing right outside my room.  As a woman traveling alone, I can't say that I would have felt comfortable staying in this room so I did ask to move.  The hotel was fully booked but after a wait of a couple hours, I was given a room on the 5th floor which felt much safer.    I think this hotel is fine if you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. While we're glad that you were moved to a room that you felt more comfortable in, we are sorry to hear that you found our hotel to need updating. Your input is greatly appreciated and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience.

Summary: While this location is an older and dated Marriott location, I thought the service, banquet food quality and rooms were quite fine.   The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Housekeeping also did a nice job.   It is located right next to the Convention Center and near many restaurants.   Overall a solid place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased that you found our staff to be friendly and accommodating. It's wonderful that you also enjoyed the meal options and our hotels' close proximity to the convention center. We hope to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: Perfectly located next to Disneyland, the hotel looks great. Very nice lobby, comfortable rooms giving a sense of luxury. A great experience at a very (very!) attractive price. Why choose a motel type chain when you can get this best value for money. I highly recommend this Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, comfortable guest rooms and affordable rates. Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary Heading: Great name, huge price, small rooms and noisy
Summary: We stayed at the Marriott from August 10 to August 15 2016. We attended a business convention at the Anaheim convention centre.  Check-in was great and fast. We checked-in through their mobile app before we arrived at the hotel. They have a dedicated booth for mobile check-in.  We arrived at our room and discovered a vending machine just besides our door and making a huge noise and the room had 2 double beds. We asked to change room and they accepted. However, they did not have any King bed rooms before another day. So we moved to a temporary room on the 9th floor with our balcony giving on the pool. We could not sleep before very late as it was extremely noisy. The hotel is old and lets all the noise in.  The following day we moved to a third and larger room on the 8th floor
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your constructive feedback. While we are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be excellent, we're sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your guest room. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed on to our team. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay.

Summary: They had us at "Hello"!!! Even if these rooms were horrible...and they are NOT!!!!... They are superb!!!! The front desk was like family!!! They took time with us!!! I mean TIME!!! Explaining and enticing us with our close and surrounding areas. What love, what cleanliness, what care. Just what my daughter and I needed. We don't know if this will be our last trip together, if it is....we felt loved and appreciated!!! Thank you for your loving kindness! We definitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We love to hear that you enjoyed your guest room, as well as the excellent service provided by our staff. It pleases us that you felt so welcomed. We hope to greet you for another spectacular stay in the future.

Summary Heading: A short family trip to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here recently to visit Disneyland. The lobby and common area were clean and renovated.   As for the room, they just felt smaller than your normal Marriott room. I am going to assume it's to make more rooms for visitors for the park and conference accommodations. The bathroom was also small. I am a Marriott person and would still stay here but you are accustomed to certain room size.   The pool is great for young children or adults that just want to sit and cool down but I would like the pool a little warmer. I was cold in it, even after being in it for more than 30 minutes.   Minor stuff but I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed the pool, as well as our great room. Your feedback regarding the guest rooms is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another wonderful stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Okay, this is a convention hotel and I set a low bar. How wrong. Right from the off I was surprised. Reception and check in was a delight. Straight to my ready room. Lifts modern and fast. My room 385 was quite a walk but came with a balcony with a view of the pool. The room was spacious. It was clean. The WiFi worked effectively. Bathroom was clean. My stay was 5 nights and overlapped The management conference and NACE. I have to say with so many delegates for both conferences service at the hotel restaurant for breakfast and lunch was efficient and the staff helpful and supportive. The bar team were first rate. Again more than I expected. There is a Starbucks on site and this was disapointing. Service was rubbish. Car valet worked well. Staff helpful and supportive. Well done
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room, clean bathrooms and efficient wi-fi. It's wonderful to hear that you found our staff to be excellent and really enjoyed​ your stay with us. We hope to welcome you in the future whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Comfortable hotel with good conference facilities
Summary: Comfortable conference venue, with good loungebar for meeting with people. Great food as well. Wifi was on/off and had to be logged in every time again. Can this be organized differently? Starbucks does not have sufficient capacity at conference time; you have to wait half an hour to order coffee at some times
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. While we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your meal at nFuse, we're sorry to hear that you experienced difficulties with the wi-fi and found the wait to be long at Starbucks. Your feedback is very important to us and will be passed on. We hope to host you again in the future whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Convenient to Convention Center and Disneyland!
Summary: The Anaheim Marriott property is directly next to the Anaheim convention center and a block away from Disneyland.  Disney also provides a shuttle service to the park.  The property itself is typical Marriott quality in terms of service and furnishings, but the actual structure is beginning to look dated.  An example would be the physical key operated metal box in the wall that serves as a safe deposit box.  Also, the evening noise from the pool dining area could be heard even though the balcony door was closed.  Overall though the staff and service were wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' close proximity to Disneyland and incredible service provided by our staff. Your feedback regarding the safe and pool noise is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' input. We hope to have the chance to welcome you again in the future for another great stay​ in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Very nice, prompt service, cool elevators
Summary: I stayed at this hotel as a conference attendee, and I was impressed with the great hospitality of virtually everyone I met, from the front desk to the restaurant. While I'm always a little sad when there's no mini-bar full of snacks and tiny adorable bottles of liquor, aside from that the room was perfectly serviceable. It had a decent balcony overlooking the extremely festive pool/outdoor dining area, which was very enjoyable. The housekeeping staff was prompt (I hate coming home at 4pm and the room still hasn't been visited), tidying the room early in the day. The only problem I encountered was a slow Wednesday night at the hotel restaurant - very bad service, and an inedible steak I had to send back - but then my wine was comped in exchange for the inconvenience. The
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the great hospitality provided by our staff. It's wonderful that you enjoyed the smart elevators and our hotels' convenient location. While we're disappointed to hear that you received unsatisfactory at nFuse, we're glad that our staff was able to improve upon this with a new steak and complimentary wine. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Very nice people at the front desk. Good customer service. Clean room! Hotel is close to main attractions. We went to Knott's Berry Farm.
