There's also a Burger King near by and a medieval times restaurant that we didn't have time to check out but will definitely do next time. This is a prime location for the hotel as many nationwide known chain restaurants are near by and it's easy to find. The staff at the Starbucks in the lobby were informative and cordial. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We love to hear that you received incredible customer service and enjoyed the nearby attractions. It's wonderful that you found our hotel to be conveniently located and clean. We look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary: The Marriott Anaheim was my most dreadful experience ever - travelling for more than 23 hours on a flight from Australia to attend the American Academy of Management conference -as a Professor who travels the world I cannot tell you how much this hotel spoiled my experience of comfort and pleasure.   It was not simply poor service - from the time the bags were left by the Taxi on the Marriott  entrance and completely ignored by the staff (two older women in their 60s having to drag them all inside the hotel in full view of bellboys standing around)  To reaching the front desk and be asked for a card to take an imprint - which to me is usual practice at hotels.  They called me 'Ms' which at the time I corrected and I specifically asked the front desk to either call me by my first
Manager Response: We are very concerned about your experience, Chris. Could you please privately message us on Facebook at /AnaheimMarriott so that we can improve upon this situation?

Summary: I stayed in this hotel last week as part of a conference. While it is looking a little dated, and the tiny bathrooms the rooms are not terribly convenient, the service I had right from the beginning was notably excellent. I arrived at 9:15am and was given an 'early check-in' room on the 3rd floor, which certainly beat the alternative of waiting around for several hours after having disembarked from a long flight. On my second day I received an email from the hotel inquiring if everything was OK. I mentioned the low-floor room with no balcony, and was immediately upgraded to a nicer room on the 16th floor with a balcony. Both rooms I slept in were very quiet and the bed was amazingly comfortable. Based on these experiences I would return to this hotel if ever I travel to Anaheim
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for a conference. It's wonderful that you enjoyed an early check-in and room upgrade. Your kind feedback is appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Summary: Went on a mini vacation with family 👪. As we enter the hotel the lobby was a lounge as a restaurant. Friendly staff very helpful and took the time to make our room ready. Lots a places to eat and Disneyland was close. I would recommend this to anyone. Thanks for the hospitality and I'll be coming back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear that you and your family received friendly service from our staff. It's wonderful that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location as well. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another five-star experience.

Summary Heading: 7 Days.... Just the boys. (son and I)
Summary: Summer vacation with my son. We checked in on a Saturday without delay and had the car valet parked it's $4 more for valet. Had our room upgraded with no charge, we had a high floor with a pool view. The pool is nice (heated) there is a hot tub which was great after a long drive. Restaurant/bar service poolside. After 4 days there we decided to stay an additional 3 days but were told it was sold out and then we were told to check back early in the morning see if anything changed. Much to our delight there was 2 rooms available so we got a room and were able to keep our original room. The service there is impeccable, everyone says Good Morning/Evening and are always willing to help out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review. We are delighted to hear that you and your son enjoyed your vacation with us in Anaheim. It's great that you were fond of the pool, nFuse dining, and the exceptional service provided by our staff. We are very pleased that you chose to extend your stay and was able to stay in your original guest room. We hope to welcome you again in the future for another enjoyable stay!

Summary Heading: Loved staying on the first floor
Summary: The first floor king room is so super comfortable! Staff are excellent, but being on the first floor right around the corner from the concierge is divine!  Pool to the right, lobby to the left, I felt like the gorgeous entry space was my living room!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased to hear that you felt comfortable in your guest room. We love to hear that you found the service to be excellent and enjoyed the pool and great room. Your feedback is very much appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: The hotel is located close to Disneyland Anaheim and other theme parks which is convenient if you are into that sort of thing. The rooms are spacious and clean, reception staff is welcoming and friendly. Wifi is more of a mixed bag and works intermittently. TV reception can also be an issue with no signal on digital channels. Clearly some TV sets need updating. $25 a day for parking is also rather steep.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. While we're glad that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, spacious rooms, and friendly staff, we're sorry to hear that you experienced issues with the wi-fi and TV reception. Your feedback regarding the parking fee is also appreciated. We value our guests' feedback and hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay.

Summary: The rooms and balcony were spacious and clean. The bathroom was small. The wifi connection was really bad in the rooms area but worked fine in the lounge. Quite close to the Disneyland Park, walking distance to downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in sharing your recent experience with us. We are thrilled to have been able to host you and thank you for you feedback in regards to the room and balcony being clean, the size of the bathroom, the Wi-Fi connection, and found it as a plus that we are located close to Disneyland. We hope the opportunity to host you again for another memorable stay.

Summary: This hotel has one of the best elevators I've seen.   There are 6 of them -- you punch in the floor before entering.   Once you get on the elevator, it will only take you to where you want to go.   The centralized control system does the 'elevator coordination', so the elevators won't stop by the same floor and maximize the service speed!   It's excellent.   The Executive Lounge is fine with standard fare.   The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are clean and well kept -- upto the high standard expected of Marriott.   If I'm back to this area, I'll stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our smart elevators, as well as our executive lounge. We love to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and our guest rooms to be well-kept. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary: I have stayed in many places, but this hotel was by far the best!!!   Everything was great!  The staff (professional, polite, knew what they were doing, efficient, courteous, helpful, and so much more!), the room (clean, comfortable, spacious, balcony), the amenities, the food (good variety, priced decently, great taste), the location (within walking distance to a lot of places)!!!  It was easy, convenient, relaxing, comfortable, and so enjoyable.  Compared to the last place I stayed at, what a difference!   Thank you Anaheim Marriott!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review. We are very pleased to hear that you experienced incredible service from our staff, excellent amenities and delicious meal options. It's wonderful that you felt relaxed and comfortable at our hotel. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another wonderful stay in the future.

Summary: Stayed for a convention and service made the stay.  Rooms seem recently updated with newer hardware and furniture making up for more dated construction.  Kudos also go out to putting LED lights in the bedside lamps - finally, I can read with no dim flickering CFL bulb!  What made the difference for my stay was the service.  From a warm check in to fantastic housekeeping (the unsung heroes of the hotel industry)  to a can-do attitude on check-out when I needed a duplicate food receipt for my expense report.  Management here must be doing something right - everyone was courteous and enthusiastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We love to hear that you received a warm welcome and incredible service during your stay with us for a convention. It's wonderful to hear your kind feedback. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed in a king, corner room on our way back from Legoland to Manhattan Beach. We spent the day in Carlsbad at Legoland and booked a room at the Marriott en route back so we could enjoy Disneyland for the day. The rooms are totally fine, nothing fancy. It is absolutely a convention/business hotel. Expect big groups from conferences. The check in experience was super easy and as a Marriott Rewards member, we have free wifi. Otherwise the wifi is $12.95 per day which I find a bit annoying. We were walking distance to many great food options for dinner. We chose to go to Mortons with our 4-year old and it was outstanding! Mortons never disappoints.  The absolute best part of this Marriott is the price for staying so close to the parks. We paid less than $200 for the night
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We're pleased to hear that you experienced a smooth check-in and complimentary wi-fi as a Marriott Rewards member. It's wonderful that you found our hotel to be reasonably priced and conveniently located. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim!

Summary: We upgraded to the executive rooms which come with a complimentary breakfast, appetizers for dinner and dessert at night. You can get free water, tea coffee, juice and soda throughout the day. This is well worth the increase in price, because you can save money on food. The food was actually quite good. Check the concierge for deals offered to Marriott guests. The are many chain restaurants within walking distance. The have a great work out room with plenty of machines and windows. The windows make the room bright. They provide ear phones and cool towels with a hint of lavender.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We're pleased that you enjoyed your room upgrade, as well as the plentiful amenities. It's great that you found the cuisine to be delicious and enjoyed the bright room windows. We hope to welcome you again soon for another excellent stay.

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for 3 nights to visit Disneyland. We chose this location for it's proximity to the parks and it's rate. We stayed at this hotel about 6 years ago and were looking forward to returning. The lobby is very attractive and large. There is a Starbucks inside of the hotel. The elevator is very modern, you push your hotel floor and a screen directs you to the elevator you will use. Our room seemed updated with newish carpeting and decor, but my kids immediately noticed that the safe still used a KEY instead of the button style we are used to. Sort of strange considering the upgrades elsewhere. This hotel did not have free coffee in the morning or free water in the evening as the other three California Marriott locations we stayed at during our two week
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our spacious lobby, as well as our hotels' convenient location. Your feedback regarding the room key is appreciated. We always welcome our guest's input. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another exciting stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Perfect location for Convention Centre Tournament
Summary: In town for tournament at the Convention Center: the hotel is a 2 minute walk to the venue across a small plaza. Loved the food trucks in the plaza as a meal option over the food court at the Convention Center or the Hilton.  We stayed in the Oasis tower. The room was a little dated, though had small fridge. The bathroom was tiny and in need of an upgrade. We had an east facing city view. I liked that the windows open for air at night though they were badly in need of a wash. Ate on poolside patio: food was good, staff were friendly. We signed up for Marriott’s rewards to save the cost of WIFI as we were staying in 2 Marriotts on the trip.  Appreciated: Starbucks in lobby. Lobby has plenty of space for meeting. Pergola that provided shade to half the pool. Would have liked:
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, friendly staff and a quick and efficient check-in. Your feedback regarding the wi-fi and crowds is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' feedback. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Marriott or Hilton at Anaheim Convention Center?
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton for one night because of a scheduling problem.  After that single night, I went across the street to the Marriott for the rest of my conference.    In general, the hotels are pretty similar.  The Hilton appeared to be a bit newer.  The staff was good at both.  Beds and pillows fine at both.  The TV at both almost the same.  The waitstaff at both did a fine job with the bartenders at the Marriott a bit friendlier and more helpful.    So, how to choose?  If price is different, I'd go with the cheaper one.  The difference is not that great.  The elevators at the Marriott were quicker, if that matters.  It seemed to be a little easier to get to the Convention Center from the Hilton although not by much.  The Hilton is closer to the Disneyland fireworks, which
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the friendly service, our smart elevators and our ability to handle the crowds from the Convention Center. Your kind feedback is appreciated and we hope to host you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great for conference and would be great for families!
Summary: I was at this hotel for several days and had a great stay. I appreciated just leaving my room and arriving at our conference headquarters and all conference rooms within minutes. There was a bit of a walk or taxi ride to get to restaurants, but felt good to walk after a day of sitting. The fitness center is well equipped with LifeFitness equipment (treadmills, bikes, elliptical) and also had some room for weights and stretching. The pool is more of a leisure pool so not ideal for lap swimming. Of course, Disney is very close but I just didn't go there his trip. Overall, a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. We're pleased that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, excellent fitness center and relaxing pool. Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome​ you soon for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay here; I'm not a fan of the toiletries that were provided (some kind of weird woody scent), but the location (20 minute walk to Disney, Starbucks onsite, directly beside the convention center) is ridiculously convenient and the room was everything I expect from Marriott. The staff were fantastic! They helped us through a check-in issue (that became a non-issue, because they're amazing!), holding our bags until we got back from Disney after checking out, and were just overall everything I expect from Marriott. I'd stay for work again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your incredible review, Louise. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us in Anaheim. It's wonderful that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, excellent staff, and service. We're pleased that our staff was able to hold your bags while you enjoyed your time in Disneyland. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another memorable​ vacation.

Summary: Stayed in the hotel for a meeting. I've been here a number of times before. This stay was on the 15th floor of the Oasis tower.   Check in was friendly and efficient.  Splitting the room at check out was no problem.   Spent a number of nights down at the main bar. Service was severely lacking each time. Almost every time we were there we had to track down a server. Once we finally got food and drinks, they were good.   Room was average but starting to look worn. Air conditioning was horrible. The room never got cool at night when we were trying to sleep. And I was there for five days.   My biggest problem was with lost and found. I accidentally left an item in one of the ballrooms one night. Our convention staff turned it over to the hotel lost and found. After three calls to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are pleased that you enjoyed a friendly check-in and the food at nFuse, we're very sorry to hear that you experienced issues with the lost and found. Our guests' and their valuables are very important to us and we are sorry to hear that you experienced these inconveniences. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your stay to the five-star experience you deserve.

Summary: Spent 6 days here last week for business at the convention center. Since I was without a car, it was convenient to the convention center (3 minute walk) and Disneyland entrance was just down the block, although a long walk to the entrance. Easy walk to restaurants, pharmacy etc as well. Hotel is typical Marriott, nice lobby with lots of seating/meeting space. Decor is modern. One hotel and bar and Starbucks. Big gift shop with basics you might need as well as souvenirs.  At least 30 minutes from Orange Cty/John Wayne airport, 45+ from Long Beach and 60+ from LAX. Easy to get cab or Uber to other destinations from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting the convention center for a conference. It's great that you enjoyed the on-site amenities, as well as the easy transportation provided around the hotel. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future for another excellent stay.

Summary: Nice room. Nice stay. Felt a bit cut off from the world, but my sense is that it is more about being in a Disney town without any intention of visiting the mouse.  I really like the lunch food truck options right outside, since my stay was for a couple of days and I can only enjoy the hotel restaurant food, pizza hut, and Starbucks for just so long I also appreciate the outdoor tables/chairs for guests. They made for a nice spot to enjoy time outside after hours of sessions in conference rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It's wonderful that you enjoyed the outdoor seating at nFuse, as well as your nice guest room. We hope to welcome you in the future for another excellent​ stay.

Summary: We arrived a couple and 3 children for 2 nights. There is valet parking and self service parking. We got a room on a lower floor Although we requested a high floor, the reception suggest us high floor but in the other building, we prefer to stay in the Lower floor room. The room itself is reasonable in size but looks outdated, in the room you can find all the necessary facilities. The hall was a loud noise, probably from the ice machine. The hotel itself is very large, clean, with a huge lobby, bar and restaurant. There is a very nice pool, we did not use it. There are parks shuttle (with paying) it's very convenient. There is a Starbucks, Pizza Hut and souvenir shop at decent prices. In conclusion, Recommended hotel at a fair price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the pool, spacious lobby, and on-site dining options. Your wonderful feedback is appreciated. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the weekend, and to go to a baseball game. The staff was excellent. The room was modern, and up to date. The bathroom was clean, and the surroundings were immaculate. Everything about this hotel was great. will stay again in the future.
Manager Response: We are overjoyed to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful stay with us in Anaheim. We love to hear that you found your guest rooms to be up to date and that you enjoyed our clean facilities. We look forward to greeting you in the future for another excellent stay.

Summary: Excellent location for attending meetings at Anaheim Convention Center and a short taxi ride to Disneyland.  Hotel is clean, rooms are comfortable and on site restaurants/bars are super.   If not attending Disneyland you are not swamped by Disney characters.  I would highly recommend this hotel location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We're glad that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, clean guest rooms and the dining options. We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Summary: I stayed here in June for a work trip. It's an ideal location for those going to the Convention Center, rooms were clean, and grounds were beautiful. The pool is great, the lobby, and the elevators! My coworker used the gym and overall it was a great experience. It's close to Disney as well and close enough to a Denny's and CVS. I also did not pay the bill, so I was able to enjoy the luxury.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, excellent guest rooms, and amenities. Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to host you  in the future for another great stay.

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is located immediately adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center, so it is perfect for meetings there. The hotel is mostly updated with a fresh, modern feel. The regular rooms are on the small side compared to some Marriotts, but nicely decorated. The AC in my room was extremely loud affecting sleep. All in all, though, this is a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. It's wonderful to learn that you enjoyed your guest room and our hotels' close proximity to the convention center. Your feedback is really appreciated and we hope to welcome​ you again soon.

Summary: Very beautiful hotel, rooms were very nice with comfortable beds. Nice lobby bar and restaurant downstairs. Easy access to the convention center if needed. Location was great, close to all the restaurants and attractions in the area. A lot were within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your comfortable guest bed, as well as our hotels' restaurant, nFuse. We're glad that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient​ location. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Summary: Not the best representation of the Marriott chain. All I can say is poor leadership in the management team. I asked the gentlemen behind the counter at the front desk for an extra ice bag and he said he did know if they had any. Just then a manager behind him pointed at a door. The clerk walked through the door and brought me the bag. Point is, he know where they were just wasn't going to wait 30 seconds of his time for a guest. Sad...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in providing your honest review, Walter. While are pleased to have been able to host you we are saddened to learn that you found our leadership in management to be below satisfactory. Please know that this has been advise to our upper management staff for review. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your recent stay with us.

Summary Heading: Amazing Stay at the Anaheim Marriott! Superb Staff and PERFECT Location!!!
Summary: Dates of Stay: Tuesday, 5/31/16 - Sunday, 6/5/16 Total Nights: 5  In a nutshell, the Anaheim Marriott is a wonderful property; it offers spacious and well appointed rooms, truly excellent service and is in an absolutely perfect location! The next time that your travels bring you to Anaheim, I would highly recommend that you stay at the Anaheim Marriott!  Now, for my detailed review:  I traveled to Anaheim to attend a 4-day conference at the Anaheim Convention Center, and I had several properties affiliated with the conference that I could chose from; of all of my choices, I am extremely happy that I chose the Anaheim Marriott and I would highly encourage you to do the same! From pre-arrival to departure, the staff at this excellent property was extremely helpful, accommodating
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your incredibly thoughtful review. We are so pleased that you enjoyed a wonderful stay with us in Anaheim. Thank you for recommending our hotel. We look forward to​ welcoming you again soon!

Summary: Okay - so this hotel was fine.  Beds were good and they brought me an extra blanket as requested.  There's a mini-frig in the room and a single service coffee maker.  The bathroom is one small room - one sink - and it's just not that large of a room and it did not have a SINGLE towel rod to hang up a towel on.  Just a hook on the back of the door.  Marriott is using a soap brand right now that smells HORRIBLE - practically makes me sick - something wood like.  I asked if they had anything else and they didn't so I had to pay a ridiculous amount of money at the gift shop to buy soap/shampoo/conditioner.  Our housekeeper was really nice and did a great job each day.  Check-in was smooth.  Room was average in size for US hotel rooms.  Windows were older - and let in A LOT of noise
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. While we're glad that you enjoyed your guest bed, excellent staff and our convenient location, we're sorry to hear that you were not fond of the guest room toiletries and the gift shop to be overpriced. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed on to our staff. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay.

Summary: The hotel is perfect for attending events at the Convention Center. I reserved two rooms, and the hotel honored my request to have them near each other. They were clean and comfortable. Both rooms had mini fridges.  Two days prior to our arrival, I called the hotel directly to request a microwave for one of our rooms. I was told that it wouldn't be a problem, and one would be delivered before our arrival. We checked in around 10pm. I immediately went to the front desk the next morning because we did not have one in either room. I encountered a very abrasive employee who was using a loud voice to curtly explain the hotel's internet access to another guest. The gentleman she was practically shouting at seemed to not use English as his first language, and the worker was visibly
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. While we are delighted that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location and dining options, we're sorry to hear about your experience with the front desk staff for the microwave and Universal Studios tickets. We aim to provide our guests' with five-star service and are very sorry to hear you received anything short of that. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your recent stay with us.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel.  As a loyal marriott member having stayed at just about all the Marriott properties near Disney this one was last on our list.  Good value with fun pool and nice concierge lounge.  I think this will be our go to from now on.  Uber or bus to the park is the way to go though!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are delighted that you enjoyed the pool area and concierge lounge. It's great that you have chosen to stay at our hotel during your visits to Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice lobby, big bar, and comfy beds, BUT
Summary: The hotel is right next to the convention center, it has a nice lobby, bar and patio/pool area.  The room is kind of small, worth very comfy beds, BUT the walls and shared in-room doors are pretty thin.  I could easily hear the gentleman next door gently clear his throat, let alone any tv or phone conversation he had.   Luckily I always travel with ear plugs, but it was quite awkward at first.  I could only imagine if there was a couple arguing or making love.  One could give a play by play very easily.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. While we are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location and pool area, we're sorry to hear that you found the guest room walls to be thin. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star experience.

Summary Heading: Large convenient conference spaces, terrific having a Starbucks on property
Summary: Staff was excellent in every way.  Typical guest rooms modest size, but clean and comfortable.  Convenient to  local attractions such as Disney.  Lovely pool area, good outside dining area. Loved the computer elevator system, you never have to wait long.  Large banquet service was good, food served hot, variety of menu not spectacular, but ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed your comfortable guest room, pool area and smart elevators. It's wonderful that you found our hotel to be convenient when commuting to Disneyland. We are very pleased that you found our staff to be excellent. We hope to welcome you in the future for another memorable​ stay in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is a pleasant place to stay close to Disneyland.  The restraurant is very good and their buffets are a great value with beautiful selections.  I was impressed by the friendly hotel staff.  It was easy to get there from the airport by using Super Shuttle which was only eleven dollars.  The pool was the only thing I thought lacking as it is small and seems crowded in among the restraurant's tables. My room was large and had everything I needed.  I had a balcony but the view was of the roof and nothing else.  You would definitely want to stay in a room with a view toward the front of the hotel.  This is an area with lots of hotels so the views are likely limited all over.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are very pleased that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location, transportation and spacious guest rooms. We love to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and attentive. We hope to welcome you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for eight days in the beginning of July 2016.  It was my third visit to this hotel ( first two being site visits for this convention) .  The service at this hotel for a convention was second to none.   I have been on a board that hosts an annual convention for almost 1000 people for more than ten years, and the level of service that we received at this hotel was wonderful.   Special mention to Justin...who took great care of us at check in   and to Shadi...for constantly being available to see that all of our needs were met.    I would highly recommend this hotel for a convention group looking for a great location at a hotel where the staff truly cared about the clients needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so pleased that you enjoyed an excellent return stay at our hotel for the convention. We love to hear that you felt you were taken care of incredibly well by our staff. Thank you for recommending​ our hotel. We look forward to hosting you for another brilliant stay in the future.

Summary: I'm a Marriott junkie just to preface this review, but wow, this is a phenomenal property . My trip here includes using the conference facilities as well so I got a good exposure to most of what they offer. The staff is extremely friendly, good humoured and seem to genuinely care about hospitality. The design and layout are awesome too. It's also a short hop to Disneyland if you want to stay outside of the park. Even thought three big events are going on at the same time here, it doesn't feel crowded or overwhelming. If I need or want to come back to Anaheim, this will definitely be my hotel of choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review, Paul. We're so pleased to hear that you enjoyed an incredible stay with us in Anaheim. We're delighted that you were fond of our hotels' atmosphere, convenient location, and excellent service. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: First I have to say that "Back in the Day" when I was bring a group of 49ers fans to Anaheim to play the Rams, the Anaheim Marriott was my best friend and made our stays great.  When we were there in May I was amazed at all of the changes in the reception and bar area.  We even stayed in the new tower.  It takes a while to get used to the computerized elevator system but I think they are great once you get the hang of it.  The rooms are well appointed but mine lacked a mini fridge.  The quality of the food service is good  but the menus only changed covers and print fonts depending if you were in the bar area or restaurant.  There was good reason to find one of the nearby great restaurants.  The staff could not be any more helpful.  If you are lucky enough to have Bellman Archie
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, Robert. We're so delighted that you enjoyed the new upgrades since your visits in the past. It's great that you found your guest room to be well-appointed and enjoyed the incredible service from our staff. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another excellent stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I had to jet in quickly & was there just a few hours. The lady checking me in remarked about my short stay & I agreed that it was unfortunate but I had no choice. She said "well I have a choice & I am choosing to upgrade you....that's just not fair!"   I had a huge room with a great view of the pool & the city.   I really appreciated her kindness--I didn't even ask & didn't expect it at all.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your incredible review. We're delighted to hear that you appreciated your upgraded guest room with a pool view. It's always pleasing to hear kind feedback from our guests regarding their exceptional experiences. We hope to welcome you in the future so that we can provide you with another five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for conferences at the Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: Every staff member I interacted with was extremely pleasant and efficient.  Check-in was a breeze, and they have a dedicated line for those who check in on-line using the Marriott app.  I was the only person in that line when I checked in, and it took less than three minutes.  My room was large and comfortable.  There was an empty in-room refrigerator for food and drinks.  I asked for, and received, a room on a higher floor.   It was quiet and had good natural light, with a balcony overlooking the entrance.  One could see the Disney fireworks.  The lobby is airy and inviting, especially compared to the Hilton that's across the access way, which seemed dark and cave-like.   The informal restaurant had good sandwiches and drinks, but it was a bit pricey.  There's a lovely outdoor
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are overjoyed to hear that you found our staff to be efficient and pleasant. It's wonderful that you found your guest room to be spacious and well-equipped. We're also very pleased that you enjoyed the outdoor pool area, Starbucks and our hotels' close proximity to the convention center. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Good room rate very   comfortable beds  helpful staff  valet very helpful  rooms are very dark and quiet helps with sleeping  Plenty of power points and chairs in lobby to recharge phones while using WiFi  Gift shop staff very helpful Free WiFi only in lobby no free WiFi in room Close to everything could walk to Disneyland, catch a shuttle for $5 or a taxi gor $9  The shampoo and conditioner good quality
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review. We're very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable guest bed, as well as our hotels' convenient location and helpful staff members. Your feedback regarding the wi-fi is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' input. Thank you again for your kind words. We hope to welcome you to our hotel soon for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary: This vacation was just my wife and I. It appears to be off the beaten path of the normal family hotels, so we didn't see a ton of kids. That was fine since we really just wanted some quiet after a day at Disneyland. The hotel was nice, the room was clean, and the bed was very comfortable. It was really what you would expect from a Marriott with a conference center next to a convention center. If you are looking for a bustling, cheap hotel with free breakfast and giant rooms for large families, this is probably not the hotel for you. But if you are a small family or just a couple that wants a quiet night, this hotel was really nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We're delighted that you enjoyed your clean and comfortable guest room after a long day at Disneyland. It's great that you were able to enjoy a peaceful and quiet stay with us as a couple. We hope to welcome you in the future for another enjoyable experience.

Summary Heading: A good but not great stay
Summary: The Marriott is, just like the Hilton across from it, well situated for the theme parks. It's set back from the main road to eliminate traffic noise and the staff are helpful.   Room service wasn't great in quality but definitely not terrible, but is rather expensive. Wifi is an added expense and doesn't come cheap.  I'm not by any means rubbishing this establishment, merely saying that it's an average, comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to let us know about your experience. While we're pleased that you enjoyed our convenient location and helpful staff, we are disappointed that you did not find your experience exemplary. Your feedback is very much appreciated. We always value our guests' input. You may be happy to hear for next time that we do offer complimentary in-room wi-fi to Marriott Rewards members who book directly through Marriott.com or over the phone. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience​.

Summary Heading: Good family and convention center hotel.
Summary: My family and I stayed here for VidCon.  It is a minute walk to the front door to the convention center. We like to stay here mainly for the balcony that looks out over the front of the hotel.  VidCon has a lot of music and things going on, on the walkway between the Marriott and the Hilton.  I like to look out and see what's going on.  In addition,, I can see my kids when they are out there!   As far as the hotel, I think it's fine.  Everyone who works there is very nice!  Each person I was in contact with was cordial  and personable. It stood out to me.  The rooms are typical.  Beds are doubles and not queens, so be aware of that.  It was a little cramped for my husband and I, but we are used to sleeping in a king bed. The room isn't big.  Small distance between the bed and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your constructive feedback with us. While we are delighted that you enjoyed our convenient location close to VidCon, we're very sorry to hear that you experienced issues with your guest room. Your feedback is very valuable to us and will be passed on so that we can improve upon these areas in the future. Your input regarding the rate to extend your stay is appreciated. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, near DisneyLand, but pricey
Summary: We were there attending VidCon. Needless to say, with 30,000 attendees ALL the hotels in the area were packed. It was very crowded, most of the time, waiting for elevators and in the lobby/lounge area. There is a Starbucks inside the hotel, but with the convention the line backed out the door and around the corner! Hotel feels very updated and tech-savy, elevators are digital, wifi stations everywhere. I can recommend the bar downstairs (nFuse) next to the pool. They make a mean strawberry marguerita. The rooms were small but luxurious. Beds have comfortable down pillows and there's a coffee maker in the room. (Ladies, there are blow dryers in the bathrooms, irons in the closet, extra pillows and lots of nice soap, shampoo and body wash in the bathroom). You will PAY for the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed nFuse, our tech-savy amenities, and luxurious guest rooms. Your feedback regarding the parking and wi-fi fees is appreciated. We are sorry to hear that you experienced noise disturbances in the evening after VidCon. Your input is valuable to us and will be passed on to the team. We hope to host​ you in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star experience.

Summary: Nice Marriott, more of a adult feel to it though.   The hotel staff was always pleasant and helpful. The property is large and has a bar/lounge area right off of the lobby which you also pass through to get to the pool. Their restaurant, Nfuse is also adjacent to the lobby. Pizza Hut is just down the hall and operates very specific hours, Starbucks and a small market area is further down the hall and always super busy during breakfast hours. They are not open during evening/late hours FYI. There is a gift shop with all kinds of items from clothing to snacks to toiletries. They also carry a variety of Disney products as well. The new elevator set up I thought was magnificent with choosing your floor number prior to boarding the elevator, the ride up goes much faster. The rooms
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our spacious hotel and pleasant staff. Your feedback regarding the guest rooms and our hotels' location is appreciated. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: So I am a Hilton honors members and we always stay at the Anaheim Hilton which is right across the parking lot from this Marriott. We switched part way through our  trip because my friend has Marriott points. Great comparison! Hilton...big room, great facilities. Marriott.... Unbelievably small room!! Seriously... We thought the room was half of another room. Lol.  Not a great selection of eateries and super small pool. The Marriott is not terrible, don't get me wrong. But not at all worth the money or he points. Hilton properties are way better.
Manager Response: We are very sorry to hear about your disappointment in your recent stay with us, Wendi. Your feedback is very much appreciated. We always value our guests' input. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience​.

Summary Heading: nice hotel with great amenities and close to convention
Summary: I just got back from my 3 day, 2 night stay at the Anaheim Marriott. I would say that this is one of the nicer properties. I was there for a convention. The hotel was actually sold out for the convention, however the staff seemed to be extremely pleasant and cool under the pressure which is always refreshing. The lobby is nicely updated and felt very open and airy. There is a starbucks located within the hotel, however the line wrapped well into the hall every time I passed. The elevator system was updated and caught many off guard featuring a system in which you must input your floor number prior to getting onto the elevator, once you figured out the system it didnt seem to be an issue- but without fail people tired to hop onto the elevator without understanding the 'newer
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It's wonderful that you enjoyed your stay with us for the convention. It's great that you found our staff to be accommodating and enjoyed the ample amenities at our hotel. We're glad that you found your guest room to be cozy and restrooms to be clean. Thank you again for your kind review. We hope to host you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here and absolutely loved it! Great service and staff. Booked through Costco and parking was only $12 a night. The ART bus was great. Busses ran smoothly and was worth it, the walk to Disneyland is pretty far especially when it's hot. We requested a balcony room facing the Hilton was great to be able to see what was happening at Vidcon and see some fireworks. I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for VidCon. It's wonderful that you were fond of the ART transportation, excellent service and the view from your private balcony. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is very nice, a favorite while at NAMM  (National Association of Merchant Musicians)  Very much a convention Hotel. It is very popular ...You will need to book well in advance.   This convention is very well attended, about 3rd week in January. There is always bands or artists in the lobby playing.  The outside plaza is also full of people and stages! Between the Hilton and Marriott you will find music playing and vendors...very congested with cars coming and going ... My advice fly into John Wayne and take Uber!   Once you are there you will not need a car everything is close by and you will be able to walk to NAMM convention  many nearby restaurants ... It is a blast ...similar to music festival atmosphere. If this is not your thing ( Fair warning )... You may want
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It's great that you enjoyed our hotels' convenient location. We hope to host you for another excellent stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel location for our convention
Summary: Attended a conference and stayed at the Marriott which was located next to the Anaheim Convention Center and it also shared a courtyard with the Hilton. This worked out very well and the conference was extremely well run-meals were seamless and flowed quickly. The hotel was located very close to Disneyland and there was lots of buses running there and other places in Anaheim. The only thing I didn't like was that you could only access the hotel pool by going through the bar. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us for the conference. It's great that you were fond of our convenient location. Your feedback regarding the pool access is appreciated. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another excellent stay.

Summary: People tend to visit Anaheim for two reasons - they're either conferencing at the Anaheim Convention Centre, or visiting Disneyland!  My husband was attending a conference and I was there for fun.  The hotel foyer is elegant and welcoming and the check-in process was fast and efficient.  The lifts operate a little differently by selecting your floor number and then proceeding to your allocated lift i.e. A, B, C etc.  Our first room was disappointing, overlooking the air-conditioning units and felt tight with a cramped layout.  We were expediently offered a different room at the front of the building, with a far more comfortable layout and great view.  We forewent a king bed, for two king singles in preference to a more comfortable room.  The bathrooms are dated, with a small
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review. We are delighted that you enjoyed our hotels' great room, smart elevators, restaurant and your comfortable guest room. Your feedback regarding the wi-fi is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' feedback. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: 4.5 - Recieved excelentt service and had a nice comfortable room
Summary: Meets or exceeds most Marriot Standards.  We received excellent service and help from everyone: front desk, bellhop, concierge, managers, and housekeeping.  We had a few minor issues resolved very quickly (we would not have even said anything, but they asked).  We were in the tower section and our room on the 16th floor was cozy, clean, and comfortable with a great city view and a ‘standing only’ narrow balcony.  (Tower section only has very few rooms with a balcony).  Smart elevators are nice, but different.  (You select the floor before entering the elevator).  ATA busses stop often and regularly in front of the hotel  - convenient and inexpensive transportation to Disney and other places.  Restaurant food is a tad expensive, but the food quality and taste is outstanding, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review. We are so pleased to hear that you received excellent service from our staff. It's wonderful that you enjoyed your comfortable guest room, smart elevators and delicious meal options at nFuse. Your kind feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Don't stay here if they have something going on like Vidcon
Summary: Stayed on the 9th floor facing the Hilton and it was very noisy. No one told me it was going to have music playing from 8 am to 10 pm. Marriott should have warned me of this. The hotel has a responsibility to inform their guests of this.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are disappointed to hear that you received noise disturbances during the evening. Our guests' comfort is our priority and we're sorry to hear that you received anything short of an extraordinary stay. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Just yards from the Convention Center and within walking distance of Disney World
Summary: The only reason I cannot give this property a five is comparing it to others.  The positives are the staff which are top notch, location is great, but the rooms although very comfortable are sparse.  The food at Concierge level is delicious but very basic.  Be prepared to pay for all alcoholic beverages.  Each room has a usable balcony with a great view.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We're delighted that you found our staff to be incredible and enjoyed our hotels' convenient location. Your feedback regarding the concierge lounge is appreciated. It's wonderful that you enjoyed the views from your private balcony in your guest room. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another incredible​ stay.

Summary Heading: Huge hotel, great food and near the Angles stadium
Summary: It was empty when we visited, food was outstanding, swimming simple and the views from the room great.  the staff were really good with the children.  Valet parking is expensive at $25 (I am learning this is just how it is in the US).  only down side is the place is so huge it does take a while to get around.  Would recommend here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We're pleased that you enjoyed the delicious cuisine at our hotel, as well as the view from your guest room. We love to hear that our staff was excellent. Your feedback regarding the parking fee is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' input. We hope to welcome you in the future for another great stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Clean Quiet Rooms and Friendly Staff :)
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times and keep going back because it's simply the best hotel in the area. We visit Disneyland a few times a year and the Marriott is within walking distance or you can take the bus right outside the hotel. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. The only thing that I find a little strange is that you have to walk through the bar area to get to the pool, just a design flaw but the pool area is nice and plenty of lounge chairs to use :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We're pleased that you enjoy frequently visiting our hotel during your trips to Disneyland. It's wonderful that you find our staff to be friendly and guest rooms to be clean. Your feedback regarding the walkway to the pool is appreciated. We love to hear that you enjoy lounging by the pool during your stays. We look forward to welcoming you again soon for another five-star experience in Anaheim.

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is right next to the Anaheim convention center. It's a pretty standard Marriott but has pizza hut and start bucks inside. I was disappointed that they did not treat their elite check ink line special. In fact I think I got a longer wait. One of the receptionist was good and even remembered my name. The other thing id's that their club lounge is closed Friday and Saturday in the afternoon and evening.. Strange. Anyways if you are going to the convention center then it's a good hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. While we're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, we're sorry to hear that you were disappointed in the concierge lounge hours, as well as your check-in experience. We strive to provide our guests' with a five-star experience and are disappointed to learn that you did not receive that. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your recent visit.

Summary: I stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for a very large convention, national meeting.  I appreciated the pleasantness and the efficiency of the staff.  The pool was pleasant, breakfast buffet was lovely.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us during the conference. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be efficient. We're glad that you were able to relax by the pool and enjoyed the delicious buffet. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another excellent stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Very modern. I loved the decor and gathering spaces. They have a great gym. Restaurant is good, but pricy. Small fridge in the room.  Staff is all super friendly and helpful.  You must checkout the big chairs out front!  Great for business conferences and to stay.   I'd love breakfast included.   Carlos has excellent service.  Ask for him if you go.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our modern spaces, along with the dining options provided at nFuse. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful. Thank you again for your kind review. We hope to welcome you again in the future whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary: The beautiful open lobby with proximity to any choice of food makes this hotel a great place to stay. The fitness center is fully equipped and the concierge lounge was great!  Staff is very friend and helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed our well-appointed Great Room, as well as the fully equipped Fitness Center. We love to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and helpful. Thank you again for your kind review. We hope to host you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary: From the moment you walk in the door this hotel has an excellent staff and team to greet you. I attended a huge conference, had a suite and meetings just about every evening. The housekeeping staff was fabulous and very helpful. The concierge offered great ideas and tips on places to eat for any kind of food you desire. Everyone was pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We're pleased to hear that you felt welcomed the moment you walked into our doors. It's great that you found housekeeping to be excellent and enjoyed the various tips that concierge had to offer. We hope to welcome you soon for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a conference in May 2016.    The conference was in the hotel.  The conference area is right off the lobby of the hotel.  The rooms were nice, but really cold. (this is a common thing with conference rooms so I am always prepared with the extra sweater).    The hotels rooms were fine, bathroom was small, and showed some wear.  The bathroom door was really tiny, and would be difficult for a larger person to enter.  Nice that rooms all had a balcony.    The rooms had a safe, but they had a key instead of electronic locks.  Maybe some would think more secure with old-fashioned lock and key, but I found it was one more thing I had to keep track of.  The pool was nice and plenty of loungers set up along side of the pool.  One afternoon the pool had to be
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of your stay with us for the conference. We are overjoyed to hear that you were pleased with the service, elevators, and dining options at our hotel. Your feedback regarding the wi-fi and our hotels' location is greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future for a five-star stay.

Summary: I recently stayed here for two nights. The hotel is WONDERFUL. The team was very welcoming when I arrived. Kelly at the front desk took the time to make sure that I felt like I was at home. I also ordered room service while I was there. It showed up on time, it was fresh and hot, and tasted delicious. The rooms were clean, you could tell that the bathroom was a little tired, but it was clean and well kept up. I will definitely stay here again in the near future!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We here for a two day conference, facilities for the conference were excellent. Rooms were well appointed and large. Restaurants food was good and service i recieved was what i have come to expect from hotels in the USA. Didn't have time to try out the pool as was too busy in the conference but looked nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review. We are very pleased to hear that you found your guest room to be well-appointed and the service at nFuse to be great. Your feedback regarding our outdoor pool and conference facilities is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: I stayed here 6/5-6/9/2016. I can't say enough about this hotel!  Our stay was perfect in every way. From the time we arrived to the time we left, the staff was very friendly, accomodating and knowledgable. The service we recieved at the front desk, bell service and restaurant was impeccable. The ART shuttle to Disneyland is in front of the hotel, making it very convenient and easy to get around, (especially with children). The pool area and the entire hotel, including the rooms were immaculate at all times. Thank You Marriott for making our family vacation even better than we anticipated!
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredibly kind review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed everything from our kind staff to our immaculate guest rooms. We love to hear that you enjoyed traveling around via the ART shuttle and were able to enjoy some down time by the outdoor pool. Thank you again for your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another memorable family vacation.

Summary: Great place for a convention, fabulous workout facility, OK rooms, and a POOR restaurant experience and FAILED resolution by customer service person for complaint regarding bill.  Restaurant served us overpriced salads - easily ‘fixed’ by simply adding a cup or two of additional lettuce to the plate.  Waiter’s service could be easily ‘fixed’ with some basic training (not sure how to fix arrogance) – and, separate checks means separate checks. A request to not bill to our room means don’t bill to our room, so, next, our personal cards were rung up by waiter (we were then at two VISA charges for each meal – fingers crossed only one would go thru).  Called Customer Service (CS) and said we don’t want the room charged, we do want our Visas charged, and CS assured us this would
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your constructive feedback. While we are glad that you enjoyed our well-equipped fitness and convention centers, we are very sorry to hear about your experience at nFuse. We strive to provide our guests' with a world-class dining and hotel experience and are very disappointed that this is not what you received​. Please privately message us with your reservation/contact information so that we can improve upon your recent visit.

Summary: This hotel is large and is a conference hotel.  Despite the amount of visitors the staff was very attentive and service was exceptional.  The pool and outside seating was inviting.  But more so, the staff in the lounge area seemed very genuine and helpful.  There is an excellent gym and our room was clean.  There were many dining options within walking distance and self parking was reasonable.  This is the first hotel where the elevators are automated requiring you to enter your room number before entering the elevator.  overall good hotel and will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are pleased that you found our staff to be attentive and provide exceptional service. It's wonderful that you enjoyed relaxing by our inviting pool, as well as in the great room. We're glad that you found our efficient elevators to be unique and enjoyed the on-site facilities. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another five-star stay!

Summary Heading: Lovely time despite our rocky start!
Summary: Despite our rocky start, we had a lovely experience at the Anaheim Marriott. I could see the resort was packed; apparently, the Anaheim Marriott had several basketball teams staying at the same time. When we arrived, we were given keys to a room on the 16th floor; however, the previous guests hadn't checked out yet! How embarrassing! Nevertheless, we were given another room. And the remaining time of our stay met my high Marriott standards. By the way, the bed and linens were exemplary!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, Carol. While we're sorry to hear about your experience with check-in, we're glad that you were given another room and able to enjoy and incredible stay with us. We love to hear that you found the guest room linens to be exemplary. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as we are always looking for ways to improve upon our guests' experience. We hope to welcome you again in the future for another wonderful stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I booked this hotel for one night with a couple friends for my birthday! The stay was pleasant although check out wasn't. Front Desk Agent Karla was amazing! She wished me a Happy Birthday and sounded excited for my night/stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are so pleased to hear that our staff made your birthday feel special, we're sorry to learn that you did not experience a five-star stay with us. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to exceed your expectations.

Summary: We just stayed at the Anaheim Marriott from 5/28-5/31 visiting from Pennsylvania! Our reason for our stay was our engagement trip to Disneyland - this Marriott was one of the nicest I have been to! It's very well kept, clean and the staff were always wonderful and soo friendly!!! The location was also very beneficial to Disneyland and the ART bus was right outside the hotel made it so easy to get on and off the bus for the ride down to the Disneyland Resort... 18th floor was awesome and the room with balcony was nice to have. The concierge was great and maintained very well. I had to write a thank you for the staff and review the day we checked out because that's how positive our stay was :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review, Katie. We are so pleased to hear that you chose to stay with us during your engagement trip to Disneyland. We love to learn that you enjoyed our hotel's convenient location, excellent views and incredible service provided by our staff. Your feedback is really appreciated and will be passed on. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Beautiful but your staff not trustworthy..
Summary: Beautiful Hotel, Sadly we won't be back. During our visit to the Disneyland park this past Saturday, we returned to find our bags had been pilfered through, while we were out in the park.  ( Cleaning Maids??)Not sure what they were looking for, my guess is cash.. I called the front desk to speak with security yet no one returned my phone call. My concern is someone stealing my personal information from my CC and Check book which was in my  suitcase. ( ALL my bags were zipped shut when we left to go to the park, yet unzipped with my purse laid on the side of my suitcase when we returned.) Safety is my number one issue.. Who does this? Perhaps a better screening of your housekeeping staff to ensure this doesn't happen again to anyone else. I'm pretty habitual about zipping up my
Manager Response: We are very concerned about your recent experience at our hotel, Patti. Our guests' safety is our number one concern and we're deeply saddened to hear that you felt your property was violated. Please privately message us with your contact and reservation information so that we can follow up and improve upon your experience.

Summary: Stayed here for a quick overnight business trip and couldn't have been more pleased.  Very pleasant interaction with each and every hotel staff member I encountered.  Arrived at 8:30pm and caught a very nice, late dinner at Nfuse sitting outside by the pool.  I was given a nice big room on the top floor in the main tower with access to the Concierge Lounge.  Took advantage of their nice breakfast buffet in the Lounge, it was a bit crowded at 7:30am but quickly cleared out a bit around 8:00.  Would stay here again on business or pleasure being right next to the convention center and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We're glad that you enjoyed the incredible service provided by our staff, as well as your dinner at nFuse. Your feedback regarding the breakfast crowds is appreciated. Thank you again for your kind review. We look forward to welcoming you in the future, whether it be for business or for pleasure​.

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at the Anaheim Marriott. I must say, our first visit, a year ago, was much better than the second. That is one reason this hotel got 4 stars. I know it can do better than our stay over Mother's Day weekend. Both times we were there it was for the Disneyland Tinkerbell 1/2 Marathon. Last year we had a nice room in the towers that overlooked the front garden area. This year we were stuck in an ok room that the girl at the check in desk boasted had a balcony. Yes it did have a balcony, but it overlooked the ugly rooftop of another building with a very noisy and dirty compressor. No need to step out on that balcony. The compressor was so noisy, we could hear it rambling with the door closed and all night long.  We called to have a couple wine
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful feedback regarding your return stay with us. While we're glad that you enjoyed your experience, we're sorry to hear that you did not enjoy a five-star stay. Your feedback regarding the room service and front desk service is appreciated. We strive to provide our guests' with a world class experience and are sorry to hear that is not what you received. We are pleased that you did enjoy the service at the valet, as well as the on-site dining options. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to an exceptional stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Overall the Marriott was a wonderful stay and one of the better hotels I have stayed in for business.   I was attending a conference by myself for three days and cannot rave enough about the staff, friendly service, knowledgeable, always helping and made my stay a great one.   I used the Marriott app to check in and was glad I did - took me less than 2 minutes at the front desk and I didn't have to wait.   As a Marriott rewards member I was upgraded to a corner king suite and also had free wifi the whole visit.   The price of the hotel was around the same as any similar hotel in the area (I did check) and I got a decent rate for my stay. Anaheim is pricey overall and their hotels reflect that.   Wifi was decent, and was very good in the public areas of the hotel and conference
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredibly thoughtful review. We are overjoyed to hear that our staff was exceptional and that you enjoyed the delicious cuisine at nFuse. It's pleasing to hear that you felt comfortable in your guest room. Your feedback regarding the room service, guest room safe and shuttle service is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' input and appreciate your feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again in the future for another excellent stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Very corporate feeling a great place to stay if you're going for convention as it is in the heart of Anaheim's convention ally. The room was great and the bed was very comfortable but they do hit you for a lot of add on fees over the price of the room such as parking and Wi-Fi and then there is the $8.5 draft beer.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your comfortable guest room, we're sorry that you found the prices to be unreasonable. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience.

Summary: I was stayed here for a business conference. My room was clean and a good size, but nothing remarkable.   Pros:  Kinkos was on site and staff was very helpful for some last minute things I needed printed.   Starbucks staff was really nice too and made me something that wasn't on the menu. But they close at 6pm, so if you want something in the evening, you'll be out of luck.    Gift shop has some cute things at reasonable prices.  There is a pool and gym, but I didn't use either.    It's near Disney's parks.   Front desk/check in staff was very friendly and helpful. As were the conference staffers. Cleaning crew did a good job too.  There is a pool and a gym, but I didn't use either of them. We walked a ton at Disney and during our day trip to the San Diego Zoo though.    Cons:
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a detailed review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the on-site amenities, clean guest rooms, and our kind staff. Your feedback regarding the taxis, concierge recommendations, and ART transportation is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' feedback and will certainly pass this along. Thank you again for taking the time to provide your insight. We hope to have the chance to host you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Second, Third, Fourth and Fifth Stay Were Great!
Summary: Mea Culpa. Or as Willie Wonka said succinctly, "Strike that. Reverse it. Thank you."  My first visit and review of this hotel was before the recent renovations. It's still a convention hotel, and prices and crowds vary greatly depending on that, however the public spaces - a large lobby with work stations and plug ins for devices; an inviting restaurant and bar with respectable food and terrific service - are greatly improved. Other plusses include in house Starbucks and a large gym with pretty decent equipment (and clean, important in my book). Proximity to Disneyland is still good, an easy fifteen minute walk. The Hilton Hotel across the way has a food court that will satisfy hungry kiddos quickly and inexpensively. The staff is Disney friendly and on top of their game. My
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your return visit to our hotel post renovations. It's wonderful that you were fond of the in-house Starbucks, as well as our hotels' close proximity to Disneyland. We love to hear that our staff was friendly and attentive. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another incredible experience.

Summary: I was there for a rather large convention and all of us were complaining about the taste and smell of the water in the rooms from the sink.  I asked for a room change so as not to come down ill in case it was a safety issue.  Turns out some rooms have it worse than others.  Even the bell staff who took my luggage out said the employee cafeteria has the same issue.  Great convention space.  Lots of walking required.  Great pool area with part of it under a cover including the hot tub.  Unfortunately, there really isn't a way of getting to the pool without walking through the lounge, restaurant, or lobby.  There is a very expensive Pizza Hut on property as well as a Starbucks and a FedEx Kinko's.  The hotel restaurant has very hit or miss service, but the food is great, once you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Scott. While we're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, we're disappointed to hear that you found the water in the guest rooms to have an odor. This is concerning and will definitely be passed along to our staff so that we can address this. Your feedback regarding the parking and dining prices is appreciated. We always welcome our guests' feedback and appreciate you taking the time to share your input. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay with us in Anaheim.

Summary: I stay here every year for a dental convention.  The staff is super nice and helpful.  The rooms are clean, modern and fresh!  Fitness center is great.  Plenty of free weights as well as a full set of machines.  We also used a meeting room with food and they did a great job!  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review. We are delighted that you enjoy staying at our hotel each year for the dental convention. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be excellent, and enjoy the amenities at our hotel. Thank you for your recommendation. We look forward to your next arrival in Anaheim.

Summary: I was here for a business meeting. The rate was fairly high in comparison to neighboring hotels, so I had high expectations. Usually I start with pros, but the cons outweighed the pros this time.  Cons: * Fragrance or essential oil smell in lobby and hallways was irritating to me. At first, I thought it was a temporary thing. But everyday it was the same light but obvious scent. It gave me a slight headache.   * Terrible wifi as others have reported.  * City view of the hotel faces a buzzy, loud unit on an adjacent first floor roof. I was on the 15th floor and could still hear the endless hum. Pool views shouldn't have the same problem.   * Scratchy towels and sheets. Very thin, smooshy pillows with no support.   * Limited TV channels, and only 5 HD channels, so everything else
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. While we're delighted that you found our staff to be kind and enjoyed the nFuse dining option, we're disappointed to hear that you were not pleased with your guest room amenities and smell in the great room. Your feedback is very appreciated and will be passed along to our team so that we can improve upon future guests' experiences. We strive to provide our guests' with a world-class experience and we hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your stay.

Summary: This is my favorite hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland. And, since my family are Disneyland pass holders, we are at the Anaheim Marriott frequently.   It's close to Disneyland, I even walked to/from the park this time. You can take the ART, with a convenient location right outside of the hotel. Or take a short walk to the free Disney shuttle to the park. The hotel lobby has a nice upscale feel. I usually order room service and the servers like Bezo, make you feel like they'd be happy to assist you with any food request. Friendly, yet very professional. And, the food arrives quickly, hot and is very tasty.   Usually I have no complaints....but this time, I felt the face of the hotel-the reservation agent "Garrett" while for the most part was coolly courteous, he was not
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your incredibly kind review. We're delighted to hear that you frequent out hotel during your visits to Disneyland. It's wonderful that you enjoyed the walking to the parks and using the ART transportation. While we love to hear that you found our staff to be exceptional, we're very disappointed to learn that you encountered unsatisfactory service from the front desk staff. This is definitely not our standard and will be addressed with our team. We look forward to welcoming you in the future so that we can improve upon your stay for an exceptional five-star experience.

Summary Heading: Nice enough, but wifi is awful.
Summary: This is a fairly typical Marriott with one major exception--the high speed wifi is worthless. Because I was there for business, I was heavily reliant on the wifi.
