In my room, I connected to the Marriott guest wifi. Downstairs, the Marriott open wifi. During the conference, I connected to two different wifi networks that were there to support the conference. All of them were incredibly slow. Knowing that, I'd say if you are traveling here with a family to go to Disney, then it's likely worth the price. But if you're traveling for business, don't expect to get any work done. Also, they have "smart" elevators, which I always find to be an odd term because they don't seem any more efficient than regular elevators.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. While we're glad that you enjoyed a pleasant stay with us, we're sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the wi-fi connectivity. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed along so that we can improve upon future guests' experiences. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your stay with us in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Very nice Marriott, appropriate for Disneyland vacation or a conference
Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is a very nice place, and it is very well operated. The restaurants and bars are well located, and have good service. The outdoor poolside bar is a nice venue as well. The breakfast in the restaurant is very good, of course there is a plenteous buffet, and at $25 is rather pricey, but that is what one expects in such a nice hotel. Rooms are well kept and up to date. It is located across from the Hilton, and next to the Convention Center in Anaheim. The location is primo. No complaints about this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We love to hear that you found our hotel to be well-located. It's great that you enjoyed the excellent service provided by our staff, as well as the delicious breakfast buffet. Thank you for your feedback regarding our well-kept guest rooms and our hotels' convenient location. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: This is my favorite hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland. It's close to Disneyland, only one stop on the ART, with a convenient location right outside of the hotel. I come to Disneyland a lot and getting from/to Disneyland is significantly faster and easier than any other off site hotel. The hotel itself has a nice sophisticated upscale feel. The bar has a fantastic craft beer selection and surprisingly good food. This is a great place to stay for visiting Disneyland and enjoying your downtime at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We're delighted that you chose to stay with us during your Disneyland vacation. We're glad that you find it easy to travel back and forth to the parks from our hotel using ART. It's wonderful that you enjoyed dining at nFuse. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: I'm a gold elite member and have to say this hotel was one of my best stays ever. They upgraded my room to a hospitality suite which was perfect as it was my birthday weekend. Every service person stuck a conversation with me and was stellar. The concierge lounge was roomy with great food big view and great service. I'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredibly kind review. We are pleased to hear that you experienced a five-star stay with us for your birthday weekend. We love to hear that our staff was exceptional and that you enjoyed the delicious dining options available. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We look forward to your next arrival.

Summary: This was the worst stay at a hotel we've ever had. We booked this hotel though a package deal. It stated the room would fit our family of 5. We walked into a tiny room with 2 double beds! We asked if they had any other rooms and they said that they had a suite for $200 more a night. We ended up having to get a roll away bed squeezed into the room and my wife and I had to squish in a double bed. Also we thought this hotel offered a shuttle to Disneyland, they do not. We had to use public transportation which was always full and would have to wait multiple times sometimes. They do not offer free wifi either.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your constructive feedback. We are very sorry to learn that you and your family felt uncomfortable in your guest room. We strive to provide our guests with an extremely enjoyable and comfortable experience and are saddened to hear that is not what you experienced. Your feedback regarding the public transportation and wi-fi is appreciated. We value our guests' feedback and will pass it along to our team. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your stay to a five-star vacation in Anaheim.

Summary: In full disclosure, our last name is not Marriott. But everyone from the front door to the front desk to the person who cleaned our room, treated us as if we were. This was our first trip to California and we were overwhelmed and nervous. Everyone welcomed us as if we were family. They were kind, and patient and friendly. A special mention is needed for the person who checked us in- Lattif M. He patiently answered every question that we had and was just as friendly as he could be. He made us feel at home. Then Jennifer at the concierge desk. She helped us with the internet, and then our reservations for transport back to the airport. Again, she was just as friendly as she could be. I did not see the person who runs this hotel, but there is a culture from everyone on the team to
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review of our hotel. It's wonderful that you enjoyed excellent service provided by our staff. We love to hear that you felt at home with us. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to our staff. We cannot wait to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: I really liked this hotel. We were staying to participate in the tinkerbell half marathon at Disney. It was fairly close to the race start, and very convenient. Although I think the others on Harbor might be a little closer. the hotel was very nice, and my membership level allowed me to visit the concierge lounge. We had breakfast twice while visiting. The breakfast buffet was better than most I thought. We had scrambled eggs, bacon, roasted potatoes and other veggies and lots of fresh fruit. The room was nice, although the bathroom had some water damage. Nothing to impact the trip. The pool area was beautiful, and I wished the weather had cooperated more to get use out of it. The service was great, beds comfortable and quick elevators. The check in was quick and easy as usual,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. It's wonderful that you enjoyed your stay with us for the Disney half marathon. We're glad that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet, as well as your comfortable guest room. It's great that you found the pool area to be nice. We would love to welcome you and your husband back for a relaxing stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Upscale hotel, yet competitive prices, good amenities
Summary: First time I visited was in 2013 for a conference held here - it was very well run and i liked the hotel much more than the Hilton across street where I stayed. For a May 2016 Disneyland vacation we chose to stay here. We had the most basic size room and it was great, Accommodated 3 of us (had a free cot delivered to room) easily. Room, public spaces are all very clean and updated. All our interactions with staff were very good. The walk to Disney is an easy 10 minutes, but there is the Anaheim Rapid Transit (ART) shuttles that you buy an inexpensive pass for. The restaurant in hotel serves a great breakfast (all marriotts tend to have good full service breakfasts). There is also a full Starbucks and  a Market with other food choices including things like ice cream that you can
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us for the conference in the past, as well as your recent stay during your vacation to Disneyland. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be excellent and enjoyed the dining options available at nFuse and Starbucks. It's great that you made use of the ART shuttle to transport to the parks. We look forward​ to welcoming you in the future for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary: We booked this hotel while visiting Disneyland. We stayed 5 days and had a 4 day Disneyland Park hopper pass. It was me, my husband, and our 2 year old.  The room is nice, a little tight but nice. We had a king bed and a balcony. We had a corner room.  I wouldn't recommend this to a family of four though. Three is perfect but I could see it getting tight with four. The bathroom has one single sink.  You do have to pay for wifi at this Marriott but the other Marriott's closer to the park have free wifi.  The pool is heated and it has a nice hot tub. We swam one of the days there and they have waiters around the pool asking if you needed anything.  I would have to say the best part of our stay was the Starbucks in the morning and we ordered room service for breakfast each day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We're glad that you enjoyed your guest room, heated pool, and the daily service at Starbucks each morning. Your feedback regarding the shuttle service is appreciated. We always value our guests' input. While we're delighted that you enjoyed a pleasant stay with us, we hope to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star vacation.

Summary: My husband and I visit Disneyland once a year, this was our third visit to this particular Marriott. If I could give 10 stars, I would. Hands down, this property is special.  First of all, it really says something when you visit year after year and see the same staff, and not just that, but the staff remembers you!! From the front desk, Paula, who checked is in and made sure everything was perfect, to all of the bell staff.. Archie, has been there from our first stay, Danny also.. Brandon, Mark, Ken, Don the bell captain.. Ooh and Paul. Seriously the best staff ever. Anything we asked was met with "certainly" and then taken to the next level. We love staying here, and highly recommend experiencing their magic whether you are there for a conference, convention or Disneyland..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We're pleased that you enjoyed your return stay with us during your trip to Disneyland. It's always a pleasure to welcome you back. We love to hear that our staff is exceptional and that you enjoy your stay with us each year. We look forward to your return so that we can provide you with another incredible stay.

Summary Heading: Great location -Especially if going to the Happiest Place on Earth!
Summary: I live local but ran the Tinkerbell 5K Neverland Race at 5am. I decided to just spend the night at a hotel close to the race. I travel a lot so I tend to be fairly 'loyal' to the brand. This is a very nice Marriott. I suspect a fairly recent remodel. My room had a balcony, great, great bed for sleeping and great hot shower. I did self parking, and not much of a walk from the parking garage either. There is a bus shuttle stop outside of the hotel that runs every 20 mins to Disneyland and the hotel has passes. I ran the race so got a freebie from the race organizers. Definitely kid friendly and adult friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review with us. We're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us while attending your race. It's great that you were fond of your guest room, ample parking and the convenient transportation to Disneyland. We are pleased that you found our hotel to be a convenient and nice choice when visiting the theme parks. We hope to welcome you for another five-star stay soon.

Summary: I asked for a quiet room and that's what they gave me. Even though there were a couple conventions going on when I was there (one that I was attending) and lots of parents and urchins there for Disneyland, my room was super-quiet. (Other attendees at my conference, though, complained about noise.)  Room service and maid service were good. Four quibbles: a) The Starbucks in the lobby could not handle the crowd. Often there was a long line. b) The take-away sandwich place next to the Starbucks was often closed. (Tip: Go to the food court in the Hilton across the drive.) c) They mistakenly charged me for parking. I didn't have a car. d) The meeting rooms were super cold.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We're glad that you enjoyed your quiet guest room, as well as the service provided by our staff. Your feedback regarding the Starbucks line and meeting rooms is appreciated. We're very sorry to learn that you were incorrectly charged. We hope this did not cause too much of an inconvenience. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay.

Summary: Great Hotel as most Marriotts are.  The Marriott in Anaheim is centrally located, you can walk to both Disney theme parks within 25 min. The hotel is very nice but the rooms are a little small for a Class 7 Marriott hotel.  The staff couldn't have been nicer, we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review of our Anaheim hotel. We're very pleased that you enjoyed our hotel's close proximity to the Disney theme parks, as well as our incredibly kind staff. Your feedback regarding the guest sizes is appreciated. We hope to welcome you in the future for another exceptional stay at our hotel.

Summary: Nice facade to entry and foyer. Pool small, lots of noisy kids in pool and spa. Food poolside, not even average faire. Rooms and tower decor very out dated. What's with the woodsie look? Take tree stumps off walls. Bed mattress sliding off box spring.  Marriott comfort standard bedding.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. While we are glad to hear that you enjoyed our inviting Great Room, we're sorry to hear that you found your guest room and decor to be outdated. Your feedback regarding the pool noise is appreciated. We're sorry to learn that you did not experience a five-star stay with us. We hope to have the chance to welcome you again in the future so that we can improve upon your stay.

Summary: This is beyond the classification of a great hotel. The reason for this is their staff. You are always greeted with a friendly smile and an enthusiastic, professional word. Some of the staff that I would like to acknowledge are as follows:  Jose, Leo, Rio, Maria, Marion, Carlos, and the wonderful front desk staff who are always there to meet your every need (I wish I knew all their names).   I always stay at this hotel when in the area and will continue this. Thank you for reading this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredibly kind review. We are overjoyed to hear that you received over the top service from our staff. We strive to provide our guests with the utmost comfort and attention and are very pleased to learn that you recognized this. Thank you again for your terrific review. We look forward to hosting you in the future for another five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights in mid April (Tuesday to Friday) As a Gold Marriott Reward member I had concierge lounge access and given room 700 at the end of the corridor facing the convention centre. The room was large, quiet and well maintained with a balcony and  fridge with good a/c. The pool is quite large and was fine . There is a large fitness centre with lots of equipment. The lounge was excellent with a good variety of hot and cold breakfast items and a great selection of desserts and cordials in the evening and great staff. There is the ART bus serving Disneyland but you can also walk ( around 20 minutes to the park gates) and the Disneyland Resort express also goes to LAX airport from just outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful review with us. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room and concierge lounge access. It's wonderful that you enjoyed the facilities at our hotel, as well as the convenient forms of transportation to multiple Anaheim destinations. Thank you again for your kind review. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star experience.

Summary: The lobby and reception area is very nice. However when we got to our room we were very disappointed with the room.The price we pay for it did not meet our expectations whatsoever. It was small and didn't provide the things you would expect compare to other luxury hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay. While we're pleased to hear that you enjoyed the great room and reception area, we're sorry to learn that you were disappointed with your guestroom. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and  we're disappointed to hear that our hotel did not exceed your expectations. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your stay.

Summary: This is s very nice hotel, great location, restaurants and bars have great service, upscale look, bedrooms very comfortable, people were very attentive and helpful.  One issue that tart said were fixing is WIFI, terrible band width, very slow, I bought the premium package and it did not matter, the hotel refunded me , but they should not have charged to begin with until it is fixed, they admitted the problem, which I respect, but don't charge for a known inferior product.  Other than WIFI I would recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughtful review, Richard. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel's location, nFuse restaurant, and comfortable guest rooms. We love to hear that our staff was attentive and made your stay enjoyable. Your feedback regarding the slow wi-fi is appreciated and will certainly be passed along to our team. We hope to welcome you in the future so that we can exceed your expectations for a five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Another convention hotel .....not great for families.
Summary: I have been a loyal Marriott member for over 20 years and own a timeshare. I had not been back to this property for a long time so we thought we would give it a go.  We were upgraded and our room was horrible. The bath took 48 mins to fill....could not believe it. Housekeeping is poor, if you are not out before 8 forget it...after 2 days we had to ask the very nice front desk staff to send housekeeping to our room. The pool is small and you have to walk through a bar to get to it...no thank you.  In general I found this to be another hotel that caters more to its convention goers. It can get very busy and loud in the lobby and those guests seem to be the priority.  We will not return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your constructive feedback. We're disappointed to learn that you did not enjoy the outdoor pool or your upgraded guest room. Your feedback regarding the housekeeping is appreciated and will certainly be passed along to our team for review. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve upon your experience.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location with an easy to take shuttle to Disneyland.  Its close to many restaurants and stores.  The staff was always very friendly and helpful.  We got the promo that included parking, pizza, movie and free Wi-Fi which seemed like a fabulous deal except that the pizza was not very good and the Wi-Fi kept disconnecting and despite asking the front desk that issue couldn't be resolved so we just had to use or own data.  The outdoor pool was freeeezing even though it was a 30 degree day but the hot tub was nice.  The room we had was in the oasis tower and it had two double beds.  I wish I wouldn't have paid more attention as for a family of 4 this was a very small room! The washroom was so small you couldn't get out of the shower and change in it.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. While we are delighted that you enjoyed our hotel's convenient location and friendly service, we're sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the pizza, wi-fi or your guest room size. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be passed along to our team. It's wonderful that you enjoyed a delicious meal at nFuse. We hope to have the chance to welcome you in the future so that we can improve your experience to a five-star stay.

Summary: We are Ritz Carlton rewards members and had points to use for the Marriot family. We were pleasantly surprised at the great service, very nicely renovated lobby and restaurant. All staff we interacted with were pleasant, helpful and friendly and went out of their way to ensure a great stay. The fitness center is well equipped and the restaurant servers and menu were fantastic. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your considerate review. We're delighted to hear that you were pleased with your use of points at our Anaheim hotel. It's wonderful that you enjoyed our great room, friendly staff and well-equipped fitness center. We're pleased that you found your meal and service at nFuse to be fantastic. We look forward to hosting you for another incredible stay soon.

Summary: Location:  Anaheim Marriott is conveniently located a few blocks away from Disneyland if you turn left and Target if you turn right.   What's around the area? CVS is just a block away which was extremely convenient since I caught the flu as soon as I landed in California.   Ihop, Cheesecake factory, Bubba Gump and California Pizza Kitchen are a stone throw away from the hotel as well.   Hotel Lobby:  If you're sick and can barely get out of the hotel there is Starbucks at the lobby as well as a "cafe" selling cold salads.   I also spotted a Pizza Hut in the lobby which I never saw open during my 2 nights there.   A convenience store and a bar are also located at the lobby.  If you have a big budget, go ahead and spluge on a buffet breakfast! It was really good but slightly on
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your excellent review. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel's convenient location, delicious dining options, and exceptional service. It's wonderful that you found your guest room to be clean and enjoyed the view overlooking the outdoor pool. Your feedback regarding the noise at night is appreciated. We always welcome our guests input. We cannot wait to welcome you in the future for another exceptional​ stay in Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent Marriott close to Disney. This week I Stayed here for business. Clean room and comfortable bed. The restaurant is excellent with an eclectic menu. The room rate was below average and a great value. I recommend this property and will stay here next time I'm in the area. Overnight parking is $25 per night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your excellent review. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay in your comfortable guest room. It's great that you found the nFuse menu to be eclectic and delicious. Thank you for recommending our hotel. We look forward to hosting you for another five-star experience soon.

Summary: When I arrived to hotel this month I was very sick! I called room service and a you man "Hamilton" was so very kind and sent me a free hot tea with honey, lemon, cough drops and Disney cup! Excellent customer service!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are overjoyed to hear that our staff was able to accommodate you when you weren't feeling well. It's our pleasure to make our guests feel at home and comfortable. We hope to welcome you in the future for another pleasant stay in Anaheim.

Summary: the hotel is nice, rooms are standard (like most of u.s. hotels). it has a good gym and swimming pool. Food is good and if you want to eat out, plenty options available at a walking distance. good option if you plan to go to disneyland, for it is some 10' walking. But beware if you need to use car: no free parking available. 27 usd per day!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and the plentiful facilities available to you. It's great that you enjoyed the quick walk to Disneyland from our hotel. Your feedback regarding the parking fee is greatly appreciated. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We hope to welcome you soon for another incredible stay.

Summary Heading: Very good experience. Great family hotel
Summary: Great bell desk. Great reception. Great room service Great restaurant.  Concierge . One female only does Disney.So she has no guests and other concierge had a queue. I only do Disney. So waited 18 minutes for help.....service.  Stunning bar/ snack service.great food and great service.  Nice views. Nice small balcony.  Delivered inter connecting rooms. Amazing.  Great app to check in.  Newly refurbished. Trying to be modern and hip.  Great location.  Starbucks is a shambles.Absolute disgrace at Starbucks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback regarding your stay with us. We are overjoyed to hear that you enjoyed excellent service throughout your stay in Anaheim. It's wonderful that you were fond of our hotel's convenient location and exceptional amenities. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary: Just stayed this last weekend , we were able to get a room facing pool which was nice. Stayed there two nights with the family , and it was awesome. It's right next to convention center  which worked out perfect during my daughters cheer competition . The pool is nice , since half of it is covered. The bar area is nice , and they serve craft beers which was a plus. The bar area gets live at night which is cool . Had the chicken tortilla soup in bar area which was good , my daughter had lobster Mac and cheese also very good . Second time at this location and won't be our last .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We're very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us in your guest room overlooking the pool. It's great to learn that you enjoyed a delicious meal at nFuse. We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another exceptional experience in Anaheim.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel twice and both times have been great. The rooms are nice and so are the beds. You are in walking distance to Disneyland and several restaurants which I was doing. I got to this hotel by taking Amtrak to the Artic Station and then a very short bus ride to the hotel. Any minor issues or requests were taken care of quickly with their great professionalism and customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your incredible review of our hotel. We are overjoyed to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our conveniently located hotel. We love to hear that you experienced excellent customer service and were pleased with the variety of transportation options. We hope to welcome you in the future for another five-star stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Disneyand-sized luxury hotel without Mickey Mouse gimmicks
Summary: If the hefty price of Disney’s Grand California is hard to swallow, and you don’t want to risk crashing for the night in a thread-bare motel where 1000+ kids have used your swaybacked bed as a trampoline, you’re not alone. You’ll save hundreds of dollars and your sanity by staying just a few blocks away from the Disneyland entrance at the sophisticated Anaheim Marriott. Like the Hilton Anaheim across the street, the Marriott is a large convention hotel but you’d never know it.  Service is friendly and flawless. Rooms are luxe, spacious and quiet. Although the hotel was near capacity during our two stays (once during the insane comic book expo Wondercon), I never once heard footsteps in the hallway or a neighbour’s bathroom plumbing, there was never a wait for restaurant seating,
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you sharing a detailed review of your exceptional experience at the Anaheim Marriott. We aim to provide each and every valued guest with a memorable stay and it delights us to read that there were so many aspects of our property that appealed to you. We are very glad that you received friendly and flawless service from our team members, found your guest room to be spacious and quiet, and rested soundly despite our high occupancy. It also thrills us to read that our housekeeping team was able to return your forgotten belongings to you. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Marriott. Should your travels bring you back to our area, we hope to have another opportunity to host you.

Summary Heading: Comfy bed very welcome after long days at Disneyland
Summary: We stayed for two nights during our trip to Disneyland. 10-15 minute walk from hotel. Hotel is beautiful, and everything I saw in the room, in the common areas, and on the hotel grounds was very well maintained. Bed and pillows were very comfortable and made for a great night's sleep. We were on the 16th floor, and had a view of the fireworks from our balcony. Hotel is by the convention center, and there was a large group there, but the only impact on us was a long wait in the morning at the Starbucks located in the hotel. There is a nice gift shop, and a Pizza Hut too which our son loved. Parking fee was a little high at $25, and wish they didn't charge for Wi-Fi; would prefer these things just be included in the room rate. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking valuable time out of your day to share your positive experience with us. We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland, our well-maintained grounds, our comfortable beds and pillows, our fireworks views, and our on property Pizza Hut. It excites us to know that you would return to us in the future and we eagerly await your return.

Summary: We were truly impressed with every aspect of the service from the bellhop to reception to the service in the concierge lounge and housekeeping. Everyone was there to help and we sincerely appreciated that especially when traveling with our 3 young children. We were upgraded to a suite and then a second room was added at no charge.  This extra space with our 3 boys really helped and gave us some adult space when the children were sleeping.  Thank you for making our trip brilliant!!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us. It is our goal to ensure that each and every valued guest enjoy a memorable stay at the Anaheim Marriott and it thrills us to read that you received exceptional service from everyone on our dedicated team. We are so glad that the extra space was helpful to you and your family and we eagerly await our next opportunity to host you.

Summary: Next to Disneyland so a bit pricey and the usual Marriott hotel parking ripoff.  The bathroom was quite small and the room smelled of disinfectant/cleaner.   There was a balcony with no view other than the adjoining rooms and the Big A in the distance.  We've stayed here twice now but not sure I'd stay again.  Best part of the stay was the dinner we ate in the lobby restaurant, I had a good french dip sandwich.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking valuable time out of your day to share a candid review of your visit to the Anaheim Marriott. We truly appreciate your feedback and are disappointed to read that you did not enjoy an exceptional experience at our hotel. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your dining experience in nFuse and hope to welcome you again in the future so that we may have an opportunity to improve upon your stay.

Summary Heading: Comfortable Room For an Exhausting Conference
Summary: I was in Anaheim for a conference at the Convention Center. The lobby was very crowded, but once I got to my floor, it was quiet and peaceful. The beds were very comfortable, room was clean. All the staff were very helpful and friendly.  The room was a nice place to relax after a very long day.  I rented a car for a day from Hertz. The return area at the hotel was not marked, difficult to find.  The hotel charged for internet service which I didn't appreciate.  Overall, I would stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Average, room for improvement but overall is ok.
Summary: Booked the Marriott as it was closest to the convention and indeed a stone throw away.   Check in was pretty busy but if you are part of the Marriott elite program, maybe slightly faster. However I need to commend on the concierge! The gentlemen was very helpful and offer great customer service.   The rooms are a little small and design is pretty dated. Inconsistent with the Marriott hotels I come from in Asia. And always remember Marriott for their most comfortable bed and pillow but it is otherwise in this hotel. But not the worst and it is still acceptable.   Like the size of the gym and it is very well equipped except that it gets really crowded by 630am.   Overall, pleasant experience but will certainly hope they do something to the overall design of the hotel. We had a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Anaheim Marriott.   As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay.  Please accept our sincere apology for the issues in which you may have experienced.  We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.   Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary: Floor 14 rooms, not noise, clean room, has refrigerator to store cans and a few snacks. Bathroom clean, small, with hair dryer. They do not replace bottle water, even if it is charged to your room bill. Has parking lot for hotel guests. With in walking distance you can reach the shuttle to Disneyland Park. Internet/wifi with daily cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Anaheim Marriott.   We pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, and it sounds like there was a couple of small things we could have done better.  Please accept our sincere apology for these items.  We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this was an isolated issues that are corrected moving forward.   Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to stay at a convention
Summary: Marriott Anaheim is a perfect place to stay at a convention.  Close proximity to everything including Disneyland.  The rooms are a little small but very nice.  The balcony is accessible and can be used to soak up some sun.  Reception is very efficient and the elevator has a unique feature that makes the waiting time a lot shorter.  You select the floor you want before you can hop on the elevator.  Its something you need to get use to but it prevents kids from pressing all the buttons.   The amenities are great from the lounge bar to the food market place, Pizzahut and Starbucks are inside the building so you don't need to get drive around for a late snack.  I would definitely come back to stay at the Marriott Anaheim Hotel in California
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worth the price we paid for......AWESOME hotel..
Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay here.  Staff were both helpful and very friendly.  Our stay was both restful and comfortable.  We loved having a mini balcony and sit and relax in after long days in Disneyland.  We would definitely stay here again the next time we visit Disneyland again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an alumni reception at the hotel as part of a professional meeting.  The catering staff (Julia Rice) was great to work with and had good suggestions to keep us on budget.  The presentation of the food was OVER THE TOP!!  And Sharon did a great job of keeping the presentation looking nice as food got eaten,  The Banquet Captain Anotnio Dorantes was also very helpful.  When doing somethjing like this out of town and setting everything up site unseen, you are sometimes unpleasantly surprised.  NOT SO with this hotel!  Excellent service!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel for the pool, but due to a broken glass in the pool, we were unable to use the pool our entire stay.  They did offer the use of the Hilton's pool across the street, but after a long day of walking at Disney Land, this was not really appealing.  Food at nFuse was excellent.  Server was lovely.  Front desk staff were friendly.  Rooms were clean - and our bed types were met.  The room was not worth the room rate we paid since we didn't really get what we booked for.  Think very carefully about booking this far away from Disney Land - if a pool matters to you, this may not be the right place.  While I realize that it's unusual to have broken glass in the pool and they did the right thing from a safety perspective, perhaps just book closer to Disney.
Manager Response: Sarah N,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Anaheim Marriott.   As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay.  Please accept our sincere apology for the pool situation while you were here.  We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.   Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Awesome spot for the single traveler
Summary: The rooms are amazingly comfortable. Great little market to grab breakfast before heading to the shuttle for a day at Disney. Super helpful staff - checked in at 10 am and held bags for a late day at checkout.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although attending a huge convention which this hotel is adjacent to the Convention Center and therefore very loud with bands and all sorts of activities, our accommodations were great as we were high enough to enjoy peace and quiet in a clean nice room with a comfortable bed. Then too, Room Service was super when we were exhausted and their pizza was really good! :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I were celebrating an anniversary at Disneyland and decided to stay at Anaheim Marriott.  We did not have children with us and thought the corporate hotel would be a good choice.  We were floored by how much we like this property.  It was perfect.  Nice rooms, relatively quiet and close to Disney.  Even though we had the ART pass for transportation, we walked back to the hotel every evening.  We rode the ART bus to Disneyland every day.  Starbucks in the lobby, great garage parking (extra charge) and perfect environment.  Close to everything.  I highly recommend this property location
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very happy with this Marriott! Very clean, wonderful pool, helpful staff!! The grounds are well kept and easy to navigate given how big the property is. Very close to Disneyland and adjacent to the convention center.  I highly recommend this resort!!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was too small and the beds are double beds not queen. Being with kids it was really important to have at least queen size beds. To upgrade for what I have paid for they charged me $115/day. I don't think it's fair.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Marriott is nice, and it has a lot of business travelers vs most hotels in the area who generally are filled exclusively w children. Not that there aren't children here or it's not kid friendly, it is. But it also has a Starbucks and a Kinkos in the building. Banquet halls etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice but missing basic expectations.
Summary: OK I get it they are a huge place for mostly conferences, but I came with my wife's company and notices lots missing basic hotels cover free.   The good... nice room, clean, comfortable, decent TV, average small fridge, great pool, and nice people.   The bad... you have to pay high daily rates for WiFi. Yes budget motels give that for free, and here you have to pay a high price. Nfusion restaurant has crazy high prices for basic food. Yes there is a Starbucks and there is hotel coffee. If you are a coffee snob go to Starbucks but if not go some other place because the hotel coffee is terrible. No microwave in the room. This is a very basic appliance and just silly when you consider they give you a fridge.   I might would come back to the area but I would pick a different hotel.
Manager Response: First of all, I'd like to thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback of your stay with us. We do apologize that any inconvenience you dealt with during your visit. We'll be sure to take all of your comments back to the rest of the team and we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you again!

Summary Heading: Room for improvement but overall good!
Summary: We stayed in a suite over Thanksgiving for an event. I requested and was re-assured an early check in would be granted as well as a microwave for the suite (although you would think one would come standard in a suite). My suite was not ready and we had to wait almost 8 hours to get into our suite. The staff was helpful but the communication was lacking. The suite did not have a microwave as promised and I was told there were no microwaves left. We ended up buying a microwave and were promised they would deduct that amount from my bill which never happened. Having said that- the suite was wonderful and the management tried their best to take care of my family and I appreciate that. The management did send up a tray of food for us which was a nice touch. The hotel itself is great-
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of of Anaheim Marriott. We apologize for the mishap with the microwave. But I'm glad you enjoyed your stay overall. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Convenient Disneyland stay for the price
Summary: My husband and I drove to Anaheim for the weekend to spend one day at Disneyland. We stayed two nights for $130 a night excluding taxes and fees. We decided to valet for $30 bucks a night. When it was all said and done we paid $360 for 2 nights including taxes and fees. Before booking this hotel, consider parking into your budget.   This hotel isn't exactly walking distance to Disneyland so I would recommend taking an Uber over the ART. It costed us $5 bucks for the two of us and we could leave whenever we wanted and were picked up and dropped off at the most convenient locations.   I love the convenience of this hotel as it has a bar and Starbucks right in the hotel.   As for the room, some aspects were outdated but the necessities were all there. The towels and sheets were
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. We're glad that we could make your visit to Disneyland enjoyable and that you liked the convenience of the hotel and the service from our staff. Please visit us again soon!

Summary: I rarely leave a one star review.  This was a very poor Marriott product.  Check-in was easy and seamless. No issues here.  Once I got to the room, a series of cleaning failures really ruined the stay.  I used a towel in the bathroom, the towel had a huge brown stain on it.  There was also a stain and hair in the bed.  There was hair in the bathtub.  Normally this does not justify a 1 star review.  I used one of the glasses on the bar to mix an Air Born pill.  After maid service I returned to the room, and needed another glass.  The glass that I used earlier was apparently poorly rinsed and placed back in the bar.  After closer inspection I noticed every glass in the room was very poorly cleaned.  These glasses are clearly never removed from the rooms to clean.  They are
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. It's unfortunate that the experience you had with us was not indicative of the exceptional service we strive to provide on a regular basis. We will bring this feedback to our staff in order to improve our service in the future. Thank you and please visit us again!

Summary: Was there for company conference & happy to book the room at Marriott. Starbucks is at 1st level & they have a huge room.. Its just across the conference centre which make it very convenient. However the hotel is so big, and many rooms that it can get confusing when i return back to my floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott! We're glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This Marriott is average. The front side and lobby and restaurant are very pretty and updated, but the rooms and pool area are dated. I had the Room on second floor facing parking lot, you could hear every person! It's great for conventions however the inconvenience with the distance to Disney would not make it worth it for a pleasure trip.  The best part was the staff at the restaurant for breakfast. The chef was an amazing guy, kudos to him.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. We're glad you enjoyed the friendliness of the staff, and we'll take your feedback to them to improve our service in the future. Please visit us again!

Summary: Great location, staff, and easy access to surrounding area.  I always have a great stay at this location.  The workout facility is above average, and has everything you need.  Since I am Platinum with Marriott, the extras that come with that are great, including the  evening social, late night dessert, and breakfast.  You can't go wrong with this location!!
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott! We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and your rewards benefits. Please visit us again soon!

Summary: Marriott Anaheim is exactly what you can expect from Marriott: nice and spacious rooms, great service and excellent location. The hotel is just a few steps of the convention center and has extremely convenient services such as a Hertz location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott! We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Please visit us again soon!

Summary: What a great hotel! You walk into a very spacious, yet inviting and beautiful lobby. Front desk personnel is the most informative, polished and courteous I have encountered in a while. They quickly took care of our check-in. The rest of the staff was sweet to our little one, which was important to us as it was a "special birthday weekend." The hotel is next to the Convention Center and about a 15-minute walk or quick 5-minute shuttle to Disneyland/California Adventure IF you happen to catch the ART shuttle at the right time. Shuttle cost was a reasonable $5 for three days and available at the front desk. Our room was clean, quiet, spacious, had a large desk and a nice deck. Bed was comfortable - slept as well as I do at home, thank goodness! Wi-Fi is free for members.    We
Manager Response: Awesome! Thank you for taking the time to give us some great feedback. We're pleased to hear about your satisfying experience with us. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Marriott Anaheim is a good hotel with excellent location. Recently it was renovated with new lobby. the lobby and lounge areas are beautiful. the swimming pool was great for our teenagers, they loved it. However, i noticed during our stay that the Pizza Hut was closed all the time, we struggled for fast food in a sense that the market advertised by the hotel wasn't open most of the time either and the Starbucks in the hotel is so overpriced. but was our only option for our family and our teenagers. At the end of the trip the cost of Starbucks was phenomenal. the other concern I had that one of our rooms wasn't ready until 6 pm for check in!! Overall though, to is a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We will take the rest of your feedback to the staff in order to improve our service. Thank you and please visit again!

Summary: We stayed at this property six days as part of a conference and to also visit Disneyland. We were placed in the Oasis Tower in a room with a king size bed. The room was small but did have all the basics. Anyone with a vehicle needs to be aware that parking is $25.00 to $30.00 per night depending on whether you use the valet service or park yourself. The other downside to this hotel is there is no shuttle service to Disneyland unless you use a city bus service offered at $5.00 per day for adults and another $2-3 for each child per day. There are positives to this hotel. The staff were very helpful, especially check-in and valet. Couldn't have been nicer. The lobby is nice and they have a nice bar area. There is a Starbucks on site but we had the misfortune of a main machine
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your feedback. I'm glad you enjoyed the service and friendliness of the staff. Please visit us again, we'd love to have you back again!

Summary: I recently stayed at the Marriott for a convention. Literally within steps of the convention center and extremely convenient. They were well prepared to handle the large surge of guests, especially at the restaurant and bar. Good rooms and friendly staff. The ART bus to Disney is right out their front door and passes can be bought at the front desk.   The hotel and its restaurants have a great awareness of gluten-free if that is a concern.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. I'm glad you enjoyed the rooms, the friendliness of the staff and the convenience with the convention center. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for four nights from Sunday to Thursday in February, didn't choose the hotel, it was the site of a convention I was attending.  Check in was seamless and quick.  I only wish I was more selective with my initial room.  When the clerk said "15th floor," I asked for something lower.  Big mistake.  Should have said, yes!  Generally I like to be on a lower floor so I can get to & from the convention meetings by taking the stairs and not waiting for the elevator.  This hotel has essentially three towers, one main, one called the Oasis Tower, and the three-story less-than where I first stayed, for two nights.  The room overlooked the pool and was kind of noisy.  The room was also run down a bit, not sure why they don't take as good of care of that part of the hotel, but
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your feedback! We're glad you enjoyed the service from the staff and that we could make your stay a little bit more enjoyable. Please visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here last week for a quick trip to Disneyland.  I was losing my my voice due to a cold, and this was noticeable at check-in.  Therese was very helpful and found an available room before the standard check-in time.  After returning from the park we found a note and tea in our room- that was so nice and much appreciated!! Thank you Therese!! This is why I continue to come back to the Marriott even though we are Platinum with Starwood😊
Manager Response: Wow! That is so great to hear! I'm glad you enjoyed the attentiveness and the service from the staff. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: First time to Anaheim and was welcomed well at the hotel. Check in was simple and efficient and I was able to check in early with no problems. Room was lovely 16th floor - city view. I was able to go to a concierge lounge that was amazing on the 18th floor with great views, wonderful fresh fruit, hearty breakfast as well as great evening appetizers. Staff were wonderful, helpful and friendly and very willing to go out of their way to help me. Check out was great also with no problems.  I went to the pool outside that was great in 90 degrees heat if you were in the sun but as the pool went round under the cover was shade and that side of the pool was cold. Clean towels changed frequently with plenty of deck loungers for the time I was there I am sure at some point it would get
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback and review of Anaheim Marriott! I'm glad we could make your first visit to Anaheim enjoyable! Please visit us again soon!

Summary: It was indeed a great short stay, I stayed here for 2 nights & 3 days last Feb. 19-21. The room is spacious and tidy, with balcony facing the neighbor hotel (Hilton). It feels so good to hangout in the balcony early in the morning while sunrise, sipping your cup of coffee, breathing chill' fresh air with a little nice view. There is a Starbucks in the ground floor of the hotel and a lot of restaurants around the area. It's 45 mins. - 1 hr to Los Angeles. The hotel offer a tour (bus tour) to some tourist destinations, it will cost you $65.  And most of all, Disneyland is walking distance🤗
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate it. I'm glad you enjoyed your balcony view and your stay with us, and we hope to have you again soon!

Summary: I was disappointed with the value for the money at this hotel.  I felt I was being gouged every step of the way.  Beyond the US$229/night + tax, the basic internet was US$13/day and parking was $25/day.  I foolishly ordered room service breakfast the first day out of necessity and was charged nearly US$18 for a hard boiled egg and a bowl of cereal.  The gift shop, as would be expected, was outrageously expensive.  Save yourself some money by walking down the road to the CVS for any necessities or snacks.  The room was adequate but the tiles in the bathroom were chipped and the shower was tepid at best.  Under the bathroom sink the pipes were rusty.  Cleanliness was adequate but not stellar.  Voices in the corridor carried and the elevator was audible from my room.  My  group
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. We will take your feedback to the staff in hopes of improving our service in the future. Thank you again!

Summary: Customer service is amazing, all staff was helpful and happy. Food was SO delicious. Beds were not bad but a little hard for us. I would give 5 stars except for there was an error with our room key getting canceled. Other than that it was great. Very clean and  pretty.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We hope you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here Halloween weekend. It wasn't as packed as I thought it was going to be. We were in the connected Marriott building. It is a HUGE hotel, by far the biggest hotel I've been to in a long time. The beds were comfortable and we LOVED our balcony. It was a nice way to watch for the shuttle. It was also a beautiful view to wake up to! Very clean room.  Parking is expensive, so if you are flying in, just take the hotel shuttle bus to and from the airport. It'll save you a lot of money. Our rental car just stayed in the parking garage - waste of money! Try UBER or LYFT for getting around to restaurants and sightseeing around Anaheim.   We will return to this hotel unless we hit the lotto and get to stay on property!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott! We're glad we could make your stay enjoyable. Good luck on the lotto, but if that doesn't work out we'll be here to help out! Thank you and please visit us again!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and loved the staff and the hotel itself. Really beautiful decor and staff are friendly and at your disposal whenever you need it. Being tourists, we needed things to do outside of Disneyland and the tour desk they have is perfect. The rooms are well kept and tidy and the pool is nice. Also has a really good gym which makes people who are wanting to exercise while on holiday alot easier. Worth the price!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott! We appreciate the feedback. I'm glad we could make your visit to Disneyland enjoyable. Please visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Convenient to Convention Center, but a drive to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed here twice, to visit Disneyland.  There is no tram or other convenient way to get to Disneyland from the hotel:  either drive your car to Disney parking lot or call a cab. (There may be a shuttle but the price was prohibitive.)  It's advertised as being two blocks away.  As the crow flies, yes, but if you want to get to the entrance, it's a 1.2 mile walk.  The rooms are large, comfortable, clean and quiet.  We requested adjoining rooms for our family, and on our first stay, we were comped an upgrade to what must have been the presidential suite.    The quality of the room service food was excellent.  The filet was probably as good as at nearby Ruth Chris steakhouse.   The hotel is adjacent to the convention center, and the hotel itself is designed to handle large
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to have you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: Too big for its own good
Summary: As a Marriott Gold member I thought I'd get the hotel room I had booked.  I asked for a king sized bed, got a key and got there with two queens.  I returned to the front desk, same thing again.  I find it unacceptable that they didn't want to admit they didn't have it, instead they banked on me simply saying good enough and not dealing with effort to return.  I found the food options surprisingly expensive for a hotel but the concierge lounge was better than average.
Manager Response: First of all, thank you for taking the time to write a review. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you dealt with during your stay. We'll be sure to take your feedback into consideration and we hope that you give us the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: Nice room with 2 king beds. clean, large space. A bar on the agora space with a good choice of beer. near Disney and Anaheim Convention Center where I been for a Sales Kick Off. I recommend this place for business or personal trip too.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott! I'm glad you enjoyed the room and nFuse bar. Please visit us again, we'd love to have you back!

Summary: Platinum elite Marriott member. .no upgrade..no view. In opposite tower than the concierge lounge.  Service just average. Location convenient to convention center and Disney. Would only stay for a convention. Appears to be non kid friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. We take pride in providing quality service to our guests. We will take your feedback to the staff in order to improve our service in the future. Thank you and please visit again!

Summary Heading: The Staff, from first entering the Lobby, are very welcoming and friendly!!
Summary: Walking alone into the spacious Lobby, easy direction to the Registration where you are immediately greeted with efficiency, friendliness and CHARM!! Within 30 minutes, I was registered, left my luggage in the room, and entering the Platinum Ballroom for my meetings!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and the great feedback! I'm glad that you enjoyed the friendliness of the staff as well as the efficient service. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice and well organised. Function room needs a bit of improvement though. Connecting service seems to be a problem to the LA airport. Food was okay but the bar service was a bit disappointing. Staffs were very nice and I would be happy to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on the Anaheim Marriott. We're glad you enjoyed the friendliness of the staff and the service. Please visit us again!

Summary: This hotel is great - it is useful if you are going to a convention at the Anaheim convention center.  it is close to Disney but not that close.  My room was on the end of a hallway and was quiet and very nice.   The bed was fabulous - very comfortable.   You have to get used to the elevator - you put in your floor outside the elevator.  You don't push anything in it - this is a bit disconcerting at first.   I figured out that the destination is on the upper part of the door.   I guess this is so kids cannot get in and push all the floors!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and review of Anaheim Marriott! I'm glad you enjoyed the service and room offerings. Those are some great tips as well. Thank you and please visit again!

Summary: Amazing location, amazing weather, amazing breakfast buffet, decent rooms for the price...just heat the pool and it would be perfect for kids. Average temp for a hotel pool should be 85 but the hotel pool was 73. Too cold so everyone crowds the hot tub. For families with kids a pool is essential to the vacation. And if they can't stay in then it's a disappointment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and the feedback! We're glad you enjoyed the breakfast offerings and the location. We will definitely take that feedback to the staff to improve our service in the future. Thank you and please visit again!

Summary Heading: Would not want to stay for holiday if there was a choice
Summary: Really just a very average hotel. Some part of the room facility is quite old, like the air-conditioning switch is like that of the 80's. The bathtub's paints are partly peeled off.  What I did not like the most was how slow the bell boy turns up with the luggage. I had to alert the front desk at least 3 times and waiting for a long time before my luggage was delivered.  What is interesting is the wireless charging that is placed at the lobby. Quite convenient for the guests. But this also show the contrast between modern technology and old facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. We'll take your feedback to the staff in hopes of improving our service in the future. Thank you and please visit again!

Summary: Enjoyed a 5 night stay at the Marriott within walking distance to our sales conference at the convention center.  Room accommodations were excellent, comfortable, and clean.  Hotel staff were friendly.  The bar at the hotel lobby was readily accessible.  My hotel of choice when visiting Anaheim and the convention center.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott! I'm glad you enjoyed the service from the staff and nFuse Bar's convenience. Glad you were satisfied with your near-week staying with us! Please visit again!

Summary: Close to the convention center, friendly staff.  Close walking distance to restaurants and bars as well.  One night a co-worker got unruly and management handles it very well.   Recommend for events at convention center.  Bar had plenty of food and drink options.  Concierge had excellent food recommendations including Mexican place not too far away on "Diners, Drive Ins and Dives".  Lots of Uber drivers in the area and ~$5 to most nearby locations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you enjoyed the friendliness of the staff and nFuse Bar's selections. Please visit again!

Summary: I stayed at the Mariott Anaheim with my husband for a trip to Disneyland and the Star Wars Half Marathon. I only booked it for the convenience and price (cheaper than Disneyland on-property resorts) but I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of our stay. Luckily we did not have to park a car as parking costs were very high. However, I have come to expect that at a convention hotel, airport area hotel, or at any hotel near Disney properties. Check-in was fast and the staff was so friendly. One gentleman at the counter even assisted me by giving me band-aids when I asked for them - a small detail, but he took the time to go look for some and I appreciated it.  The room was clean and spacious enough for us. We didn't have a balcony view but we booked a discounted room through
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback! I'm glad you enjoyed the service and friendliness of the staff! We're glad we could make your visit to Disneyland enjoyable. Please visit us again!

Summary: Attended a Real Estate Convention and was pleased to see that they hae updated the hotel since our last visit.  The lobby has new furniture and decor with beautiful flower arrangements changed every other day.  The room also was updated, with comfortable beds and new carpet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback. We're happy to hear that you're pleased with the renovations that have been made since your last visit. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Conventions or Disney
Summary: We were at the Marriott Anaheim for 5 nights for a convention.  The staff was very friendly and efficient.  Our room was clean and comfortable, with a balcony where we could watch the Disneyland fireworks at night.  One note about the elevators.  You punch in your floor BEFORE you get on the elevator.  Once inside there are no buttons to push so be sure to get on the correct elevator.  We found this to be a very efficient system and never waited more than a minute or so.  The concierge lounge, while very busy, serves a great breakfast buffet, with hot and cold dishes.  Overall, a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us some positive feedback. We're pleased to hear that your visit with us went great. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Perfect location for Disney, staff extremely friendly.  The lift/elevator is a first for me (I won't spoil the fun). If you get access to the 18th floor lounge you can save a heap of money on the cost of breakfast. They have a free comprehensive breakfast free.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We're glad you enjoyed the service and the friendliness of the staff (and the elevator!). I'm happy we could make your stay enjoyable and we hope to see you again!

Summary: Loved the mobile check in feature. Enjoyed my room 11th floor views of the entry and with its own balcony 1120 . Very comfy beds, very well maintained. Loved the check in staff when not busy would line up and great you. Everyone from the store late night help to the friendly parking lot attendant who wished me a great day as I left - were all very customer friendly I will be back. Plus a great location to be able to walk to the convention center. ( hidden tip- walk across the street to the Hilton and it has a good court option)
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We're glad you enjoyed the service and the friendliness of the staff! I'm happy we could make your stay enjoyable and we hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: The hotel is mainly geared for corporate groups, with its proximity to the Anaheim Convention Centre. Rooms are in decent condition though must admit the bed mattress was getting a bit saggy. There are so many other options in the area for those who are here to visit Disneyland however
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We're glad we could make your stay here pleasant. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: During our trip we stayed in 2 different rooms. The first, with countryside view. The bed was fabulous but the room (in the Tower) was really small with a low ceiling. The next stay we asked to upgrade our room. We were shown a Hospitality Suite. Great for business but with a fold away bed and an eye level view of a roof top with a LOT of air-con units blasting away. The noise was really loud, making the balcony not a pleasant place to be, and so we declined this choice. Our next room was a larger version of the original and pretty well perfect. Beds at this hotel are outstanding. Food at the restaurant was excellent with varied choices, fast and efficient service. The hotel boasts a Starbucks and an excellent shop. Reception staff were first class. This is a very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback. We're pleased to hear that our staff was about to accommodate your needs and get you the room you deserve! We hope to have you back again very soon.

Summary: I stay at this hotel every other year when my husband attends a conference.  It is clean, modern with a Starbucks, cafe, along with more formal dining.  It is close to Disneyland and nicer "chain" restaurants such as Ruth's Chris & Cheesecake Factory.  Staff are nice and attentive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I'm glad we could make your visit enjoyable and comfortable. Thank you and please visit us again!

Summary: The name should not be Marriott for this hotel. From the lobby to the rooms and the restaurants it's not anywhere near the Marriott standards. The rooms are clean and staff are friendly but the hotel feels crowded 24/7.might be due to the convention Center next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I'm glad you enjoyed the room and the friendliness of the staff. Please visit us again soon.

Summary: From the moment we pulled up, to the time the front desk person took to locate a room that was ready (we arrived early) to the way he stepped out from behind the desk to hand me the key....I could go on and on but why?  I recommend you choose this property the next time you are in the area...PERIOD! :)  It's a shuttle ride away from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott! I'm glad you enjoyed the service from our staff and your room. Please visit us again!

Summary: Great staff! Enjoyed my stay. Great food and drinks. Starbucks was always busy, but very speedy with getting orders out. Loved having the option to buy Disney passes, shuttle passes etc. Great central location!
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I'm glad you enjoyed the friendliness of the staff and the convenience of the location. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Hotel Looks Brand New, close to Disneyland
Summary: I took a friend to California Adventure and we stayed here. The hotel looks like it was just built, the lobby and pool area are very nice. The room was also modern with new looking fixtures, etc, plus a large balcony and view of the pool. The price was reasonable too, compared to the Disney hotels. I would definitely stay here again.   The only thing I didn't like was that there is no free shuttle to the park. You have to go up to the front desk and buy "trolley tickets" and then stand out in front of the hotel and wait for the bus to arrive. There were so many people waiting out front that we almost didn't get on the first one, it was like being on a packed subway. Better to cab it over or walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of the Anaheim Marriott. I'm glad you enjoyed your room and your visit to Disney's California Adventure. Thank you again and please visit us soon!

Summary: We visited the Marriot for 2 nights to run the Star Wars Disney 1/2 marathon.  We were greeted by friendly, and courteous staff from the valet to the front desk staff. We had come from the Westin in Long Beach and experienced an unpleasant stay at that hotel and we mentioned to Tharice (spelling) our experience. She was wonderful and sympathetic and assured us that we had a large, corner room with a balcony and to let her know if we needed anything etc. The room was comfortable, bright, modern, clean and spacious. It misses a few small details that would just give it that extra update. I would suggest a towel bar on the wall in the washroom, a bench in front of the bed or another chair, a larger, modern TV stand. These are small details, but for me the details matter. Overall,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott! I hope you guys enjoyed your time at Disneyland and had a blast at the Star Wars Marathon. We're glad you enjoyed the convenience and location of the hotel. Thank you again and visit us again soon!

Summary: Just left after three days at the Marriott.  The positives include excellent location.  Close enough to walk to Disneyland, but far enough to be removed from the crowds.  Right next to convention center and has a Morton's Steakhouse on the same block.  Hotel is well kept and modern.  Elevator system is unique, but awesome.  Very little waiting with these elevators!  Concierge Lounge was pedestrian, but decent breakfast.  Rooms are not huge, but balconies are nice.  Ask for a room facing Disney to see the nightly fireworks from your room/balcony.  Complaints included a very small bathroom and one of the worst shower heads I have ever experienced.  Service was mediocre.  Examples include; Left the hotel at 7:30 AM and asked at front desk to have room cleaned before return around
