Summary: The service during our stay was top notch but our room was average at best. Perhaps the suites are a bit nicer? We wouldn't mind staying again but not in a standard room. The concierge lounge was also closed during our stay for a private event.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write us a review about your experience. I'm going to take your feedback to the staff so we can work to better serve our guests. Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Need to get onboard with charging WiFi...
Summary: I'm here for a work convention and I'm a bit taken aback about 12.95 per day for WiFi.  Who does that anymore??  This convention is bringing in $$.  What I will say that, if you have Marriott Awards, they do away with that, but I had to hear it from a co-participant.  I even went to the desk to respectfully show my disdain for this charge, being a work-related trip, and they offered nothing.  The rest of the hotel is average for the price.  I think the quality of room depends on what tower you're on.  My last conference, I had a very large room on the left tower from desk.  This time, I'm above Starbucks, and the room barely had enough room for the ironing board.  Beds are comfy, very friendly staff, in-house restaurant a bit stuffy and over-priced.  I would check other hotels
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. While I'm sorry to hear that your room wasn't up to satisfaction, I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.

Summary: We stayed during Thanksgiving week during a busy National Pageant.  The room was a little small, but nice.  The staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  The pool area was really nice and clean.  It was easy to navigate and close enough to walk to several restaurants.  We had a wonderful experience and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the property and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: I don't consider myself or my family to be an overly picky or critical bunch of travelers, but there were just too many bad experiences during our four day stay to give this property anything other than a poor review. We make our annual trip to Disneyland, and we've stayed at many of the hotel properties surrounding the park, but this one stands out as a sub-par hotel experience. Item #1: we were locked out of our hotel room because of a malfunctioning door/lock mechanism. My wife and two young daughters had just come from the pool and had to wait in the hallway in our bathing suits while I made multiple trips to the front desk to try and get assistance. A custodian eventually showed up and popped the door, but told us to start packing because the door was malfunctioning and we
Manager Response: What is an email and phone number for you?

Summary: This was my first stay at this particular Marriott. I have stayed at the Anaheim Courtyard and Residence Inn, as well as a few other non Marriott properties in the area. This by far was my favorite! The lobby was lovely, with a very cool hip vibe and my room appeared to be recently renovated. The bathroom was nice but nothing special. As a gold member I am given access to the concierge lounge for breakfast and evening appetizers. The lounge absolutely did not disappoint. The breakfast had many choices and the evening spread ended up being dinner! I slept extremely well, as the bed was comfortable and the air conditioning worked perfectly.... which is not always the case! I was even able to see the Disneyland fireworks from my room!  Upon arrival and check out every staff member
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the property and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: Comfy beds.. But I ended up with lots of itchy bites ..thought it might have been be bugs but according to the hotel.. There was no sign of them in our room.  If the hotel is not full there is no buffet breakfast .. You can only order a few items from the menu
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write us a review about your experience. I'm sorry that your stay was anything but exceptional. I'm going to take your feedback to the staff so we can work to better serve our guests. Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Good hotel that needs some improvement
Summary: We had a meeting at Hiton (across the street). But since I read about dated, old rooms at Hiltion, I decided to stay at Marriott instead. From others who stayed at Hilton, Hilton indeed has rooms that need updating/renovation. Bu I found that Hilton has some advantages: bigger lobby, directly connected to food court, larger restaurant that offers foods at reasonable to high prices. But marriott is quieter.  The lobby at Marriott looks nice. I stayed in 16th floor - not sure if it is ugraded room or not. The rooms are OK in general, but the bathroom looks a little dated. There is a shower over bath tub - not great for people who ony take showers at the hotel. The shower felt little weak (Is it to save water?). The bathroom may need updating soon,  The staff at the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.

Summary: Rooms are small and dated but very clean. We had connecting rooms which was nice. Had a fridge but no microwave. Had hot water coming form hot and cold tap a lot of the time (annoying). Staff was excellent, no issues at all. Only ate breakfast there and it was very good. Lobby, bar, restaurant are very nice. Pool is Ok but not kid oriented. More of a convention hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: Was very impressed with the Marriot on Convention way. The staff were always friendly, helpful and happy and helped us with information and tips every day. So easy to catch the art buses and shuttle buses just right out the front. The rooms were spacious, modern and clean and we were very comfortable there for the 6 nights of our stay. Highly recommend this hotel with families as it is so easy to get to Disney, and the local CVS is 5 minutes walk to get breakfast items, snacks etc. Awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the lobby and bar area and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: The hotel is very nice, rooms are average and make sure you get one away from the loud ice machines and with a pool view so you don't end up staying up all night listening to a party all night like I did.  Walls between rooms are paper thin as well. I complained and the hotel took good care of me. Mr. Marriott even showed up for a visit. Food is fantastic at the hotel and convention facilities are of the best I have experienced. Great location right across the street from Disneyland and close to plenty of great restaurants.  I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the hotel and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: We stay here annually as a family to enjoy Disneyland at the beginning of the holiday season.  To accommodate all of us, we need 3 separate rooms.    The pros are as follows: Great location - can take the bus to Disneyland or walk (12-15 minutes) Clean rooms and comfortable beds Corner rooms are larger Staff is always helpful, whether at the front desk, concierge, or parking attendant Starbucks is conveniently located in the lobby Room rates are reasonable, in comparison to Disneyland properties and the rooms are larger, by comparison  Some things could be better: Wifi in the room is not always available Multi-day bus passes are not sold on site; must go to the Hilton or Clarion Concierge is often over-sold and unavailable Food is average and expensive  Overall, we enjoy our
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the property and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Business and Family vs Marriott Suites
Summary: I've recently been a regular visitor to this property and the Anaheim Marriott Suites down the road.  Both for business and family trips.  I book these two as they regularly seem to be the best values of the Marriott properties.  The Suites is a basic, no frills Marriott with a great price and a large suites, ideal for families.  It's fine for business if you're driving and they have an easy self park facility.  They have everything you need from Starbucks to many very close restaurants.  The downside there is it's dated, slow, and no frills.  The lobby bar will cure your insomnia as it's about as dead a place as you'll ever find.  Again though, it's great for families and ok if you're in and out for business.   The Anaheim Marriott prices seem to swing wildly though so it's a
Manager Response: Thanks for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I'm glad that you enjoyed both of the Marriott properties and the modern feel of our hotel. We hope you stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: This hotel is convenient for anyone attending a conference at the Convention Center or in the hotel facilities, but beyond that it's really not good enough for business travel solely because I couldn't get wifi in my room.  It came and went but mostly I could only get emails to transmit in the middle of the night when the traffic had died down, and was completely unable to do a Skype call from my computer in my room.  I would never stay there again for that reason.  After a long day of meetings the last thing I want to do is have to keep running out to the lift lobby of the floor I was on to get enough connection for messages to receive and transmit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the convenient location of the hotel. If there is anything I can do to make your next stay more enjoyable, feel free to contact me.  Best,  Dan

Summary: No doubt it is a stretch to call this a four star hotel.  The location is amazing if you are visiting the convention center, the lobby is nice, it has a nice restaurant ... but the rooms leave a bit to be desired ...  Again, just know what you are getting.  It's basically a 3 star hotel, cleaned up, with a better bed.  And, if you're going to be at the convention center, that may be just fine for your needs ...
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the location of the hotel and the attractions in the lobby area. We hope you stay with us again soon.  Best,  Dan

Summary: I travelled around the USA for 3 weeks and this hotel had the best service by far. Check in and check out was extremely quick every staff member I spoke to was extremely friendly and helpful. Walking distance to resturants and Disneyland or there is a shuttle bus to Disneyland if you are too tired to walk. I had an issue with the TV not working on arrival but they almost immediately sent someone to fix it which was fantastic. Bathroom is a little small and outdated but was clean. Overall I had no issues and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am happy to hear that the check in and check out process was effecient. We hope you stay with us again soon.  Best,  Dan

Summary Heading: Jaded rooms but good communal areas
Summary: Came here for a conference. The lobby and bar area are very pleasant and there is a good area to eat/drink around a small pool area. The food at the bar was very good and I found all the staff very pleasant and friendly.  I had a room on the ground floor which looked out on the car park. The bathroom was from the 70s and some of the fittings were falling apart. The bed and linen was very comfortable though.  From colleagues staying in the other hotels in this space, it sounds like this one is the best. I had a breakfast meeting at the Hilton and I can say that the Marriott is a much better venue for that.  Overall pretty good
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the lobby and bar area and the friendliness of the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.  Best,  Dan

Summary: The hotel is located on minutes walking distance from Disneyland Anaheim, great for families, there is a bus shuttle to Disney as well. The hotel itself is good, has a Starbucks and Pizza Hut and gift shop inside the hotel, if you are not going out for meals, different restaurants around the corner, shuttle to major shopping malls are available for a fee. If going for business, the hotel is located few steps from the Anaheim Convention Centre. About 15 minutes walking you can find Target Store. Staff are helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you made use of the location of the hotel and that the staff was accommodating. We hope you stay with us again soon.  Best,  Dan

Summary Heading: Shaky Start Became a Great Stay
Summary: We arrived early afternoon and were able to check in right away.  Because we usually request a quiet room, Katy M. gave us a nice room in the Oasis Tower.  Since we always check out a room for cleanliness and working plumbing before unpacking and settling in, we noticed a dripping sound from inside the ceiling above the sink in the bathroom.  Although nothing was visually apparent, upon touching the ceiling, there was dampness felt, so we decided to ask for a room change.  Katy M. was not at the front desk when we returned, but another Katy (there are 2) gave us another room near the original one.  Unfortunately, this time we heard similar dripping sounds, but the ceiling was dry.  Not willing to take any chances since we’d already spent too much time on this, we went downstairs
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and will send Katy M you compliments. We hope you stay with us again next time you're in town.   Best, Dan

Summary: Just got back from a trip to Disneyland for our anniversary and this hotel did not dissapoint. The hotel was beautiful, the employees were beyond courteous and friendly and the room itself was very very nice. There was a shuttle that conviently ran to and from the park in pretty steady increments but wasn't out of walking distance if need be. There were lots of restaurants near by and a really awesome little food shop on the lobby level next to the Starbucks. When we checked in we were asked if we were celebrating anything so we informed the desk clerk that it was our anniversary. The next evening after returning from the park we came back to our room and discovered a bottle of champagne on ice and chocolate covered strawberries along with a very thoughtful hand written card
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the location of the hotel and the hospitality of our employees. We hope you stay with us again soon.  Best,  Dan

Summary: I am very satisfied with this hotel. We had a great time here at the Anaheim Marriott. The hotel itself was okay being an older hotel with average sized rooms but whatever was lacking with the rooms the hotel staff made up for it with great friendly service. I mentioned my daughter was having her birthday during our stay and she was made to feel very special by management on the night we checked in. She received a birthday card signed by many of the staff along with a bunch of goodies. The next day the assistant manager followed up with an email to make sure everything was to our satisfaction. Everyone we came into contact with at the hotel was very friendly and nice. We spent two days at the Disneyland park and the shuttle bus to and from the park was really convenient for only
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad the staff was so accomodating and made your stay so special. We hope you stay with us again when you are in town.  Best, Dan

Summary: The hotel was modern in appearance inside (looks a little dated from the outside).  Pool is really meant more for adults than children (best access is through the bar), but it is still well used by all ages.  The service was pretty good and we were able to walk to the toy story parking lot to catch the parking shuttle to the park.  Riding back is a crap shoot - sometimes the line for the shuttle is very long - I walked back while my family rode the bus - I got back about 30 minutes before they did.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am glad that you enjoyed the pool and the interior design of our hotel. We hope you stay with us again when you are in town.  Best, Dan

Summary: We visited the Marriott Anaheim for a convention, the hotel and surrounding hotels were packed out. I noticed a large number of business travelers, Disney visitors, and convention attendees. Given this you know parking was potentially horrendous, since the parking for the several hotels kind of merges... potentially crazy!  Yet the Marriott's parking and bellhop staff were absolutely wonderful! So on top of it, and if you ever meet Archie! That man is like three people in one, he's worth more than the best tip you can give him. We found the customer service at this hotel to be exceptional, and its not value added.... it shows this organization truly values their clients. It was like coming home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our customer service and I will give Archie your compliments. We hope you stay with us again when you are in town.  Best, Dan

Summary: Stayed here for one night while attending a conference. Hotel has been refreshed and is up to date on decor, furnishings and amenities, and easy walking distance to convention center. Check in was fast and rooms were well appointed, clean, with in room coffee and refrigerator. My room had a balcony with a view.  There were restaurants on site as well as a Starbucks. I ordered room service and it was very good and came within 30 minutes as promised. Used the app to check in and out and and mail copy of receipt - very nice. This Marriott was very well run.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the convenience of the app to check in and out, as well as the amenities of the hotel itself. We hope you stay with us again when you are in town.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Great rooms as always, Amazing Service
Summary: I was at the convention center with my Corporate conference Oct 19-22. It was amazingly easy to check in to this hotel. The hotel is perfectly situated next to two upscale steak houses and the convention center. My room was excellent, sheets and pillows exactly what I needed.  And the air conditioning was central air not the noise maker window blower machine.  Coffee maker was kinda mickey mouse but worked. The only downside is the Infuse bar is too small for convention crowds.  A big place like this needs room for at least 100, even better 150.  Our conference of 3400 filled this hotel. It needs a bigger bar. The concierge desk, front desk, and bell caps were all over us with service. This is the best I have found in many trips. Two thumbs up on my 7th conference hotel this
Manager Response: Hi Daniel,  Thank you so much for giving such a thoughtful review about your stay with us. I'm happy to hear that our staff took excellent care of you. We hope you'll consider staying with us the next time you are in town.  Best, Dan

Summary: Stayed here for the Star Wars Celebration Anaheim even in April 2015, location was great with the convention centre next door and plenty of food options within a block's walk. Not to mention Disney is just up the road as well.  Hotel Staff were very friendly and incredibly attentive. It's been a while since I had stayed in an American establishment so their style of service was a welcomed surprised. Especially after the housekeepers noticed my note regarding the pillows! (Just had them arranged for my back and asked for them not to be moved)  Very nice hotel, comfortable. Many thanks for the staff, especially at the bar who endured quite a lot of people over that event. :)  Only downside was the room I was staying in had a bit of a incline into one corner, which was off putting
Manager Response: Hi Aaron,   Thank you for giving us a thoughtful review of your stay at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that our stay took good care of you and you enjoyed your stay.   Please stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Classy hotel, close to conference center and Disneyland
Summary: I stayed here for a conference, and found the hotel to be very comfortable, with first class amenities. The only thing that stopped me giving this review 5 stars, was the water temperature in the room. I got about 2 minutes of hot water every morning for a shower before it went freezing cold. One day the elevators were playing up, and I had to wait almost 20 minutes for one to take me to the 11th floor, but I suspect this is not a regular occurrence.
Manager Response: Hi Mike,  Thank you so much for giving us such thoughtful feedback on your stay. I'm happy to hear that you found our amenities to be world class. However I am sorry about the water temperature problem and the speed of the elevator. I will be sure to bring your feedback to our staff so that we can better serve our guests.   We hope to make your next stay even better.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but poor internet service
Summary: I stayed here this past week for a conference.  The hotel is nice, clean, friendly staff, great beds, everything I've come to expect from the Marriott.  But internet service was lacking.  Several times I was unable to connect through the Marriott guest portal.  And frequently, even with the higher speed access, speed was so slow, pages timed out.  Given that this is a standard conference hotel, hosting thousands of business folks at a time, one would expect adequate internet service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I'm sorry to hear about the issues you experienced with regard to our internet and it's speed. I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: I stayed here for a business proposal. Due to its very good place-in front of Hard Rock Cafe, I could have time to walk around, specially to have a coffee and take a delicious pancake, in front the Hotel. Besides, the room is very good, clean and well decorated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Sergio. I'm glad you enjoyed the room and atmosphere for the Anaheim Marriott. We hope you stay with us the next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Summary: Hotel was clean nice and provided what was needed.  Was there when temps were over 100 and the air conditioning worked well.  The staff and people working there were friendly.  Enjoyed the stay, amenities and food.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott especially the room and the food. We hope you stay with us the next time you are in town.   Best,  Dan

Summary Heading: Well locates, Suer busy and very Trendy
Summary: I had the chance to stay one night in this hotel for a conference.  Arriving to the hotel notice is an old building, impression that totally changed as I walk in.  The hotel was full of movement, people, conventions, outlets full and lines to place reservations.  During my two days there was not a moment the hotel was not full engine.  The line in the check in was considerable and a lot of check in / check out and check out.  On day 2 I approached the front desk to ask a question about to re-print my folio and the same lady who did the check in (Tall, long hair, Room clerk #253) took a minute to knowledge me and call me by my last name. WOW! with the amount of people check in/out she remembering my name was a plus...  The Starbuck concept, so open, and divided in two sections
Manager Response: Thanks for your review, Peter. I'm glad you enjoyed the amenities and the room. We hope you come back and stay with Anahaeim Marriott again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: For our 3 day weekend Disney trip we picked the Marriott. The hotel was very busy when we arrived late Thursday, but that didn't seem to prevent the staff from providing us with a great check-in experience from valeting the car, to the bellman and the front desk clerk everything was seamless and very professional. The front desk assisted us with our shuttle bus service tickets to the Park. $5.00 per day, per adult. Very convenient we never waited more than 5 minutes for a shuttle. Great room it was large.  Seemed like it was recently updated and it was clean and comfortable. Pool was very nice part in the shade part outside. We ate at the bar one night it was late, the food was outstanding. Service was a little slow but it was worth our wait.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott, especially the shuttle and the pool. We hope you come back and stay with us again soon.  Best,  Dan

Summary Heading: Ok for a place to put your head
Summary: We booked this hotel as we wanted something close to Disneyland and we stayed there for 2 nights.  As the address would suggest the Hotel is in a cluster used I would imagine by convention attendees and families like us who were going to Disneyland.  It's ok, and it did the job, it's nothing special. We had a standard room which had 2 double beds, the bathroom was quite small. There was just myself and my daughter so size wise the room was ok, although if you had any more people though it would be quite cramped.  The offer a comprehensive room service menu although the food that we had was quite unmemorable, and expensive for what it was.  There is a nice pool though and you can get good service poolside and the staff were very accommodating.  It's about 15 minutes walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay, Merilyn. I'm sorry to hear about the issues you experienced. I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: The staff at the Marriot Annihiem saved my Holiday.  Alicia Compagnone was my saviour and she bent over backwards to accommodate everything.  I was at such a low point when I arrived at the Marriot she did every thing she could to make my stay a very pleasant experience. I felt safe and she offered me all the support without letting her duties to other clientele slip.  this accommodation and staff assistance is truly 5 Star. I would recommend the Marriot Annihiem to everybody. When the Marriot train there staff they don't disappoint.  A true credit to them.  Thankyou from the bottom of my heart.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, Donna! I'm glad your experience was spectacular and I will be sure to send along the review to Alicia. We hope to you come and visit again soon!  Best,  Dan

Summary: I can't recommend the Marriott Anaheim to anyone. It seems like good service was at an all time low.  After checking in we proceeded to the elevator to our floor, however when arrived at our floor the room number was not there. We called the front desk, our first experience with their phone sysytem and was placed on hold for nearly ten 10 minutes. We finally gathered our luggage and went back down to the front desk where 4 employees were enjoying a personal conversation - not busy assisting anyone. We inquired why no one answered the phone, their response - "we don't answer the phone." We were finally directed to a different tower in the building - far from the front desk where we encountered several other guest wandering around looking for the elevators too! This was just the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I'm sorry to hear about the issues you experienced regarding the service. I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: We stayed here for a conference having flown in from overseas.  The room was clean and fine although the bathroom was tiny and there was much debate about whether the slightly drab carpet was threadbare or looked it by design (we settled on the latter).  There were a number of ways that the service detracted from what should have been a good hotel. We were in from overseas there was a bar fridge but it was empty, no mini bar, there was a single tea bag (perhaps rationing is still in place).  We were jet lagged and astonished by literally no food options in the night as room service closes. Not even a basic sandwich! We were told we could walk to a local fast food restaurant 1km away?!   Communication was very ordinary and quite passive aggressive, rather than advise the bar or
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I'm so sorry to hear that our staff missed the mark on this. I know traveling from overseas can be stressful enough and it is  I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: Stayed at this property during a convention. One would think that they would be accustomed to large groups. Paid one night in advance and was told they were over booked. I didn't get a room until late that evening    Thank goodness I am a platinum member otherwise I would have been placed at another property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I'm sorry to hear about the issues you experienced regarding check-in. I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: My family and I typically stay at one of the downtown Disney hotels, but we were going with a group of friends who wanted to try this new Marriott. The water park was a lot of fun (even though it got shut down because a kid pooped on the slide). Nice, clean, spacious rooms. Paul Mitchell products. Kids loved the bunkbeds. We had a water park view. The breakfast at the bistro was delicious (try the frittata) although the line was quite long to put your order in. The manager said they were working on that. Pretty close proximity to the park. We'll for sure go back. Cute gift shop too!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your kind and thoughtful feedback. It's great to hear that you and your family enjoyed our amenities. It's also wonderful to hear that you will stay with us again next time you are in town. We look forward to serving you again soon.    Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Expected more from a Marriott near Disneyland
Summary: Service was pretty good.  Room could have been nicer. For some reason we were given a first floor room. Can't remember last time i got a first floor room in a huge hotel. Felt weird.  The room was not nicely decorated. The carpet was ugly so the room had a drab, depressing ambience.  But there was a fridge and iron. But no free wifi in room.  No business center for me to use a computer or print something. That was very disappointing.  There was a nice outdoor pool which is family friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. While I'm sorry to hear that your room wasn't up to satisfaction, I will be sure to bring your feedback to my team so we can continue to improve our service in the future.  We hope to make your next stay with us even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: Our room was small and very basic.  Some of the rooms had patio doors and a balcony, ours did not.  The elevators are really fast.  The beds were good.  There was a safe (with a key) in the room and a fridge.  The hotel is about a 1 minute walk from the convention center.  It is also walking distance from a few stores and restaurants.  There was a nice restaurant / bar in the hotel that was reasonably priced and good.  Self parking was 24$/day. The staff was all very nice and helpfull.  There is a Disney counter in the hotel.  Disney is about a 5 minute drive.  The business center is in a FedEx office and is a pay as you use place.  There is a Starbucks and a Pizza Hut as well as a gift shop and ATM's.  There is free WIFI in the lobby.  All in all a great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our amenities and your found our location to be convenient for your needs. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Excuse me! Your Pride in Customer Service Is Showing....
Summary: When I moved into my fabulous apartment built in 1902...it never crossed my mind that I would need AC. When the weatherman said the temperature would be in the 100's AGAIN, I told my daughter and son-in-law...lets do a staycation. I figured, they could go to Disney and I would "chill" in the hotel. We self-parked ($24/valet is $28). There is a nice walk from parking through the ballroom area to the front desk, but it was cool, very clean and kind of grand. And, you can see they have everything you need, Starbucks, a mini mart, Pizza hut, a gift shop, ATM, a cool looking restaurant, bar, and pool.  The lobby and other spaces have been updated. There appeared to be approximately six guest service staff standing at attention a couple of steps in front of their stations - who kindly

I must say that the Anaheim Marriott as a hotel is much nicer than the hotels we typically stay in. The entire property is well maintained and the grounds are impeccably landscaped. The lobby is large and inviting, there are many amenities around the complex (including a Pizza Hut Express, a large gift shop, and a Starbucks), and the elevators don't have buttons in them (when you enter the elevator lobby, you key in your floor on a touch pad, and it tells you what elevator to board. Manager Response: Hi Allison,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I asked for a roll away bed however it didn't arrive. Pretty angry that we had to ask again that evening as by that stage we were very jet lagged and just wanted to sleep.  We had breakfast in the restaurant on site the first morning and was looked after impressively. My wife and one son are gluten intolerant and as such were given the appropriate menus. Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm glad that you enjoyed your room and that the management was able to make your stay as comfortable as possible. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Summary: The hotel was very nice, the staff was great and the rooms were fresh. They even had a Santa in a chair and they took pictures for you and your family and gave them free to you. The front desk was polite and checked us in very quickly.  Our room was nice and clean, the balcony was an added bonus. When I checked in I was asked if I would be using Valet or Self parking and I made it clear that I would be using the Self parking option. Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and the service. I am sorry to hear about your trouble with the parking attendant. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Summary: I stayed here while working the ASIS 2015 trade show.  The hotel was right next to the convention center so it was very convenient.  The room was great and the staff very attentive.  Having a rewards card helped with the cost of the trip since the Internet was free with it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and I hope you enjoyed your conference. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

And she smiled the entire time; we even stopped and had a great conversation on our way to dinner.  Then Raul Castro, from Engineering, worked on the television set in our room and decided it needed replacing.  He was back in record time - all with a smile and courteousness.  We left for Disneyland early in the next morning.  When I got in the cab I realized I had lost a very special gold earring - not much I could do so all day I just wore one and no one noticed!  Imagine my delight and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience at our hotel. I'm glad that you enjoyed your room and were extremely pleased with the service. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott because of it's proximity to the convention center. We were given a room overlooking the walkway between the Marriott and the Hilton.  I loved the location.  We were able to sit on the balcony and people watch. That side of the hotel was a little noisy during the day with the slider open, however since we were there for VidCon, I was not expecting things to be quiet.  We'll stay there again.next year. As a Marriott member I was given free WIFI.  The room was typical. Nothing special, but it was clean and the employees were very nice.  The pool was relaxing to layout by and the food service was good.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient and our staff took care of you. Thank you so much for considering us for your trip next year. We look forward to seeing you then.   Best, Dan

I would not take a,room there again, you need to go to lobby and up to 18 in main hotel,for concierge floor. Staff here is excellent. Food is good, a little expensive. Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and I will tell Julian of your compliments. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

You wouldn't expect that, which is why this is perhaps a bit of a let down.  It's not a bad hotel - it's fine.  Staff is friendly, there is shuttle to park (for a fee) and there is a Starbucks onsite. For the price, better off at the Hyatt or Courtyard.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and the service. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and the location as well. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

But there was a bus to stop right outside the Marriott and ran very frequently. It picked us up and drop us off pick this up again at Disney and brought us back. It covered the time after Disney closed too. It was five dollars per adult and three dollars p. per child for unlimited pass for the day. I have to give a shout out to "Latiff" at the front desk. He was awesome and went above and beyond.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experienc at our hotel. I will tell Latiff of your compliments and I am glad you enjoyed your stay and the many amenities of the hotel. I hope you stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

This hotel is one of the best I have ever stayed in. Before even walking into the hotel booking the room was easy and the rooms were priced perfectly. The staff were really friendly and helpful. The rooms were beautifully done. They are clean and comfortable. This hotel isn't all that far from the Disneyland Resort. If you stay here and want to go to Disneyland take the Anaheim Resort Transit bus. The drop off is right in front of the hotel. Overall this was a wonderful hotel and is a highly recommended place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and that the staff was friendly. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Art picks and drops right at the entrance . we booked the ART passes online and it worked out only 30 dollars for 2 adults and 2 kids of unlimited trips for 3 days . This hotel is within the walking distance to CVS pharmacy(5 mins) , Ihop(5 mins) and even DL if you can walk and bear the heat with approx 20/30 min of walking . Few other restaurants located even closer

My sheets were not changed but one time my entire 5 night stay, and that was because I stayed in the room while housekeeping cleaned. 2. The bathroom felt like a public bathroom, It wasn't as clean as it should be, and there was that toiletseat with the gap in the front (I seriously am going to google what that space is for) which reminded me of a public bathroom, not the home-away-from-home bathroom I expected. The convenience of getting to and from Disney was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm sorry housekeeping did not come back promptly but I'm glad you enjoyed your stay overall. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

Summary: friendly staff, clean and comfortable room, exceptionally nice, well worth the few extra $ over the cheaper hotels nearby close to nice restaurants as well.  new ice-cream shop on the way back from Disneyland was nice also.  starbucks in lobby closed too early for us on the way back from Disneyland, but was nice for early drinks @ snacks.

Once that convention was over, the hotel and rooms were quiet and comfortable.

Convenience and I'm I Marriott Gold Elite Member and try to stay in Marriott properties.  So, to my delight we gave this hotel another try.    What a difference about 10 years makes.  The hotel recently underwent a major refurbishment (from what I could tell).  Certain structural components such as the small bathrooms in the rooms were not changed. The concierge lounge has reduced hours over the weekend ( Breakfast only until Sunday evening) On Saturday morning the lounge was packed with people with the lounge staff doing their best to cope ( I had not seen a lounge so busy before) I had thought it was due to the half marathon and the convention at the anaheim convention centre but on  sunday there was a agent outside the lounge crossing room numbers off a list ( it turned out that people were letting other people into the lounge who should not have had access) On Saturday
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm glad your stay with us was overall enjoyable, while the pool and the lounge were slightly stressful. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan

No need to guess and no need to subject yourself to anyone pressing the wrong floor causing unnecessary delays.  Even

Summary Heading: Great spot for a one day visit to California adventure
Summary: We didn't want to pay top dollar for a Disney hotel especially since this was a quick stop before San Diego.  This was a very clean and spacious hotel. Big Disney convention getting out.  Looked fun.  Lucked out on our timing.  In between two large conventions.  Little crowds at hotel and Disney.  Wouldn't stay here for a week but perfect for an overnight.
Manager Response: Hi Megan,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found our amenities and location to be convenient. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.  Best, Dan

If you don't need to get to sleep early and aren't sleeping in, get a room facing the pool because music will be blaring until 10:00pm and starts back up at 6:00am.  Thought I had a decent price until the WIFI and Parking fees were added.  Seriously?  On my 1st full day, I questioned if someone entered my room with the privacy sign up.  I was told it would be investigated and I would have a message on my room phone with what happened.  Nothing.

Ample table space in the lobby for convention-goers to sit and power up their computers and phones while they work.  The hotel has been, for the most part, well updated. Smart elevators have been installed, which is always fun. I stayed in the Oasis Tower, which was perfect because it's smaller and I didn't have to walk very far to get to my room from the elevator. Free internet
Manager Response: Hi Kaitlin,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience at our hotel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our amenities and our staff took great care of you. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you are in town.   Best, Dan
