We hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again soon so that we can make your next stay exceptional.   Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel. Fees and More Fees!!
Summary: We stayed here the weekend of 8/9. I have stayed at numerous Marriott Hotels in the post and actually prefer staying at Marriott than any other hotel. But, I can assure you I will not be staying at this hotel again.  It was $24 to park per day and also fees for WiFi connection.   The price you pay for the room should include all of these amenities. The stay was nice and the hotel pool was nice as well, but the entrance and  exit to the pool is awkward. You have to enter through a bar/restaurant to get to the pool. If I were eating there I would not like kids running through where I'm eating dripping wet.   I also had a incident with the valet parking attendant. My sister who was meeting us at the hotel to go out for dinners accidentally parked in their parking structure because
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for taking the time to write us a review about your experience. We appreciate any feedback that will help us be a better hotel. I'm very sorry that your stay was anything but exceptional. It sounds like we missed the mark on a few things including how our parking attended handled the situation. I'm going to take your feedback to the staff so we can work to better serve our guests. If you could please give me more details such as your full name, dates of your stay, room number and marriott rewards number (if any), so that I can look further into this. Thank you again.  Best, Dan

Summary: Spent three nights here as we visited Disneyland and GCA.  Hotel is less than a mile from Walt's World and is an easy walk.  Our room was immaculate and well-appointed, and the hotel staff was attentive and very helpful.  We will stay again when we're in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a detailed review of your stay. I'm happy to hear that our staff took care of you and you found your room to be comfortable and clean. We hope you come back to stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Hotel was very nice. Very good breakfast buffet at the SunSpot right off the lobby. Jacob and Leo were awesome waiters and were both very attentive. The only drawbacks for us was that front desk staff were not overly friendly and parking is a bit far and unless you use the bellhop services, it's a quite a trek to get your luggage from the parking area to your room. You can buy Disneyland tickets in the lobby. They have a shuttle bus that runs pretty frequently to and from Disneyland for a small fee per person. The shuttle pass is good all day so you can go back to your room and take a break or eat if you'd like. Overall a really nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a detailed review of your stay. I'm happy to hear that our staff took care of you and you enjoyed our restaurant and other amenities. While I'm disappointed to learn that our front staff wasn't as friendly as they should be, I'm glad to know other members of our staff gave you an exceptional experience. We hope you and your family come back to stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: This is a great hotel.  Very clean, service is outstanding, and the layout is awesome.  It has a Starbucks on the property.  It has a great lobby bar and a terrific restaurant.  Very spacious lobby with numerous nooks and places to have meetings.  The rooms were very clean and furnished well.  The location is easy to find and good access to other parts of Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a detailed review of your stay. I'm happy to hear that our staff took care of you and you enjoyed our amenities. I'm also glad you found our Starbucks to be convenient.  We hope you come back to stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Wanted a hotel in between Disneyland and the convention center. This is the perfect location... Will def stay again mext time. The staff was very nice and upgraded my room for me. The room was nice, basic, but big. The only complaint is the shower head is very low... I'm 5'6 and I had to sqaut down. The toilet also had flushing, leaking issues. Other than that, it was great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for telling us about your stay. I'm happy to hear you found our hotel to be comfortable and our staff took good care of you. Please come back and stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: We spent 2 nights here to visit Disney and do some shopping. The location is great - 2 or 3 minutes by shuttle bus ($5 / day) to Disney or a 10 - 15 minute walk and a 7 or 8 minute drive to The Outlets at Orange. Very warm welcome from the hotel valet parking staff and at reception. We had checked in online and both rooms were available at the time we said we would arrive and were connecting. Rooms were a good size and very clean. We were on 17th floor, overlooking the pool. There was no noise and the bed was very comfortable. We paid $20 extra per room to be able to access the Concierge lounge on the 18th floor. This was well worth doing, with friendly staff, a good hot breakfast buffet plus cereal, pastries, cans of soft drinks, etc. There is also a Starbucks, a Pizza Hut and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review and kind words. We are delighted to hear that your enjoyed your stay and found our hotel to be a great value. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon.   Best, Dan

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is perfectly located for conferences at the convention center.  The lobby and public areas are very nice and there was usually room to get a seat with friends.  The elevators were unusual (for me at least) in that you choose the floor you want in the elevator lobby and then it tells you which elevator to take.  There are no controls inside the elevator.  I realize this is probably an efficiency thing, but I prefer the standard elevator controls.    The hotel room I stayed in was relatively small but in good shape.  No bells and whistles.  Just a pretty basic room.  The bed was pretty comfortable but the pillows were completely mushy.  I know it is just a preference, and some people like very soft pillows, but these were a whole new level of mush.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for telling us about your stay. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us. I will be sure to bring your feedback to our team so that we can always be looking to improve our guest experience. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon so we can make your next experience even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: Within walking distance of Disneyland and a very reasonable rate of $159. It's a full service hotel with dining, bar, Starbucks and even a FedEx office. Of course,  you have to pay to park...guess that's a thing here on the west coast...but anyway... It served our need of a clean, comfortable place to spend the night after a long day at Disney. Shuttles ($5) run every 20 minutes to the park, but the walk did allow us a look at local life. 😉 We got a corner room with a balcony and a very comfortable king sized bed. Bathroom was kinda small,  but clean matters more thanthat, so it's not bad for a short term stay. Several weddings that Saturday and a few late night revelers made for some noise in the hallway but it didn't last long. Staff was nice, professional and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review and kind words. We are delighted to hear that your enjoyed your stay and found our hotel to be a good value and convenient to your needs. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon.   Best, Dan

Summary: We ended up booking this hotel unexpectedly last minute due to the issues we faced with our initial accommodation. Although we booked online through Expedia (few hours before we went to check in) we were not in the system when we got there, however the friendly reception staff sorted this out relatively quickly. The rooms are spacious, and although have aged a little, it has all that you need for a good stay. The hotel is right next to the Convention Centre and within a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. There are a few small shops down in the lobby, including Starbucks, Pizza Hut and a couple other speciality stores which is convenient however with a short stroll you will come across various other food places on the main street. The CV/Pharmacy is a pharmacy and supermarket so
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm happy to hear you would our location and amenities convenient. I will bring your feedback to the staff so that we can always be looking to improve our guest experience. We hope you will stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Best Concierge Level and Housekeeping is Excellent
Summary: We stay in a lot of Marriotts. This one has the best concierge lounge! It's open EVERY day for breakfast! Then for hors d'oeuvres and dessert Monday through Thursday. They have bottled water and all the sodas you can drink as well. It was great! Twice we were in our room with the privacy sign on the door when the maid service came around. But as soon as we took off the sign and left the room, they still came back and cleaned. It was amazing that they did this even when we left so late. I was very impressed and thankful! Also if you are going to Disneyland, be sure to get the $100 gift card and bus pass package. It's a GREAT deal! We used the gift cards for souvenirs and food. The bus to Disneyland is the ART bus(Anaheim Regional Transportation.) It is the public bus and you have
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review and kind words. We are delighted to hear that your enjoyed your stay and found our hotel to be a great value. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon.   Best, Dan

Summary: Standard Marriott, close to the convention center, a mile walk to Disneyland parks.  You should know that they do not have queen beds- just "super" doubles.  So be prepared if you are expecting to have queen beds.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for telling us about your stay. I'm sorry to hear that your stay with us was anything but excellent. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon so we can make your next experience even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: Nothing special here. It's a Marriott next to a convention center near Disneyland. Family friendly, clean, monotonous, but efficient. Met my expectations and my room was in perfect order. Restaurant is overpriced and Starbucks can get packed! Self parking is a lengthy walk compared to valet, but at least your car will be garaged. Valet cars are in the hot sun :(
Manager Response: Hi Rob,  Thank you so much for telling us about your stay. i'm sorry to hear that your stay with us fell short of our commitment to excellence. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon so we can make your next experience even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: I was there last weekend for a convention.  Great space for 1000 + attendees.  Nice Starbucks, fitness center, pool, bar, entertainment, and food.  Next to Anaheim Convention Center and blocks from Disneyland, Mortans Steak House and more.    The room was spacious but my view was the roof  and you have to pay for Wi-fi, reeeally Marriott?  Rooms, etc. , cost enough for you not to have free Wi-Fi.  Room service staff were very pleasant and made great meal suggestions.  The only bizarre thing were the elevators. Don't get in any of the 4 doors without pushing your floor number on the pad across the room. You won't end up where you want to go. You will have to start all over again. And make sure you get in to the elevator door assigned by the pad.  Front desk check-in should advise.
Manager Response: Hi Terri,  Thank you so much for telling us about your stay. I'm sorry to hear our elevators caused you trouble and will be sure to bring your feedback to the staff. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon so we can make your next experience even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: Staff very friendly and very clean with Disney right down the street, waking distance. Really would visit again enjoyed my stay. Also there shuttles available to go to nearest shopping malls and 15mins interval shuttles to Disney. One of the best experiences
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback. i'm glad to hear our staff took great care of you and we hope you will stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Was very disappointed in size of rooms seem extremely small for such a large facility right in the heart of Disneyland. Bathroom was very tiny just enough room to get washed and get out. There was hardly any closet space for 2 people  Service personnel from car attendants to lobby hosts very pleasant and cordial.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate all the feedback you provided us with, because we are always striving to be the absolute best we can be.  With that being said, we sincerely apologize for the space issues you encountered in your room. Our priority is the comfort of our guests and we fell short on some things during your stay. We hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again soon so that we can make your next stay exceptional.   Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Not quite as good as last time.
Summary: I stayed here two years ago for the D23 Expo and it was wonderful. That is why I stayed here again. The room was nice. They must have gotten rid of the ottomans they had before. The last time I was here, the chair came with an ottoman which was nice to put your feet up. The beds are a little too high to rest your feet on while sitting in the chair now. The staff was friendly when I checked in. At check out, I called the "At Your Service"  for the bell desk. The girl that answered said she would send them up in a few minutes. I waited 20 minutes and took everything down myself. 3 tote bags and my suitcase. I got to the bell desk and the man there ask if he could help me and I said no. I told him to cancel the request for room 601. He claimed the girl from "At Your Service" just
Manager Response: We truly appreciate all the feedback you provided us with, because we are always striving to be the absolute best we can be.  With that being said, we sincerely apologize for issue you experienced with our bell service. Our priority is the comfort of our guests and we fell short on some things during your stay. We hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again soon so that we can make your next stay exceptional.   Best, Dan

Summary: The Marriott convention center is very nice. It is close enough to the parks to walk on a nice day or you can take the ART to Downtown Disney and the parks. The staff in general is very nice. We had several pleasant conversations with many of them, very helpful and just kind in general. We did run across one employee that was rather rude and not helpful (Paula at the front desk) HOWEVER, Latiff (Sri Lanka) made up for the issue's we had. He was very nice and made us feel like we were at home. The lounge is very nice (only open during the week though) and the bar is great as well for snacks and drinks. Pool is a little small, but enough to have some fun in. If you are not staying on the Resort, Marriott Convention Center is good.
Manager Response: Hi Brandi,  Thank you so much for telling us about your stay. While i'm sorry to hear a member of our staff fell short of our commitment to excellence, we are glad to know another member of our staff took such great care of you. We hope you'll come back and stay with us soon so we can make your next experience even better.  Best, Dan

Summary: Stayed at the Marriott Anaheim for two nights and left today. We took our 9-year-old to Disneyland. The staff is very friendly and professional and the room was modern looking and clean. We really felt comfortable here and would go back any time. Shuttles from the hotel will take you to Disneyland and there is a Disneyland concierge who can give you all the information you need to navigate the park. The pool area is really nice - my daughter loved it. I loved the gym, for which there was no charge as a hotel guest. It was huge and had a lot of machines. Finally, we had free WIFI because we are Marriott members. Otherwise, it's $15/day. We really enjoyed our stay here and, in fact, booked last minute at the Marriott Manhattan Beach when we came up to the Los Angeles area (had a
Manager Response: Hi Amy,  Thank you so much for giving us a detailed review of your stay. I'm happy to hear that our staff took care of you and you enjoyed our amenities. We hope you and your family come back to stay with us again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Odd Hit-or-Miss Vibe still better than the Hilton
Summary: Moved into the Marriott for a week and a half for business at the Convention Center and had some hit or miss likes and dislikes.  Originally promised a suite upon arrival, but needing to wait for it to be prepared, we started with breakfast at the restaurant on property.   Flies in the coffee, screaming children - it was a rough start.  But the food came out very well and the room was ready just after we'd finished.  Our suite had been swapped out for a Standard King, which - no problem, didn't really need a suite, but would have been nice to know.  Also would have been nice to know there was an event planned in the parking lot, so when I found the GUY on my BALCONY setting up decor imagine by surprise! Being in events myself I got over it but I can't imagine if you were a guest
Manager Response: We truly appreciate all the feedback you provided us with, because we are always striving to be the absolute best we can be.  With that being said, we sincerely apologize for the problems with your room and our restaurant. Our priority is the comfort of our guests and we fell short on some things during your stay. We hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again soon so that we can make your next stay exceptional.   Best, Dan

Summary: Anaheim Marriott is a great place if you are visiting Disney Land.  Rooms are nice and clean, staff friendly and the restaurant is great if you do not want to go out and eat in Disney.  I had an emergency and needed to get to the airport asap at 5 am in the morning.  The front desk agent was so helpful and contacted a taxi immediately.  I was able to make it because of her. Pool is great, room service excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and thoughtful review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff took excellent care of you. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Great place to pass out after a day at Disneyland
Summary: This is a very nice hotel. The rooms are clean and nicely decorated but nothing fancy.  It is close to Disneyland.  You can take the shuttle (for a fee) or even walk if you dare.  Driving home after being at Disneyland from 8am to 11pm on a hot day when you live over an hour away is crazy if you don't have to do it.  The cost was reasonable and for two adults and two tired children it was a a haven.  They have a very good bar with a restaurant. Great cocktails and appetizers before we went back to the park.  We've stayed here many times and have had consistently good service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your detailed review. We are delighted to hear that your family had a consistently great time at our hotel each time you have come to stay with us. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: Anaheim Marriott is in the very best location in Anaheim - located basically right at the Anaheim Convention Center and just next door to Disneyland this hotel is great! Very clean, great pool area, lobby area and great in-house restaurants as well.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us some great feedback of your stay with us. We're so pleased to hear that you found our location and amenities convenient. We look forward to having you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: This was our first time to Disneyland and chose this location for the proximity to the park and the price. What a find! The staff was excellent and had out connecting rooms ready upon arrival. They even had a small Disney themed gift for my son waiting. He was so excited. This was all made possible due to the great effort of Solmayra. She deserves a gold star. She was so professional and thorough that our stay was perfect. They have access to the ART bus out front which I highly recommend if you do not want to walk to the park or other area attractions. Just take the frequent bus. I would stay here again without hesitation. The only thing that is a bit odd is the elevator system. You put in your floor on a kedpad and then get on the assigned elevator. But there is no way to
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us some great feedback of your stay with us. We're so pleased to hear that Solmayra was able to make your stay with us exceptional. We look forward to having you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Great property with excellent concierge lounge.
Summary: This hotel is about a 15 minute walk to Disney attractions.  Great concierge lounge serves breakfast 7 days a week.  Concierge staff was very helpful and enthusiastic.  Kudos to Michelle and Heather in the lounge.  Nice indoor/outdoor pool. Fully stocked fitness center.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review. I'm pleased to hear that Michelle and Heather contributed to your satisfying visit with us. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: A Star Wars Celebration Anaheim Life Saver
Summary: The obvious benefit was being so close to the Anaheim Convention Center for Star Wars Celebration. One can just literally walk from the hotel and be at the convention center in 5 minutes...in full stormtrooper costume! Costumers will appreciate having a room so close to the con and for a first time SWC visitor, I needed that piece of mind of having a home base that I can retreat to to deposit my bought hauls or to change in and out of costume.  When checking out, the hotel mistakingly recorded a transaction from the hotel restaurant under my room which they resolved quickly and without fanfare. They also refunded my wifi costs after I told them I was a member of their loyalty program.  If you're in Anaheim to go to the Anaheim Convention Center and you want to be as close to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize again for charging the wifi fee to your account. I'm happy to hear that our staff was able to take care of this issue. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: Pros: listed in subject line Cons: we have a family of four, asked for a room with two beds, got a room with two double beds. In hindsight, we should have paid closer attention to the websight, but double beds? There was plenty of room inside the room for two queens. Also, we had a room that faced out onto the round about where the buses did their pick up and drop off from the amusement parks. The noise level from the buses, the people coming back from ??? drunk??? at 1:30 am? This is Disneyland people, Cano San Lucas. Also, the parking lot is right below those rooms (facing the round about) and the car alarms randomly going of is too much. I honestly don't know how the Marriott would "fix" this other than making the sliding doors sound proof. The pool is very small and shallow,
Manager Response: We truly appreciate all the feedback you provided us with, because we are always striving to be the absolute best we can be.  With that being said, we sincerely apologize about the pool incident. Our first priority is the safety of our guests, so we do in fact have to close down the pool if there's any sort of safety hazard. We're pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and responsive to all of your needs. We hope you give us the opportunity to serve you and your family again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: In town for the Angels game.
Summary: This hotel is very nice and modern. My husband and I purchased the family package that came with- 1 large Pizza, breadsticks,wings, 4 drinks, ice cream & a movie!! We didn't bring our kids with us this time but it was still an amazing package because self parking & wifi was also included in the price! For $188 dollars def worth it! We arrived early..around 2pm and they were able to check us in & even upgraded our room. We had a little trouble ordering our movie which was disappointing because after the game we wanted to relax and watch a movie..but after about 30-45min of not being able to watch, & multiple 10+ minutes waiting to speak to someone the night shift manager called my room & personally took care of the issue and resolved our problem. He was great!! We will def be
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review and for providing some great photos of your stay. We apologize for the inconvenience of not being able to watch the movie when you got back from the game. I'm pleased to hear that our staff was able to fix this issue and accommodate you and your husband. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: The rooms of the hotel were clean pretty big and comfortable . The view of the city was actually pretty good and the cleaners were kind and helpful .also had a nice pool .one of the things that we didn't like was that the breakfast however wasn't free . It was 30$ per person . That's a lot for a big family .
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us some feedback of your stay. We apologize that we don't provide a complementary breakfast for our guests. We do, however, have other options such as the Starbucks located inside of the hotel that offers cheaper items to choose from. We hope to see you again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: It was the last place we stayed at during our road trip & we were not disappointed. The staff are super friendly & helpful, the hotel itself has a great feeling about it & the food served in the café/restaurant is excellent. The pool area is perhaps a little small but very nice just the same. It is located about a 10 to 15 minute walk from Disneyland so very handy from that point of view. Not the best place to stay if you intend to frequent the likes of Universal Studios, Hollywood, Beverly Hills or anything heading in a Northerly direction as the traffic on the "freeways" is just chaotic seemingly 24/7. A very enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We're so pleased to hear about your satisfying experience with us. We look forward to having you back again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: I travel frequently, use two canes to walk, and have never had a problem with a too-high bed in a hotel until a visit to the Anaheim California Marriott. I inquired if the beds in an ADA room were shorter. The answer was “No.” I asked for a foot stool and housekeeping brought me a small foot stool - for children. I fell. I reported the fall to the front desk. No one asked if I was OK. I asked for the manager and got a supervisor.  i explained the problem and asked for an adult-sized foot stool.  I was told the hotel couldn’t provide a foot stool as it was "a liability issue and some might fall."  Really?  The supervisor offered to have someone come up and help me into bed.  She did note she would send a female employee to assist.  Again, Really?  I ended up wedging the kiddie
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about your stay with us. I'd like to sincerely apologize that the foot stool we provided you did not accommodate your needs. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all guests, and we also believe that the way this incident was addressed is completely unacceptable. Our team has been informed about the details of your experience and we're working together to investigate this incident further and provide you with the service that you deserve. We value your business and we're working hard to ensure that something like this doesn't reoccur.

Summary: I can't say enough about this hotel and its staff. Me and my husband were there for our honeymoon and we were treated like royalty. The staff went above and beyond and we can't thank you enough. The room was spacious, food was excellent! The whole staff was awesome! Everyone from the valet, to the check-in, to the housekeeping staff, everyone was so nice and accommodating. We had a wonderful time and will definitely be back!  Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We love hearing that the excellent customer service we provided helped make your stay with us exceptional. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Rooms don't look like website. Hotel only wants your money. Suites are a room with half a suite, very small.  Low ceilings, dirty couch pillows. Needs remodeling ASAP.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am sorry that you were unsatisfied with the room you were given. We are always striving for excellence at the Marriott Anaheim and we value your input.  Best,  Dan

Summary: This hotel was a great place to stay while we were visiting Disneyland.  The property is older, but is being maintained well.  Beds were extremely comfortable.  The rooms are not super large, but laid out well.  Recessed area for luggage and it was nice to have a refrigerator in our room that wasn't a mini-bar.  We loved having a balcony.  The best part was the staff!  Everyone was friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We're truly pleased to hear that you were satisfied during your visit with us. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great  Hotel - Awesome staff for VidCon
Summary: I was just there for VidCon and had a lovely stay.  The staff was amazing.  The rooms were spacious and comfy.  It was safe.  The pool area is fab.  The food at the restaurant was yummy.  The only tiny ding is that their bathrooms - tubs are a bit dated but otherwise a fab stay.  Oh and their gym is better than many non-hotel gyms.  It is a hike but a do-able walk to Disney from here.  If y ou have or sign up for Marriott rewards the wifi is free.
Manager Response: Awesome! Thank you for the great feedback, we'll be sure to take the points mentioned about the bathrooms into consideration.

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable.  Two large beds, plenty of room for the kids and the bathroom was clean.  The pool was great and fun.  Pool side food and drink service.  Starbucks in the hotel.  Of course Disneyland was a short bus ride away.  We had a great time and worth the money.  We stayed 3 nights and consider staying a 4th.
Manager Response: Great! I'm so pleased to hear that the awesome service you and your family received made you want to stay with us longer. We look forward to serving you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, Good Location for Disney
Summary: overall good experience, friendly staff and easy check in. Rooms were nice and clean, but you can tell its an older property. easy access to the convention center and 25-30 minute walk to Disneyland or $5 for daily bus pass.  Wifi was spotty at times and had trouble connecting. Overall above average stay and experience.
Manager Response: Brian, Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback of your stay. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary Heading: They managed the VidCon crowds well...
Summary: This is the place to be if you're attending a convention.  I am not sure I'd want to be here if I were just going to Disneyland, unless I was also attending a convention.  Since we did both, this was really the most convenient spot for us.  Here's a breakdown of my thoughts on this place:  Elevators:  The elevators were amazing!  They are an upgraded system, so you enter your floor in the main terminal by the elevator and it tells you which elevator to go to.  Never waiting more than 1 minute.  Most elevators came instantly.  I heard other guests say the Hilton was sooo bad and you could spend a looong time waiting for an elevator.  Service:  There was always someone there to answer a question or help out.  There were a couple of hiccups (once with our TV and in general with
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to give us a positive and detailed review. We're always striving to be the best we can be, and are so pleased to hear that you had a satisfying stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, had great time there
Summary: I stayed at the Marriott on business for 4 nights. The hotel was surprisingly pleasant. Facilities are modern and room is clean. The bathroom, which is a common pitfall for hotels, is likewise clean and modern. Only drawbacks are related to money. Wifi is expensive and breakfast at the hotel's restaurant is sold at the outrageous price of $25.
Manager Response: Ran,  Thank you for the review. We apologize for the inconvenience of not providing free wifi and breakfast. We'll be sure to take your feedback into consideration. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Service and food is consistently good at the Anaheim Marriott and this is very refreshing if you are a frequent traveler. Great location for a business meeting!! Happy to be back😎 Cameron at the bell stand was extremely helpful and gracious.
Manager Response: Awesome! We're truly pleased to hear about the excellent customer service you received during your stay. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay, 20 minutes or so from parks
Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel while my husband was at the convention center for business. My mother came with us so it was me, my husband, and our 2 and 4 year old. We shared a room and they provided a roll away bed for us to use. Overall, the room is on the small side(but we did have 5 people). It was very clean and well kept.  We visited the pool and it is very nice. The Hilton across the street has a cooler pool for kids though (with a fort/water slide).  We had a stroller delivered to the room for the parks. It was very convenient. We walked to the parks everyday which took us about 20 minutes (with kids and a mother in law). There is a cvs close enough to get snacks for the room. There is also a subway and pizza place within that same area. The hotel will bring up a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a detailled and honest review about your experience with us. We're always striving to be the best we can be and will definitely take all of your points mentioned into consideration.  We hope to serve you again soon!

Summary: A very good hotel, with a super hi-tech elevator system. But, slips: I was charged $3.50 for a bottle of water placed in the room but never used.  I had the charge removed, but it was put on my bill after a 4-night stay, amidst all the charges for taxes and meals. If this little maneuver is done routinely on bills, most business customers would not notice it, and Marriott is able to come away with a little extra.   Also, access to the pool is through the lobby and bar, awkward for patrons of both.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We apologize for the inconvenience of having that water charged to your bill. We'll be sure to take all of your feedback to the rest of our team. We look forward to having you back again!  Best, Dan

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is located right next door to the Anaheim Convention Center, and just a few minutes walk from the Disney parks. The hotel is showing its age in a few spots, but the lobby, restaurants, and rooms have been nicely renovated. $249 a night was steep, but it was VidCon, and every hotel in the area was marking up rooms. This hotel, along with the adjacent Hilton, fill up fast during big events, so book early!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us some feedback of your stay with us! We apologize for all the noise, but as you mentioned we were very busy with the VidCon happening. We hope to have you back again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Great for families. Kids going to Disneyland or the Angels games, ect.  A typical Marriott 3 property. Lots of food/ drinks in the area as it is right in the heart of Aneheim. Property looks a bit like it is frequented by mass kids. Pool is just ok. Work out facility is lacking. I would stay there again if I had the family and would not be at the hotel much. Probably wouldn't use it for a business trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Anaheim Marriott. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: My family stayed at this Marriott property for Vid-Con. The staff at check in was outstanding, they were welcoming and attentative.  Every staff member i had contact with was friendly and attentative to every customer.  I sat at the bar and was very impressed with the staffs attention to every customer. With Disneyland walking distance away I would highly recommend this Marriott property
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We're so pleased to hear that our excellent customer service made your stay with us exceptional. We look forward to having you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Liz in Sun Spot is a TREASURE
Summary: Liz in the restaurant at the hotel is an absolute DELIGHT. Attentive service, beyond friendly, helpful and knowledgable. Truly the best service we have had anywhere in a very long time. The hotel itself is in a convenient proximity to Disneyland, and is clean, and perfectly adequate, but Liz and the tremendous service she provided made our experience stand out. Keep up the great work Liz and thank you for making our lunch a great one!
Manager Response: Hi Reed,  We are always thrilled to hear that our guests not only enjoyed their stay, but recieved exceptional service. Thank you for writing us a positive review and we hope to you again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Was here for a convention in July,  room and lobby, etc. were all very, very nice.  Elevators are programmed for efficiency - you enter your floor and it tells you which elevator you should ride. Great wifi, linens, and beds.  About an easy mile walk to Disneyland, or buy a shuttle ticket for $5 for the day.  Many restaurants within walking distance, plus a CVS for extras.
Manager Response: Hi Diane,  Thank you so much for the positive review. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our speedy elevators are a part of the 2014 rennovations. We hope to see you again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Booked this hotel primarily because it was close to Disneyland Resort. Check in was no problem and the staff was professional and nice. One staff was very patient with us when we asked if there was a bus going to the resort.   The room was large, with a balcony, 2 double beds, fridge, desk, phone and complimentary coffee and tea in the room. Bed was comfortable and definitely slept soundly after flying in from San Francisco. There is a Starbucks within the hotel too! It is also close to Katella Ave. where a lot of restaurants and stores are located.   Overall I would definitely consider this next time we visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are delighted to heat that you enjoyed your stay at the Anaheim Marriott, from the service you recieved to the dining options to the locations. We hope to host you again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: The Marriott Anaheim was really a great place to stay the room was pretty nice not too big if 4 or 5 people were staying in it. We only had 2 so it was fine. The beds were super comfortable!!  We stayed in the Oasis Tower and it was very quiet!  There were plenty of outlets for your electronic devices.  The only drawback was the bathrooms bathtub fixtures seem to need to be updated.  The closet also was pretty tiny.  The food is great at the hotel.  They have an excellent breakfast buffet and you can order also from the menu.  I recommend the granola pancakes I have never had them but they were excellent.  Another perk is that children under 12 eat free for breakfast lunch or dinner with purchase of an Adult entree that was cool.  The location is about 3 long blocks to
Manager Response: Hi Kimberly,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write us a detailed and positive review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the dining options and the location.   Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Perfect location, great service and incredibly comfy beds!
Summary: I wanted a close to Disney resort that was close enough to some local eats.  I got it.  Located in the Convention Centre cluster of hotels, valet parking was easy and the area is so easy to get around.  As a Marriott Rewards Member, it'll be on the return list.  Hotel amenities were great, housekeeping service was wonderful and we'll definitely be back.  Even with a convention happening and the hotel full with summer visitors, we didn't feel like a number and it wasn't chaotic.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We're pleased to hear that your stay was comfortable and satisfying despite how busy we've been with our summer visits. We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Generally good hotel but I'll have to give it 3 dots
Summary: I stayed here for 6 nights on business. There was a large congress I was attending in the congress centre next door so my company booked us into the Marriott.  I've stayed in a Marriott a couple of times before only since I usually don't really find that the price justifies the stay. I'm sort of mixed for this one as well and can't say that the value was excellent, just ok. It is generally a clean and modern hotel with polite employees. My room was a pretty good size with one double bed but my colleagues seemed to get slightly smaller rooms (although a few did get a balcony which I didn't). Everything worked well and seemed to be clean, although I never trust the glasses and mugs in hotel rooms and can't expect that they actually cleaned them here either.  There is a pool at the
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed feedback of your experience with us. We're happy to hear that the charges for the WiFi were removed from your bill. We do sincerly apologize for the inconvenience of being woken up at 7 a.m. when you did not request it. We'll take all the mentioned points into consideration.  Best, Dan

Summary: The hotel is very nice and has been updated.  The elevators are awesome.   Instead of pushing buttons on the inside of the elevators you press your floor in the elevator area and it tells you which one to take. Mathis eliminates pushing and crowds.  One downside is that it is very noisy if your room is on the pool side.   The rooms had king or double beds. There is a restaurant down there too.  The restaurant has great selections and homemade ice creams.  On a plus side, the staff is wonderful and would have changed our room.  I'd come back here.
Manager Response: Happy to hear that you would stay with us again if you were in the area. We've changed the pool hours to accomodate any guest rooming near that area. However, we do apologize for the inconvenience. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: Only stayed one night for a convention, so my experience is fairly limited.    The positive:  Friendly and generally helpful staff.  Overall fairly clean and the bed was comfortable. Right next to the convention center and very central to everything in the Disney - area of Anaheim, so very convenient, especially for convention goers.  This is also kind of a weird comment, but I liked the elevators where you selected a floor on a wall panel outside the bank of elevators and it told you which one to get on.  The WiFi was pretty strong in my room - no lost signals and I was able to get my work done, although I did not play games or stream videos.  The negative:  Most of this is going to be a bit nit-picky, but here goes.  The room and layout was a bit strange.  They (nicely, as I
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback of your stay with us. We do apologize that your experience was anything but exceptional. We're always striving to be better, so we'll be sure to take your input into consideration. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: Though an older property, it's been well maintained and upgraded, especially in the lobby area.  The front desk and dining room staff were very helpful and endlessly attentive.  The room was very comfortable and unusually quiet which was greatly appreciated.  The only off putting observation would be your being charged to use the computers in the business center.  I've not seen that in any other hotel and didn't care for it.  Wireless WiFi is available however so you should be OK with your smartphone,  The hotel had cost free provisions for printing out your airline boarding passes however.  It's a 3 block walk to Disney so it's proximity was optimal.  I would certainly consider staying there again if business takes me back to Anaheim and have no reservations recommending it to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We apologize for not having free WIFI, but we believe that we offer a reasonable price for the night. Besides that, we're pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. We look forward to having you back again!

Summary Heading: Glad I choose this in spite of negative reviews
Summary: This hotel was really great.  Clean, friendly staff, prime location, superb service, great food options, quick valet, beautiful pool, nice rooms.  I always stay at hilton and am a gold member.  Read reviews of surrounding convention hotels and decided to choose this marriott. I was there for 6 nights and it was nothing less than superb.
Manager Response: We're truly pleased to hear that your six night stay with us was everything you hoped it would be. We hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: This is a good hotel. Good location, really close to disneyland, and is located next to anaheim convention center. Good service and all the staff are really helpful. One of the bell boy who brought my luggage to the room broke the tag in one of my luggage, and I really appreciate him because he was being honest and told me what he did. Unfortunately I can't remember his name. Overall this is a good hotel, but I think it's time for them to renew their room. I think it really looks old.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We apologize again for the inconvenience of your luggage tag. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service and truly believe that honesty is the policy. We hope to have you back again!  Best, Dan

Summary: We had an amazing time at this great and sophisticated hotel. Wonderful swimming pool, very good restaurant and a very good infrastructure and localization. Close to Disney. The room is very good even for our family: 2 adulta and 3 kids. They offered us an additional bed, so it could accomodate us very well. The food is great. I wish We would have more time there.
Manager Response: We appreciate the postive review. We're happy that our staff was able to accomodate you and your family to ensure that you had an exceptional stay.

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland.  The public transportation was well worth it, and traffic was tough. With less humidity  (15%) than the South (85%) 95 degrees, we were comfortable most of the day.   $5 pass is the best way to see the areas via ART. It did take more time than driving, but you could see and wonder around with little concern driving and parking.  Hollywood was of a bit let-down. Very dirty looking. Not TV quality for sure.   Expect premium prices for most items.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We're happy that our option to take a shuttle made your trip more accommodating. We look forward to serving you again when you're in the area.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Excellent Price , 2 mins Drive to Disney
Summary: I  stayed at Marriot Anaheim for 4 nights. I was with my family and kids who came to see Disney land. We got a Amazing price for 4 nights and this hotel is well worth it. I think there price is super . We got a room for 180 $ only including tax and a buffet breakfast too. The location is great but you cant walk to Disney from here since its a bit far but if you take a cab its just 2 mins. You have to pay around 8 $ for a cab or you cant take a 5 $ shuttle which runs every half hour. The rooms were good and so was the buffet breakfast. There lift system is great as  you get a semi dedicated lift for yourself. If you are coming to see Disney land in Anaheim and cant afford Disney hotels then this hotel is hardly any less then those. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Hi Syed!  We are delighted to know that you found your experience at the Anaheim Marriott to be one of comfort, ease, and convenience. Thank you for taking the time to give us your positive feedback. We hope to see you again.  Best, Dan

Summary: Stayed here in late May of 2015 with husband and daughter who is 6. visit was for a work conference and family came along.   Hotel is stylish with modern features reminiscent of the better Marriott properties. Rooms were adequately spacious, beds comfortable, and all expected amenities we're in the room. Wifi is not free unless you have achieved a certain level of Marriott Rewards or it's included with a conference reservation. wifi was reliable. as this is a Marriott property, there were no issues with room or property cleanliness.  Food in the restaurant was very good, pricey as expected although not unreasonable. Service was hurting in the restaurant each time we ate there, but continue to eat there since it was convinient and very good.  Pool is very nice. Bright orange
Manager Response: Hi Heather,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write us a positive reivew. We love getting feedback from our customers and are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.   Best, Dan

Summary: I stayed at the Marriott on business, but was pleasantly surprised by the resort atmosphere. The staff is attentive and the site is lovely. The pool and restaurant are well situated for both adults and children. Since it is quite close to Disneyland it is a popular spot for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service, so we're pleased to hear about your exceptional stay!

Summary: What a wonderful property. From check in till check out I was treated nothing but absolutely perfect. Service was top notch. Concierge Lounge was great.   Just great all around stay. So close to Disney. Take advantage of Disney packages!
Manager Response: Awesome! Thank you for the great feedback. We're happy that the excellent customer service you received made your stay exceptional. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Wanted to get away and relax.  Hotel clean and quiet.  View from balcony was beautiful.  Hotel is in walking distances of various restaurants and a theater.   Recommend requesting a floor that is quiet due to numerous amount of families visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind words. We're pleased to hear that our excellent customer service contributed to your perfect getaway. We hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: The lock place backwards. The rust on pipe leaks onto making it look like feces on floor. Mold in shower caulk was placed over mold. Toilet seat painted to cover cracks. Staff is great.  Hotel is pricey that's why I thought the rooms would be clean. Hair all over the room even inside the ice bucket and towels have dark stains. We are staying two nights staying two nights. If you want me to email pictures . Nuecesplace@hotmail.com
Manager Response: I responded to your review on Yelp, but would like to reach out to your through Trip Advisor as well.  I would like to thank you for taking the time to write us a review about your experience. We appreciate any feedback that will help us be a better hotel. I sincerly apologize that your stay was anything but exceptional. I want to ensure that the issues you dealt with are resolved and never reoccur. If you could please give me more details such as your full name, dates of your stay, room number and marriott rewards number (if any), so that I can look further into this. Thank you again.  Best, Dan

Summary: not the  best  hotel in town for sure,  but is  sufficiently  nice,  looks  like  rooms  have been  renovated, exept  for  thermostats, and beds,  I  was  put in room 343  wich  had  this  issue  with the OLD thermostat that  had sticky  buttons and  it  didnt  turn the AC on until  it  was too  hot  and  didnt  turn it off until it was too cold,  the beds  was  unconfortable,  how ever the staff  was incredibly  nice and  helpfull  but  unfortunetly we were not able  to fix  my  discomfort, Internet  seemed  expensive and  notfast enough  (the 12.99 per day) I  complain  about this  and they  something to  help me, I am not sure if  I will choose  this  hotel in the  future, but the helpfull staff  might be one  reason to choose it again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback. We apologize for your AC thermostat not working properly. Would you mind private messaging me your room information, so that we can ensure that this issue was resolved? Thank you and we hope to serve you again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Pretty nice Marriott. The lobby is very pretty. Colorful water fountain when you walk in. Starbucks in the lobby and a Disney ticket booth for your convenience. The hallways are pretty stuffy walking to your room. There's no ventilation and the soda machines ate my money twice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience of dealing with a stuffy hallway and getting your money taken from the soda machine. I'll take these points to the rest of our staff to ensure that the machine gets fixed. We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Did the Mickey thing for 4 nights and booked via Costco Travel Package. Great deal, nice room, decent location with not too far of a walk to Disneyland. Room was nice, not overly large but just fine. Hotel restaurant for Breakfast was quite good the two mornings we ate there. Only minor blemish on stay was Hotel Desk staff and Concierge had no awareness of the Disneyland Resort Buses back to LAX that were part of our package. Wife was somewhat rudely and repeatedly told that only public transit was available. Odd since these buses travel to all Disneyland hotels and all other major hotels in the area. We had to call the Bus line to confirm when they arrived at the Marriott, every two hours throughout the day.
Manager Response: Hi BT,  Thank you for the positivie review. We are pleased to hear that your stay with us was delightful. We hope to host you again.  Best,  Dan

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel for a convention. We stayed there for a 5 day convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. Staff was friendly and accommodating from start to finish. Hotel food was rather pricey. I was traveling with students. We walked across the walkway to go to the Hilton food court, ( part of our convention was at the Hilton). Disney and many other restaurants were within walking distance. We often visited the CVS for quick meals and supplies. The public bus is not far from the hotel. We received complimentary wi-fi but it was slower than expected. Normally the w-fi cost 11.95 per day. That was the only downside. The pool was awesome. It was very quiet early in the morning but got busy in the evening. We were able to check in early and the rooms were
Manager Response: Hi Sallie,  Thank you for writing a positive review! We are delighted to hear that your experience with us was lovely. We hope you chose us again should you return to Anaheim.  Best, Dan

Summary: The Marriott Anaheim situated just a short walk from the Anaheim Convention Center as well as Adventure California (which is a Disneyland property). The rooms were well appointed and very comfortable. The workout center and pool were top notch. The staff was very well trained and extremely helpful. This is a good choice for any type of travel whether it be business or a family vacation.
Manager Response: Hi Rick,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write us a positive review, we truly appreicitate your kind words. We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to seeing you again.  Best, Dan

Summary: My husband has been part of the ASTM for a very long time. This time, the meeting was this hotel. From the moment that we checked in until the time we left, it was a great experience! It is very close to Disneyland and there are shuttles that come every 20 minutes or so to take you to the parks. Note: Tickets for the shuttle can be purchased for $5 a day. A multi-day pass can be purchased, at a better price, from the other hotels, like the Clarion and the Hilton. The staff was great and helpful. One of the concierge is a lovely gentleman named William. He is so nice and can make great recommendations. He suggested we try The Catch, a great seafood and steak restaurant. The place is light and airy. The tuna is fabulous! The ladies are also very helpful. There is lady who answers
Manager Response: Great! We appreciate your kinds words and are truly pleased to hear that you had an exceptional stay. We look forward to having you back again.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Hotel Right Out of a James Bond Movie
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a massive HOSA conference in Anaheim. For all four days and nights that we stayed, I can say for a fact that this hotel made the stresses of travel go away and the joys of the journey even better. The rooms are nice and clean, the beds are comfortable, the bathroom is clean, as expected. The staff are nice and professional and can help in any situation, from problems with your room to the location of a different venue in a neighboring hotel. The hotel itself is designed to be visually stunning and it definitely accomplished its goal as soon as the car was valet-parked. My only gripe was with the free Wi-Fi that was supposed to be included with our conference package. It didn't really work for any of the people in our group, but when i asked others
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We're pleased to hear that you had a satisfying stay with us. We hope to have you back again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Not the Happiest Place on Earth
Summary: Our stay was horrible. The air didn't work and when the maintenance man came to fix it he made us feel like we didn't have a clue about what was wrong. It was never fixed and the night was spent in a hot room. When checking out the desk lady was rude and not helpful. I asked for the manager and got the assistant front desk manager. We got our parking taken off. Whoopee!! Are you kidding me? They even doubled charged our credit cards. Just an overall cappy stay. I called and talked to the manager. He was very nice and credited our night back. Probably will go back to the Sheraton when we go to Disneyland. At least Marriott follow up was first class.
Manager Response: We appreciate your input and apologize that your stay with us was anything but exceptional. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to our guests, and I can ensure you that all of your feedback will be taken to the rest of our team. We hope you give us another opportunity to serve you again.   Best, Dan

Summary: Expected more from the Marriott. Overall, it's near the park so I would go again. Foyer lovely. However- came back from day at the park and the room wasn't clean. When i called housekeeper - they said you must ask for it , we don't just clean your room. So would you like us to clean it now (it was late at night). One of the perks of a hotel rather than just a home is you get your bed made and new towels . The other concern is my purse went missing , and the hotel actually didn't care to. Investigate or if they did - they didn't call to follow up. I moved most of my belongings to a backpack for disney but concerned there has been no follow up or concern. How else did it get out of the roo . Maybe review a surveillance camera? Very poor security  or follow through.  The location
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write us a detailed review about your experience with us. We apologize for the inconvenience of not having your room cleaned every day, but we do want to ensure that it's only done when it's necessary. If there is anything else our staff can do for you in regards to your purse, please feel free to send me a private message with your name and dates of your stay to better assist you.   Best, Dan

Summary: We purchased a home and while waiting for our furniture to arrive from Texas we were fortunate to stay in such a pet friendly place at Marriott TownePlace Suite Anaheim ... Not only is it very clean hospitable and the generosity is over and beyond ... Also very pet friendly our Willy boy not only was he loved here he felt safe and made himself at home we met a lot of new friends!!! We will definitely recommend this place to our family and friends.
Manager Response: Hi Luba!  We are delighted to hear that you and Willy Boy enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for you positive review. We hope you chose to stay with us again if you find yourself in Anaheim!  Best, Dan

Summary: I can't say enough nice things about this hotel. The building and grounds are attractive and well maintained. The staff is professional, helpful, and friendly. Every single staff member with whom I dealt, or even just passed in the hallway, smiled and wished me a good day. The rooms are a little dated, but not too badly. Since I was last at this hotel, they've updated the elevator controls so that you enter your floor number before entering a cab, and the controller informs you which cab you should enter. There is no more waiting for more than a few seconds for an elevator. The bar and restaurant are very nice, with a very good food selection. Just a really great hotel.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to write us a positive review. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to our guests, so we're pleased to hear that your stay was exceptional. We hope to have you back again soon.  Best, Dan

Summary: Stabdard Marriott with enough features and comforts for a pleasant stay. Clean, comfortable and convenient. The 3 C's of a good hotel. But then again, this is Marriott. WiFi could be better but in the land of unlimited data, I suspect this to be a non-issue for most guests.
Manager Response: Hi Anita,  We appreciate you taking the time to write us a review. Due to the large number of guest having issues with our WiFi, we're currently looking into any adjustments we can make. We hope to serve you again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Nice visit, but will stay somewhere else next time.
Summary: The pros:  This hotel had very nice staff. They all were friendly and helpful.   Catching the ART to Disney Land was very easy as well, there is a stop right out front of the hotel and the bus came about every 15 minutes or so during the day. This also goes for transportation back and forth to the airport.   The elevators were quick and somehow different than any other hotel I've been at before too. There was usually no more than a few second wait time. So nice.  I really liked the pool area. The pool water was warmish so you didn't have to get "used to it" and part of the pool is in the sun and part of it was not. That goes with the seating as well. If you plan to spend all day at the pool, and we did one day, we had the choice to move into the shaded area while the kids swam.
Manager Response: Good day Ms. Carolyn  Thank you for your feedback. We are disapointed that we lll short from your expectations. We have since shared your comments with our management team. We hope to regain your faith in our hotel and you may reconsider us in the future when your travels bring you back to the city of Anaheim.  Thanks, Dan

Summary: Stayed here a couple weeks ago for a conference.  Check in was easy.  Hotel has a really nice large lobby with multiple seating areas which make it convenient to meet up with others and network.  Elevator system is rather neat, you put your floor number and it assigns an elevator.  I assume its a computerized elevator assignment system designed to make things flow more smoothly.  The only downside is the doors on the far elevators can close too quickly if you punch in your floor number at the first keypad and are trying to lug your suitcase.  Room are decent in size but comfortable.  I had some issues with the WiFi dropping during my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review! We apologize for the inconvenience of your WiFi dropping during your stay. We'll be sure to take all of your feedback int consideration and we hope to serve you again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Check your Bill and Check your bill when Check out !  An advice from Reviewer with more then 5000 views.
Summary: Stayed 6 nights. Nothing special and regret stay in Marriott Anaheim.   1.  Some smart Front Desk staff change our stay from 6 nights to 8 nights.  Ridiculous   When checked out, it showed 8 night even the statement clearly stated check in date and check out date only has 6 nights.  And the supervisor is not friendly when we raised the concern.  Rate : 1 / 10 front desk female supervisor. 2.  House Keeping :  Does not replenish our shower gel etc.  Rate  : 3 / 10  However, there is few good things need to mention. 1.  Front Desk Ms Terrese.  She was so helpful after her supervisor seem ignore our complaint.  One big LIKE for her. 2.  Evening Valet / Concierge.  They are very friendly and always greet people with " Welcome Back Sir ".    Conclusion :  Hilton just 15 meter across
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm surprised to hear this, as we pride ourselves on customer service here at the hotel. Please private message me with the dates of your stay, room number, name it was under, and Marriott Rewards number (if any) so that I can look into this further.   Thanks, Dan

Summary: I had an amazing experience at the Marriott. Arrived and asked about the Disney fireworks, immediately the concierge offered to put us on the top floor as I had expressed interest in seeing the fireworks. It was an amazing upgrade and I was so thankful. The bar was excellent and had great staff that taught me all about the finest whiskeys. The pool was nice as well as the workout facility. The hotel is located within walking distance from Downtown Disney. Ask the front desk for the fastest route though.   Overall the staff was jovial and professional, the gentlemen behind the bar are experts at their craft and the front desk staff isn't afraid to go the extra mile. They even provided me with a free movie one night.   If you plan on going to Anaheim then the Marriott should
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to write us a detailed an honest review. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service to all of our guest, so we're pleased to hear that you had a satisfying experience. We hope to see you again very soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: Our room upon first impression was great. Lovely room and well appointed. However, when you go a little into details there were several small issues:  The duvet cover had a hole on top at the bottom right corner. This should have no longer been given to guests, the housekeeeper should have discarded it.   The "at your service button / one stop button", wasn't programmed.  The bathroom wasn't set up with any soap bars. How do you wash your hands after using the toilet?  Front Desk check in was polite, but very mechanical. No time for explanations, and the explanations we did receive were so fast we had at several times asked to repeat. Especially walking directions to Disneyland, the directions given were for a local, assuming we would know all the street names. No map was given.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm surprised to hear this, as we pride ourselves on customer service here at the hotel. Please private message me with the dates of your stay, room number, name it was under, and Marriott Rewards number (if any) so that I can look into this further.   Thanks, Dan

Summary: The hotel was great. In walking distance in Disneyland. The room was just awesome. The food was great. The pool was so cool. Again the room was just beautiful. We had a corner suite with double glass windows. You could see the fireworks from the room.
Manager Response: Hi Jonette,  Thank you so much for taking the time to send us a review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate the kind words about our cuisine at nFuse.   Best,  Dan

Summary: The staff was amazing and made me feel like I was already at Disneyland. Manager Response: Hi There!  Thank you so much for the psotive review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope that the construction did not cause too much confusion. Thank you for your feedback and we would love to have you again!  Best,  Dan

Summary: Overall, this hotel was quite nice.  I stayed here for four nights while on business meetings in the area.  The hotel is centrally located - very close to Disneyland, I was able to walk there in about 20 minutes.  The hotel is clean - the elevator system was ultra-modern and minimized wait times and stopping at floors that weren't mine.  The conference facilities were large and well appointed.  I also had a very nice balcony where I could sit and watch the city function around me (and periodically catch some of the fireworks at Disneyland!).   My only issue was with the "little things" - and for a hotel of this cost, size, and chain, The way that my bathroom was set up, the piping running from the underside of the sink to the lateral wall (not the wall directly behind the sink)

Summary: A wonderful location and a beautiful hotel!  The remodel is stunning and the staff is friendly, helpful and constantly available.  You can't find a better home in Anaheim! The hotel is contemporary yet warm and comfortable.  Rooms are nicely furnished. Best VERY comfortable and bathroom amenities galore.

This is a good thing because the non-chain restaurant alternatives are few and far between in Anaheim which is a cultural wasteland if you're not a Disney fan.  I found that the room was a little blah and the hallways are drab and uninteresting.

Room service was excellent.  The ART bus was handy for Disney, but coming back at night it was packed. Its not a far walk but after a long day if your feet are sore its way too long.  We did not use the pool (no time) but after seeing it I dont think I would, its not private as the whole restaurant looks out at it, I dont want to be the dinner entertainment LOL!  I do highly recommend this hotel,

The food was good and room service was timely and friendly.  My room was nearly silent, I don't think I heard another person my entire stay.  The little shop is big enough that it has most of the little things I might want or forgot.  Plus, there is only a very short walk to the Convention Center or arena, and about a mile to Disney. I did find the fragrance of the in-room toiletries very cloying and overpowering; something more neutral would be my preference. The hotel usually charges $12.95 a day for wifi; fortunately it was complimentary for us as we were involved in a sponsored conference, but otherwise I think that wifi has become an essential

While we were there we walked right around the corner to Morton's Steakhouse and had what I thought was the best steak I have ever had.  That was until my husband and I visited the hotel restaurant. They have a modern, new feel. There is a centrally located Starbucks inside. There are also a few other deli style places where you can buy a parfait, bagel, muffin,etc. The gym is really state of the art. It was a very nice place to work out. The hotel staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The rooms and bathroom were smaller than some Marriotts I have stayed in, but I think that is typical for Southern California. There is a bus for $5 that can quickly take you to Disney, however it is also walkable (but you might want to conserve energy for the theme park).

We phoned down to reception and they immediately upgraded us to a King size bed, that happened to be on a lower floor, with a balcony overlooking the pool.  To us, this was a much better room, so we were pretty pleased with the change.  They called us immediately after relocating us to confirm that we were satisfied so I think they really do their best to manage customer satisfaction.  We ordered room service breakfast the next morning, and it arrived at the right time with no mistakes on

Concierge was more than willing to help us on Saturday, but Sunday not so much.  She saw me standing there but ignored me for several minutes until I left and went to front desk for help.    Housekeeping didn't clean our room on Saturday but came right away when we called front desk.    Room with double beds and balcony over the pool is very comfortable.

Summary: When attending or working at trade shows, it is rare to find a hotel that stands out or that would cause rave reviews regardless of location.  I have traveled for business for over 40 years and attended my share of trade shows.  The Marriott Anaheim far exceeded my expectations when I spent 5 nights there in May 2015.  My room was large, clean and comfortable.  The hotel amenities were great.  The biggest surprise was that the restaurants were excellent!  The breakfast and lunch buffets were superb.  I have seldom found hotel restaurants to be anything but convenient.  These were excellent in their own right.  Service was great and friendly.  All in all, the Marriott Anaheim was a respite from a tough week of working at a trade show.

Each room has its own balcony so that was a surprise bonus. We sat outside drinking our Starbucks (from downstairs) in the perfect CA weather each morning.  Parking is expensive but there's no way around it. Valet is $28 and self is $24. Plus, we were told it is expected that you will tip EACH time they take or retrieve your car. Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review. We're so pleased to hear that your experience with us was exceptional and everything you hoped it would be. We hope to serve you again soon!  Best, Dan

Eventually all of the incorrect charges were removed but it took multiple phone calls and emails (in part because of the time difference) to get everything resolved. Who has time for that?!
Manager Response: We appreciate your honest and detailed review. We apologize for an inconvenience you experience while staying with us. Despite the multiple phone calls and emails that had to be made, we're pleased to hear that all of the incorrect charges were removed from your account. We will take your feedback into consideration. We hope to serve you and your family again soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: Stayed at the Anaheim Marriott in February 2015 while attending an event at the convention center. The hotel property was very nice and the room was clean and what you would expect from a full service Marriott property.  The front desk was especially kind and helpful. I had three flights that day and was arriving late. I appreciated the hospitality and warm welcome. When I travel back to Anaheim, I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review! We're pleased to hear that you had a stellar experience while staying with us. We hope to serve you again when you're in the area.  Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Great hotel...a short bus ride on ART or a 20 minute walk to Disneyland
Summary: We just returned from the 60th Anniversary of the opening of Disneyland. Our choice to stay at the Marriott Anaheim was a good one (all the Disney resorts were full). The staff and service were outstanding.   There is a FEDEX store in the hotel as well as a Pizza Hut (open 6-11 pm) and a Starbucks that is open for breakfast and lunch.   We spent most of our time at Disneyland so the "view" from our room was, well, nothing great at all, but the service was very good from the moment we walked in through the moment we had a cab to take us back to the airport.   Four solid stars. I would give it 5 stars, but I did not really use many of the services at the hotel. Again, however, the service was outstanding.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write us a review about your experience with us. We're pleased to hear that you had a stellar stay. We hope to see you again soon!  Thanks, Dan

Summary Heading: Great stay, beware of noise from pool area if room faces the pool
Summary: Chose the Anaheim Marriott because of the Marriott name and proximity to Disneyland. Check-in process was fast and efficient. Brandon was friendly and professional. We were assigned a room that was facing the pool. It made for convenient access to the lobby and pool, but one of the drawbacks of the room was the room was on the noisy side. The first night we were there, there were quite a bit of pool users late into the night, and you could hear them through the windows.   Our room was clean and comfortable. The only criticism about the room was the carpet was quite worn in places and really should have been replaced. The bed was comfortable and most importantly, the room was fresh smelling.   If you have concierge lounge access, the concierge lounge is open for breakfast 7 days
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I apologize for the noise that was coming from the pool area. We're pleased to hear that you wouldn't hesistate to stay with us again. We hope to see you soon!  Best, Dan

Summary: This Marriott will not disappoint. My stay was excellent. Came into my room with a hanawritten note and some cookies from the GM of the hotel. I also received an email from him prior to my arrival. The location is great, parking is very easy, and staff is very helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind review. We are proud of our 13mm renovation, and fully revamped menu at the nFuse Bar & Kitchen. We hope to see you again soon!   Best, Dan

Summary Heading: Expected much better service, rating based off high expectations
Summary: We booked two rooms as part of a Disneyland reservation. Due to some mix ups (which was Disney's fault) the hotel didnt have our booking. They were able to accommodate us which was great, but the whole experience of checking in was very unenjoyable and inefficient.   At checkin the person required our Disney confirmation number, which is obviously reasonable. But even with this she had to confirm with her manager several times, making for a whole lot of awkward back and forth while I waited. The whole process took over twenty minutes. Bad way to start the vacation.  Despite our printed reservation ticket from Disney and our emails stating we'd get two King rooms, we were both given rooms with two queen beds. As two couples traveling together, and after the hassle at checkin this
Manager Response: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. I'm surprised to hear this, as we pride ourselves on customer service here at the hotel. Please private message me with the dates of your stay, room number, name it was under, and Marriott Rewards number (if any) so that I can look into this further.  Dan.
