Summary Heading: Best hotel in the Disneyland Resort for adults
Summary: We travel to the resort 2-3 times a year and this is by far our favorite hotel. It's a great Marriott in a prime location, a short shuttle ride or an easy walk to Disneyland/DCA. There are beautiful views of the park from many of the rooms. The pool area is large and partially covered so its perfect in any type of weather. Since it's close to the convention center we find that the crowd tends to be more adults and couples and less kids then some of the other hotels in the area, which we love being a couple in our 30s. There are also convenient options for coffee and snacks (Starbucks, Pizza Hut, Room Service). There's a Hertz Rental Car right in the lobby and Alamo less then a block away, adding to the ease of the location. To top it off, the customer service always blows us
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest of our hotel. I am delighted to hear that you consistently enjoy your stay with us and appreciate your comments. I look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: My husband and I went down to California for a foot-race through Disneyland parks (more information on these races can be found at the Run Disney website). We were looking for hotel accommodations that were close to the park, easy to get to from the airport and a good price. We found all of that with the Marriott.   We rented a car from a location very close to the airport and drove to the Marriott - took only about 40 minutes through light traffic. And very easy to find. Check in was pretty challenging as the front desk associate didn't know if our room was ready and had to make several attempts to call. Finally we were able to go up (17th floor). The only bummer was that 2 out of the 6 elevators were in service (for the whole weekend I should add) so we had full trips up
Manager Response: How fun, the Disney Race!  I'm so glad that you and your husband enjoyed your stay with us and that you'd recommend us.  Thank you!

Summary: The staff here is excellent.  I was not happy with my original room, but Monica at the front desk moved me to another room with no problem.  She was very polite and professional and made it seem effortless, even with a full hotel for a packed convention.  She even followed up with a hand written note to make sure I was happy.  Who does that anymore?
Manager Response: I'm so glad to hear of your great experience and that we were able to surprise and delight you.  Please come stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I really wanted to love this hotel. After all its a Marriott a few blocks from Disneyland. The location is great and is next to the convention center. We arrived on New Years eve around 7pm. That night at the convention center there was a new years bash basically a rave. The lobby was filled with teenagers and young adults wearing all white and the girls wearing close to nothing. Girls dresssed like women of the night and certian parts of their bodies handing out filled the streets and lobby that night. I was shocked that the Marriott would allow half naked girls to walk around with kids playing in the special xbox aera that they set up in the lobby. They did have extra security that night which was reassuring. We reserved two city view top floor panoramic window rooms. When we
Manager Response: I'm disappointed to hear about your experience and hope you'll give us another look in the future.

Summary Heading: Came for convention, stayed for Disney
Summary: My week long stay during the Laserfiche convention was a great experience.  All staff were very helpful.  In particular Martin Florez (red blazer assistant) went above and beyond to help me.  Gretchen was also very pleasant and helpful during breakfast.  The entire facility was clean and well run.  I would come back in an instant.
Manager Response: I appreciate your comments about our staff and am very glad to hear about how they were able to help you. Thank you for sharing your thoughts.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and close to Disney
Summary: Updated hotel with a lot of amenities and great service.  We were able to walk to a free shuttle for disney so it made the stay very convenient.  they will hold your luggage for the day when you check out so it made it easy to hit the park one last time before we left.  Food was good, service great, awesome plat. break feast.  We had 9 people in our party and we would all stay here again.  very accommodating and the kids had a blast.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great time. I'm delighted to hear that we were able to make your experience a pleasant one. Thanks for staying with us and I look forward to having you again.

Summary: The hotel is gorgeous!  An added bonus is the full service Starbucks in the lobby!  The room was very clean, and ours even had a balcony that we could sit on and look at the palm trees and watch the families getting on and off the Disney busses with their hats! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your review. It's great that you were able to enjoy a nice view from the balcony of your room. Hope to have you stay with us again.

Summary: I was running 10 min. late for checkout getting back from goofy's kitchen and was trying to get my bags together and check out of our room and key didn't work. The front desk reprogrammed and had to go back to room to front desk 3 different times because the key they thought they were fixing wasn't working. This took a quite a while I was on the 19th floor. Front desk told me 2nd trip to the front desk to call a hallway phone if it didn't work. So I ran around the whole floor looking for a phone, there was no phone on our floor! So the 3rd time down I expressed that I was worried about missing my flight and maybe I could get a luggage cart to get everything down at once. The front  desk said she would get a bellman to open your door for me and take a cart. When he got to the
Manager Response: I appreciate you being a regular guest at our hotel and am very disappointed in hearing about how you were treated. Our bell staff constantly gets showered with praise, so this is a rare and unfortunate experience. I am sending you a private message right now.

Summary Heading: Excellent experience, polite staff, comfy room
Summary: I stayed in this hotel for a conference, and I was extremely pleased with the service. From the moment I checked in, the staff did everything they could to make sure my stay was pleasant. They were courteous and kind, and nowhere were they kinder than at the Bell Captain's desk. Upon returning from a morning run, the Bell Captain offered me a bottle of water, which was very welcome. Housekeeping was unobtrusive but efficient; the restaurant staff was prompt and accommodating (I wanted to sit a while and read, and they were fine with that and didn't try to rush me out). The room itself was very comfortable, and I really liked the power outlets on the nightstand for my phone.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts. I am delighted to hear how pleased you were with the staff and that you had an excellent experience. I hope you stay with us again.

Summary: Does not happen often with a Marriott but Such a Disappointment. The first impression of the hotel was terrible. There was none of the bellboys to receive us upon arrival; once the car's trunk was opened we had to wait for 5' to have somebody asking if we were checking in or out (with 8 suitcases in the trunk I personally would assume that I'm clearly checking in). Then we wait other 10' to have somebody taking our suitcases!!! At reception we had to wait some time as well, and the process was quite slow. The excuse for all the delays was 'we have a big event tonight and there's a lot of people' - well a good solution is putting more personnel when it is known there are lots of departures and arrivals.  The rooms are nice and comfortable - but there is too much noise coming from
Manager Response: I appreciate you staying with us and am disappointed in hearing about the service you received. I am sending you a private message.

Summary Heading: Its ok ... but not book in the Hospitality Suite
Summary: We recently stayed at the property during our trip to disneyland.  When we check in everything is ok untill we get to the room which had 2 double bed, since we have kids age 10 and 12 we think that the bed will not be confertable for all of us . Then we decided to upgrade the room to the suite room which has 1 queen bed , 1 sofa bed and 1 roll away bad  they charge us $50 more for the price they selling for us its ok as long as the room is confertable . When we get to the room I was very surprised for a suite room the queen bed is not a proper bed but is a Murphy bed after over 10 hours flight I dont think the bed is confertable for a next 5 days, we check the web dor the Hilton htl oppsite the hotel which has 2 queen bed in the room for $90 less what we paying. So I went to the
Manager Response: I regret to hear about the issues you had with the room but am glad to hear Jenny was able to take care of you. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Outstanding hotel and service. The renovated rooms are extremely comfortable. Beds are great and the big screen TV has an excellent channel line up. The service is superb. You cannot beat the location relative to the Anaheim Convention and Disneyland. We walked to Morton's for a good dinner although a little pricey. We enjoyed a wonderful bottle of California sparkling Brut in the Bar just off the lobby while watching sports on big screen TVs. The free shuttles to Disneyland and the Outlet Stores of Orange were very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your thoughts. I am delighted to hear that you had such a pleasant experience at our hotel and hope come stay with us again soon.

Summary: My husband and I have been to Disneyland several times and have only once stayed at an actual Disneyland Hotel (Grand Californian).  The hotel was great, but very expensive.  Therefore, we started to stay at the Anaheim Marriott on Convention Way.  The hotel rooms are really nice, rooms are clean, front desk staff very nice and friendly and the fitness center exceptional.  We have always dealt with Anne and she is always really nice to us.    We will continue to stay at this hotel every time we visit Anaheim or Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Thank you for being regular guests at our hotel. I'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Anne. I look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: It is a very clean hotel, that, for me it is the most important issue. Is there something to complain? As a matter of fact, no. But, Marriot hotels are usually more luxury than this one. So, I was a little disappointed. There are only two thing that I would like to underline. When I booked this hotel, it was said that the hotel was located very near Disneyland. It is not so near. Manly when you come back from Disneyland in the evening (and children are extremely tired). But, there is a bus ( US$ 5 for adults and US$ 3 for children for a 24 hours pass) people can use. The last thing: people from the room service are lazy. In the evening, when you order something, you have to wait at least one hour.
Manager Response: I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate you bringing these details to my attention. I hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here on our first night in the United States after a day at Disneyland. The hotel is very large and impersonal and the staff were polite but unwilling to provide any genuine service or assistance. Our request for a rollaway bed was met with a perfunctory "certainly sir,we will see what we can do" it never arrived. We have been Marriott fans for years but this hotel does not live up to the standard that we have experienced in the past. My advice - save some money and stay somewhere cheaper - you certainly won't do any worse.
Manager Response: I am disappointed to hear about the service you received and am sending you a private message.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel. Good area. Transportation great!
Summary: I was at a convention at this hotel in July. They have a nice restaurant, but a little expensive. It's in walking distance to other restaurants and Disneyland. The room was nice, nothing special, but clean. The concierge staff was helpful and very pleasant. I didn't get a chance to use the pool but my roommate said it was nice and you could order food and drinks poolside. They also have great transportation in Anaheim! You can catch a bus to Disneyland or the outlet mall, the drivers are very helpful and will answer any questions you gave about getting around.
Manager Response: I am so glad to hear that you had a pleasant experience at our hotel. I hope next time you can enjoy our pool. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel is not bad, but unfortunately it's pretty much "average" in every aspect. The pool is very small and packed (as the hotel is huge). There is a Starbucks, but it closes at 6pm (so early). Disneyland is within walking distance, but only for an ADULT. If you have kids (up to 5-6 years old) it may be hard to walk to/from the Disneyland Parks. So, the bus would be the best option. A great "con" in this hotel are the beds!! Really hard and gave me "neck pains"! So, after an entire day walking in the parks, do not expect to have a great night of sleep here. Also, as we have a 4-year-old son, we opted for two beds and they are really, really small. It's very hard for two adults to sleep in the Marriott Anaheim bed. One thing shall be said: the hotel smells great!!
Manager Response: I appreciate your feedback. Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your thoughts.

Summary: Stayed with family for 5 nights to visit Disneyland. Hotel was fine but nothing special. Used the pool once but found it crowded  and not especially nice. Room was average. One day we returned from Disneyland at 11pm to discover our room had not been made up, no toilet paper or clean towels. Difficult as our kids 9 and 6 were cranky and ready to sleep. A call to housekeeping did have clean towels and toilet paper delivered. I followed up with front desk in am and received apology and credit for coffee shop. Average but not as memorable as other Marriott hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for bringing this to my attention. This will be used as a teaching tool for our staff to provide better service in the future.

Summary Heading: nice hotel, very convenient for disney
Summary: just got back from five days here, the property is nice and seems to have been recently renovated. -rooms are nice but a bit small, there was room for a club chair but it was missing -staff was helpful and friendly -as it was new years it was very busy, the starbucks in the lobby was always a long wait -breakfast restaurant was good, stick to the cold buffet as it was good enough unless you want eggs and bacon/sausage -the pool is where things are a bit dated, there is a permanent roof that covers half of the pool that is unsightly. -the hottub smelled like body odor -the gym was spacious and had a lot of equipment, I used it twice and never had to wait for equipment -as the hotel is on the block south of disney it was pretty convenient though taking ART is recommended as the
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us and for your review. Your tips will certainly be beneficial to future guests of our hotel. I hope you stay with us again.

Summary: The hotel was pretty good.  It was clean and adequate for a two night stay to see the two Disney parks.  The front desk though was a pleasant surprise!  They really went out of their way to make it easy for us and it was appreciated.  I actually felt like they cared about us as individuals and they guy who checked us in wrote us a personal thank you note when we left!  What a great personal touch! I found out we both graduated from U of A the same year when we checked in so Bear Down and Go Cats! And thanks again.  Another recommendation is to get the daily shuttle pass as if you have small kids... the half mile walk past the homeless guy at the local bus station can get to be a bit more than you want.  But excellent lobby service and staff! Great place to stay if you are not
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay with us. I appreciate your comments about the staff and am happy that they provided you with excellent service. I look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Just wanted the bell desk to receive the recognition they deserve. Had so much ridiculous stuff to move in and out for our stay that it took two men to push the trunk shut when we left, yet their pleasure at helping us was genuine. Their desk handled the delivery and return of a locally-rented wheelchair for our family member with feet problems to get around Disneyland. They happily posted my letters for me when I asked where a mailbox was, got me set up with the very convenient shuttle to Disneyland, and answered every question like I was the most important part of their day. And when my child got separated from the family, and kept getting on and off elevators on random floors trying to find us, it seemed they and the entire hotel staff organized a search party to get her back
Manager Response: Sounds like you had quite a trip! I am thrilled to hear that our staff gave you the best service you have ever had and will be sure to pass along the compliments. Thank you very much for staying with us.

Summary: I stayed here for 8 days while attending a conference in December and could not have been more impressed. The staff and facilities were second to none and I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of a visit to Disneyland or on a business trip.
Manager Response: I am so glad to hear about how impressed you were with our hotel and appreciate your recommendation. I hope you come stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Pros and Cons of This Hotel
Summary: We recently returned for a trip to this hotel.  I thought I would draw your attention to some of the highlights and other issues that you should consider when booking this hotel.  First our trip was specifically to visit Disneyland with my wife, 3 adult children and my daughter in law.  I booked a few months prior to the trip and got a pretty good rate considering the holidays.  Pros:  - I have the Marriott app on my phone.  This let me check in ahead of time.  As we were riding on the Super Shuttle from the airport at 12:30 pm, the app send me an email saying our rooms were ready.  Not bad!  - Arrived at the hotel - Check in took about 10 seconds to pick up the keys.  Not bad!.  The service staff is top notch.  This is actually the best part of the hotel.  Every person we
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear that you had a pleasant experience staying with us and I appreciate your feedback. Hope you had fun at Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Wish I had a better experience
Summary: We are Marriott gold members so we spend a lot of time in Marriott hotels, in addition to being timeshare owners.  I usually love my Marriott experiences and "splurged" a bit over the rate I wanted to spend to stay closer to disney at the holidays.  However, this is the first and last time I will ever stay at this hotel.  The staff is wonderful, but the bed was beyond firm.  I am a side sleeper and found it virtually impossible to fall asleep, let alone get a good night sleep.  The concierge lounge was closed for 2 of the 3 nights, and the one night it was open the food ran out early and the staff picked everything up much earlier than the published time.  Not great form a cranky toddler who was looking forward to the promise of a chocolate chip cookie.  The location is
Manager Response: I regret to hear about your recent experience at our hotel. I am sending you a private message.

Summary Heading: Service when it counts - Great property
Summary: Great concierge staff. Great bellhop staff. Clean and friendly hotel. Great rooms with balconies. As a Marriott Elite, they truly make you feel like an elite in the concierge lounge and when checking in. Separate elite counter for long check in lines as well. Overall a great hotel, for events and for family visits to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments about our staff. I am glad that you enjoyed the benefits of being an elite member. Thanks again and I hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: As always, when you stay at Marriot Hotel, you can expect a high level of standard. Can't say anything unsatisfactory. You will always be pleased with the service and the hospitality that you get. The hotel is located right at the center of Anaheim and you can explore the area by just walking. You can also depend on their hotel service if you want to go quickly to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. I appreciate your comments and am glad that we were able to uphold the standards you have come to expect from our hotels. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Marriott Property, great location, wonderful staff
Summary: Stayed at this property for three nights for a conference.  Location is excellent  to both the convention center and Disney.  Arrived early 12:15, self parked for 24 a day (ouch), and as should be expecting when arriving early my room was not ready.  When it was finally ready at close to 4pm, was assigned a KING room on the 4th floor.  Wasn't the view I was hoping for, but the room itself was fine.  Typical room size and Marriott furnishings. Bed was great, bathroom small like most Marriott's but was what I expected.   ONE HUGE plus was that the floor I was on was quiet. Did not hear one door slam that woke me up, and that is my biggest pet peeve of hotel travel.  This Marriott has their doors figured out and they don't slam unless you were to pull them hard to do so.  Bravo!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. I'm glad that you enjoyed the concierge room. I would love to have you and your family stay with us and I hope to see you again.

Summary: I stayed in Marriott Anaheim for a conference at the Convention Centre from 10-15 Dec 2013. The location is very convenient, particularly that I stayed at the Oasis Building which is the nearest block to the Convention Centre. And at the ground floor, there was a Starbucks and Market Place where you could buy food for breakfast and lunch.  The facilities in the room were very minimal. They've got you shampoo, shower gel, hair conditioner, a soap, body lotion. That's all. There was a coffee making, but no spoon for you. A fridge was in a cabinet under the TV set. The bottle of water was not complimentary but cost 3.5US. You can always buy cheaper water at 7-11 or ABC convenience store outside the hotel.  My flight was supposed to be at midnight, while their check-out time was
Manager Response: I am disappointed in hearing about your recent stay at our hotel. I am sending you a private message right now.

Summary: Wonderful! My husband had business at the Convention Center. I had relaxation. Beautiful! Wonderful staff. Good food. I could walk to Downtown Disney to shop. It is a walk away from shopping areas. It is 1 block away from Morton's Steak House.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you had a relaxing stay at our hotel. I certainly hope you choose to stay with us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Award Winning Staff, Excellent Facilities, Clean Rooms
Summary: We stayed here for four nights in early December. We were blown away by the incredible service we received from the employees at this hotel! From the first interaction with the valet, to the cheerful smile of the front desk receptionist (her name was London) and the incredibly friendly bellman (John). Warm, sincere greetings were everywhere.   We checked in later in the evening during a convention and we were given a complimentary upgrade to an executive king. When we got to the room, we noticed that we were on a lower level overlooking the convention center. The room was clean and spacious, and we went to sleep!  The next morning when I visited the lobby to see about moving rooms, I was greeted by a member of the front desk staff who was roaming the lobby checking on guests
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear about your recent experience at our hotel. Our staff is a great point of pride and I am glad they were able to make your stay so pleasant. I certainly look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: We booked our vacation stay at this Marriott because of how close it is to Disney. We had a great stay the room were standard nothing special Two double beds because we had the kids with us. The room was cleaned every day and done well but my compliant is the pillows. Marriott has horrible pillows. Last time we stayed at the Marriott suits down the road the same thing. The comment we received from them last time was to call down to get new ones. So this time I did and they sent me up two more uncomfortable pillows. What can I say Bring your own pillow from home I guess.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest and for your review of our hotel. I'm glad to hear that you had a great stay and hope to see you again.

Summary: Stayed a few times for meetings held at convention center. Nice staff, good service.  Due to the volume of meetings I get this sense that they don't have to "try" for lots of business and I feel that is why they don't have to go the true extra mile for rooms and comfort.  It's nice, but I give it an average rating for the following:  For size it should have more than one on-site restaurant running. Rooms are on the small size even for Marriott.  Really small bathrooms  Concierge lounge on small size --at it's busiest it can be cramped and hard to move around.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I appreciate your feedback. I hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Great place to stay. We walked to Downtown Disney to gain access to the parks everyday and found the walk to be easy, took about 10 minutes. Room was spacious and very neat and clean. Staff were great, Karla was great at check in & check out - a credit to the Marriott and made the welcome and good bye more than the norm. Was great to be located close to several food places plus having a starbucks in the foyer was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Our guests certainly enjoy being so close to Disneyland. I am so glad you felt welcomed will be sure let the staff know of your comments. I hope you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Great for Business Travelers.  Pricey for Families.
Summary: I enjoyed my recent stay during a conference.  My room was clean, quiet and comfortable, despite being placed near the elevator doors due to an alcove that I suspect mitigated noise.  An array of services are available for business travelers and conference attenders, including a FedEx mini-store and business center, as well as other amenities like exercise facilities.  Additionally, this hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland.  If I ever travel to the area on business again, this Marriott will definitely rank high on the list of desirable options.  However, no inexpensive restaurants appear to be within easy reach of the Marriott, and the in-house options are either expensive, unappealing--like a Pizza Hut station--or both.  Families visiting Disneyland, may want to
Manager Response: I am so glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay at our hotel. As far as more affordable restaurants, there is a Denny’s a block away and a couple other reasonable options just north on Katella. Thank you for sharing your thoughts and I hope to see you again.

Summary: I attended a conference here, and was greeted before I even entered the driveway.  Every staff member I met was helpful and pleasant from doormen to front desk to housekeeping.  William, a concierge, was particularly helpful and generous with his time and effort.  My room was comfortable, my bed cozy and bathroom/bedroom very clean.  I appreciated the tea/coffe service available.  The only concern was the sliding glass door, which was difficult to slide and secure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you choose stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights during the week of Thanksgiving. My daughter was a participant in the National America Miss pageant.  Yes, this is an older hotel. But they have done great job with keeping it up to date. We were in room 1710 for our family of 4.  The two double beds & one bath did make it a little challenging after 8 days together. We made it work. Our room had a really cool balcony looking out North, towards Disney. We could watch the fireworks each night @ 9:30pm. As others have mentioned, the service level of the employees is what sets them apart. Sandy checked us in and for the rest of the week, she would call us by name every time we'd see her. Same thing with the concierge lounge. Larry greeted us every morning with a nice "good morning Mr. Smith" Maid service
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will be sure to share your comments with the staff. Thank you for the review and I hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Don't Pay for the Shuttle to Disneyland walk across the street and take one for free!
Summary: First- if you are going to Disneyland you do not need to pay to take the shuttle from the hotel.  Disneyland has a lot right across the street from the hotel that you can walk to and ride for free.  We felt pretty stupid that when talking to someone at the hotel in trying to decide if we were going to drive to Disneyland and park there or take the shuttle that came to the hotel.  It was the same price to drive and park or take the shuttle.  This was our first trip to Disneyland and we are used to Disney World so we didn't know what to expect.  So, we got our car and drove to Disneyland only to find that the parking signs led us pretty much right back to our hotel to park and then take the shuttle over. Why didn't they tell us the parking lot for Disney was right there- pretty
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for your tips to other travelers. I'm delighted to hear that the staff went above and beyond, and were able to provide a pleasant experience at our hotel. I hope to see you again the next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Amazing (though costly) facilities for conferences and business travelers
Summary: I attended a business conference at this hotel, and it is well-built for this purpose.  It has enough sleeping rooms to accommodate large conferences, as well as services such as copying and shipping right in the hotel.  Of course, the cost of these services is rather high, but they have probably found that most are willing to pay for the convenience.  My sleeping room was comfortable and clean.  I may not pick this hotel for leisure travel because I usually prefer something smaller and more unique, but it seems like a good choice for business conferences and travel.
Manager Response: I am so glad you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and appreciate your feedback. I certainly hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Big Brand Hotel, Big Brand Let Down
Summary: It always surprises me, that when you go to a smaller hotel, most things are including in the room rate, like room wifi for example. Here, you are basically paying an in flatted price, for a very basic product, where anything extra you would need to pay a hefty price for.  But that was not my grip with the Hotel, as they setup is well advertised on their web site.  When the manager of the Hotel said they will contact you the next day, you would expect they would contact you. Alas this manager doesn't keep their word.   It all came down to staying guest not being able to buy any drink, after a hotel cut off time. The hotel stopped serving alcohol dead at 12.30am. Most bars stop serving at 2am, but this hotel bar stopped at 12.30am, and it didn't matter that you were a staying
Manager Response: I am regret to hear about your negative experience at our hotel. I am sending you a private message right now.

Summary: Wonderful staff experience and convenient to walk or shuttle to Disneyland  Would stay again if traveling for business at the convention center or with family and going to Disneyland again.  Could see fireworks for Disney facing room balcony.
Manager Response: I am very happy to hear that you had such a wonderful stay at our hotel. Being able to see the fireworks from the comfort of your room must have been a delight. Thank you and I look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We had a great time at the Marriott but this time around the cleanliness of the room left us wanting.  Although the room was next to the elevator on a high floor and check-in was practically flawless, the room cleanliness was not up to our expectations.  In the photos here from our stay October 11-13th, I wanted to make sure they were posted today.  Before we get to that, the check-in process was amazing.  We were checked in swiftly and received our package deal items quickly ($200 gift cards to Disneyland and free shuttle passes).  The room was on a high floor near the elevator, which was nice.  The room itself was spacious and was a handicap room.  I didn't mind having a handheld shower and the space in the room because it was made for wheelchairs.  The downfall came upon
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I truly regret the condition of your room when you arrived. If this happens next time, please do not hesitate to call the front desk and let them know so that they can remedy the situation. I appreciate you coming back to our hotel and certainly hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay with Outstanding Service From Staff
Summary: Service was outstanding by this Marriott staff from the time I arrived.  You can't ask for a better location if you are visiting for the Convention Center and Disneyland is a short hike or ride away.  Excellent restaurants within walking distance.  Rooms were small but clean, the staff made up for it by providing the best service.  They could never do enough for you.  I stayed here five days and this was my second stay at this hotel.  My first stay 4 years ago was just as good and I had four other choices for this trip, but chose to come back to this property.  It was a great decision!
Manager Response: I am so glad you chose to stay with us again. Our staff is definitely a point of pride at our hotel and I am happy to hear that you had such a great experience. We certainly look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: terrible, thanks for ruining our vacation
Summary: the clerk at the check in didn't even welcome us, it was a cold procedure and it was by far the worst experience I ever had. Even some Motels make one more welcome. However it was convention time and maybe the staff was just stressed.   The convention time may also be the reason that the room was so expensive, One can get a 5+ hotel room for the price we paid. Anyway the room itself was clean, but very small. Very small was also the bathroom and had even no fan. We got room 711. Horrible was the constant noise of a running aircraft engine. Below our room was some kind of gigantic A/C power unit. A real good night sleep? No way.   And the door to the balcony could not be locked and due to the design of the balconies we felt not really safe to let our belongings in the hotel room,
Manager Response: I'm very disappointed to hear this and am sending you a private message now.  Thanks you for bringing this to my attention.

Summary: A last minute decision my husband & I were able to stay at this beautiful hotel. Friendly & helpful staff. The room looked great & we were able to request tooth brushes & tooth paste since we weren't planning on staying in Anaheim over night. Had room service for breakfast & everything not only looked good but tasted yummy. We will book in advanced for next Blizzcon :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We take great pride in our staff and I'm delighted to hear that your impromptu stay was such a pleasant experience.  I look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Had one night here. The rooms were great and hotel very nice, but the noise from the roof fan for the main cooling system was really loud at night. I did not notice during the day, but it was terrible on the night I was there. Other than this great staff, nice food and good overall. I had a view over the city on the 9th floor.
Manager Response: I appreciate your feedback. I'm glad you were able to enjoy the view of our beautiful city. I do apologize for the noise and hope it wasn't overly disrupting. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: After reading some of the previous reviews I was nervous about staying here.  We stayed with our 4 year old for a Disneyland trip. I've been a Marriott rewards elite member for a long time and generally know what to expect from a Marriott hotel. We were in an Exec Double in the Main Tower on the 12th floor overlooking the pool.  The Exec rooms are a bit larger than the standard. The room was ready when we arrived and was clean.  There was a fridge, but no microwave. It was decorated like any standard Marriott room. The bathroom was SMALL and the tub/shower could be updated, but overall it was fine.   It's not the JW...so don't expect it to be. The lobby was nice.   The main reason I gave 5 stars was the service.  It was the best service I have received at any Marriott EVER.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  I'm so glad that you found our service to be the best you've received EVER!  We pride ourselves in taking care of our guests.  We hope to see you on your next Disney vacation and can't wait to hear what your daughter has to say again.

Summary: The Marriott Anaheim is more of a convention centre than a resort. I was there attending a conference and was very impressed with the conference facilities. The residences were well appointed, and the outlets like Star bucks and a gift shop are a hit. The bar has an excellent collection of wines and spirits. The rooms are very well maintained and appointed. The "naturally flavoured" water they keep for their guests are a hit. The restaurant offers an excellent breakfast spread - purely continental breakfast with well appointed staff that take excellent care of your needs. Overall a good experience - could have more of a resort like setting, being situated bang across the street from Disneys. The elevators need heavy overhaul.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in Anaheim and for all of your tips to other travelers.  We hope you'l be back again.

Summary: I've stayed at the Anaheim Marriott quite a few times over the years even dating back to high school when I was here for a Key Club International convention in the 1970's. It is a great hotel for conventions and a very good hotel for families heading to Disneyland when there are not conventions on.  I say for families when there are not conventions on, because you can get great rates and the hotel tends to be quiet. When there is a major convention going on, it is just too busy.  Nice onsite restaurants, a decent pool area and a well trained staff are all pluses here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal guest all these decades, we really appreciate it.  We look forward to serving you for the next few decades!

Summary: I stayed here for one night while attending a conference at the Marriott. As a Marriott gold member I was upgraded to the concierge floor and felt very welcomed when I checked in at the front desk. I have stayed several times at the Hilton across the street from the Marriott ( I am a diamond hilton member) and have never felt as welcomed at the Hilton. In-room refrigerator and robes were a nice touch. Concierge Lounge served a hot breakfast and wonderful evening snacks.Clean comfortable room. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: I'm glad that you felt so welcome at our location, we take pride in our service.  Thank you for your kind comments and I hope to have you back to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Ok stay but staff went above and beyond
Summary: The rooms here are standard Marriott rooms, but the staff addressed me by name and my elite membership status.  Also, when I called ahead for valet, the car was there promptly...in the timeframe of going down the elevator.  Food at the restaurant was 'ok'.  Close to Convention Center and Disneyland.
Manager Response: I'm delighted that our staff exceeded your expectations and that you chose our location for your stay.  Thank you.  I hope you'll be staying with us again.

Summary: We stayed in the Oasis Tower, and were not very happy with our room.  It was quite small.  The balcony had plant pots with no plants - just a dumping spot for cigarette butts!! The last time we were here I remember the rooms in the main tower to be larger.  The Oasis Tower is very dated, and the elevators are very slow.  The common areas are drab and dull.  We had trouble with our TV and called.  We were told that an engineer would come, but no one ever did.  The TV finally corrected itself.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  I'm sending you a private message.

Summary Heading: Great location nice hotel for area
Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Marriott while visiting Disneyland. It was a great location and great price. Hotel isn't the nicest place I've ever stayed but it was clean pretty quiet considering location and was a great price! Shuttle comes right to the door to take you to Disney!
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for your Disney trip.  We do have a remodel scheduled in the future.  I hope you'll stay with us again, thank you!

Summary: Incredible hotel staff. Hotel room was spacious and really loved the bed. I requested a high floor received exactly what I asked. I love the Marriott hotel chain. Excellent restaurants and pool area. Awesome hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, we really appreciate you booking your stay with us.  We're glad to have delighted you with exactly what you asked for.  I hope you'll be back to see us again.

Summary: Stay across the street at the Hilton.  It's a lot nicer.  Marriott rooms old and need updating.  I usually stay in Marriotts, but this one I would avoid.  I stayed here 10 years ago and I don't think they've updated their rooms.
Manager Response: We appreciate that you booked your stay with us.  Thanks for the feedback, we do have remodeling plans in the future and hope you will come by and give us another shot.

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly and the hotel is great. The lobby was particularly nice.  Wish parking wasn't so pricey but that is that is the way it goes for the area. Conveniently located near Disneyland and would stay here again for our next visit.
Manager Response: I'm so glad that you found the hotel great.  We pride ourselves on our friendly staff.  Thanks for your review and for staying with us.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: We came to Anaheim for a family and friends vacation. The Marriott didn't disappoint and is still a great place to stay. Very comfortable, good restaurant and bar, nice pool area and great customer service. I recommend this hotel and we will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your family & friends vacation.  I really appreciate your comments and hope you'll be back to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Kids on break and needed two rooms
Summary: Great hotel, both rooms connecting and same price as one Disney hotel room.   Both rooms updated, clean and spacious.  Beds comfortable and decor very nice.   Looked over the pool.  Took cab each day to Disney.  Overall very pleased with rooms and entire hotel. Friendly at check in.  Friendly at breakfast and very helpful valet.  Would recommend for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your recommendation.  I'm glad that you and the family enjoyed yourselves.

Summary: I traveled with my 4 and 10 year olds during this trip and treated them to a visit to Disneyland.  As we checked in the Tania at the front desk noticed I was traveling with children and suggested a room on third floor instead of a floor room for safety precautions.  My room was clean and equipped with all we needed for a fun stay.  The kids especially liked the big screen TV and watching the Disney Channel during the evening.  We also took time to enjoy the large pool area.  The kids enjoyed playing in the 2-3 feet area and the pool toys Marriott provided for guest to use made it more fun.  I treated myself to some time in the Jacuzzi and onsite Starbucks :).  The shuttle service to Disneyland in front of the Hotel made it convenient to go/come from Disneyland without dealing
Manager Response: I'm excited to hear about your relaxing family getaway.  Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  I hope you'll stay with us again.

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is an excellent business hotel. The in-house service is awesome, always friendly and very nice. Only the WLAN connection is pretty dependent on where in the hotel you are, lobby is actually the best place. The preparation of breakfast and lunch was always on time and very excellent with a good amount of different choices throughout the week.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing that you feel we're an excellent business hotel.  I'm so glad that we could make your stay a good one.  I hope you'll stay with us again.

Summary: The hotel service was really nice, prompt and helpful. We stayed 5 nights in in a 2 double-bed room. The room was on the smaller size. The bathroom was tiny. We stayed in room 603; and it was facing air conditioning vents, so it was pretty laud. You could not enjoy the balcony at all. Once you open the patio doors, the noise was just way too loud to even talk in the room, not mentioning sitting outside and enjoying the view. Disneyland is 2 blocks away. The hotel had a nice cafe, I think it was called Cafe Del Sol. It served good breakfast. Dinner options were not great, so we were eating in Hilton across the square, which has a nice restaurant (the Mix). Also, the Garden Walk was 5 min away and it has PF Changs if you like Chinese food. There were other restaurants around, but
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experiences.  Other travelers will surely like your tips.  I'm glad you enjoyed your breakfast at Cafe del Sol.  I wish you would have been able to enjoy your balcony more.  Again, thank you.

Summary: The hotel is located in close proximity to Disneyland and has a great conference center inside the hotel. The highlight for me was that the catering provided for the conference was not the typical "meat smothered in sauce", but was pretty healthy "California cuisine", including lots of salads and fish. This is a welcome change as this is my 6th conference this year. What a differentiator!  Rooms are nice good solid Marriott rooms, Beds are comfortable and the amenities are all nice.   Hotel seems to be a great choice for conferences, or if you are looking to use your Marriott points to visit Disney, this would make a good location to base yourself.
Manager Response: I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed our menu for your conference.  We love to provide healthy eating options for our guests.  Thank you for staying with us and for telling us about your stay.

Summary: Was there earlier this month for a work meeting.  I arrived from the east coast cranky and tired.  When I checked in, my company had neglected to use my Marriott Gold Rewards info so I was stuck with two beds for just me.  I get my keys and get to my room and the key does not work.  I am so aggravated that I snapped at the security guy that came to help.  I was promptly put into my place when he showed me that I was trying to get into the wrong room!!  I was so embarrassed, but he was so nice to me.  I apologized profusely and told him I was just having one of those days.  I left the room to go get dinner and when I returned, the staff had left me a bottle of wine and a snack tray with a sweet note, saying that the one good thing about having one of the days is that they all
Manager Response: I loved reading about your experience.  Travel can definitely make us weary and cranky but I'm delighted that we were able to give you a happy ending to your day.  I hope you'll come back and stay with us again.  Thank you for everything.

Summary: A note of thanks to Marriott. Stayed here for a conference and what a great place to stay! This hotel is immaculately kept up and the front desk/concierge, technical support staff, and restaurant wait staff were fantastic.  Kudos are MUCH DESERVED to the housekeeping staff.  The room itself was wonderful.  It was SO WELL CLEANED and had a VERY COMFORTABLE BED.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: THANK YOU!  I'm so glad you had such an outstanding stay.  I'll be sure to let the housekeeping staff know how you feel.  Thanks again and I hope you'll be back.

Summary: the room was way to small for the people we had ad the sofa bed was so hard and uncomfortable the person sleeping there woke up with a stiff neck and it made his vacation terrible because he hurt so bad.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent chain next door to Orange County Convention center.  The staff - without exception - is well trained and treats you like a person that matters.  The hotel is older but in good shape. All you could ask for in a convention location.  The people do make the difference.
Manager Response: Wow, thanks for the great comments about the staff, it's definitely something we pride ourselves on.  I hope you'll come back and stay with us again.

Summary: The room size was barely enough for three. It is about the only downside. Everything else were as expected at a Marriott.  The ART bus stop to Disney is just outside the hotel. The bus arrives there every 20 minutes(top of the hour, at 20 past and 40 past).  The hotel set up Wii game console with few controllers for the kids during the weekend (Columbus Day). The kids were occupied and parents just sit and relax next to them.
Manager Response: I'm glad that  you enjoyed your stay with us for your Disney vacation.  I wish you had found our room size good for your needs, but glad that you were still satisfied.  I hope the kids had fun playing with the Wii.

Summary: The EN event I was attending was held at the Marriott and I have to say...wow. Great rooms, very friendly staff and room to move around. I didn't stay in the hotel, but I'm sure glad that I got to see what the main floor was like. Thanks Marriott for having us meet there :) See you again.
Manager Response: Thank YOU for the wonderful comments, I'm so glad that you loved the conference rooms.  Next time I hope you can stay with us.

Summary Heading: Good choice if you're attending a convention in Anaheim
Summary: Location is very good: Right next door to the convention center in Anaheim. If you are not there for business, it only taks 15 minutes to walk to Disneyland.  Hotel has a very good standard, although withou the "wow factor". Rooms are large and nice. Standard is good. Employees friendly and professional.  Maybe not the newest hotel in the neighborhood, but delivers good value.  I especially liked the fact tht the gym is large with modern equipment.
Manager Response: I'm glad you enjoyed our gym, location, and friendly service.  I hope you'll stay with us again, thank you.

Summary: The sleeping rooms are spacious.  This hotel is obviously used to hosting conferences which is why I was here.  Valet staff and front desk staff were helpful and friendly.  Internet in the room is expensive.
Manager Response: I'm very happy that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and attentive customer service. While we are a very popular hotel for business and conference travellers, I would love to invite you back if you ever plan a vacation to Disneyland. We are very conveniently located within walking distance to the park, and some of our rooms on the top floors have wonderful views of the fireworks show every night. Thank you for sharing your review.  - Dan

Summary: Very well located: besides Ananheim's Convention Center and about 2 blocks from Disneyland. Good facilities and accomodations. The staff is extremelly courteous. There are many good restaurants in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. I'm happy that our convenient  proximity to the Convention Center and Disneyland , paired with our wonderful staff and well-appointed rooms, made your stay in Southern California a great one. I hope we can welcome you back.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Rooms OK but got charged twice
Summary: We stayed there for 3 nights from 22-24 Sept. I booked and paid for 3 rooms for my family through Hotelclub.com. The hotel was quite old, but well maintained. The rooms are OK, I'm not really a complainer. The hotel is close to Disneyland which is great. On checkout, the desk told me there were no other incidental charges.   Two days after we left I found via online banking that there has been a charge of equiv of AUD $674 on my Amex by the hotel, which I knew would be a mistake as the rooms were prepaid. They seemed to have mistakenly charged me for one of the rooms.   The only contact email given to me by the Marriott call center was of the Director of Room Operations of the hotel. I promptly sent an email to him, asking him to refer to the appropriate area, followed by
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, and I apologize for the confusion surrounding this situation. We previously attempted to contact you by phone but were not successful. We do have your email address though so we will be contacting you again soon. I'm glad that you had a pleasant stay with us otherwise, and I look forward to making up for the extenuating issues.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Five great days and nights at this hotel
Summary: My entire family was here for a convention and a visit to Disneyland and Knox Berry Farm.  It was a great trip.  My four grandchildren had a wonderful time. The place was very clean, the staff was freindlya and helpful;  I had not one complaint. Comfortable beds, great cleaning service; nice eating...the pool was wonderful.  Worth the money.  Kids were welcome.
Manager Response: I'm very happy that you had a wonderful family vacation with us. Our combination of well-appointed rooms, great amenities, and convenient proximity to the best attractions in Orange County make us a popular choice among business and vacationers alike. I'm delighted that we met all our expectations during your stay, and I hope we can welcome you back.  - Dan

Summary: I stayed at the Marriott Anaheim for a conference.  I used SuperShuttles to get to and from LAX, and they were wonderful.    Had to wait about 10 minutes before I could check in to the hotel.  There were 3 hotel employees at the reception desk but they all seemed occupied with the 1 person who was ahead of me in line.  Oh well.  I was placed on the 3rd floor, which is a mix of hotel rooms and meeting rooms.  My room was paid by the conference organizers, so I suspect that's why I was on this "special floor" with a very special view of a retaining wall! Luckily though, I wasn't in my room much, and the room itself was very spacious and clean.  I was never disturbed by any noises and slept well in the comfortable bed.  My TV didn't work when I first checked in but a technician
Manager Response: I'm happy that you had a pleasant stay during your conference, but I'm sorry that we couldn't give you a room with a better view. We have some beautiful rooms with balcony views of the Disneyland fireworks every night, so I hope you can enjoy that on a future visit. Thank you for your patience with check in and your TV repair, and I'm happy that you took advantage of Cafe del Sol and the food trucks when our other dining options were crowded. We appreciate your feedback and would love to welcome you back in the future.  - Dan

Summary: Here for a convention otherwise I would not pay this price for what you get! Hotel rooms clean & functional but otherwise small, noisey & basic. Reception, bar area is minimalist. Pool is dirty & very disappointing. Location though is good with lots near by.
Manager Response: I'm glad that you had a convenient stay with us, but I'm sorry to hear that you did not enjoy our attentive customer service and well-appointed facilities which the majority of our guests are very happy with. However, we aim to please all of our guests no matter what so I appreciate your feedback.  - Dan

Summary: Had a lovely stay at this hotel,but on the day before we were due to leave someone pooped in the pool a member of staff was alterted another member came to have a look but nothing was done. This spoilt our last day as we wouldn't swim in the pool for fear of picking up bacteria but others were swimming because they were oblivious as to what had been found the day before. We feel more should have been done to clean the pool which unfortunately did not happen
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience.  Would you please message us and let us know the date of the incident that you're speaking of?  It would be especially helpful if you could let us know who you spoke with as well.  When a guest notifies a staff member of such an incident the pool is closed down, cleaned, and then inspected before it's reopened.  Thank you so much!

Summary: I guess being a Disney hotel they don't see the need to renovate, but we were very surprised at how old the rooms in this hotel are.  The rooms were clean, but when they are this old, they just don't feel that clean or fresh.  Apart from this, the hotel location is good, well serviced by transport for a family holiday to Disney (and certainly a lot cheaper than the Disney hotels).  Staff in the cafe and front desk were good, but not up to the standard experienced at other Marriott properties on the same trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm glad you had a convenient stay with us for your Disneyland vacation. We hope to have guest room renovations done by early 2014, so I hope you can come visit us again once they are complete.  - Dan

Summary: They were replacing the beds/frames while I was there blocking the hall.  I was given a room whose view was that of a garbage dumpster and employee smoking area.  I stay in Marriott's every opportunity I can ..... although I was disappointed by this one.  The food was above average as was the service.  I'm scheduled to return there in December and look forward to a better stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review of your previous stay with us. We were in the midst of refreshing our guest rooms at the time, and I apologize for the inconvenience. This is not typical, and I'm very happy that you will be returning so we can show you the normal guest experience. Please request a room with a better view and we will do everything we can to accommodate your request.  - Dan

Summary: I stayed here for a conference and the hotel was comfortable and clean. It was also nice to stay in a high rise hotel, as the view is particularly stunning. The only downside is that they do not have wifi in the room unless you pay for it. There is wifi in the common area, but who wants to sit on their laptop in the midst of hustle and bustle?
Manager Response: I'm very happy to hear that you enjoyed the convenience, comfort, and cleanliness of our hotel. Likewise, I'm glad that you enjoyed our great Anaheim views, and I hope you were able to see the Disneyland fireworks show from your balcony. Thank you for sharing your review, and we look forward to hosting you again.  - Dan

Summary: Have stayed in the marriott Anaheim a few times. I was with with a large group for a convention at the ACC. This hotel sits near the entrance and has great facilities. Well suited for business or for Disney ( which we went too!) good value for money with courteous staff.  The rooms are very comfortable and well styled. No complaints will be returning next January.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, and I'm delighted that we can count you as a loyal guest. Our convenient location near the convention center and Disneyland make us a perfect hotel for those who want a taste of the amusement park while on a business trip. Please let us know if there is anything we can help you with when you come back to see us in January.  - Dan

Summary: We stayed here two years ago and were so impressed with this hotel that we had to stay here again when visiting the Disney parks this past week. The location is conveniently located within walking distance of numerous restaurants and shops as well as offering several great dining options within. The staff is friendly and helpful and rooms are clean and spacious.
Manager Response: I'm very happy that we could host you again for your Disneyland vacation. I'm glad you appreciated our convenient proximity to the amusement park, combined with our attentive staff and attractive amenities. I hope we can welcome you back on your next trip.  - Dan

Summary: We were here for 2 nights during the NAMM show earlier this year. Obviously the proximity to the convention center is brilliant, but this really is a good hotel. Despite such a huge event being on with a fully booked hotel, the service was fantastic! Our room was very comfortable with a very large balcony overlooking the pool area, and was clean with a great comfy bed.  Room service was a standout, and very reasonably priced. We ended up ordering a few room service meals as it was the easiest thing to do whilst the convention was on, and the quality actually surprised us.....much better than many 5 star hotels I've stayed at. We'll definitely be back for the next NAMM show!
Manager Response: NAMM is one of our favorite events of the year, so I'm delighted that you were able to enjoy it with us. Our wonderful staff is always excited to make sure our guests have a convenient and comfortable stay, and I'm happy to hear that our room service impressed you. We look forward to spending the next NAMM show with you.  - Dan

Summary: We stayed for two weeks august 2013 absolutely fantastic brilliant cleanliness brilliant service very friendly staff would definately go back. We have unfortunately had to book the clarion anaheim next year due to next years hols not yet been loaded and wanted to get somewhere booked but will definately be back. The staff were also fantastic in helping us solve a problem with our bank card.
Manager Response: I'm so happy that you had a wonderful stay with us. We are very proud of our staff, who often go above and beyond their duties to make sure our guests feel at home. I'm sorry to hear that you will not be able to return next year, but we certainly hope we can welcome you again at some point soon.  - Dan

Summary Heading: A little outdated but great customer service
Summary: The conference facilities, bathrooms in the guest rooms were outdated. I also had some noise issues-could hear music from the bar in my room on the 9th floor. But the busier service was excellent, especially the concierge staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm happy to hear that our staff made a great impression on you, and I hope we can welcome you back on a future visit to Anaheim.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Convention Hotel Much Better than Expected
Summary: I attended a conference here earlier in the month and truly enjoyed the service.  The hotel is very average but what makes up for the hundreds of people staying there is the service.  Lovely concierge lounge (maybe just a little too small for a convention hotel) has wonderful staff.  My check-in experience was great.  The gentleman assisting me took extra time to cover the features in the hotel and walked me and my colleague to the elevator.  I also have to say I hosted a small lunch in their main restaurant and the server was a gem.  He kept referring to us as "my ladies."  He anticipated needs and was a real joy.  Thank you.
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear that our wonderful staff made such a great impression on you. We understand that top-notch customer service is of the utmost importance for a hotel of our size, and I'm very happy to hear that you experienced this during your stay. I hope we can welcome you back again on a future visit to Anaheim.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Excellent location central to many venues.
Summary: A bit surprised at first by room in older wing/building but staff was helpful in changing room to more acceptable one. Restaurants on site a bit pricey but paying for convenience of dining in hotel. Parking rates high. Did not use pool but seemed quite nice. Overall would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation. I'm glad that our dedicated staff could provide you with a room to your liking, and I'm happy that you had a great stay with us overall. I hope that you can take advantage of more of our great amenities like our spa area on your next visit.  - Dan

Summary: This is a great location right across from the convention center and you can walk to Disney. The hotel is very and clean.The service is very good also. The rooms were very nice but the view from our room looked out to a roof top.
Manager Response: I'm very glad that you had a comfortable and convenient stay with us, and that our staff provided you with excellent service. I'm sorry to hear that we could not give you a room with a better view. If you stay with us again, please request a room with a view of Disneyland so you can experience the fireworks show from your balcony every night. Thank you for your great review and feedback.  - Dan

Summary: I come to visit this hotel because of the excellent indoor pool. and they has the best breakfast bar for the kids and kids can eat for free.if you can stay on the high floor , you will be able to see Disney firework.
Manager Response: I'm very happy that you appreciate all the wonderful amenities that we have to offer, and I'm glad you had a great stay with us. Our guests love to see the Disneyland fireworks shows every night from their balconies, and I'm delighted that you and your kids enjoyed that. Thank you for sharing your review, and we hope you will come back soon for more great breakfasts with us.  - Dan

Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights and 5 days for a national conference.  It served as the host hotel and the nearby convention center was where our classes were at. The hotel is very closely situated next to the convention center.  The first thing that impressed me was the customer service I was shown throughout my stay; every  employee had a smile and asked how I was doing, even if I was just walking down a hallway. I ate most of my meals in the hotel and everyone was just amazingly friendly. The staff should be congratulated on providing superior customer service at this facility.  Speaking of meals, the breakfast buffet is stellar as far as the amount and quality of food they offer. But the price is expensive.  This is my first time to California, and maybe that's normal, but $24
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a thorough review. I'm delighted to hear that our wonderful staff impressed you at every turn. Likewise, I'm very pleased that you enjoyed our well-appointed rooms and various dining options throughout your stay. I hope we can be your home away from home again on a future business trip.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Good hotel, just a bit too far from the parks
Summary: We weren't able to get into one of the Disney hotels over the Labor Day long weekend, so we stayed at the Marriott.  The hotel is very close to the convention center, but it's quite a long walk to the parks if it's hot or humid out.  We took the ART buses a lot!  The hotel itself was quite good.  Housekeeping was quite late one day - not until after 4:00.
Manager Response: I'm happy that you had a great stay with us, and I hope Disneyland wasn't too crowded during your visit. The walk is about 15-20 minutes, but I'm glad that you took the convenient ART busses from our hotel. I'm sorry to hear that housekeeping was late one day, and I appreciate your patience. Thank you for sharing your review.  - Dan

Summary: There were lots of options in our Disney area stay and we selected this Marriott out of the four in the immediate area.  Enjoyed the clean room suites.  Check-in was quick and efficient.  Got a steal of deal on two separate rooms for our two families.  The free internet in the bar area was greatly appreciated and Kellie made the browsing most relaxing.  Thanks and we will definately put this at the top of the list on our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Anaheim Marriott, and we can't wait to welcome you back. I'm very happy that we could accommodate your entire party at a great rate, and I'm even happier that you had a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for sharing your review.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Ok hotel but watch your credit card bill on check out!
Summary: Enjoyed staying two nights at the Marriott Anaheim. Has all the standard Marriott facilities and an outstanding gym. Very convenient location for Disney with a $5 shuttle running right out the front. Staff were lovely and friendly at the reception and concierge desk. My biggest gripe with this place is the charges that they put on your credit card without authorisation. This is much more than the standard room deposit. I was left with seven line items charged to my card (none of which were ours). We questioned the staff and they said that someone had checked out of our hotel room by mistake and the charges would disappear in a few days!! Unbelievable and a very confusing and unexpected start to our travels in the US. Surely this isn't allowed? I would never have expected this in
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm happy that you enjoyed our great customer service and comfortable accommodations, but I'm dismayed to hear about the mistaken charges on your bill. I am writing you a private message now to follow up and ensure that you do not pay them.  - Dan

Summary: The Marriott Anaheim is an excellent hotel for business conferences as well as family vacations to Disneyland for those willing to pay big $$$$ for lodging.  The staff is very friendly in this large hotel.  Rooms are nicely furnished.  The hotel has several restaurants onsite as well as a Starbucks.  Several restaurants are located within walking distance or a short taxi ride.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great review. We are popular with business travelers and Disneyland vacationers alike because of our fantastic location and well-appointed accommodations. Our rates are often cheaper than other Disneyland resort hotels as well! I'm very happy that you had a great stay and we look forward to welcoming you back.  - Dan

Summary: Brought my family for the first time to USA and stayed at Marriot, Anaheim from 23/8-28/8. After seeing many Hollywood movies most of my family members were very apprehensive about the US. Staying at Marriot really help them adjust to the local lifestyle and feel relax again. Service was friendly especially those at level 18 Concierge rooms, thank you guys. Efficient service from Hotel to ART. Kids had a good time at Disneyland and Universal studios, we preferred the Blue Whale watch and the Redwood Forest.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your first say in the USA, I'm glad you and your family had a good time.  Hollywood does sensationalize things a bit as you found out!  I hope you'll come again.

Summary: The Marriott in Anaheim is a three star hotel.  Although the location is wonderful if you are planning a visit to the convention center, the accommodations are sub-par.  The a/c units in the room don't cool your room properly, the pillows are flat, and my towels were dirty.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Although I'm happy that you appreciated our convenient location in Anaheim, I'm dismayed to hear about your discomfort in your room. The issues that you experienced are not typical for our guests, so I am writing you a private message so I can personally follow up.  - Dan

Summary: Stayed here with my hubby, two kids and parents. We had two rooms on the 9th floor overlooking the pool with a balcony.   Check in was smooth with Sandy being very helpful.  We quickly got to our rooms which were very clean although a tad small with 4 suitcases and a roll away bed. We were pleased with our overall stay with all staff being very helpful and polite and the general areas and appearance of the hotel being clean and spacious.  We always felt safe and there were many great restaurants within walking distance. Starbucks was good to have on site alongside the hotel shop which stocked trinkets and essentials.  Hotel bar was nice with staff being chatty and helpful. The only gripe I had was the day before we were due to leave, we planned a relaxing pool day.  However on
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback, I'm glad you had a great, relaxing stay.  I'd love to know what day you were at the pool so that I may look into it.  Our policy is to immediately shut down the pool and shock treat it until it is deemed safe and ready to be opened for our guests' use again by a certified inspector in these cases.  Once again, thank you and I hope you'll visit us again.

Summary: 1st we had a room by the parking area but they quickly moved us to another tower where we had stayed last time.  It was very quiet after staying at the Hilton across the way last time & they were having a cheer leading competition and it was very noisy! At the Marriott it is alway quiet!
Manager Response: I'm very happy that we could welcome you back to Anaheim Marriott. It's great to hear that we were able to give you a room that you previously enjoyed, and I'm glad that you had another peaceful and relaxing stay.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.  - Dan

Summary: My 13 year old son and myself stayed here for 12 nights. As others have said, the hotel was extremely busy but we only noticed noise from other guests on one of the nights. The room was comfy, although a little lacking in storage (3 dresser drawers and a bedside cabinet). The housekeeping team kept it spotless for us.  Despite the small size of the pool and volume of guests, we always managed to find a lounger and the complimentary towels were well stocked.   The on site shop was stocked with a nice range of products which were reasonably priced. It also had long opening hours.  As a single mum, I felt safe in the area and in the hotel itself. I would not hesitate to recommend the hotel to others in the same position.   The downsides were the additional costs for wi-fi and
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear that you felt comfortable and safe during your stay with us, and I really appreciate your recommendation. I'm also happy that you enjoyed hanging out by the pool on such a busy weekend. You are correct that we do not have control over parking and WiFi prices, so thank you for your understanding. I hope we can host you again on a future trip to Southern California.  - Dan

Summary: The best thing we can say about this hotel is the proximity to Disneyland.  As it holds up to the brand Marriott, it is not on par.  Room was not cleaned properly.  We found empty bottles of wine under the beds, along with socks and garbage as it appeared this was not checked nor vacuumed.  Air conditioning did not work well.  Parking costs are un-exceptable, over $25 per day.  This is where they make up the difference in their room rate.  Pool area was messy.  Beds were not very comfortable.  Very lumpy and hard.  As an elite member we have come to expect more from Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. Your feedback is very important to me, so I am sending you a private message to learn more and make sure that future guests do not have the same experience.  - Dan

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this Marriott when attending an event in the Anaheim convention center.  I booked via expedia since the rate included parking and wifi (the same rate on all other sites was room only).  On arrival, self parking was easy and given that the convention had a huge attendance and the hotel was sold out I was pleased to find a space almost immediately and within a short walk to the elevator.  When I arrived at check in there were a few people waiting in line so the concierge guy told me to use the premium line which is reserved for club patrons (which I'm currently not a member of or at least don't hold much status with the Marriott brand).  My check in was smooth, the staff were really friendly and efficient.  My room was a city view room, balcony was
Manager Response: I'm very happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us, and I'm glad that we could quickly check you in during such a busy weekend. Becoming a Marriott Rewards member is free and a great way to experience many extra perks such as priority check-in at thousands of our partner hotels worldwide. Thank you for the great review, and I hope we can host you again on a future visit to Southern California.  - Dan

Summary: Anaheim Marriott is a great option for business travelers attending conferences at the Anaheim Convention Center. Accommodating staff, great location to restaurants and Disney! The pool could use an update, the rooms are spacious and the beds are ok!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are popular with business travelers who want to pair convenience and comfort with accessibility to the popular attractions in the area. I'm very happy that you had a great stay, and I hope we can host you again on your next visit.  - Dan

Summary: Except for the valets and bellmen at the front door being very officious and standing there with their hands out for every little thing it was a good place to stay. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The food in the restaurant and wine bar was O.K. Unable to catch our shuttle to the airport right at the front door and had to walk a block to catch it or pay the bellmen to drag it out. I would stay here again though. Now I know what to expect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, and thank you for sharing your feedback about the valets and bellmen. We want our guests to feel like our staff is always ready to assist them as needed without smothering them, so I will pass your comments on to the team. I'm glad that you had a nice stay with us, and I hope you return for a future visit.

Summary: I stayed for 7 nights in August for a conference.  The entire hotel staff was amazing, very personable and helpful. The room was clean and quiet. The hotel is right next to the convention center for easy access.  The wireless internet service was slow but serviceable. I would stay at this hotel again.
