Manager Response: Customer service is one of our highest priorities, so I'm happy to hear that our staff delivered during your week-long stay with us. Thank you for your great review and feedback, and I hope that we can serve you again on a future business trip.  - Dan

Summary: Hotel was convenient to Disneyland. There's a Pizza Hut (open late in the evening) that sells a great fruit cup and a Starbucks open in the morning with a small kiosk for breakfast items. The hotel's breakfast restaurant was pricey. For those needing gluten free, the hotel's breakfast was adequate (no issues). There's also a California Pizza Kitchen nearby that provides gluten free menu items. Also, at Downtown Disney, Naple's Restaurant had gluten free menu with a fabulous authentic Italian Minestrone soup. High recommend Naple's! It's also about 15 min. drive to South Coast Plaza for those who want to do some serious shopping! So, great hotel overall. The shuttle into Disneyland was very convenient as well!
Manager Response: I'm very pleased to hear that you had a good stay with us for your family vacation to Disneyland. Likewise, I really appreciate that you added detailed gluten-free dining tips to your TripAdvisor review. Thank you for sharing your feedback, and I hope that we can host you again in the future.  - Dan

Summary: This is by far the best hotel in the Disney area without actually being a Disney property. The staff is all very friendly and helpful. The rooms are very nice! We had a suite and they are a wonderful size for a family of 3 or more!! The halls were quiet at night, and the pool was very large with both shade and non shaded areas. We stayed at the Hilton last year and this property beats it by a mile! There are places to eat in the hotel as well as a Starbucks. It is only a 15 minute walk to Disney but there is also a shuttle that will take you! Highly recommend this place for its value, location, and all it offers!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. Many of our guests are surprised that we are so family friendly despite being next to the convention center. I'm glad that our spacious suites and convenience to Disneyland made your family vacation a winner.  - Dan

Summary: I stayed here for three nights over the Labor Day weekend when I was running in the Disney 10k and half marathon on Saturday and Sunday.   All the employees I interacted with were nice and helpful.   There is a Starbucks on site (the line gets long) and a Pizza Hut. The hotel is right next to the Hilton which gives additional food options.   We took the ART bus to the races and to the parks a couple of times. Busses are very frequent. We also walked to the Disneyland Hotel (for the race expo and starting point of the races) and to the parks. It's about a 15-20 minute walk to either place (note: to get to the DLH, go via the Anaheim Convention Center, not through Downtown Disney).  The room is nice and has comfortable beds. It has VERY few outlets. The fixtures in the bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and congratulations on competing in the Disney Marathon! I'm happy that you enjoyed your stay with us, from our great value to our convenient location. However, I'm sorry to hear that you did not find the fridge in your room. Every room is equipped with one, so please contact the front desk if you cannot find it on a future visit.  You will be happy to know that we are beginning a complete "room refresh" for all our guest rooms. New mattresses and bed bases will be introduced in the next few months, with complete room-design overhauls scheduled for next summer. I hope you will stay with us again once they are complete.  - Dan

Summary: The Anaheim Marriott is a great option. I attended the D23 Expo last month. The hotel is right next door to the Convention Center. The staff members that I dealt with were very friendly and welcoming from the valet, the desk clerk, the bell captain, from the time I checked in to the time I checked out. I would definitely stay there again. I had an executive oversize room with a balcony. It is walking distance to Disneyland, the Gardenwalk. There is a decent IHOP less than a block away if you have to be somewhere before the hotel restaurant opens. I tried the restaurant for breakfast during my stay. The buffet was decent. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful recommendation on TripAdvisor. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and that our entire staff made you feel welcome during your stay. Thank you for sharing your dining recommendations as well, and I hope you will stay with us again on a future visit.  - Dan

Summary: Positives - Clean rooms, decent onsite food options. Nice shuttles to Disneyland. We stayyed during the Disney Marathon last weekend, so it was crowded but didnt affect the service at all.  Negatives - Being a typical business hotel, they charge $13 for internet. Also parking was $25/night which didnt make me happy at all but my guess is most hotels in that area charge such parking rates.
Manager Response: I'm very glad that you had a great stay during the Disney Marathon. Our staff is very well trained in handling large crowds since we often serve conventions and Disneyland visitors at the same time. Unfortunately, the decision to charge an in-room wireless fee is not made by our local management, but I hope you were able to enjoy our free wireless in the Lobby. Thank you for sharing your review, and I hope you will return on a future family vacation.  - Dan

Summary: The rooms here are extremely clean, really spacious, and have super comfy beds.  I stayed here with my boyfriend before we had kids and I really loved how quiet the hotel is. Another thing I enjoyed is how big the bathrooms were......I mean seriously, the bathroom has two doors into different rooms with a bath and a huge mirror/sink area with lights. Our room also had a sitting area with a full desk and TV and seperate area with a bed and TV. The staff was great and everything went smoothly.  I'd definitely stay here again...but maybe without the kids!
Manager Response: I really appreciate you taking the time to write your review. I'm very happy that you appreciated our spacious rooms and the attentive customer service that you can expect from the Marriott brand. We'd love to have you back without the kids, although we are a hop, skip, and a jump away from Disneyland so maybe a family vacation is in order!  - Dan

Summary: I have an overall mixed review. The staff is extremely nice and helpful. However, the hotel is dated. The bathroom was horribly tiny. For the life of me I cannot understand why, when one of the largest conventions is being held in your hotel, why would you close your signature steakhouse for the week? I found this baffling!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review.  We appreciate the great comments on our staff members. Next month, all of our guest rooms will be getting new mattresses and bed bases, adding 4 extra inches of comfort and visual appeal to our beds.  Next summer, all of our guest rooms will undergo a complete room refresh which will provide new and updated design elements.  We look forward to welcoming you to see our new rooms once they are completed.   JW’s Steakhouse is opened based on business demand.  Even if a large convention is in our hotel, we will not open it if we know the attendees do not have a lot of free time scheduled.  I'm sorry we were not able to accommodate you during your stay, but I hope we can serve you on a future one.  - Dan

Summary Heading: If your traveling alone this hotel is for you.
Summary: I chose the Marriott Anaheim as it ticked all the boxes for me as I was travelling alone and meeting up with friends for a few days @ Disneyland, shopping ,and universal Studios.The facilities were great offering great dining options within the Hotel as to your needs daily..Firstly the large Starbucks was great for morning coffee and a light breakfast or a salad and fruit for lunch.There was also Pizza hut express as well as two other eateries.The Bar and dining area were great  with the food and wine list superb featuring NewZealand  wines.The outlook was onto the Pool area ,which was also serviced with outdoor dining and poolside dining.On average dining was no more expensive than if you were at home and the service certainly top shelf.The staff were among the best group of
Manager Response: Thanks for telling us about your experience, it's great to hear that you had a nice stay.  Please come visit again.

Summary: I recently attended a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  I Booked my room at the Anaheim Marriott because I am a rewards member.  When I arrived I was very impressed with the hotel staff.  Everyone from the Bell Men to the Front Desk Staff to the house keeping staff were very pleasant, smiling, and always had a friendly greeting anywhere you were in the hotel.  The rooms were very clean and up to date.  Most Rooms have an outdoor balcony so you can enjoy the weather and the views.    I did not have an opportunity to try the hotel restaurants although there is a very nice bar area adjacent to the lobby, with a pool patio for you to enjoy, day or night.    You are a few steps away from the convention center and they have shuttle buses to Disneyland and area shopping
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear that our entire staff made you feel at home. We are always eager to welcome our guests to our convenient location where they can enjoy the many amenities that we have to offer or easily explore the nearby attractions. Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback, and I look forward to your next business trip or family vacation in Anaheim.  - Dan

Summary: Spent seven nights at this hotel.  The staff are amazing.  The rooms in the Palms section have balconies and what a treat to be able to sit outside all during our visit.  The rooms are clean, spacious, and quiet.  The wireless internet works  great - a rare occasion in most hotels so that was a real bonus.  The hotel is walking distance to Disneyland and downtown Disney, and many tours and shuttles operate from the hotel.  The hotel is also next to the Anaheim convention centre so a great hotel if you are here for conference.
Manager Response: I'm very happy to hear that you had a wonderful extended stay with us. We try our best to balance convenience with comfort and luxury, so I'm glad that we could impress you. I hope that another business trip will bring you back to Anaheim in the near future.

Summary Heading: Hotel was fine BUT beware of receiving packages
Summary: Stayed there last weekend. Rom was fine, location was great - right near convention center. But beware of one thing: I received a UPS air box (standard UPS or Fedex size) for which this hotel charges a daily storage fee! The package came Thursday (according to bellman), sent from a third party. I checked in late Saturday (8/17), picked up the box on Sunday. Upon checkout, I was astounded at a $60 charge for "shipping". I was told the hotel charges for each day the package was stored for me. Since I picked it up Sunday, three days of $20 per day charges.  I travel on business frequently (almost 50% of my time) and have never encountered a charge like this, even at other Marriotts. Imagine, the hotel "shipping" charge was 3 times the shipping charge. After complaint, the charge
Manager Response: Thanks for taking time to post a review.  We are glad you enjoyed your room and our great location.  Also, thank you for the feedback on our shipping charges.  We will review your situation in further detail and the current handling charges.  We are glad that one of our guest service associates made an appropriate adjustment to your bill.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: I was a little apprehensive about our stay at the Marriott Anaheim after reading reviews on Trip Advisor.  We stayed at this property for 3 nights beginning August 11th.  We found the hotel to be very nice and conveniently located near both theme parks (Disneyland and Disney California Adventure Park).  The rooms are spacious and we never had a problem  waiting for the maid to clean our room.  Each room has a balcony which overlooks the city.  We could see the Disneyland fireworks show from our balcony.  There is a small refrigerator in each room.  Our bellman was very helpful and even offered to get us extra towels upon delivering our luggage to our room.  I might add that we didn't have to way very long for the bellman to help us with our luggage upon checking in or out.
Manager Response: I'm so glad that you had a great stay, thank you for choosing our location.  I'll be sure to let the bell and restaurant staff to keep up the good work.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed at the Marriott Anaheim Aug 11th-15th to visit Disneyland with family.  Being that it was my first time to visit Anaheim/Disneyland, I was concerned about the hotel and how it would be, since most hotels near Disney looked pretty old and run down.  However, upon entering hotel lobby, I was pleasantly surprised with the way it looked.  The room itself was a pretty standard Marriott room, which was expected,  Room furniture seems to have been updated (within the last couple of years) and the beds were very comfy. Although the bathroom was very small, it that wasn't a huge issue for me (even with 2 little ones in tow). Also, housekeeping did a good job cleaning rooms.  There is suppose to be an in-room safe, which I kept looking for and looking for only to find that it is a
Manager Response: It's great to hear that you had a great time for your Disney/SoCal adventure.  I'm happy that you took advantage of everything we have to offer.  It sounds like you did quite a bit and I hope everyone in the family had a wonderful vacation.  Please come again.

Summary: We stayed for the VIDCON convention and it was great! The hotel is beautiful with great restaurants close by. The Hilton is across the street with the convention centre in walking distance. The rooms were spacious and very clean. Good sized bathrooms with plush towels. The beds very comfortable.  The hotel is down the street from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review!  I hope you also had an excellent time at your convention.

Summary Heading: Very Friendly to Traveling Mom, Great Location
Summary: We had planned a trip a trip to Anaheim for a convention more than a year in a advance.  In the time between when we booked and when we travelled, my wife become pregnant and gave birth to our son.  Knowing that being away, would mean that she would have to pump, we called the hotel we had previously booked and asked if we could use their fridge for ice packs.  They refused, as did about a dozen other hotels in the Anaheim area.  When she contacted the Marriott, they were very helpful not only in offering their fridge, but in helping her find solutions for traveling with breast milk.  We immediately booked the room and were glad we did.  The hotel is in a great location and is in close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland.  It is clean and the staff was very
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to assure that your travels would be smooth even though you didn't plan on being new parents when you first booked your Anaheim stay.  I'm so  glad that you had a great experience and that you'd consider coming back to us.  Thank you for your suggestions as well, I'll definitely let the management team know.  I hope to have you as a guest again in the future.

Summary: Needed to stay there for an Expo, and the location was perfect. The room we were given was an upgrade, for which I have much gratitude for. It was a corner suite, overlooking the convention center. Clean, and comfortable. I would stay there again in a heartbeat, but they always sell out too quick.
Manager Response: I'm grateful to hear of your excellent experience with us.  Thank you for the complements and I hope you will stay with us again soon.

Summary: This was about what you'd expect from a hotel near a theme park - very very average. It's a large convention center-style hotel; the priority is clearly the meeting facilities. Rooms are small, and ours was not particularly clean. It wasn't particularly dirty either, just nothing special. The staff were attentive to everything we asked, which makes a difference when everything else is just OK.  The bathroom fixtures were old - straight up old. The shower needed a renovation, the top of the toilet tank was not a match for the rest of it (and nearly slid off a few times), and the bathroom was tiny. The hotel advertises in-room safes - they are correspondingly small. Great for documents, but too small even for a 7" tablet.  With the right expectations and the right price, this is a
Manager Response: I appreciate your thoughts and happy that you found our staff attentive.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I booked this hotel through a 3rd party travel site as a 4-star property. So I admit, I had higher expectations and was expecting something more. On a business trip, I find this location is sometimes a good alternative to where I normally stay and have found a hotel in the area I really like, so this probably contributed to my less than desirable state of mind. When I got a deal on this supposed 4-star hotel, I was excited, but that faded when I stepped in the room.   First, it's a great location. And the lobby and common areas are very inviting, modern and classy. The customer service was top notch. I was impressed with the valet and front desk staff. I did have to call maintenance once because the chain on my door was broken. Even though this was late night, maintenance showed
Manager Response: I do appreciate your honest feedback, thank you.

Summary: We stayed here at the end of July for a event in the Anaheim Convention Centre - it was one of the official hotels and we decided to choose this one because of the fridge and safe.   The convention centre was right next door, which made it extremely easy to go back and forth during the day to drop things off and get food. Very clean and the staff are extremely helpful (although may need nudging if you want something done now and not in an hour or two). The cleaners... were so difficult to communicate with they had no idea what I was asking them when we were simply asking for toilet paper - she just stared blankly. Same when we were requesting more towels as we wanted to shower - she told me I would have to wait for her to do the whole floor and come back which as you can
Manager Response: I regret that  you weren't able to communicate with the cleaning staff and will pass your feedback on to their management staff.  I'm sure that others will appreciate your tip about the free internet in the lobby, we also have it throughout the common areas in the hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again, thank you for the great review.

Summary: I arrived at 12:30, which is before normal check-in time. I was tired after a 9 hour trip from the east coast. The desk person said that he had a great city view room for me if I wanted a room right away. I said yes. He said that it was a handicap room, which had rails. When I got to the room balcony, I looked hard for the city view but just saw suburban spraw. The handicap room did not have a bath tub, which  i would have liked to use. I was so tired that I just took a shower and went to my convention activities. The room was nice, but it was not quite as nice as I usually get from Marriott. I talked to a colleague, who had some problems at the Hilton across the street that made me satisfied with my choice.
Manager Response: Yeah, we understand that Anaheim isn't Las Vegas or San Francisco but that's our city of Anaheim view.  I'm sorry if you didn't find it to be a desirable view (it's actually on our webpage and people do request it).  We do have rooms that do see the Disney fireworks also, if you're interested for next time.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts and I hope you come again soon.

Summary Heading: Family Movie Night Package is a great value for Disneyland visits!
Summary: Stayed here 2 nights for a Disneyland visit.  Typical quality Marriott experience, service, etc.  It's a 20 minute walk to the park, or a short shuttle ride. Be sure to buy shuttle tickets from the hotel desk, as they are half price (round trip for one way price). Also, the "Family Movie Night" room package is a great deal. Includes parking, and a movie, pizza, wings, breadsticks, and ice cream EACH night! Granted, it gets old eating the same thing, but it's a $60-70 value (with the parking) for only a few more dollars than the regular room rate. Also, for Marriott Rewards members, ask for an upgrade to the concierge level & lounge access. Even though I haven't reached Gold yet this year, they gave us a free upgrade. Not only did we get access to the lounge with free breakfast
Manager Response: We love to upgrade our Marriott Rewards members whenever we can, and I'm glad that we could do something special for your family. Thank you for your wonderful review. Our Family Movie Night is one of my favorite packages, and I'm happy that you could reap the benefits. I hope you will come back for round 2 on your next family vacation.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Very good, somewhat bland convention hotel
Summary: It provides all the basics of a convention hotel but not more.  First room had a noise problem from a giant fan on the roof of the next building grinding away.  To their credit, found me another room, much quieter, on he next day.  One surprise here is the good food in the restaurants.  had the breakfast buffet at Cafe del Sol, can recommend it, great waffles and made-to-order omlettes, and a lot of items on the buffet.  One night had the pan-sered halibut at the bar, the fish was superb.  Parking is on the expensive side at $24 for self-park.   One disadvantage of this hotel is that you are really penned-in into the Disney hotel-and-chain-restaurants ghetto, and you simply cannot walk around (you end up walking along busy streets, not fun).
Manager Response: Our staff will do everything they can to make sure that you have a comfortable stay with us, and I'm happy to hear that we could move you to a room of your liking. Likewise, glad that you enjoyed our gourmet offerings at Cafe del Sol. Our chefs are proud to serve you, whether it be in our restaurants  or at our hosted events for hundreds of guests. Thank you for sharing your review.  - Dan

Summary: Stayed here for EFAM conference. My room was very clean as was the conference area. Staff was helpful. Only negative was that considering I paid $12.95 plus tax per day for in-room internet service, it was spotty and would work on and off. The bath salts for rubbing on your hands in the public bathrooms was a nice touch. I did not have a chance to visit the pool area, gym, or lounge, since I was busy non-stop for my entire stay, but they looked nice. The food at the restaurant, Cafe del Sol was very good. Breakfast service was quick, but during a busy lunch hour the service was slow.
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear that our accommodations and food offereings were more than satisfactory during your stay with us. Unfortunately, the decision for in-room wireless fees is in the hands of our corporate managers, but I hope you were able to enjoy our complimentary WiFi in the Lobby. Nonetheless, I'm happy that we could help make your business trip both comfortable and convenient, and I hope you will return to us next time you're in town.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Close Proximity to Disney with Modern Amenities
Summary: My husband and I just stayed here on vacation for three nights.  We've been visiting the Anaheim area for several years and have tried each of the large, nicer hotels.  This was our first time staying at the Marriott Anaheim and it is right up there at the top of our list.     A staff member greeted us warmly at the reception desk.  We stayed in a corner executive king with city view.  The room was huge and quiet with classy, modern decor with an extra large California(?) king bed, a comfortable high-back chair, ottoman, and a work desk with a pull-out table.  There was a comfy crisp, white down comforter on the bed.  We requested a microwave, and the room already had a fridge in it.  There was a big balcony off of the room.  There was a large, flat screen TV with a variety of
Manager Response: After all these years in Anaheim, I'm very happy that you gave us a chance to impress you. I'm even happier that we succeeded. I'm glad that you enjoyed the Executive King room and all the amenities that it has to offer. I am disappointed that you overheard two of our staff members using inappropriate language, and I address this during our next staff meeting. Thank you for the great feedback though. I'm glad that you had a wonderful stay, and I would love for you to experience one of our rooms with Disneyland firework views on your next visit.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Perfectly fine for a conference hotel
Summary: Very friendly and efficient staff, nice 18th floor concierge lounge with scrambled eggs, pancakes, cereals, and fresh  fruit. Evening snacks in the lounge were basic but enough for a light meal. One mile south of Disney-an easy, flat walk up Harbor Blvd or bus for a fee. Room was clean, bath was small. Bath had a tub but no makeup mirror. Internet was slow even with premium upgrade.
Manager Response: We like our guests to start their day with a hearty breakfast, and I'm happy that you took advantage of this. Thank you for sharing your review. Our dedicated and attentive staff is always ready to assist in any way, and I'm glad to hear that all your needs were efficiently met. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.  - Dan

Summary: I stayed here 8 days for the EFAM Conference.    Hotel is in a great location.  It is in a resort location so as you would expect prices are higher than usual.   If you don’t feel like driving, there are several places to walk to.  Just a short 10 min walk and you can find Garden Walk, which has several restaurants/bars, a movie theater and a few shops.    We did not do Disney, but the entrance might be a bit far to walk, then also walk at the park all day.    Valet Parking is a must and worth the $28 per day.  Self-park is $24.    They always had the car quickly when we needed it, always asked if we needed directions and were very courteous and helpful with bags.    Our room was smaller than expected, but quiet.  Maid always did a good job cleaning each day.  We looked over the
Manager Response: Perfect!  Thank you so much for describing the hotel as perfect, it really means a lot to us.  I just wish we could have done something about that traffic for you.  Hopefully we will see you again.

Summary Heading: Nice place to Stay and great location to Disney!
Summary: Marriott Anaheim is a great place to stay.  Nice, clean and helpful staff to get you where you need to go and help you with any questions.  Disney is about 4 blocks away and not a bad walk.  Its safe and there are a whole lot of people walking to park and restaurant in area.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your time with us from Portland.  The property prides itself on being clean, friendly, and safe.  We hope to see you again!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here last week with our 2 and 3 year old. We have annual passes to Disneyland so we have stayed in our fair share of hotels in the Disneyland area. The Marriott Anaheim is definitely ranking on the top of my list . Cleanliness is usually my biggest concerns when staying at a hotel but our room was amazingly clean! I also loved how we had a balcony! We also enjoyed the pool during our visit and I liked how the pool was partially covered so I didn't have to worry about my son burning under the sun. They also provide swim covers to go on top of babies diapers.  The location is awesome! It took us only 15 minutes to walk to Disneyland. Way faster than loading the kids in the car, unloading the car and kids, then riding the tram to the park. My 3 year old is
Manager Response: Our guests are often surprised to learn how easy it is to walk to Disneyland or take the ART shuttle. I'm glad that your family opted for exercise! Thank you for the wonderful review. Unfortunately, parking fees are standard across all Marriott Hotels, but I'm delighted to hear that you will return based on our great amenities, dedicated customer service, and high standards for cleanliness. We look forward to having you back.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Friendly knowledgable staff.  Clean and spacious room, generous bathroom
Summary: Stayed here with my teenage son and nephew so the 2 beautiful queen beds meant no one had to sleep on a roll away or floor!  I was delighted to see a fridge - Sheratons or Hyatt hotels never have them in theirs plus the usual iron/ironing board. Nice and neutral decor made this room very relaxing. The balcony overlooking the pool was a huge bonus and great to sit out on at the end of the day. The pool is open until 11pm which the kids took quite literally. The girls on the concierge were fantastic - very patient as I sought their advice on travelling around the area and they rang around a few car hire places for me. I ended up using the Hertz office based in the hotel - again superb friendly service and the car was waiting for me in the multi storey parking lot. The gift shop
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words. All of us at Marriott are passionate about hospitality, and I'm delighted to hear that Chase exemplified this during your stay. I will be sure to pass your compliments on to him. Likewise, I'm very happy to hear that you enjoyed all the great hotel amenities that we have to offer. We look forward to your next trip!  - Dan

Summary: Just returned from a 6 night stay with my wife, son (5y/o) and daughter (18months).   Hotel: Full service so don't expect to use the luggage cart to haul your Disney souvenirs or your luggage.  Bell hops are quick to unload your car and help you.  This isn't a bad thing.  The bell hop was friendly, efficient and very informative.  Check in was simply professional and friendly (genuine - not fake).  Very upscale feel - a-la Las Vegas.  Parking $24/DAY !!  Outrageous but ... oh well.  Room: Balcony facing pool.  Great sunrise view.  Clean but bathroom a bit small. Great TV and comfortable bed.  They failed to refresh our soap so I had to call down for more soap twice !!  They were quick to deliver though.   Overall - Fantastic.
Manager Response: I'm glad that we could be your family's home away from home during your stay in Anaheim. We are proud to offer friendly and efficient customer service for our guests, and I'm happy to hear that our entire staff left you with a positive experience. We hope to see you again on your next family vacation to Southern California.  - Dan

Summary Heading: The hotel is well located to the Convention center, but there are better options nearby
Summary: If you are on business and attending the Convention Center (I was there for SigGraph 2013), the hotel is very well located. But the room was very basic, it did not even have a in room safe, which was weird to me. Parking is expensive, as most hotels nearby, but you can find other hotels with free parking. If you are going to Disneyland, you can find closer and cheaper hotels nearby. The pool was also small compared to the size of the hotel. The room had a small fridge and coffee machine, but no microwave. The lobby was ok, with free Wifi in the lobby - to get internet in the room you need to pay $$. Bed was comfortable, not bad, but not great. Room was quiet. Breakfast buffet was $20+, which is a lot to me, but there is a Stabucks in the hotel lobby for your caffeine fix. There
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed the convenience and comfort of our location during your recent stay at Anaheim Marriott. We are a favorite among Convention Center attendees, and I'm glad that we could serve you in this capacity. I hope our dedicated service will bring you back on your next trip to Anaheim.  - Dan

Summary: Came here for a business conference held in one of the ballrooms.  GREAT!!!!  We had a corner room with tons of room.  Each room does come equipped with a refrigerator, and you can request a microwave.  We lucked out.  Typically, when you walk into a hotel room, the bathroom is right by the door.  This time, the bathroom was tucked away in the corner, which was a very nice change.    The bed was super soft.  It felt like we were sleeping on clouds each time.  The bathroom was large and bright.  Can't really complain about anything.  Parking was easy and the gym was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great review. We appreciate the opportunity to welcome your group, and I'm happy to hear that you were fully satisfied with everything about your stay. We are famous for our heavenly beds, and I'm glad you were able to experience them.  I hope you will return for another beautiful night's sleep in the future.  - Dan

Summary: Our family of five spent four memorable nights at this fine establishment.  From the moment we got our first look at the hotel and were warmly greeted by valet as well as the bellman, I knew that I had made the correct decision on where to stay.  The interior of the hotel was just as beautiful as the exterior.  Check-in was swift and the associate was both courteous and helpful.  The rooms were spacouis and very accomomdating.  I could have slept in that comfortable bed all day.  Every associate we made eye contact with greeted us.       For transportation to Disneyland we purchased three day ART passes from the Gift Shop.  The shuttle pick up and drop off was within a few step from valet.  Best part is that it's the first stop for the shuttle and only made one stop before
Manager Response: I'm very happy that you were able to experience our authentic Marriott hospitality on your family vacation to Disneyland. We are proud of our convenient location and great hotel amenities, and I'm glad that you could make the most of both. We look forward to your next trip!  - Dan

Summary Heading: Marriott Anaheim is family friendly close to Disneyland.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel and were pleasantly surprised. We had a room with a City View which allowed us to sit out on the balcony and watch the fireworks from Disneyland. On our second night we had a fridge that stopped working and we called the front desk. They were prompt to come and fixed it for us. Staff was great. We will def stay there again!
Manager Response: We look forward to having you back!  I'm happy that you had a comfortable stay with a fireworks view. I'm also pleased that our responsive staff could handle the fridge issue as soon as possible. Thank you for sharing your review. - Dan

Summary: We recently stayed here for a seminar and the service was EXCELLENT!!! From the time you walk in the door you are greeted with a smile. The hotel was very clean. The rooms were a little tight, but the beds were very comfortable and even had a small balcony where you could see the fireworks from Disney at night. The pool are was very clean and nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. I'm happy to hear that you experienced our caring service and great view of the Disneyland fireworks. I hope we can welcome you back in the future.  - Dan

Summary Heading: Easy place to stay for Disney
Summary: My son and I stayed here for two nights while we went to Disney.  The locations is great.  We walked back and forth from Disney (12 minute walk).  Shuttles and taxi's are available as well for a small fee.  The hotel itself is unremarkable.  It feels a little old, but the rooms were clean, the service was fine and the food decent.  When you are going to Disney, as long as the hotel is clean and in a good location the rest is pretty insignifcant.  The majority of time is spent away from the hotel.  If I was not going to Disney or another of the attractions, I would look for another place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I'm happy to hear that our convenient location, quality service, and comfortable beds could meet your needs for your Disneyland vacation.  - Dan

Summary: Our family of 4 stayed here for the annual ServPro Convention in June.  My husband and I both worked for hotels/resorts in our earlier years and really appreciate good customer service.  I had read prior reviews about this hotel which were excellent.  They were right.  From the minute we pulled into valet, we were greeted professionally and cordially.  Once in to meet with the Bell desk, we were provided with great information on the hotel and events, Disney (we brought the kids and inlaws) and were given treats for the kids--free movie, popcorn, water bottles, etc.  The staff was a hit!  Rooms were nice, clean and beds very comfortable.  The hotel food we had was very good as well from room service to the restaurant down by the lobby bar.  Excellent sushi platter to pizza.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments. We are very fortunate to have so many great reviews here on TripAdvisor, and I greatly appreciate you adding your experience. It's wonderful that you could turn a business trip into a mini family vacation. I'm delighted to hear that our food, staff, room, and location met your highest standards, and I hope that we can host your family again in the future.  -Dan

Summary: This is a great hotel and the staff were very happy and helpful and all stood out as taking real pride in their operations and respective duties. Very responsive and helpful staff at check-in and check-out. A great value and really close to the entrance to DisneyLand.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We are very fortunate to have such a dedicated and hard-working staff, and I greatly appreciate you adding your experience with them.

Summary: Our family stayed her for a large event that was hosted both onsite and at adjoining event space! Can't say enough about the first class customer service the hotel provided during a hectic and demanding event!  Highlights were our hotel rooms! Each night we had a view of Disney Fireworks! Wow! We simply requested and they got it for us! We lost an iphone, they found it! We lost some business papers, they found it! All within 10 minutes of our phone call! We never waited long for food, drinks or a coffee! Plenty of staff at all times of day and night! The hotel was sparkling clean and you never had to look for an employee! There was always someone there to help and after two days, they remembered our names?! There were 1000's of us!   If you are an event planner or considering
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to host your event. I'm very happy that you could experience the luxury for which we strive. I really appreciate your glowing recommendation, and we look forward to hosting you again someday soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a gang conference and was impressed the moment I walked into the hotel. The exterior of the hotel looks dated compared to the Hilton which is across the street but the interior is top notch. The balconies were a great touch since I like to get fresh air and listen to the sounds of the city. I would def recommend staying here and will be back next year.
Manager Response: We think our balconies are some of the best in Anaheim, and I'm glad that you were able to relax and appreciate them. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We really appreciate your recommendation.

Summary: Overall, a fairly standard Marriott (not a bad thing at all) but the staff all stood out as taking real pride in their operations and respective duties. Very responsive and helpful staff at check-in and check-out.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind comments about our exceptional staff. I hope you will return to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I cant say enough good things about the marriott anaheim. Upon arrival (early in the day)i was able to check in right away and got a room with the view of the fireworks! the staff is great from the overnite shift (thank you for the info going to Huntington Beach, best beach ever!) and throughout the day.  love the restaurant that was poolside convenient shuttle that cost only a few dollars takes you to disney and the shopping district this marriott makes me want to go back on vacation
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear that your stay with us left you with such a lasting positive impression. We always try our best to provide top-notch customer service, and I'm very happy that we succeeded. Thank you so much for your kind words.

Summary Heading: Great place for the Convention Center
Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights for a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center... This was a very nice hotel great location very nice amenities the on-site restaurants are excellent!  The staff was great and very helpful!  We checked in had a room that had a strange odor in it I went to the front desk and they upgraded my room for free and without question.  Great service indeed!  All the staff was very friendly and wanted to make sure we were completely taken care of.
Manager Response: We pride ourselves in maintaining the highest standards for customer service, so I'm happy to hear that our staff could immediately address your issue. Glad that you enjoyed our dining options as well! I greatly appreciate you sharing your experience.

Summary: We stayed here for three days. Hotel is great! We were there for a convention and the hotel was full. It never felt crowded and the staff handled the crowds very well. It is easy to grab a quick snack or have a meal at the hotel restaurant. Location is great and the rooms are spacious and very clean!
Manager Response: I’m happy to hear that our staff exceeded your expectations on such a busy weekend, and that our convenient location met all your needs. Thanks again for choosing Anaheim Marriott, and we hope to see you again.

Summary: In town for an irish dance competition.  Rooms very clean with a good size balcony with an incredible view.  Could see Disney fireworks each night.  Exceptional service from all of the staff.  Everyone greeted you with a smile.  In house restaurant very good with reasonable prices.  Starbucks & Pizza Hut also inside for a quick bite.  Great pool in the courtyard with a large hot tub. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thanks for your kind comments about your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that our staff provided you with the exceptional service that we are known for. I'm glad you enjoyed our pool and the Disneyland fireworks from your balcony, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our needs. We were in Anaheim for a volleyball tournament and the Marriott was in the perfect location next to the Convention Centre and within a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, restaurants and Downtown. We booked two rooms as we had 7 people in our group and both rooms had two queen beds with ample room to move around in. The shuttle bus ran every twenty minutes to Disneyland, which was handy if we didn't feel like walking. i would stay again.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear that our convenient location could help you enjoy Disneyland while attending your volleyball conference. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: This was our 3rd trip to the Anaheim area.  However our first stay at the Marriott hotel.  This was by far the best hotel stay we have had in the area, and probably ever.  The service was exceptional from the time we walked through the door.  We were greeted by a manager who took our bags, and got us checked in fast and early.  We were traveling with an infant and asked if we could checkin at 9:00 am when checkin is not until 4:00 pm.  Even though the hotel was extremely busy.  The manager found a room for us to checkin to which i really appreciated having a fussy infant.  Any special request that we had were taken care of right away with a smile.   Our hotel rooms were spotless, and kept that way for the duration of our stay.  I can't say enough about the Anaheim Marriott hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your heartfelt review. We pride ourselves in delivering the best customer service possible, and I'm so happy to hear that we could make your stay with us a memorable one. I hope to see you return to us soon for another great Marriott experience in the future.

Summary: Upon arrival, we learned that the hotel was hosting thousands of high school students for a national FBLA convention.  We braced ourselves for crowds, noise and general chaos, but all this was needless--in spite of the very large groups of students, the staff worked tirelessly to ensure that our stay was pleasant.  We were warmly greeted, given a room away from convention groups, and made to feel at home.  We were especially pleased with the entire staff in the concierge lounge area  and the sweet housekeeping staff of the 18th floor!  For families interested in the nearby Disney attractions, the hotel is a rather long walk however, the shuttle ran frequently  throughout the day.  We were also pleased to be able to view Disney fireworks from our room's balcony (slightly
Manager Response: Our dedicated staff works tirelessly to meet the needs of our guests. In this case, your need to was to have a quiet and relaxing stay during a very busy convention, and I'm delighted they could fulfill that request! Thank you for sharing your comments, and I hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: We brought our grandson to Disneyland and really liked staying at this Marriott.  The shuttlebus takes you directly to Disneyland and runs very often.  The rooms were great and the people working there were top notch.  We were not able to check in when we arrived so we left our luggage and headed to disneyland.  Once we returned, we got into our room and they gave us a free movie coupon - which our grandson used that first night! The executive lounge proved to be a big hit with us and our grandson - it is one of the nicer ones in the US.  This Marriott manages both the convention business and family vacation customers very well.  The only complaint is that the pool is too cold.  With California temps only in the low 80's at best,  the pool really should be heated.  Our grandson
Manager Response: I'm very happy that you chose Marriott Anaheim as a home base for your Disneyland vacation with your grandson. I'm also happy that your free movie coupon went to good use! We look forward to hosting you again when you bring the rest of your grandchildren for round two.

Summary Heading: Marriott Anaheim after National Championship of Irish Dancing
Summary: My family experienced  this hotel last week with thousands of Irish Dancers from across the country and other countries. This hotel managed this event beautifully from beginning to end. It was well organized, clean, efficient all week. The staff was superior everywhere from checking in to valet parking to telephones. This hotel managed to make it fun to put up with the hectic dancing schedules as well as schedule us to trips to the Disney Parks with reduced rates, excellent transportation, making it as easy as possible for all the parents and grand parents that accompanied these dancers.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words. We are passionate about service and hospitality, even when things get busy with large events, and I am very pleased to hear that our staff could help make your stay a wonderful one. Thanks again for choosing Marriott Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Directly accross the street from the Convention Center
Summary: We stayed here for one night because we were going to Disneyland. But it is literally right next to the Convention Center. Probably would stay at another hotel that was a little closer to Disneyland since my fiancé likes to walk everywhere. The hotel was clean and they have a Starbucks located inside. There was a dance convention in town and it was busy. Our room was kind of small but had a refrigerator. We were on the 14th floor and had a peek a boo view of the theme park roller coaster. I would definitely recommend this hotel to someone who was there for a convention since you can walk and the hotel lobby and be there in 2 minutes. The self-parking was $24 and valet is $28.
Manager Response: Many of our guests walk to Disneyland from our hotel, so I'm surprised to hear that your fiancé wasn't one of them! However, I'm happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us and enjoyed our convenient access to Starbucks. Thanks for the recommendation.

Summary: We stayed here for a dance competition. The competition was in both the Hilton next door and the Marriott and it was really close by and easy to walk from one hotel to the other. Room was comfortable and clean. As usual with dance competitions we did not have much opportunity to leave the hotel, so we made good use of the Starbucks, Pizza Hut, and Marketplace store which were right by the ballrooms. The parking garage was also by the ballrooms which made it easy to keep things (like dance dresses and packs of water bottles) in the car without carrying them unnecessarily all the way to the room and back. The bar staff (next to the lobby) were very efficient and courteous. We were on the 19th floor so elevator rides were long and tedious as they seemed to stop at every floor,
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review and feedback! We understand that the elevator rides to the upper floors are tough when we have a full house, and we really appreciate your patience. Hopefully the Disneyland fireworks show made up for it though! We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: I think our room was on the worst floor (3rd). It was as if we were in the basement with a casement window, while other floors had balconies with sliding glass doors. The pool area did not order sufficient lounge chairs and the pool water was cold. Overall the hotel was clean and served its purpose. Great location if you were going to the convention center and about a 15 minute walk to Disney. We paid a group rate; would have been more disappointed if paid full rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We're happy that you had a clean and comfortable stay with us. We hope you request a room with a Disneyland view if you stay with us again!

Summary: We went there last year, and did not expect a lot from this place but ended up being amazing. It is pretty close from Disneyland, if you feel like walking, 15 minutes will be enough to be in the Disney Parks, the restaurants are good, the service is great, there are shuttles that run from the hotel to Disneyland, and from the area to a nice outlet shopping centre. The area is really good and offers different kinds of restaurants.   The door in the balcony had some trouble to open and close but we did not pay too much attention to it, and when we came back from Disneyland, we found a nice tray with popcorn, drinks, and lollies with an apology note about the door. The concierge was great and buying tickets to Disney was not an issue thanks to the Disney Desk. If I go back to
Manager Response: Thank you for thinking of us as amazing!  We hope to see you again!

Summary: We chose this hotel based on location (1 mile from maingate Disney) and price.  We stayed for two nights.  Upon arrival there is a large lobby with plenty of seating and friendly helpful door staff.  The young lady that checked us in was delightful...friendly and kind.  We had two rooms, both with a King bed.  My son and his girlfriend's room had a lovely view of the pool area and palm trees.  Ours was a corner room with a bit more space but a view of the roof top.  It  had a large balcony and was very quiet.  The usual amenities adorned the room, coffee maker, mini bottles of decent shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and lotion.  We ate two meals in the lounge and although the selection was limited the food and service was good.  We also ate two breakfasts in the main restaurant.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a nice and relaxing Disneyland vacation, and we're happy that we could help! Thanks so much for the great review. We really appreciate the recommendation, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our Future Business Leaders of America stayed at the Anaheim Marriott for the recent convention.  I definitely took into consideration the fact that there was a hotel full of teenagers when writing this review.  Our room was 362 and it looked out to a parking lot and cement wall.  The opposite side rooms looked over the pool.  This section of the building was 4 stories high.  The room was standard and I was annoyed that we did not have a fan in the bathroom.  Every day, we seemed to have problems with maid replenishing our coffee, cups, etc.  One day, we waited until about 4:30 to call because maid service missed our room, even though we had been out at meetings all day and we were not the only ones skipped.  I'm sure the hotel was extremely busy, as it was a Sunday and many
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review and feedback! We really appreciate your patience during such a busy period, and we will bring your maid service issues to the attention of our management. However, we're delighted that you had a comfortable and relaxing stay with us, and we hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Excellent service for a convention center hotel
Summary: The hotel was a typical Marriott.  Nice rooms, but nothing spectacular. What stood out was the service. Everyone was very helpful from the bellboys to the bartenders. A very well run hotel. We drove to Disney, but had we not had a five year old with us, we could have walked.  We got a roll away bed, and although it was a bit tight, we were able to fit five people in our room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great write up, we definitely pride ourselves on our service!  We hope you stay with us again when you're in the area!

Summary: Family holiday was fantastic, close to Disneyland if you want to walk or pick up and drop bus service was great. We had a great time rooms clean and comfortable . Staff very friendly and helpfully for any questions. We enjoyed the service from staff and they really helped the kids.
Manager Response: We love having families stay with us for their Disney vacations, thank you so much for choosing us.  We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Better than average in a good location
Summary: This review may be slanted a little because when we came here for FBLA nationals, our state had to stay at the Marriott as it was our State's host hotel  The first night though, stayed at the Hilton across the way and I am a Diamond there and nothing at Marriott so take that into consideration  The Marriott was clean and easy to just charge everything to the room but what kills this review is that on a hot Saturday the pool was closed and we had to go across the way to the Hilton  If you are a Marriott member stay here but if the dollar is the same, I think I will stay at the Anaheim Hilton next time
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We apologize for the pool closure during your stay, but it is periodically required for safety maintenance and we have no control over scheduling. We really appreciate your feedback though, and we hope to see you again on a future trip to Anaheim!

Summary: During my recent stay here I found what appeared to be mold in the the shower. Upon contacting the front desk staff, they directed me to a manager who said he would check it out, but he never got back to me, so I talked to another manager the next day he said this incident was not noted anywhere and they were unaware of it. This manager finally looked into it and called me a day later and said it was just mildew so it wasn't a big deal. I find this extremely disturbing and will never be giving another dime to this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention - we definitely want to get to the bottom of this.  We are sending you a message as we would like to know when you stayed and who you dealt with.  Again, thank you for your comments.

Summary: Loved absolutely everything about this hotel! Check-in was smooth and Michelle was fantastic! VEry genuine and seemed to really know what she was doing. We got a room on the 12th floor overlooking the pool. I am not sure if this is standard, but our room had a balcony and it was very nice to be able to enjoy a coffee in the morning.  I noticed management reads the reviews here and leaves little comments most of the time, so if you are reading this, make sure you commend Michelle on being absolutely amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your enthusiastic feedback! We really appreciate your wonderful review, and rest assured that we will pass your compliments on to Michelle. We hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Came here for a 3 day business conference.  Very nice hotel, stayed in the Oasis Tower.  Seemed to be quieter there.  I would recommend staying in the Palms tower, on an upper floor with a view towards Disneyland if you would like to see the fireworks at night and you also would get a balcony.  No balconies on the Oasis tower.  Just a few hundred feet from the Convention Center entrance, a little less than a mile from Disneyland.  Very busy this time of year with families and student conferences - the beautiful lobby was busy all the time.  Parking is pricy - $24 a day to self-park, $28 for valet.  The Starbucks and Pizza Hut on site were very busy.  The Hilton across the walkway also has some fast food - can't remember them all - but about 3 fast food places.  Room was nice -
Manager Response: We're happy to hear that you had a pleasant business trip with us! Thank you for the great review and room tips, and we hope that you will visit us again for a vacation next time!

Summary: This hotel is a great hotel especially if you will be going to Disneyland. Spacious, clean rooms, and Cafe Del Sol served a great breakfast. Starbucks is convenient and right next to the lobby. My only word of advice is to spend the $5/day and take the shuttle to Disneyland/CA adventure. Yes it is walking distance but a FAR walking distance. After walking around all day you will greatly appreciate the shuttle ride back.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us for your Disney adventures!

Summary: We stayed here in June for our 6 night trip to Disneyland.  My husband and two little boys.  We travel to Disneyland yearly and for the past 4 years have stayed at the Radisson Suites in Buena Park, but decided to try something different this year.  The Marriott was a nice, clean hotel, with a very friendly staff.  They were out of paper in the kids check in area and quickly got some for my boys.  The fridge was a nice convenience.  We walked to Disneyland every morning and rode the Toy Story parking lot shuttle back to the parking lot and walked back across the street to the Marriott, which was very convenient when our children were tired.  The bathroom is a little small, but worked.  We could see the Disneyland fireworks from our balcony.  We bought a bubble gun at Target down
Manager Response: We're so happy that you decided to change your routine and give us a try! Thank you for the amazing review and recommendation. We're delighted that your Disneyland vacation was comfortable and convenient, and we hope to see you again next year!

Summary: I love this hotel! Everyone is so great!  Walking in to the lobby is like being at a friend's house!  The people at the desk are willing and able to make your stay the best it can be! Staying alone the night with two small grandchildren, I wanted a place I knew would be safe and comfortable. They are so close to Disneyland and you can even see the fireworks from your room if you are on the north side. The rooms are super clean and beds are like sleeping on a cloud!  Check-out was a dream!  I can't want to go back!
Manager Response: We're delighted to be your home away from home in Anaheim! Thank you for the absolutely wonderful review and recommendation. We're so happy that you had a perfect stay with us, and we can't wait to see you again on your next trip!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, loved everything about it
Summary: I absolotely loved eveything about this hotel!!! The staff was wonderful, the room was clean and well stocked and the pool are was clean. The room was what u would expect from a Marriott with clean linens and comfortable mattresses. We got a room on the 14th floor with a balcony and pool view. While we were here for obly one night, we left with a very positive impression and will be back soon
Manager Response: We loved that you stayed with us!  Thank you!

Summary: We like to stay at Marriott Hotels but this is one of the best. Very friendly staff and helpful. Convenient to walk or catch the shuttle to Disney Resort.  We were upgraded to a very large room at the end of the hall.
Manager Response: We're honored to be considered one of the best Marriotts! Thank you for the wonderful review and recommendation. We hope to see you again soon for another Disneyland vacation!

Summary: We stayed here for our Disney vacation. Convenient to Disney, especially with the ART (anaheim resort transportation) stop right outside the hotel. You can purchase tickets for the ART at the front desk or gift shop.  The bus passes are $5/day or the gift shop sells 3 day passes for $12.  We rented a car two days and instead of using the hertz in the hotel, we saved money and rented from Alamo on Katella which was a very short walk from the hotel. The hotel itself was very nice and our room was enjoyable. I read some reviews about the bed being hard, and although it wasn't the best, we both slept just fine.  The housekeeping kept our room nice and neat and on our last day, even folded the clothes we had laid out on a chair! Overall I would recommend this hotel and book again if
Manager Response: ...and we hope you come back soon! Thank you for the great review and recommendation. We really appreciate your feedback, and we look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Always seem to draw one of the wonderful rooms with a view of the roof out of one window and a sliver view of the driveway out of the other...kinda like a closet...the workout room is nice and the lobby is cool which is good as I'll be spending most of the time there and not in my room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We have many rooms with amazing views, so please request one next time if you choose to stay with us on your next trip to Anaheim! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: So my first time away to California and my 2nd time away to America.  Booked our holiday with British Airways in the Winter Sale and got it for an amazing price. When I placed my booking with BA i couldnt help but notcie that my room was for a twin bed room.  This was great for me and my partner so I got intouch with the Hotel them self and asked if it was possible to have our room changed to a double bed room.  The hotel got back to me a day later and told me that this wasn't a problem and they would give me a city view room with a king size bed! Awesome! When we got to our room i was amazed we had 2 balconies (yeah thats right two of them) one had a view of Disney and a Hilton and the other had a view of Orange County.  The room was cleaned and the bed was made everyday.  The
Manager Response: We're delighted that we could welcome you to Southern California in style! Thank you for sharing your wonderful review. We're happy that you enjoyed the awesome views from our balconies, and we hope you will come back and visit us again for a second look!

Summary: We went to Anaheim to see a game at Angels Stadium. Knowing nothing about the area we chose this hotel because of it's brand name mostly. The staff were fantastic ... helpful and efficient. A special mention should be made of the valet team. They must be the fastest in the country! :) We arrived in the middle of an 8,000 strong Amway Convention and it must be said that the staff were handling it exceptionally well. The room was clean, although not particularly quiet (probably no room was quiet during the Amway onslaught). Lots of conveniently placed outlets to charge your assortment of electronic devices. Each room has a little balcony which is especially nice since many hotels don't even have a window to get any fresh air. The Hotel is positioned in a convenient location (for
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback! Could you send us a private message with your email so we can have the appropriate person contact you to follow up with your issues? Thanks!

Summary: From our check in with Michelle,everything was perfect, a great room, a view , a great Disney desk lady Amy who sold us discounted tickets and a great day bus pass for the shuttle. The coffee maker in the room was a great touch . We had a fantastic time every question we asked of the concierge was always answered well and with great precision. The letter under the door on the day of checkout was well written, also the map of the areas with all the restaraunts etc was great . I loved the location and the total Disney vibe of the hotel
Manager Response: Great to hear that Michelle could help start your Disneyland vacation with ease. Thank you for your great review and feedback! We're glad that your stay with us was relaxing and convenient, and we hope to see you again on your next vacation to Southern California!

Summary: Marriott Anaheim is a good hotel, right in front of Anaheim Convention Center and Hilton Convention Center. Its at a walk distance of Disneyland, Downtown Disney and some good restaurants. be aware that you'll be charged USD 24 a day to park your car in the parking building and breakfast will cost you USD 25 a day!!! Nevertheless, there's a Starbucks inside the hotel lobby that will help to better the breakfast cost. I dont know why, my shower took almost 5 minutes to heat the water (all the 5 days I stayed). The bed was too soft, and since I stayed on the second floor there was a light direct on my face.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We really appreciate your feedback, and we hope to see you again on your next business trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The most stand-out memory of this hotel is how friendly and helpful the staff was.  From the check-in staff, to the doormen, to the people bringing additional necessities to our room (extra towels for our family of 5, microwave), we were always met with cheefulness and eagerness to meet our needs.  The lobby itself is beautiful.  There is a small Pizza Hut on property, a market, and a Starbucks.  Be prepared to pay big prices for these items, however that is to be expected at the Marriott.  Our family was upgraded to a junior suite so we had plenty of room for my husband, myself, and our three children, ages 12, 9, and 6.  We had plenty of room for a rollaway and the couch pulled out into a good size double bed.  The room was clean and kept up nicely with turndown done nightly.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your Disneyland home! We really appreciate your review and compliments to our staff, and we're very happy that you had comfortable stay with us. We hope to see you again on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great Conference Facilities, Room just average
Summary: This hotel has a beautiful lobby and great conference facilities.  In addition, the conference staff were exceptional.  They were always available to refresh drinks/clean up.  I was very impressed and have been to many conferences and this staff were excellent.  The front desk staff were also very friendly and proficient.  The reason for the 3 star review was the rooms themselves, which appear quite tired. The rooms are in need of some updating. I travel a lot, so it was obvious that the money had not been spent updating the rooms.  In addition, if you want a room with a balcony only one tower has that option, so make sure and confirm at front desk.  Sleep quality was great though, quiet and comfy bed.  Very close to Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our conference facilities and staff! You will be happy to hear that we are renovating our rooms next year, so we hope you will come back for another business trip to experience them!

Summary: A well located hotel for Disneyland. Our room was comfortable and well equipped! Every staff member we meet was helpful and super friendly. Thoroughly recommend this hotel for your Anaheim stay. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and recommendation! Happy to hear that our staff met your needs while staying with us, and we hope you will visit Southern California again soon!

Summary: Great stay, friendly staff from check in thru to house keeping! Made us feel very welcome. Rooms clean and tidy. Staff down in lobby area etc go above and beyond! Would totally recommend this property to family and friends. Close to Disneyland parks... Shuttle every 15 minutes from hotel door. Clean and tidy with close walking distance to placed to dine!
Manager Response: Great to hear that our entire staff impressed you! Thank you for the wonderful review and recommendation. We hope to see you again on your next trip to Southern California!

Summary: I stayed here a week to do the whole Disneyland experience. We live in Orlando so we have pretty high expectations when it comes to hotels, theme parks, and pretty much any vacation in general. I booked this hotel knowing it was mostly a business hotel but being very familiar with the Marriott brand I knew I could anticipate a nice, enjoyable stay.   Arrived at the hotel a few hours before check in time and our early check in request was granted. Art checked us in a he was one of the best interactions we had throughout the entire stay. He was nice enough to give us a room on a high floor overlooking California Adventure which made our trip feel even more like home. We could see world of color at night which was an even nicer touch at night. Thanks Art!   Room was very clean, and
Manager Response: Wow, we are honored that our service inspired you to write your first review. Thank you so much for taking the time to do so! We really appreciate your comments and recommendation, and we couldn't be happier that your Disney experience rivaled that of our East Coast family. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had taken a bus to Anaheim and reached to the hotel at 1pm. Check in time was not until 4pm but the front desk was so gracious to let us check in early with no fee. We were even asked on what floors we would prefer. The location of the hotel was very convenient since our main purpose of the trip was to go to Disneyland. It is in walking distance if you don't mind a 20 minute walk but there is also a very convenient ART bus that comes every 20 minutes to take you to Disneyland as well. The staff was great at the restaurants Degrees and cafe del sol. The food as well was good there. We ate at both quite often. The rooms were fairly clean. It wasn't sparkling but it was clean. The housekeeping were very nice. We had put a do not disturb sign because we did not need cleaning for
Manager Response: Wonderful to hear that you had a great Disneyland vacation with us! Thank you for the fantastic review. We're always happy to check you in early when possible, and we're glad that you enjoyed Cafe del Sol and Degrees Wine & Patio Bar. Hope to see you again soon for another trip to the "happiest place on earth!"

Summary Heading: Bad Vacation Made Better By Merriott 12015 Harbor Blvd
Summary: First of all this is a very over due letter, My Name Is Jeffrey B. Barnett 621 W Jardin Dr. Casa Grande, AZ 85122 520-431-0944. I booked a Christmas trip at Disneyland Park for my Neice and brother and brother n law, Every thing went wrong from day one. We were a day late getting there due to me being rushed to ER nite before we left. Out dates there was December 29th 2012 - Jan 3-2013. I booked threw Disney travel and also booked a electric wheel chair as well. At your resort I booked a suite for 4 3 adults and 1 child. Real quick I had had a massive stroke prior June and minor one in November before we came. So please excuse my spelling and grammer my memory is not all there anymore and I get confused easy, I will due the best I can, bare with me. I would of written sooner but
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for taking the time and effort to write such a wonderfully-detailed review! We're very sorry to hear about your terrible vacation, but we're delighted that the Marriott staff could help as much as possible. However, we believe you were staying at a different Marriott in Anaheim since our address is 700 Convention Center Way, not 12015 Harbor Blvd. We can only take credit where credit is due, so we hope you can copy and paste this review on their TripAdvisor page. You can find it here: http://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g32420-d225743-Reviews-Marriott_Anaheim_Suites-Garden_Grove_California.html  Thanks again, and we hope you stay healthy and can come back to Southern California for a better vacation next time!

Summary: First time stay here for business conference.  Excellent reservation staff - April was very good at explaining hotel amenities and pre-trip planning.  Check in very nice, room was clean neat, no view from the room really, but didn't matter to me since I didn't spend much time there, but if room matters to you - ask questions.  I was on 2nd floor so it was a convenient location to the conference and to Starbucks inside the hotel.    Restaurant by the pool was nice for outside dining and food offered delicious options -  several families with children were there enjoying the pool and being so close to Disneyland.   Inside the hotel, there is a Disney concierge and they offered evening entry tickets into Disneyland at a reduced evening rate for one park - not bad at $67 for entry
Manager Response: We'd love to host your family! Thank you for the wonderful review. We're so happy that you had a great business conference experience with us, and we hope to see you again for a vacation next time!

Summary: This was our 4th time staying here for our annual family vacation to disneyland.  We are always amazed at how well the hotels treats us.  One night they delivered movie treats so we could enjoy a movie in our room.  The hotel is a great location and using the shuttle service to the parks is convenient. We would highly recommend this hotel for families looking for a nice alternative to the Disney hotels.
Manager Response: We love having loyal guests such as yourself, and we're so happy that we could help make your movie night a little more special! Thank you for the wonderful review and recommendation. We look forward to seeing you again for your Disneyland vacation next year!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  I requested a king room but it was changed on me to a double.  It didn't really matter as I was traveling alone. Not sure if they would have changed it for me if I asked.  The room was clean and had a balcony.  It was nice little balcony and I looked forward to sitting out there with my book at the end of the day of meetings.  No such luck.  My room was at the front of the building and for some reason unfathomable to me, they were blasting rock/pop music outside all day! It was so disturbing to the peace. To make matters worse, the a/c in the room was marginal.  It wasn't too hot out so I normally would have just opened the window for fresh spring air.  But with the music blaring, I couldn't
Manager Response: Thank your for staying with us and for all of your comments.  We really appreciate your feedback and are delighted that you would stay with us again.  Let us know when you're planning to stay.

Summary: We stayed here for a convention. There was over 3000 people staying at the hotel for this convention. Imagine what a head ache it was try to get down to the lobby for meetings or back up to your room after the meeting when all these people want to use  the same 3 of the 6 working elevators. What a mess. We also stayed there last year for a family trip. Please believe me when I say it wasn't any better. They always seem to have 3 of their 6 elevators working. We were told the elevators are being "upgraded". My question was, for over a year? They never really gave me a good answer to that question.  Don't get me wrong, its a beautiful hotel, great people working there. But they really don't cater to their convention quests.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for telling us about your experience.  We will definitely make sure that your comments are shared with the right team members here.  We appreciate your compliments and hope you stay with us again!

Summary: I attended a conference at this hotel. My room was not ready but I was given a nicer room. I was so relieved as I had been traveling all day and wanted to relax. The bed was very comfortable. Despite the close proximity to Disney there were not a ton of kids running around. There are 2 sit down restaurants and a Starbucks and pizza Hut in the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review and feedback! We're happy that we could immediately upgrade your room for some much-needed relaxation.  Come back and stay with us again on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: This is a great option in the Anaheim area
Summary: I like this property, not fancy but in very good shape and good service, nice bright rooms, easy to maneuver if you are attending an event all meeting space is in the same area, there's a Starbucks for a quick fix and also close to the parks, not quite walking distance but the city shuttle stop there every 20 minutes ($5.00 USD p/p ride all day tickets for sale at the front desk or the gift shop).  At the hotel there's a Disney tickets desk and I learned the have a "Twilight" ticket that applies for people attending an event (you jut need to show your badge) and for $62.00 US you can enter the park by 4:00 pm and stay until it closes. I thought this option was brilliant.  I think this hotel is a great option they offer pretty good rates and are definitively a level above all the
Manager Response: Great to hear that you enjoyed your event with us! Thank you for the wonderful review and recommendation. We're glad that you discovered the "Twilight" pass, and we hope you were able to take advantage of it. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Really great bed. Kinda small Room
Summary: The staff here is friendly and very helpful.    We came here for a conference and the hotel is well set up for this venue.    They have a nice pool and spa. The Spa is a bit dated but ok. As for the room it is small but adequate. The A/c was not working the first night but in the AM I called the desk and they fixed it right away. There is also a nice 40 in. flat screen tv .They have installed a real nice electronics outlet station with plugins galore,s-video and hdmi for game stations.
